analyzed: prakaraṇa utpatti

original: śrīrāmāya namaḥ / oṃ
analyzed: śrī rāmāya namaḥ om

original: kṛtvā cittaṃ svabodhasmaraṇavinihataṃ prauḍhamohāndhakāraṃ smṛtvā jñānapradāṃ tāṃ sumahitavibhavāṃ śrīguroḥ pādukāṃ ca /
analyzed: kṛtvā cittam sva bodha smaraṇa vinihatam prauḍha moha andhakāram smṛtvā jñāna pradām tām su mahita vibhavām śrī guroḥ pādukām ca

original: dhyātvā vighnāntakaṃ taṃ śivasutam anaghaṃ śrīgaṇeśaṃ sureśam utpattyākhyāvagāhiprakaraṇavivṛtis tanyate bhāskareṇa //
analyzed: dhyātvā vighna antakam tam śivasutam anagham śrī gaṇeśam sureśam utpatti ākhyā avagāhi prakaraṇa vivṛtiḥ tanyate bhāskareṇa

original: evaṃ mumukṣuvyavahārākhye prakaraṇe vakṣyamāṇopadeśādhikāritvasampādananimittaṃ vyavahāraṃ
analyzed: evam mumukṣuvyavahāra ākhye prakaraṇe vakṣyamāṇa upadeśa adhikāri tva sampādana nimittam vyavahāram

original: pratipādya tacchravaṇamātreṇa ca śrīrāmaṃ prāptatadanuṣṭhānaphalaṃ vibhāvya prapañcasyānutpattisatattvotpattijñānam
analyzed: pratipādya tad śravaṇa mātreṇa ca śrī rāmam prāpta tad anuṣṭhāna phalam vibhāvya prapañcasya anutpatti sa tattva utpatti jñānam

original: upādeyabhūtamokṣaprāptau mūlakāraṇatayā niścitya tadupapādakam utpattiprakaraṇam
analyzed: upādeya bhūta mokṣa prāptau mūla kāraṇa tayā niścitya tad upapādakam utpatti prakaraṇam

original: ārabhamāṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇabrahmaikatvāśrayaṇena guruśiṣyabhāvānupapattiṃ puraskṛtya svavyatiriktaśiṣyopadeśabhāvena
analyzed: ārabhamāṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇa brahma ekatva āśrayaṇena guru śiṣya bhāva anupapattim puraskṛtya sva vyatirikta śiṣya upadeśa bhāvena

original: paraprayuktaṃ codyam abhiśaṅkamānaḥ taduddhāranimittabhūtaṃ brahmaikatve 'pi svapnadṛṣṭāntena
analyzed: para prayuktam codyam abhiśaṅkamānaḥ tad uddhāra nimitta bhūtam brahma ekatve api svapna dṛṣṭāntena

original: padārthabhedagrāhakaṃ brahmavidanubhavaṃ prathamaṃ kathayati //
analyzed: padārtha bheda grāhakam brahma vid anubhavam prathamam kathayati

original: vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani / yad-idaṃ-tat-sva-śabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat //MU_3,1.1//
analyzed: vāc bhābhiḥ brahma vid brahma bhāti svapne iva ātmani yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ yaḥ yat vetti sa vettu tat

original: uttaravākyasthaṃ vettīti padaṃ pūrvavākye 'pi yojanīyaṃ / tenāyam arthaḥ / brahmavit
analyzed: uttara vākya stham vetti iti padam pūrva vākye api yojanīyam tena ayam arthaḥ brahma vid

original: brahmajñānī / vetti anubhavati / kim iti karmāpekṣāyāṃ paśya mṛgo dhāvatītivat vākyaṃ
analyzed: brahma jñānī vetti anubhavati kim iti karma apekṣāyām paśya mṛgaḥ dhāvati itivat vākyam

original: karmatvena kathayati vāgbhābhir iti / brahma nānāpadārthabhāvena bṛṃhitaṃ kim api
analyzed: karma tvena kathayati vāc bhābhiḥ iti brahma nānā padārtha bhāvena bṛṃhitam kim api

original: sūkṣmaṃ vastu / bhāti vilasati / sphuratīti yāvat / kaiḥ bhāti / yad-idaṃ-tat-sva-śabdārthaiḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣmam vastu bhāti vilasati sphurati iti yāvat kaiḥ bhāti yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ

original: yadādisarvanāmaśabdavācyabhūtaiḥ padārthaiḥ / tadrūpeṇeti yāvat / itthambhāve tṛtīyā /
analyzed: yad ādi sarvanāma śabda vācya bhūtaiḥ padārthaiḥ tad rūpeṇa iti yāvat itthambhāve tṛtīyā

original: padārthānāṃ ca yadādisarvanāmavācyatvaṃ vastūpalakṣaṇaṃ / yatra sarvanāma prayujyate
analyzed: padārthānām ca yad ādi sarvanāma vācya tvam vastu upalakṣaṇam yatra sarvanāma prayujyate

original: dravyam ity ucyate / so 'rthaḥ bhedyatvena vivakṣita ity abhiyuktasmaraṇāt jñeyam /
analyzed: dravyam iti ucyate saḥ arthaḥ bhedya tvena vivakṣitaḥ iti abhiyukta smaraṇāt jñeyam

original: kutrādhāre bhāti / ātmani svabhittau / tadvyatiriktasya dvitīyasyābhāvāt / idaṃ bhānaṃ
analyzed: kutra ādhāre bhāti ātmani svabhittau tad vyatiriktasya dvitīyasya abhāvāt idam bhānam

original: ca arthāt jāgratkālīnaṃ jñeyam / svapnasya dṛṣṭāntatayopādānāt suṣupteḥ śūnyamātrabhānāspadatvāc
analyzed: ca arthāt jāgrat kālīnam jñeyam svapnasya dṛṣṭānta tayā upādānāt suṣupteḥ śūnya mātra bhāna āspada tvāt

original: ca / yad-idaṃ-tat-sva-śabdārthaiḥ kābhiḥ / vāgbhābhiḥ / vāg atra samānaviṣayatvena
analyzed: ca yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ kābhiḥ vāc bhābhiḥ vāc atra samāna viṣaya tvena

original: vikalpaḥ abhipretaḥ / tena vikalpabhānarūpair ity arthaḥ / bhāsamānā ete padārthāḥ
analyzed: vikalpaḥ abhipretaḥ tena vikalpa bhāna rūpaiḥ iti arthaḥ bhāsamānāḥ ete padārthāḥ

original: hi svapnapadārthavat vikalparūpā eva / tatsāratayā sthitasya śuddhacinmātrasyaiva
analyzed: hi svapna padārtha vat vikalpa rūpāḥ eva tad sāra tayā sthitasya śuddha cit mātrasya eva

original: vastutaḥ arthatvāt / kasminn iva bhāti / svapne iva / yathā svapne / brahma svapnapadārthatayā
analyzed: vastutas artha tvāt kasmin iva bhāti svapne iva yathā svapne brahma svapna padārtha tayā

original: bṛṃhitam / ātmākhye vastuni / ātmani svabhittau / vāgbhābhiḥ vikalpabhānabhūtaiḥ /
analyzed: bṛṃhitam ātma ākhye vastuni ātmani svabhittau vāc bhābhiḥ vikalpa bhāna bhūtaiḥ

original: yad-idaṃ-tat-sva-śabdārthaiḥ bhāti / tathā ity arthaḥ / svapne hi ātmabhāvena sthitasya
analyzed: yat idam tat sva śabdārthaiḥ bhāti tathā iti arthaḥ svapne hi ātma bhāvena sthitasya

original: brahmaṇaḥ padārthabhāvena bhānaṃ sarvasākṣikam eva / nanv anye bauddhādayaḥ sarvathā
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ padārtha bhāvena bhānam sarva sākṣikam eva nanu anye bauddha ādayaḥ sarvathā

original: padārthāpahnavaṃ kurvanti / tat kathaṃ tvayaivam uktam ity āha yo yad iti / yaḥ yaḥ
analyzed: padārtha apahnavam kurvanti tat katham tvayā evam uktam iti āha yaḥ yat iti yaḥ yaḥ

original: kaścit brahmavidaḥ bauddhādiḥ yat yat padārthānāṃ sarvathā asattvādi vetti anubhavati /
analyzed: kaścid brahma vidaḥ bauddha ādiḥ yat yat padārthānām sarvathā asattva ādi vetti anubhavati

original: saḥ tat vettu anubhavatu / kim asmākaṃ tadvedanena / brahmavidvedane eva tātparyāt
analyzed: saḥ tat vettu anubhavatu kim asmākam tad vedanena brahma vid vedane eva tātparyāt

original: iti bhāvaḥ / atra ca yacchabdaḥ idamāditrayeṇa saha samānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt sāmānyaniṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ atra ca yad śabdaḥ idam ādi trayeṇa saha samāna adhikaraṇya darśanāt sāmānya niṣṭhaḥ

original: śiṣṭāḥ idamādayaḥ trayaḥ viśeṣaniṣṭhāḥ / tatrāpi idaṃśabdaḥ pratyakṣavedyaniṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: śiṣṭāḥ idam ādayaḥ trayaḥ viśeṣa niṣṭhāḥ tatra api idam śabdaḥ pratyakṣa vedya niṣṭhaḥ

original: iti sarvanāmacatuṣkenaiva sarvapadārthākṣepasiddhāv anupayuktatvād anyeṣām akathanam
analyzed: iti sarvanāma catuṣkena eva sarva padārtha ākṣepa siddhau anupayukta tvāt anyeṣām a kathanam

original: iti jñeyam / atha vā brahmavid ity āmantraṇapadaṃ brahmajñānādhikṛte śrīrāme viśiṣṭādhikāritvasūcanāya
analyzed: iti jñeyam atha vā brahma vid iti āmantraṇa padam brahma jñāna adhikṛte śrī rāme viśiṣṭa adhikāri tva sūcanāya

original: prayuktaṃ / tathā ca
analyzed: prayuktam tathā ca

original: sphuṭa evārthaḥ / nāpi duryojakatvākhyadoṣāpattiḥ //MT_3,1.1//
analyzed: sphuṭaḥ eva arthaḥ nā api duryojaka tva ākhya doṣa āpattiḥ

original: proktabrahmavidanubhavāśrayaṇena śaṅkāviṣayīkṛtaṃ paraprayuktaṃ codyaṃ pariharati
analyzed: prokta brahma vid anubhava āśrayaṇena śaṅkā viṣayīkṛtam para prayuktam codyam pariharati

original: nyāyenānena sarvasmin sarge brahmāmbare sati / kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ //MU_3,1.2//
analyzed: nyāyena anena sarvasmin sarge brahma ambare sati kim idam kasya vakṣi iti codya cañcuḥ nirākṛtaḥ

original: anena nyāyena anayā padārthānāṃ brahmamayatve 'pi bhedasādhikayā brahmavidanubhavarūpayā
analyzed: anena nyāyena anayā padārthānām brahma maya tve api bheda sādhikayā brahma vid anubhava rūpayā

original: yuktyā / na tu padārthānāṃ sarvathāpahnavakāriṇyā bauddhādiyuktyā / sarge sṛjikriyākarmaṇi
analyzed: yuktyā na tu padārthānām sarvathā apahnava kāriṇyā bauddha ādi yuktyā sarge sṛji kriyā karmaṇi

original: bhāvajāte / brahmāmbare brahmākāśarūpe / sati / tvam kiṃrūpaḥ / tvam kim idaṃ kiṃrūpam
analyzed: bhāva jāte brahmāmbare brahmākāśa rūpe sati tvam kiṃrūpaḥ tvam kim idam kiṃrūpam

original: idaṃ śāstraṃ / kasya kiṃrūpasya śiṣyasya / vakṣi kathayasi / sarvasya brahmaikarūpatvāt /
analyzed: idam śāstram kasya kiṃrūpasya śiṣyasya vakṣi kathayasi sarvasya brahma eka rūpa tvāt

original: iti evaṃrūpaṃ / yat codyam ākṣepaḥ / tena cañcuḥ prasiddhaḥ / evaṃrūpacodyakārīti
analyzed: iti evaṃrūpam yat codyam ākṣepaḥ tena cañcuḥ prasiddhaḥ evaṃrūpa codya kārī iti

original: yāvat / nirākṛtaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ bhavati / tena vitta iti cañcuppratyayaḥ / vittaḥ
analyzed: yāvat nirākṛtaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ bhavati tena vitta iti cañcup pratyayaḥ vittaḥ

original: prasiddha ity arthaḥ / nanu katham etena codyanirāsaḥ / ucyate / brahmavidā paramārthena
analyzed: prasiddhaḥ iti arthaḥ nanu katham etena codya nirāsaḥ ucyate brahma vidā paramārthena

original: brahmaikatve 'pi vyavahāradaśāyāṃ svapnatulyasya śiṣyasya yādṛśo yakṣaḥ tādṛśo balir
analyzed: brahma ekatve api vyavahāra daśāyām svapna tulyasya śiṣyasya yādṛśaḥ yakṣaḥ tādṛśaḥ baliḥ

original: iti nyāyāśrayaṇena tadrūpopadeśakaraṇaṃ yuktam eva svapnatulyasya jagataḥ aṅgīkaraṇāt /
analyzed: iti nyāya āśrayaṇena tad rūpa upadeśa karaṇam yuktam eva svapna tulyasya jagataḥ aṅgīkaraṇāt

original: sarvathā padārthāpahnavakāriṇāṃ bauddhādīnām evedaṃ codyaṃ yuktam iti //MT_3,1.2 //
analyzed: sarvathā padārtha apahnava kāriṇām bauddha ādīnām evā idam codyam yuktam iti

original: evaṃ śaṅkitacodyanirāsaṃ kṛtvā svopadeśaṃ prati śrotṝn saṃmukhīkaroti
analyzed: evam śaṅkita codya nirāsam kṛtvā sva upadeśam prati śrotṝn saṃmukhīkaroti

original: ahaṃ tāvad yathājñānaṃ yathāvastu yathākramam / yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ //MU_3,1.3//
analyzed: aham tāvat yathājñānam yathāvastu yathākramam yathāsvabhāvam vacmi idam tat sarvam śrūyatām budhāḥ

original: tāvacchabdaḥ sākalye / ahaṃ vasiṣṭhākhyaḥ guruḥ / idaṃ mokṣopāyābhidhaṃ śāstraṃ /
analyzed: tāvat śabdaḥ sākalye aham vasiṣṭha ākhyaḥ guruḥ idam mokṣa upāya abhidham śāstram

original: tāvat sākalyena / vacmi kathayāmi / kathaṃ vacmi / yathājñānam jñānānusāreṇa / tathā
analyzed: tāvat sākalyena vacmi kathayāmi katham vacmi yathājñānam jñāna anusāreṇa tathā

original: yathāvastu vastvanusāreṇa / tadvat yathākramam kramānusāreṇa / punaḥ katham / yathāsvabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yathāvastu vastu anusāreṇa tadvat yathākramam krama anusāreṇa punar katham yathāsvabhāvam

original: svabhāvānusāreṇa / jñānādayaḥ catvāra eva hi śāstrapravṛttinimittabhūtāḥ / tat tato
analyzed: svabhāva anusāreṇa jñāna ādayaḥ catvāraḥ eva hi śāstra pravṛtti nimitta bhūtāḥ

original: hetoḥ / he budhāḥ / yuṣmābhiḥ sarvam śrūyatām śravaṇagocarīkriyatām / budhā ity āmantraṇapadaṃ
analyzed: hetoḥ he budhāḥ yuṣmābhiḥ sarvam śrūyatām śravaṇa gocarīkriyatām budhāḥ iti āmantraṇa padam

original: budhānām evaitacchāstraśravaṇe adhikāritvaṃ sūcayati / sarvam ity anena sakalam idaṃ
analyzed: budhānām eva etad śāstra śravaṇe adhikāri tvam sūcayati sarvam iti anena sakalam idam

original: śrutvā paramaprayojanāvāptiḥ bhaviṣyatīty ardhād utthāya na gantavyam iti sūcitam //MT_3,1.3 //
analyzed: śrutvā parama prayojana avāptiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ardhāt utthāya na gantavyam iti sūcitam

original: evaṃ śravaṇayogyaṃ budhavargaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtyotpattiprakaraṇatātparyārthaṃ ślokena saṅgṛhya kathayati
analyzed: evam śravaṇa yogyam budha vargam saṃmukhīkṛtya utpatti prakaraṇa tātparya artham ślokena saṅgṛhya kathayati

original: svapnavat paśyati jagac cinnabho dehavinmayam / svapnasaṃsāradṛṣṭāntā ihaivāntaḥ samanvitāḥ //MU_3,1.4//
analyzed: svapna vat paśyati jagat cit nabhaḥ deha vid mayam svapna saṃsāra dṛṣṭāntāḥ iha eva antar samanvitāḥ

original: cetayati pāṣāṇaprakhyaṃ karaṇavargaṃ svāveśena cetanakriyākartṛtve prerayatīti cit
analyzed: cetayati pāṣāṇa prakhyam karaṇa vargam sva āveśena cetana kriyā kartṛ tve prerayati iti cit

original: sarvāntargataṃ kim api śuddhaṃ tattvaṃ / atha vā cetatīti cit citikriyākartṛbhūtaṃ
analyzed: sarva antargatam kim api śuddham tattvam atha vā cetati iti cit citi kriyā kartṛ bhūtam

original: kim api tattvam / sā eva nabhaḥ sarvavyāpakatvāt ākāśaṃ / tat cinnabhaḥ cidākāśaḥ /
analyzed: kim api tattvam sā eva nabhaḥ sarva vyāpaka tvāt ākāśam tat cit nabhaḥ cit ākāśaḥ

original: jagat gamanaśīlam dṛśyaprapañcaṃ / svapnavat paśyati svapnavat svayaṃ kalpayitvā
analyzed: jagat gamana śīlam dṛśya prapañcam svapna vat paśyati svapna vat svayam kalpayitvā

original: anubhavati / kīdṛśaṃ jagat / dehavinmayaṃ / dehavit deho 'ham iti jñānam / ahaṅkāra
analyzed: anubhavati kīdṛśam jagat deha vid mayam deha vid dehaḥ aham iti jñānam ahaṅkāra

original: iti yāvat / tasya vikāraḥ dehavinmayaṃ ahaṅkārasvarūpaṃ / na tu śuddham ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: iti yāvat tasya vikāraḥ dehavit mayam ahaṅkāra svarūpam na tu śuddham iti arthaḥ

original: nanu svapnaḥ kim iha dṛṣṭāntatvena datta ity / atrāha svapneti / svapne dṛṣṭāḥ saṃsārāḥ
analyzed: nanu svapnaḥ kim iha dṛṣṭānta tvena dattaḥ iti atra āha svapna iti svapne dṛṣṭāḥ saṃsārāḥ

original: svapnasaṃsārāḥ / te eva dṛṣṭāntāḥ nirṇayasthānāni / te svapnasaṃsāradṛṣṭāntāḥ ihaivāsmin
analyzed: svapna saṃsārāḥ te eva dṛṣṭāntāḥ nirṇaya sthānāni te svapna saṃsāra dṛṣṭāntāḥ iha eva asmin

original: jāgratprapañce evāntaḥ / samyak / na tu āmukha eva / anvitāḥ sambaddhāḥ bhavanti /
analyzed: jāgrat prapañce eva antar samyak na tu āmukhe eva anvitāḥ sambaddhāḥ bhavanti

original: kalpanāmātrasiddhatvāt / ataḥ svapnasya dṛṣṭāntatvam uktam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.4 //
analyzed: kalpanā mātra siddha tvāt atas svapnasya dṛṣṭānta tvam uktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: saṅgraheṇoktam arthaṃ mūḍhabuddhiṣu praveśanāya svataḥ sarvajñaṃ śrīrāmaṃ madhyekṛtya vistārayituṃ prastauti
analyzed: saṅgraheṇa uktam artham mūḍha buddhiṣu praveśanāya svatas sarvajñam śrī rāmam madhyekṛtya vistārayitum prastauti

original: mumukṣuvyavahāroktimayāt prakaraṇāt param / athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ mayedaṃ parikathyate //MU_3,1.5 //mumukṣuvyavahārasyoktiḥ
analyzed: mumukṣu vyavahāra ukti mayāt prakaraṇāt param atha utpatti prakaraṇam mayā idam parikathyate mumukṣu vyavahārasya uktiḥ

original: prācuryeṇa prastutā yasmin / tat mumukṣuvyavahāroktimayaṃ / tādṛśāt prakaraṇāt /
analyzed: prācuryeṇa prastutāḥ yasmin tat mumukṣu vyavahāra ukti mayam tādṛśāt prakaraṇāt

original: mumukṣuvyavahārākhyāt prakaraṇād iti yāvat / param anyat / parikathyate samyak kathyate //MT_3,1.5 //
analyzed: mumukṣu vyavahāra ākhyāt prakaraṇāt iti yāvat param anyat parikathyate samyak kathyate

original: pratijñātaprakaraṇārambhaṃ karoti
analyzed: pratijñāta prakaraṇa ārambham karoti

original: bandho 'yaṃ dṛśyasadbhāvo dṛśyābhāve na bandhanam / na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt //MU_3,1.6//
analyzed: bandhaḥ ayam dṛśya sadbhāvaḥ dṛśya abhāve na bandhanam na sambhavati dṛśyam tu yathā idam tat śṛṇu kramāt

original: ayam anubhūyamānaḥ / bandhaḥ dṛśyāsaktatvaṃ / dṛśyasadbhāvaḥ dṛśyena dṛśikriyāviṣayeṇa
analyzed: ayam anubhūyamānaḥ bandhaḥ dṛśya āsakta tvam dṛśya sadbhāvaḥ dṛśyena dṛśi kriyā viṣayeṇa

original: bhāvajātena / sadbhāvaḥ svarūpalābhaḥ / draṣṭāraṃ prati sphuraṇam iti yāvat / yasya /
analyzed: bhāva jātena sadbhāvaḥ svarūpa lābhaḥ draṣṭāram prati sphuraṇam iti yāvat yasya

original: saḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavati / dṛśyābhāve sati bandhanaṃ bandhaḥ / na bhavati / na hi rajjvabhāve
analyzed: saḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavati dṛśya abhāve sati bandhanam bandhaḥ na bhavati na hi rajju abhāve

original: bandhanaṃ dṛṣṭam / nanu sato dṛśyasya katham abhāvaḥ setsyatīty / atrāha na sambhavatīti /
analyzed: bandhanam dṛṣṭam nanu sataḥ dṛśyasya katham abhāvaḥ setsyati iti atra āha na sambhavati iti

original: tuśabdaḥ sambhavinaḥ śuddhadraṣṭuḥ sakāśāt dṛśyasya vyatirekadyotakaḥ / dṛśyaṃ na
analyzed: tuśabdaḥ sambhavinaḥ śuddha draṣṭuḥ sakāśāt dṛśyasya vyatireka dyotakaḥ dṛśyam na

original: sambhavati sambhavanakriyākartṛtvaṃ na bhajati / svapnanyāyena pratītimātrasiddhatvāt /
analyzed: sambhavati sambhavana kriyā kartṛ tvam na bhajati svapna nyāyena pratīti mātra siddha tvāt

original: nanu katham etad ity / atrāha yathedam iti / idaṃ dṛśyāsambhavanaṃ / yathā bhavati /
analyzed: nanu katham etat iti atra āha yathā idam iti idam dṛśya asambhavanam yathā bhavati

original: tat kramāt śṛṇu //MT_3,1.6 //
analyzed: tat kramāt śṛṇu

original: nanu kimartham utpattiprakaraṇam eva prathamaṃ kathayasīty apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: nanu kimartham utpatti prakaraṇam eva prathamam kathayasi iti apekṣāyām āha

original: utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate / sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā //MU_3,1.7//
analyzed: utpadyate yaḥ jagati saḥ eva kila vardhate saḥ eva mokṣam āpnoti svargam vā narakam ca vā

original: dharmādharmollaṅghanena mokṣam / dharmeṇa svargam / adharmeṇa narakam iti vibhāgaḥ //MT_3,1.7//
analyzed: dharma adharma ullaṅghanena mokṣam dharmeṇa svargam adharmeṇa narakam iti vibhāgaḥ

original: nanu tataḥ kim ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatas kim iti atra āha

original: atas teṣv avabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham / utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā //MU_3,1.8//
analyzed: atas teṣu avabodha artham tat tāvat kathayāmi aham utpattim saṃsṛtau eti pūrvam eva hi yaḥ yathā

original: yataḥ utpattyādīnām ekādhikaraṇatvaṃ asti / ataḥ teṣu kramabhāviṣu utpattyādiṣu madhye /
analyzed: yatas utpatti ādīnām eka adhikaraṇa tvam asti atas teṣu krama bhāviṣu utpatti ādiṣu madhye

original: avabodhārthaṃ tvajjñānārthaṃ / ihāsmin prakaraṇe / aham tāvat prathamaṃ / tat kathayāmi /
analyzed: avabodha artham tvad jñāna artham iha asmin prakaraṇe aham tāvat prathamam tat kathayāmi

original: tat kiṃ / yaḥ puruṣaḥ / yathā yena prakāreṇa / saṃsṛtau saṃsaraṇasvabhāve saṃsāre /
analyzed: tat kim yaḥ puruṣaḥ yathā yena prakāreṇa saṃsṛtau saṃsaraṇa svabhāve saṃsāre

original: pūrvam eva sargādau eva / utpattim eti brahmaṇaḥ vyatiriktatvena sattāṃ bhajati /
analyzed: pūrvam eva sarga ādau eva utpattim eti brahmaṇaḥ vyatirikta tvena sattām bhajati

original: tato 'nantaraṃ sthitiprakaraṇādau vardhanādikam api kathayāmīti bhāvaḥ / hiśabdaḥ
analyzed: tatas anantaram sthiti prakaraṇa ādau vardhana ādikam api kathayāmi iti bhāvaḥ hi śabdaḥ

original: niścaye / ata evāsya prakaraṇasyotpattiprakaraṇam iti nāmāpi bhavatīti jñeyam //MT_3,1.8 //
analyzed: niścaye atas eva asya prakaraṇasya utpatti prakaraṇam iti nāma api bhavati iti jñeyam

original: tatra tāvat saṅkṣepakathanaṃ pratijānīte
analyzed: tatra tāvat saṅkṣepa kathanam pratijānīte

original: idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava / tataḥ prakathayiṣyāmi vistaraṃ te yathepsitam //MU_3,1.9//
analyzed: idam prakaraṇa artham tvam saṅkṣepāt śṛṇu rāghava tatas prakathayiṣyāmi vistaram te yathā īpsitam

original: he rāghava / tvam idam jagadutpattirūpaṃ / prakaraṇārthaṃ utpattiprakaraṇābhidheyaṃ /
analyzed: he rāghava tvam idam jagat utpatti rūpam prakaraṇa artham utpatti prakaraṇa abhidheyam

original: saṅkṣepāt saṅkṣepeṇa śṛṇu / tataḥ saṅkṣepānantaram / yathepsitaṃ īpsitānusāri vistaraṃ
analyzed: saṅkṣepāt saṅkṣepeṇa śṛṇu tatas saṅkṣepa anantaram yathā īpsitam īpsita anusāri vistaram

original: kathayiṣyāmi / saṅkṣepakathanena vinā tvatsandehānutthānāt vistareṇa kathanaṃ na
analyzed: kathayiṣyāmi saṅkṣepa kathanena vinā tvad sandeha anutthānāt vistareṇa kathanam na

original: sambhavati / sandehaviṣayatvāt vistarasyeti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.9 //
analyzed: sambhavati sandeha viṣaya tvāt vistarasya iti bhāvaḥ

original: pratijñātāṃ saṅkṣepataḥ jagadutpattiṃ kathayiṣyan prapañcākrāntabuddheḥ śiṣyasya
analyzed: pratijñātām saṅkṣepataḥ jagat utpattim kathayiṣyan prapañca ākrānta buddheḥ śiṣyasya

original: vidhimukhena mūlakāraṇasvarūpakathanam ayuktaṃ jñātvā sthūṇānikhanananyāyam āśritya
analyzed: vidhi mukhena mūla kāraṇa svarūpa kathanam ayuktam jñātvā sthūṇā nikhanana nyāyam āśritya

original: jagannāśamukhena mūlakāraṇasvarūpaṃ kathayituṃ prastauti
analyzed: jagat nāśa mukhena mūlakāraṇa svarūpam kathayitum prastauti

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / / tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati //MU_3,1.10//
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam   tat suṣupte iva svapnaḥ kalpa ante pravinaśyati

original: asmābhiḥ yat / idam purovarti / sthāvarajaṅgamaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamasvarūpa / jagat naśvaraṃ
analyzed: asmābhiḥ yat idam purovarti sthāvara jaṅgamam sthāvara jaṅgama svarūpa jagat naśvaram

original: bhāvajātaṃ / dṛśyate anubhūyate / tat kalpānte āntarārthavivakṣāyāṃ sarvadṛśyakṣayarūpāyāṃ
analyzed: bhāva jātam dṛśyate anubhūyate tat kalpa ante āntara artha vivakṣāyām sarva dṛśya kṣaya rūpāyām

original: turyāvasthāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ tadatītāvasthāyāṃ ca / bāhyārthavivakṣāyāṃ tu kālāntarabhāvini
analyzed: turya avasthāyām viśeṣataḥ tad atīta avasthāyām ca bāhya artha vivakṣāyām tu kāla antara bhāvini

original: pralayakāle / pravinaśyati prakarṣeṇa saṃskārākhyāt mūlād ādhārād naśyati / mūlakāraṇabhāvenāvasthānāt
analyzed: pralaya kāle pravinaśyati prakarṣeṇa saṃskāra ākhyāt mūlāt ādhārāt naśyati mūla kāraṇa bhāvena avasthānāt

original: adarśanaṃ yāti / ka iva / svapna iva / yathā suṣupte svapnaḥ naśyati / tathety arthaḥ /
analyzed: adarśanam yāti kaḥ iva svapnaḥ iva yathā suṣupte svapnaḥ naśyati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu suṣuptau jagato bījabhāvenāvasthānāt anyathā punarbhavāyogāt katham ayam upamānopameyabhāvaḥ
analyzed: nanu suṣuptau jagataḥ bīja bhāvena avasthānāt anyathā punarbhava ayogāt katham ayam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ

original: siddhyatīti cen / na / staimityākhyasya sāmānyadharmasyobhayatrāpy avasthānāt sāmānyadharmamātrāśrayaṇenaiva
analyzed: siddhi ati iti ced na staimitya ākhyasya sāmānya dharmasya ubhayatra api avasthānāt sāmānya dharma mātra āśrayaṇena eva

original: hi upamānopameyabhāvaḥ uttiṣṭhati / iti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ //MT_3,1.10 //
analyzed: hi upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ uttiṣṭhati iti na kaḥ api virodhaḥ

original: yatsvarūpaprakaṭanārtham ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ tan mūlakāraṇaṃ śeṣatvena kathayati
analyzed: yad svarūpa prakaṭana artham ayam yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ tat mūlakāraṇam śeṣa tvena kathayati

original: tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam / anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yat kiñcid
analyzed: tatas stimita gambhīram na tejaḥ na tamaḥ tatam an ākhyam an abhivyaktam yat kiñcid

original: avaśiṣyate //MU_3,1.11 //tataḥ prapañcanāśānantaram / yat kiñcit kenāpi nāmnā vaktum
analyzed: avaśiṣyate tatas prapañca nāśa anantaram yat kiñcid kena api nāmnā vaktum

original: aśākyaṃ kim api sūkṣmaṃ vastu / śiṣyate śeṣatayā tiṣṭhati / tasyāpi nāśe nāśopalabdhur
analyzed: a śākyam kim api sūkṣmam vastu śiṣyate śeṣa tayā tiṣṭhati tasya api nāśe nāśa upalabdhuḥ

original: abhāvena sampanno 'pi prapañcanāśaḥ / asatkalpa eva syād iti bhāvaḥ / nanu nāmataḥ
analyzed: abhāvena sampannaḥ api prapañca nāśaḥ asat kalpaḥ eva syāt iti bhāvaḥ nanu nāmataḥ

original: tad vastu kathaṃ noktam ity / atra viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āhānākhyam iti / anākhyam
analyzed: tat vastu katham na uktam iti atra viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha anākhyam iti anākhyam

original: ākhyākartṛtvena sthitatvāt ākhyākarmatāṃ netum aśakyam / nanu kathaṃ tad anākhyam
analyzed: ākhyā kartṛ tvena sthita tvāt ākhyā karmatām netum aśakyam nanu katham tat anākhyam

original: astīty / atrāpi viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āhānabhivyaktam iti / anabhivyaktam atisūkṣmatvāt /
analyzed: asti iti atra api viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha anabhivyaktam iti anabhivyaktam ati sūkṣma tvāt

original: bāhyāntaratvena sthitair indriyair apratyakṣīkṛtam ity arthaḥ / bāhyāntarendriyāpratyakṣasya
analyzed: bāhya antara tvena sthitaiḥ indriyaiḥ apratyakṣīkṛtam iti arthaḥ bāhya antara indriya apratyakṣasya

original: cānākhyatvaṃ sphuṭam eva / vāgindriyasyāpi agamyatvāt / nanv anabhivyaktatvam api
analyzed: ca anākhyatvam sphuṭam eva vāc indriyasya api agamya tvāt nanu anabhivyakta tvam api

original: kathaṃ tasyāstīty / atrāpi viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āha na tejo na tama iti / cetyakalitaṃ
analyzed: katham tasya asti iti atra api viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha na tejaḥ na tamaḥ iti ca iti akalitam

original: cinmātraṃ tejaḥ / taccetyaṃ tamaḥ / atha vā sūryādikaṃ tejaḥ / andhakāraḥ tamaḥ tadvyatiriktasvarūpam
analyzed: cit mātram tejaḥ tat cetyam tamaḥ atha vā sūrya ādikam tejaḥ andhakāraḥ tamaḥ tad vyatirikta svarūpam

original: ity arthaḥ / tathā ca tasyānabhivyaktatvam eva / tejastamasor eva abhivyaktiviṣayatvāt /
analyzed: iti arthaḥ tathā ca tasya anabhivyakta tvam eva tejaḥ tamasoḥ eva abhivyakti viṣaya tvāt

original: tathāpi śūnyatāpattim āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āha tatam iti / sarvatra protasvarūpam ity
analyzed: tathā api śūnyatā āpattim āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āha tatam iti sarvatra prota svarūpam iti

original: arthaḥ / śūnyatve kathaṃ tatatvaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ / kena svarūpeṇa tasya protatvam
analyzed: arthaḥ śūnya tve katham tata tvam syāt iti bhāvaḥ kena svarūpeṇa tasya prota tvam

original: astīty / atrāha stimitagambhīram iti / stimitaṃ ca tat gambhīraṃ ceti stimitagambhīram /
analyzed: asti iti atra āha stimita gambhīram iti stimitam ca tat gambhīram ca iti stimita gambhīram

original: cinmātrarūpatvena cetyabhāvarūpasya prasaraṇasyābhāvāt niḥspandam / nirālambanatvena
analyzed: cit mātra rūpa tvena cetya bhāva rūpasya prasaraṇasya abhāvāt niḥspandam nirālambana tvena

original: svabhinnasyāvagāḍhuḥ abhāvāt duravagāhaṃ cety arthaḥ / ataś ca nirālambaśuddhacinmātrarūpatayā
analyzed: sva bhinnasya avagāḍhuḥ abhāvāt duravagāham ca iti arthaḥ atas ca nirālamba śuddha cit mātra rūpa tayā

original: protam astīti bhāvaḥ / yady api nāsargaṃ tiṣṭhati / param iti vakṣyamāṇanītyā tasya
analyzed: protam asti iti bhāvaḥ yadi api na āsargam tiṣṭhati param iti vakṣyamāṇa nītyā tasya

original: tattvasya prapañcodbhāvanaṃ prati sarvadaiva spando vartata eveti / śuddhatayā sthitasya
analyzed: tattvasya prapañca udbhāvanam prati sarvadā eva spandaḥ vartate eva iti śuddha tayā sthitasya

original: tasyopalabdhiḥ kadāpi na sambhavaty eva / tathāpi deśād deśāntaraṃ dūram ityādivakṣyamāṇanītyā
analyzed: tasya upalabdhiḥ kadāpi na sambhavati eva tathā api deśāt deśa antaram dūram ityādi vakṣyamāṇa nītyā

original: madhyavṛttiṣu sadā tadupalabdhiḥ sambhavaty eveti na vimukhena bhavitavyam / videhamuktānāṃ
analyzed: madhya vṛttiṣu sadā tad upalabdhiḥ sambhavati evā iti na vimukhena bhavitavyam videha muktānām

original: tu sarvadā tanmayatvam api sambhavati / yataḥ asya cinmātratattvasyedṛśa eva mahimā
analyzed: tu sarvadā tanmaya tvam api sambhavati yatas asya cit mātra tattvasya īdṛśaḥ eva mahimā

original: bhavati / yat sarvadā viśvamayaṃ tad uttīrṇaṃ ca bhavatīti na kiñcid viruddham //MT_3,1.11 //
analyzed: bhavati yat sarvadā viśva mayam tat uttīrṇam ca bhavati iti na kiñcid viruddham

original: nanu yadi tat tattvam anākhyam asti tat kathaṃ budhaiḥ tasya tattvasya ṛtaṃ ātmetyādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kṛtāḥ ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi tat tattvam anākhyam asti tat katham budhaiḥ tasya tattvasya ṛtam ātmā ityādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kṛtāḥ iti atra āha

original: ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ / kalpitā vyavahārārthaṃ yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ //MU_3,1.12//
analyzed: ṛtam ātmā param brahma satyam iti ādikā budhaiḥ kalpitā vyavahāra artham yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ

original: budhaiḥ tatsākṣātkāravadbhiḥ / kalpitāḥ kalpanayā bhāvitāḥ / vyavahārārthaṃ śiṣyopadeśākhyavyavahārasampādanārtham /
analyzed: budhaiḥ tad sākṣātkāravadbhiḥ kalpitāḥ kalpanayā bhāvitāḥ vyavahāra artham śiṣya upadeśa ākhya vyavahāra sampādana artham

original: na tu kiñcit pravṛttinimittam upādāya ṛtādikāḥ sañjñāḥ tatra pravartante iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.12 //
analyzed: na tu kiñcid pravṛtti nimittam upādāya ṛta ādikāḥ sañjñāḥ tatra pravartante iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tat īdṛśaṃ bhavatu / kiṃ tata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tat īdṛśam bhavatu kim tatas iti atra āha

original: sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan / jīvatām upayātīva bhāvināmakadarthanām //MU_3,1.13//
analyzed: sa tathābhūtaḥ eva ātmā svayam anyaḥ iva ullasan jīvatām upayāti iva bhāvinām akadarthanām

original: tathābhūta eva paramārthataḥ proktāt svarūpād apracyuta eva / saḥ ātmā proktaviśeṣaṇayuktam
analyzed: tathābhūtaḥ eva paramārthataḥ proktāt svarūpāt apracyutaḥ eva saḥ ātmā prokta viśeṣaṇa yuktam

original: sarvadā bhātatvena sātatyagamanakriyākartṛbhūtaṃ cinmātrākhyaṃ tattvam / jīvatām
analyzed: sarvadā bhāta tvena sātatya gamana kriyā kartṛ bhūtam cit mātra ākhyam tattvam jīvatām

original: sātatyagamanaviruddhasvabhāvaprāṇadhāraṇakriyākartṛbhūtaṃ jīvabhāvam / upayātīva
analyzed: sātatya gamana viruddha svabhāva prāṇa dhāraṇa kriyā kartṛ bhūtam jīva bhāvam upayāti iva

original: gacchatīva / saḥ ātmā kim kurvan / anya ivollasan / svayaṃ svaviṣayatāsādanena svavyatiriktaṃ /
analyzed: gacchati iva saḥ ātmā kim kurvan anyaḥ iva ullasan svayam sva viṣaya tā āsādanena sva vyatiriktam

original: cetyarūpa iva ullasan / svaparāmarśanamātreṇaiva hi cinmātrasya cetyarūpo jīvādibhāvaḥ
analyzed: cetya rūpaḥ iva ullasan sva parāmarśana mātreṇa eva hi cit mātrasya cetya rūpaḥ jīva ādi bhāvaḥ

original: bhavati / tathābhūta iti padam ivaśabdadvayasya yogyatāṃ kathayati / na hi tathābhūtasya
analyzed: bhavati tathābhūtaḥ iti padam iva śabda dvayasya yogyatām kathayati na hi tathābhūtasya

original: paramārthataḥ atathābhāvo yuktaḥ / na hi sadā jalabhāvāt apracyutasya jalasya taraṅgatāsādane
analyzed: paramārthataḥ atathābhāvaḥ yuktaḥ na hi sadā jala bhāvāt apracyutasya jalasya taraṅga tā āsādane

original: 'pi paramārthataḥ ajalabhāvo yuktaḥ / jīvatāṃ kathambhūtāṃ / bhāvināmakadarthanām /
analyzed: api paramārthataḥ ajala bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ jīvatām kathambhūtām bhāvinām akadarthanām

original: bhāvinīṃ agre / bhavanaśīlā nāmakadarthanā jīveti nāmarūpā / kadarthanā mālinyaṃ
analyzed: bhāvinīm agre bhavana śīlā nāma kadarthanā jīva iti nāma rūpā kadarthanā mālinyam

original: yasyāḥ / tām / jīveti nāmayogyām ity arthaḥ / bhāvitvaṃ ca nāmnaḥ vaikharīprādurbhāve
analyzed: yasyāḥ tām jīva iti nāma yogyām iti arthaḥ bhāvi tvam ca nāmnaḥ vaikharī prādurbhāve

original: jñeyam //MT_3,1.13 //
analyzed: jñeyam

original: adhunā tasyaiva jīvatvānantarabhāvinīṃ manastāṃ kathayati
analyzed: adhunā tasya eva jīva tva anantara bhāvinīm manaḥ tām kathayati

original: tataḥ sa jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatāṃ gataḥ / mano bhavati maunātma mananān mantharībhavan //MU_3,1.14//
analyzed: tatas sa jīva śabda artha kalanā ākula tām gataḥ manaḥ bhavati mauna ātma mananāt mantharībhavan

original: tataḥ jīvabhāvānantaram / saḥ ātmā / manaḥ bhavati / kīdṛśaṃ manaḥ / maunātma / sahajasvarūpavimarśāsāmarthyaṃ
analyzed: tatas jīva bhāva anantaram saḥ ātmā manaḥ bhavati kīdṛśam manaḥ mauna ātma sahaja svarūpa vimarśa a sāmarthyam

original: maunaṃ / tadrūpam kutaḥ bhavatīty / atra hetugarbhaṃ viśeṣaṇam āha / mantharībhavann
analyzed: maunam tad rūpam kutas bhavati iti atra hetu garbham viśeṣaṇam āha mantharībhavan

original: iti / yataḥ mantharībhavan alasībhavan bhavati ity arthaḥ / kutaḥ mantharībhavan
analyzed: iti yatas mantharībhavan alasībhavan bhavati iti arthaḥ kutas mantharībhavan

original: ity apekṣāyām āha / mananād iti / mananāj jīvatvamananākhyāt dharmāt / mananaparatvenaiva
analyzed: iti apekṣāyām āha mananāt iti mananāt jīva tva manana ākhyāt dharmāt manana para tvena eva

original: hi ātmā svaparāmarśaṃ prati mantharībhavati / tataḥ manorūpaṃ bhavati / kathambhūtaḥ
analyzed: hi ātmā sva parāmarśam prati mantharībhavati tatas manaḥ rūpam bhavati kathambhūtaḥ

original: saḥ / jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatām / jīvasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ jīvaśabdaḥ / tasya yaḥ
analyzed: saḥ jīva śabda artha kalanā ākula tām jīvasya vācakaḥ śabdaḥ jīva śabdaḥ tasya yaḥ

original: arthaḥ aṇurūpaḥ jīvaḥ / tasya yaḥ kalanā svarūpatayā parāmarśaḥ / tayā yā ākulatā /
analyzed: arthaḥ aṇurūpaḥ jīvaḥ tasya yaḥ kalanā sva rūpa tayā parāmarśaḥ tayā yā ākula tā

original: tām gataḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / sarvathā cetyavyatiriktasvarūpaṃ cinmātraṃ prathamaṃ cittvenāham
analyzed: tām gataḥ ayam bhāvaḥ sarvathā cetya vyatirikta svarūpam cit mātram prathamam cit tvena aham

original: iti svaparā-marśaṃ karoti / tatra grāhakatayā sthitasya bhāgasya cid iti nāma / grāhyatayā
analyzed: iti sva parāmarśam karoti tatra grāhaka tayā sthitasya bhāgasya cit iti nāma grāhya tayā

original: sthitasya tu jīvatvaṃ / tataḥ tasya jīvasya svasmin aṇutvaparāmarśo bhavati / tad
analyzed: sthitasya tu jīva tvam tatas tasya jīvasya svasmin aṇu tva parāmarśaḥ bhavati tat

original: eva ca tasya manastvam iti //MT_3,1.14 //
analyzed: eva ca tasya manaḥ tvam iti

original: phalitaṃ kathayati
analyzed: phalitam kathayati

original: manaḥ sampadyate tena mahataḥ paramātmanaḥ / susthirād asthirākāras taraṅga iva vāridheḥ //MU_3,1.15//
analyzed: manaḥ sampadyate tena mahataḥ paramātmanaḥ susthirāt asthira ākāraḥ taraṅgaḥ iva vāridheḥ

original: tena tataḥ hetoḥ / manaḥ aṇurūpaṃ cittaṃ / mahataḥ vyāpakāt / paramātmanaḥ sampadyate
analyzed: tena tatas hetoḥ manaḥ aṇu rūpam cittam mahataḥ vyāpakāt paramātmanaḥ sampadyate

original: prādurbhavati / ka iva / taraṅga iva / yathā susthirāt vāridheḥ samudrāt / asthirākāraḥ
analyzed: prādurbhavati kaḥ iva taraṅgaḥ iva yathā susthirāt vāridheḥ samudrāt asthira ākāraḥ

original: taraṅgaḥ sampadyate / tathety arthaḥ / atra ca susthiratvaṃ taraṅgāpekṣayā jñeyam //MT_3,1.15 //
analyzed: taraṅgaḥ sampadyate tathā iti arthaḥ atra ca susthira tvam taraṅga apekṣayā jñeyam

original: manasaḥ utpattim uktvā tatkāryabhūtasya jagataḥ utpattiṃ kathayati
analyzed: manasaḥ utpattim uktvā tad kārya bhūtasya jagataḥ utpattim kathayati

original: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ / teneyam indrajālaśrīr vitateva vitanyate //MU_3,1.16//
analyzed: tat svayam svairam eva āśu saṅkalpayati nityaśas tena iyam indrajāla śrīḥ vitatā iva vitanyate

original: tat paramātmoktaṃ manaḥ / svayam / na tu anyat kiñcit madhyekṛtya / svairam svecchayā /
analyzed: tat paramātma uktam manaḥ svayam na tu anyat kiñcid madhyekṛtya svairam sva icchayā

original: na tu parapreraṇayā / saṅkalpayati saṅkalpaṃ karoti / ataḥ tena manasā / iyam anubhūyamānā /
analyzed: na tu para preraṇayā saṅkalpayati saṅkalpam karoti atas tena manasā iyam anubhūyamānā

original: indrajālaśrīḥ mithyābhātattvena indrajālavat bhāsamānatvāt indriyajālasampadrūpā
sṛṣṭiḥ / vitanyate vistāryate / kathambhūteva / vitateva vistīrṇā iva / paramārthataḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭiḥ vitanyate vistāryate kathambhūtā iva vitatā iva vistīrṇā iva paramārthataḥ

original: aṇusvarūpe manasi sthitatvāt vaitatyarahitetīvaśabdopādānam //MT_3,1.16 //
analyzed: aṇu svarūpe manasi sthita tvāt vaitatya rahitā iti iva śabda upādānam

original: paramātmotthān manasaḥ sṛṣṭyutthānakathanaphalam āha
yathā kaṭakaśabdārthaḥ pṛthaktvārho 'sti kānake / na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare //MU_3,1.17//
analyzed: yathā kaṭaka śabda arthaḥ pṛthaktva arhaḥ asti kānake na nāma kaṭake tadvat jagat śabda artha tā pare

original: yathā kaṭakaśabdārthaḥ kaṭakaśabdābhidheyabhūtaḥ sanniveśaviśeṣaḥ / pṛthaktvārhaḥ /
analyzed: yathā kaṭaka śabda arthaḥ kaṭaka śabda abhidheya bhūtaḥ sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ pṛthaktva arhaḥ

original: arthāt kānakāt pṛthaktvayogyaḥ na bhavati / kva sthitasya kaṭakaśabdasyārthaḥ / kānake
analyzed: arthāt kānakāt pṛthaktva yogyaḥ na bhavati kva sthitasya kaṭaka śabdasya arthaḥ kānake

original: kaṭake kanakanirmite kaṭake ity arthaḥ / tadvat pare jagacchabdārthatā bhavati /
analyzed: kaṭake kanaka nirmite kaṭake iti arthaḥ tadvat pare jagat śabda artha tā bhavati

original: tadvad ity anena dṛṣṭāntagataṃ sarvam ākṣipyate / tenāyam arthaḥ / tadvat tathā /
analyzed: tadvat iti anena dṛṣṭānta gatam sarvam ākṣipyate tena ayam arthaḥ tadvat tathā

original: pare / arthāt proktanītyā jagattayā sthite uttīrṇe cinmātre / sthitasya jagacchabdasyārthaḥ
analyzed: pare arthāt prokta nītyā jagat tayā sthite uttīrṇe cit mātre sthitasya jagat śabdasya arthaḥ

original: parāt pṛthaktvārhaḥ na bhavati //MT_3,1.17 //
analyzed: parāt pṛthaktva arhaḥ na bhavati

original: mūḍhabuddhiṣu saṅkramaṇārthaṃ punar apy etad eva kathayati
analyzed: mūḍha buddhiṣu saṅkramaṇa artham punar api etat eva kathayati

original: brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat / na jagacchabdakārtho 'sti hemnīva kaṭakāditā //MU_3,1.18//
analyzed: brahmaṇi eva asti ananyātma yathāsthitam idam jagat na asti hemni iva kaṭaka ādi tā

original: yathāsthitam anena prakāreṇaiva sthitaṃ / na tv anyaṃ prakāram āsādyeti yāvat / idaṃ
analyzed: yathāsthitam anena prakāreṇa eva sthitam na tu anyam prakāram āsādya iti yāvat idam

original: jagat brahmaṇi bṛṃhite cinmātre / ananyātma ananyasvarūpaṃ asti / tatra jagacchabdakārthaḥ /
analyzed: jagat brahmaṇi bṛṃhite cit mātre ananya ātma ananya svarūpam asti tatra

original: jagacchabdakasya jagad iti śabdasya / arthaḥ brahmavyatiriktapadārtharacanārūpaṃ
analyzed: jagat śabdakasya jagat iti śabdasya arthaḥ brahma vyatirikta padārtha racanā rūpam

original: abhidheyam / na bhavati / tattayābhimatasya jagataḥ brahmatvasādhanāt / jagacchabdakārthaḥ
analyzed: abhidheyam na bhavati tad tayā abhimatasya jagataḥ brahmatva sādhanāt

original: kā iva / kaṭakāditā iva / yathā kaṭakāditā kaṭakādibhāvaḥ / hemni nāsti / tathety
analyzed: kā iva kaṭaka ādi tā iva yathā kaṭaka ādi tā kaṭaka ādi bhāvaḥ hemni na asti tathā iti

original: arthaḥ //MT_3,1.18 //
analyzed: arthaḥ

original: asattvasādhikām ata evoktārthadārḍhyakāriṇīṃ manasaḥ sakāśāt jagadutpattim anuvadati
analyzed: asattva sādhikām atas eva ukta artha dārḍhya kāriṇīm manasaḥ sakāśāt jagat utpattim anuvadati

original: asataivāsatī tāpanadyeva laharī calā / manasaivendrajālaśrīr jāgatī pravitanyate //MU_3,1.19//
analyzed: asatā eva asatī tāpa nadyā iva laharī calā manasā eva indrajāla śrīḥ jāgatī pravitanyate

original: manasā eva / na tv anyena kenacit / jāgatī jagatsambandhinī / jagatsvarūpeti yāvat /
analyzed: manasā eva na tu anyena kenacid jāgatī jagat sambandhinī jagat svarūpā iti yāvat

original: indrajālaśrīḥ indrajālasampat / pravitanyate / kathambhūtenaiva / asatā eva asatsvarūpeṇaiva /
analyzed: indrajāla śrīḥ indrajāla sampad pravitanyate kathambhūtena eva asatā eva asat svarūpeṇa eva

original: na hi brahmavyatirekeṇa manasaḥ pṛthak sattā asti / kathambhūtendrajālaśrīḥ / asatī
analyzed: na hi brahma vyatirekeṇa manasaḥ pṛthak sattā asti kathambhūtā indrajāla śrīḥ asatī

original: svakāraṇabhūtamanovat asatsvarūpā / manasā kayeva / tāpe bhāsamānā nadī tāpanadī /
analyzed: sva kāraṇa bhūta manaḥ vat asat svarūpā manasā kayā iva tāpe bhāsamānā nadī tāpa nadī

original: tayā iva / yathā asatyā tāpanadyā asatī calā laharī pravitanyate / tathety arthaḥ /
analyzed: tayā iva yathā asatyā tāpa nadyā asatī calā laharī pravitanyate tathā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu kathaṃ pūrvaśloke kanakakaṭakasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ iha tāpanadīlaharyāḥ iti cet /
analyzed: nanu katham pūrva śloke kanaka kaṭakasya dṛṣṭānta tvam iha tāpanadī laharyāḥ iti ced

original: satyam / pūrvaśloke jagataḥ paramārthataḥ brahmarūpatvakathanārthaṃ kanakakaṭakasya
analyzed: satyam pūrva śloke jagataḥ paramārthataḥ brahma rūpa tva kathana artham kanaka kaṭakasya

original: dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ / asmin śloke tu tasyaivānupapattinivāraṇāya brahmavyatirekeṇāsattvakathanārthaṃ
tāpanadīlaharyāḥ dṛṣṭāntatvam ity ekaphalasādhakatvān na dṛṣṭāntadvayasya vaiṣamyam /
analyzed: iti

original: jagataḥ manonirmāṇatvābhāve hi paramārthasattvaṃ prāpnoti / tathā ca bhinnasattābhājaḥ
analyzed: jagataḥ manaḥ nirmāṇa tva abhāve hi paramārtha sattvam prāpnoti tathā ca bhinna sattā bhājaḥ

original: tasya brahmatvakathanam ayuktaṃ syāt / na hi ghaṭe paṭo 'yam iti vaktuṃ yuktam /
analyzed: tasya brahma tva kathanam ayuktam syāt na hi ghaṭe paṭaḥ ayam iti vaktum yuktam

original: ity anupapattinivāraṇāyāsya ślokasyopanyāsaḥ / iti tadantargatasya dṛṣṭāntasyāpi
analyzed: iti anupapatti nivāraṇāya asya ślokasya upanyāsaḥ iti tad antargatasya dṛṣṭāntasya api

original: tadartham eva saḥ yuktaḥ //MT_3,1.19 //
analyzed: tad artham eva saḥ yuktaḥ

original: jāgatīm indrajālaśriyaṃ viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: jāgatīm indrajāla śriyam viśinaṣṭi

original: avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ / kalpitānīti nāmāni yasyāḥ sakalavedibhiḥ //MU_3,1.20//
analyzed: avidyā saṃsṛtiḥ bandhaḥ māyā mohaḥ mahat tamaḥ kalpitāni iti nāmāni yasyāḥ sakala vedibhiḥ

original: sakalavedibhiḥ sarvajñaiḥ //MT_3,1.20//
analyzed: sakala vedibhiḥ sarvajñaiḥ

original: adhunā proktāyāḥ indrajālaśriyāḥ sakāśāt mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaṃ śiṣyaṃ jñātvā mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: adhunā proktāyāḥ indrajāla śriyāḥ sakāśāt mokṣa kāṅkṣiṇam śiṣyam jñātvā mokṣa svarūpa nirūpaṇam

original: vinā śiṣyasya mokṣāvāptim ajānan mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇam api tadviruddhabandhasvarūpajñānaṃ
analyzed: vinā śiṣyasya mokṣa avāptim a jānan mokṣa sva rūpa nirūpaṇam api tad viruddha bandha sva rūpa jñānam

original: vināśakyaṃ manyamānaḥ tatsvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ pratijānīte / bandhasyeti /
analyzed: vinā aśakyam manyamānaḥ tad svarūpa nirūpaṇam pratijānīte bandhasya iti

original: bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu / tataḥ svarūpaṃ mokṣasya jñāsyasīndusamānana //MU_3,1.21//
analyzed: bandhasya tāvat rūpam tvam kathyamānam idam śṛṇu tatas sva rūpam mokṣasya jñāsyasi indu sama ānana

original: bandhasya indrajālaśrīsvarūpadṛśyāsaktatvasya / anupādeyabandhasvarūpanirūpaṇapratijñayā
analyzed: bandhasya indrajāla śrī sva rūpa dṛśya āsakta tvasya anupādeya bandha sva rūpa nirūpaṇa pratijñayā

original: vyākulībhūtaṃ śiṣyaṃ samāśvāsayati tata iti / tataḥ bandhasvarūpakathanānantaram /
analyzed: vyākulībhūtam śiṣyam samāśvāsayati tatas iti tatas bandha svarūpa kathana anantaram

original: mokṣasya dṛśyanairapekṣasya / heyanirūpaṇānantaram upādeyanirūpaṇasya yuktatvād iti
analyzed: mokṣasya dṛśya nairapekṣasya heya nirūpaṇa anantaram upādeya nirūpaṇasya yukta tvāt iti

original: bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.21 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ

original: bandhasvarūpaṃ kathayati
analyzed: bandha svarūpam kathayati

original: draṣṭur dṛśyatvasattāṅga bandha ity abhidhīyate / draṣṭā dṛśyavaśād baddho dṛśyābhāvād vimucyate //MU_3,1.22//
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ dṛśya tva sattā aṅga bandhaḥ iti abhidhīyate draṣṭā dṛśya vaśāt baddhaḥ dṛśya abhāvāt vimucyate

original: he aṅga / paṇḍitaiḥ dṛśyasattā dṛśyasadbhāvaḥ / draṣṭuḥ dṛśikriyākartuḥ / bandhaḥ
analyzed: he aṅga paṇḍitaiḥ dṛśya sattā dṛśya sadbhāvaḥ draṣṭuḥ dṛśi kriyā kartuḥ bandhaḥ

original: abhidhīyate / bhāvapratyayaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ / etad evānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ āśvāsayogyaṃ
analyzed: abhidhīyate bhāva pratyayaḥ pāda pūraṇa arthaḥ etat eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām āśvāsa yogyam

original: karoti draṣṭeti / dṛśyavaśāt dṛśyavaśena / dṛśyasattāvaśeneti yāvat / dṛśyābhāvāt
analyzed: karoti draṣṭā iti dṛśya vaśāt dṛśya vaśena dṛśya sattā vaśena iti yāvat dṛśya abhāvāt

original: dṛśyāsattayā / viṣayasya bhāve viṣayiṇo 'pi bhāvāt / tadabhāve tasyāpy abhāvāt iti
hetudvayaṃ vākyadvaye svayaṃ yojyam //MT_3,1.22 //
analyzed: hetu dvayam vākya dvaye svayam yojyam

original: tatra dṛśyasvarūpaṃ kathayati
analyzed: tatra dṛśya svarūpam kathayati

original: jagat tvam aham ityādi sargātmā dṛśyam ucyate / yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate //MU_3,1.23//
analyzed: jagat tvam aham ityādi sarga ātmā dṛśyam ucyate yāvat etat sambhavati tāvat mokṣaḥ na vidyate

original: jagat bandhahetuḥ dṛśyaprapañcaḥ / tvam tato mokṣākāṅkṣī śiṣyaḥ / aham ity upadeṣṭā /
analyzed: jagat bandha hetuḥ dṛśya prapañcaḥ tvam tatas mokṣa ākāṅkṣī śiṣyaḥ aham iti upadeṣṭā

original: ādiśabdena mokṣasya grahaṇam / tasyāpi dṛśyatvānapāyāt / paṇḍitaiḥ jagat tvam aham
analyzed: ādi śabdena mokṣasya grahaṇam tasya api dṛśya tva anapāyāt paṇḍitaiḥ jagat tvam aham

original: ityādi dṛśyam dṛśikriyākarmocyate / kuta ity ākāṅkṣāyām viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuṃ kathayati /
analyzed: ityādi dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā karma ucyate kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyām viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum kathayati

original: sargātmeti / sṛjyamānasvarūpa ity arthaḥ / sṛjyamānasya ca dṛśyatvaṃ sphuṭam eva
analyzed: sarga ātmā iti sṛjyamāna svarūpaḥ iti arthaḥ sṛjyamānasya ca dṛśya tvam sphuṭam eva

original: darśanapūrvakatvāt / sarjanasya ca darśanapūrvakatvaṃ tad aikṣatetyādiśrutisāmarthyāt
analyzed: darśana pūrvaka tvāt sarjanasya ca darśana pūrvaka tvam tat aikṣata ityādi śruti sāmarthyāt

original: jñeyam / asya bandhahetutvam anuvadati / yāvad iti / yāvat etat idaṃ jagadādidṛśyam /
analyzed: jñeyam asya bandha hetu tvam anuvadati yāvat iti yāvat etat idam jagat ādi dṛśyam

original: sambhavati sattāyuktaṃ bhavati / tāvat mokṣaḥ na vidyate / bandhanimittasya sthitatvāt /
analyzed: sambhavati sattā yuktam bhavati tāvat mokṣaḥ na vidyate bandha nimittasya sthita tvāt

original: sattāmātreṇaiva ca dṛśyasya bandhanimittatvasvabhāvatvāt //MT_3,1.23 //
analyzed: sattā mātreṇa eva ca dṛśyasya bandha nimitta tva svabhāva tvāt

original: nedam iti vacanakathanamātreṇaiva śāntadṛśyatvābhimānayuktaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati āha
analyzed: na idam iti vacana kathana mātreṇa eva śānta dṛśya tva abhimāna yuktam śiṣyam prati āha

original: nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati / saṅkalpajanakair dṛśyavyādhiḥ pratyuta vardhate //MU_3,1.24//
analyzed: na idam na idam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpaiḥ nā upaśāmyati saṅkalpa janakaiḥ dṛśya vyādhiḥ pratyuta vardhate

original: idam anubhūyamānaṃ / idaṃ dṛśyam / na bhavati / idaṃ dṛśyaṃ na bhavati iti evaṃrūpeṇa
analyzed: idam anubhūyamānam idam dṛśyam na bhavati idam dṛśyam na bhavati iti evaṃrūpeṇa

original: sthitaiḥ vyarthaiḥ dṛśyaśāntyākhyaphalarahitaiḥ / tathā saṅkalpajanakaiḥ niṣedhākhyasaṅkalpotpādakaiḥ /
analyzed: sthitaiḥ vyarthaiḥ dṛśya śānti ākhya phala rahitaiḥ tathā saṅkalpa janakaiḥ niṣedha ākhya saṅkalpa utpādakaiḥ

original: pralāpaiḥ unmattapralāpaiḥ / dṛśyavyādhiḥ dṛśyākhyo rogaḥ / nopaśāmyati niṣedharūpatayā
analyzed: pralāpaiḥ unmatta pralāpaiḥ dṛśya vyādhiḥ dṛśya ākhyaḥ rogaḥ na upaśāmyati niṣedha rūpa tayā

original: sthitatvāt / pratyuta vardhate vṛddhiṃ yāti / niṣedhākhyasaṅkalpavardhakatvāt / nanu
analyzed: sthita tvāt pratyuta vardhate vṛddhim yāti niṣedha ākhya saṅkalpa vardhaka tvāt nanu

original: kathaṃ niṣedhasya dṛśyatvaṃ / satyam / draṣṭṛviṣayatvāt niṣedho 'pi hi draṣṭuḥ svataḥ
analyzed: katham niṣedhasya dṛśya tvam satyam draṣṭṛ viṣaya tvāt niṣedhaḥ api hi draṣṭuḥ svatas

original: bhinnatayā bhāti //MT_3,1.24 //
analyzed: bhinna tayā bhāti

original: nanu nedam iti vacanamātreṇa dṛśyaśāntiḥ mā bhavatu / tarkādibhiḥ tacchāntiṃ sādhayāmaḥ ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu na idam iti vacana mātreṇa dṛśya śāntiḥ mā bhavatu tarka ādibhiḥ tad śāntim sādhayāmaḥ iti atra āha

original: na ca tarkabharakṣodair na tīrthaniyamādibhiḥ / sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ //MU_3,1.25//
analyzed: na ca tarka bhara kṣodaiḥ na tīrtha niyama ādibhiḥ sataḥ dṛśyasya jagataḥ yasmāt ete vicārakāḥ

original: tarkabharāṇāṃ bhedapradhānatvena dṛśyasatyatvāpādakānāṃ tarkasamūhānāṃ / ye kṣodāḥ
analyzed: tarka bharāṇām bheda pradhāna tvena dṛśya satya tva āpādakānām tarka samūhānām ye kṣodāḥ

original: vicāraṇāni / taiḥ dṛśyavyādhiḥ nopaśāmyati / tathā tīrthaniyamādibhiḥ dṛśyavyādhiḥ
analyzed: vicāraṇāni taiḥ dṛśya vyādhiḥ na upaśāmyati tathā tīrtha niyama ādibhiḥ dṛśya vyādhiḥ

original: nopaśāmyati / yataḥ ete tarkabharādayaḥ dṛśyasya jagataḥ sataḥ vicārakāḥ satyatvavicārakā
analyzed: na upaśāmyati yatas ete tarka bhara ādayaḥ dṛśyasya jagataḥ sataḥ vicārakāḥ satya tva vicārakā

original: bhavanti / tatra tarkāṇāṃ sākṣād eva padārthasādhakatvaṃ / tīrthādīnāṃ tu svargādiphalaniṣṭhatvāt /
analyzed: bhavanti tatra tarkāṇām sākṣāt eva padārtha sādhaka tvam tīrtha ādīnām tu svarga ādi phala niṣṭha tvāt

original: na hy asatyaniṣṭhatvaṃ yuktam //MT_3,1.25 //
analyzed: na hi asatya niṣṭha tvam yuktam

original: nanu tarkāḥ sad api jagat paryante bhāgataḥ anityatvena kathayantīti teṣām api bhāgataḥ dṛśyaśāntyupapādakatvam asty evety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarkāḥ sat api jagat paryante bhāgataḥ anitya tvena kathayanti iti teṣām api bhāgataḥ dṛśya śānti upapādaka tvam asti eva iti atra āha

original: jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit / nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ //MU_3,1.26//
analyzed: jagat dṛśyam tu yadi asti na śāmyati eva tat kvacid na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: dṛśyam dṛśikriyāviṣayībhūtaṃ / jagat naśvarasvabhāvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ / yady asti yadi
analyzed: dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā viṣayībhūtam jagat naśvara svabhāvam bhāva jātam yadi asti yadi

original: paramārthasat bhavati / tat tadā / kvacit kutrāpi deśe kāle vā / na śāmyati śāntiṃ
analyzed: paramārtha sat bhavati tat tadā kvacid kutra api deśe kāle vā na śāmyati śāntim

original: na vrajati / yataḥ asataḥ astikriyākartṛtvam abhajataḥ / bhāvaḥ sattā / na bhavati /
analyzed: na vrajati yatas asataḥ astikriyā kartṛ tvam abhajataḥ bhāvaḥ sattā na bhavati

original: tathā sataḥ astikriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajataḥ / abhāvaḥ asattā / nāsti / svarūpahāniprasaṅgād
analyzed: tathā sataḥ astikriyā kartṛ tvam bhajataḥ abhāvaḥ asattā na asti svarūpa hāni prasaṅgāt

original: iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.26 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛśyaparamārthasattve doṣam āha
analyzed: dṛśya paramārtha sattve doṣam āha

original: acetyacitsvarūpātmā yatra yatraiṣa tiṣṭhati / draṣṭā tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīḥ samudety apy aṇūdare //MU_3,1.27//
analyzed: acetya cit svarūpa ātmā yatra yatra eṣa tiṣṭhati draṣṭā tatra asya dṛśya śrīḥ samudeti api aṇu udare

original: citā svayam āvirbhāvyasvaviṣayīkṛtaṃ bhāvajātaṃ cetyaṃ / avidyamānaṃ cetyaṃ yasyāṃ /
analyzed: citā svayam āvirbhāvya sva viṣayīkṛtam bhāva jātam cetyam a vidyamānam cetyam yasyām

original: sā acetyā / proktasvarūpacetyavyatirikteti yāvat / tādṛśī yā cit / tatsvarūpaḥ tanmayaḥ /
analyzed: sā acetyā prokta svarūpa cetya vyatiriktā iti yāvat tādṛśī yā cit tad svarūpaḥ tad mayaḥ

original: ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya / saḥ acetyacitsvarūpātmā / yatra yatra yasmin yasmin deśe /
analyzed: ātmā svarūpam yasya saḥ acetya cit svarūpa ātmā yatra yatra yasmin yasmin deśe

original: yasyāṃ yasyām avasthāyām iti yāvat / tiṣṭhati / aṇūdare 'pi paramasūkṣmodare 'pi /
analyzed: yasyām yasyām avasthāyām iti yāvat tiṣṭhati aṇu udare api parama sūkṣma udare api

original: tatra tasmin deśe / asya draṣṭuḥ / dṛśyaśrīḥ samudeti prādurbhavati / nanu tādṛśe
analyzed: tatra tasmin deśe asya draṣṭuḥ dṛśya śrīḥ samudeti prādurbhavati nanu tādṛśe

original: sūkṣmatare deśe 'rme katham etādṛśasya prapañcasyāvasthānaṃ sambhavati / satyam /
analyzed: sūkṣmatare deśe arme katham etādṛśasya prapañcasya avasthānam sambhavati satyam

original: sthūladṛśyasaṃskārotpāditayā smṛtyā tatra tasya prādurbhāvaḥ sidhyaty eva [---]tvāt //MT_3,1.27 //
analyzed: sthūla dṛśya saṃskāra utpāditayā smṛtyā tatra tasya prādurbhāvaḥ sidhyati eva tvāt

original: atha tapodhyānādibhiḥ satyadṛśyaśāntyabhimānagrastān prati kathayati
analyzed: atha tapaḥ dhyāna ādibhiḥ satya dṛśya śānti abhimāna grastān prati kathayati

original: draṣṭur asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam idaṃ mayā / tyaktaṃ tapodhyānajapair iti kāñcikatṛptivat //MU_3,1.28//
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ asti jagat dṛśyam tat pramṛṣṭam idam mayā tyaktam tapaḥ dhyāna japaiḥ iti kāñcika tṛpti vat

original: draṣṭuḥ dṛśikriyākartuḥ / jagat dṛśyam svabhinnatayā dṛśikriyāviṣayo bhavati / tat
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ dṛśi kriyā kartuḥ jagat dṛśyam sva bhinna tayā dṛśi kriyā viṣayaḥ bhavati tat

original: jagadrūpaṃ dṛśyaṃ / mayā tapodhyānajapaiḥ tyaktam śāntiṃ nītam / iti etat / kāñcikatṛptivat
analyzed: jagat rūpam dṛśyam mayā tapaḥ dhyāna japaiḥ tyaktam śāntim nītam iti etat kāñcika tṛpti vat

original: kāñcikadravyeṇa mama tṛptir jāteti vacanavat bhavati / yathā tṛptyarthaṃ bhakṣitena
analyzed: kāñcika dravyeṇa mama tṛptiḥ jātā iti vacanavat bhavati yathā tṛpti artham bhakṣitena

original: kāñcikadravyeṇa pratyuta kṣut eva jāyate / tathā svabhinnadevatārādhanārtham anuṣṭhitaiḥ
analyzed: kāñcika dravyeṇa pratyuta kṣudh eva jāyate tathā sva bhinna devatā ārādhana artham anuṣṭhitaiḥ

original: tapaḥprabhṛtibhiḥ api dṛśyavṛddhir eva jāyate iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.28 //
analyzed: tapaḥ prabhṛtibhiḥ api dṛśya vṛddhiḥ eva jāyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu dṛśyaṃ satyaṃ bhavatu / mokṣāvasthāyāṃ dṛśyān nirgatasyāta eva viśeṣaguṇāsaṃvedanapātratāṃ
analyzed: nanu dṛśyam satyam bhavatu mokṣa avasthāyām dṛśyāt nirgatasya atas eva viśeṣa guṇa a saṃvedana pātra tām

original: gatasyātisūkṣmasya jīvasyedaṃ dṛśyaṃ kiṃ karoti / na hi suptasya bāhyajagatkṛtaṃ
analyzed: gatasya ati sūkṣmasya jīvasya idam dṛśyam kim karoti na hi suptasya bāhya jagat kṛtam

original: vyākulatvaṃ dṛśyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: vyākula tvam dṛśyate iti atra āha

original: yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati / paramāṇūdare 'py asmiṃś cidādarśe na saṃśayaḥ //MU_3,1.29//
analyzed: yadi nāma jagat dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati paramāṇu udare api asmin cit ādarśe na saṃśayaḥ

original: jagat naśvaram dṛśyajātam / yadi nāmāsti yadi nāma paramārthasat bhavati / tadā paramāṇūdare
analyzed: jagat naśvaram dṛśya jātam yadi nāma asti yadi nāma paramārtha sat bhavati tadā paramāṇu udare

original: 'pi atisūkṣmamadhye 'pi / asmin ātmatvena sthite / cidādarśe cinmakure / pratibimbati
analyzed: api ati sūkṣma madhye api asmin ātma tvena sthite cit ādarśe cit makure pratibimbati

original: pratibimbatvena saṅkrāmati //MT_3,1.29 //
analyzed: pratibimba tvena saṅkrāmati

original: katham etad ity / atrāha
analyzed: katham etat iti atra āha

original: yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati / adridyūrvīnadīśādi cidādarśe tathaiva hi //MU_3,1.30//
analyzed: yatra tatra sthitam rāma yathā ādarśe prabimbati adri dyūrvī nadīśa ādi cit ādarśe tathā eva hi

original: he rāma / hi yasmāt kāraṇāt / yathā yatra tatra sthitaṃ vastu / ādarśe prabimbati
analyzed: he rāma hi yasmāt kāraṇāt yathā yatra tatra sthitam vastu ādarśe prabimbati

original: pratibimbati / tathaiva tadvat eva / adridyūrvīnadīśādi adrayaś ca dyauś ca ūrvī
analyzed: pratibimbati tathā eva tadvat eva adri dyūrvī nadīśa ādi adrayaḥ ca dyauḥ ca ūrvī

original: ca nadīśāḥ samudrāś ca / te adridyūrvīnadīśāḥ / te ādiḥ yasya jagataḥ / tat adridyūrvīnadīśādi /
analyzed: ca nadīśāḥ samudrāḥ ca te adri dyūrvī nadīśāḥ te ādiḥ yasya jagataḥ tat adri dyūrvī nadīśa ādi

original: tādṛśaṃ jagat / cidādarśe cinmakure / pratibimbati / svabhāvasya tyaktum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: tādṛśam jagat cit ādarśe cit makure pratibimbati svabhāvasya tyaktum aśakya tvāt

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / sphurattā eva hi sattā bhavati / sā ced dṛśye paramārthataḥ asti tadā
analyzed: ayam bhāvaḥ sphurat tā eva hi sattā bhavati sā ced dṛśye paramārthataḥ asti tadā

original: sphurattāmātramayī cinmātratvāt / sā svasphurattātvataḥ kadāpi na vyatiriktā bhavet
analyzed: sphurat tā mātra mayī cit mātra tvāt sā sva sphurat tā tvataḥ kadāpi na vyatiriktā bhavet

original: iti kadāpi cidādarśaḥ dṛśyapratibimbarahito na bhavet iti //MT_3,1.30 //
analyzed: iti kadāpi cit ādarśaḥ dṛśya pratibimba rahitaḥ na bhavet iti

original: tathā ca mokṣābhāvaprasaṅga ity abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: tathā ca mokṣa abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: tatas tatra punar duḥkhaṃ jarā maraṇajanmanī / bhāvābhāvagrahotsargāḥ sthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ //MU_3,1.31//
analyzed: tatas tatra punar duḥkham jarā maraṇa janmanī bhāva abhāva graha utsargāḥ sthūla sūkṣma cala acalāḥ

original: tataḥ yadi cidādarśaḥ dṛśyasadbhāvena punaḥ punaḥ pratibimbayukto bhavet / tadā tatra
analyzed: tatas yadi cit ādarśaḥ dṛśya sadbhāvena punar punar pratibimba yuktaḥ bhavet tadā tatra

original: tasmin cinmātre / punaḥ duḥkhaṃ bhavet / tathā jarā bhavet / tadvat maraṇajanmanī
analyzed: tasmin cit mātre punar duḥkham bhavet tathā jarā bhavet tadvat maraṇa janmanī

original: bhavetāṃ / tathā bhāvābhāvagrahotsargāḥ prādurbhāvanāśādānatyāgāḥ bhaveyuḥ / saṃsārasyaitatsvarūpatvāt /
analyzed: bhavetām tathā bhāva abhāva graha utsargāḥ prādurbhāva nāśa ādāna tyāgāḥ bhaveyuḥ saṃsārasya etad sva rūpa tvāt

original: duḥkhādayaḥ kathambhūtāḥ / sthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ / tatra jāgratkālīnānāṃ sthūlatvam
analyzed: duḥkha ādayaḥ kathambhūtāḥ sthūla sūkṣma cala acalāḥ tatra jāgrat kālīnānām sthūla tvam

original: acalatvaṃ ca / svapnakālīnānāṃ sūkṣmatvam calatvaṃ ceti vibhāgaḥ / suṣuptau duḥkhādibhānābhāvāt /
analyzed: acala tvam ca svapna kālīnānām sūkṣma tvam cala tvam ca iti vibhāgaḥ suṣuptau duḥkha ādi bhāna abhāvāt

original: tathā ca sthūlasūkṣmaduḥkhādirūpasaṃsāragrastatvena jīvasya kadāpi muktiḥ na syād
analyzed: tathā ca sthūla sūkṣma duḥkha ādi rūpa saṃsāra grasta tvena jīvasya kadāpi muktiḥ na syāt

original: iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.31 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu bhavatu dṛśyaṃ paramārthasat / tathāpi samādhiparāṇām anartham utpādayituṃ kāsya śaktir ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu bhavatu dṛśyam paramārtha sat tathā api samādhi parāṇām anartham utpādayitum kā asya śaktiḥ iti atra āha

original: idaṃ pramārjitaṃ dṛśyaṃ mayā nātrāham āsthitaḥ / etad evākṣayaṃ bījaṃ samādhau saṃsṛtismṛteḥ //MU_3,1.32//
analyzed: idam pramārjitam dṛśyam mayā na atra aham āsthitaḥ etat eva akṣayam bījam samādhau saṃsṛti smṛteḥ

original: mayā idam dṛśyam pramārjitam samādhyupāyena nāśitam / yataḥ aham atra āsthitaḥ āsthāyuktaḥ
analyzed: mayā idam dṛśyam pramārjitam samādhi upāyena nāśitam yatas aham atra āsthitaḥ āsthāyuktaḥ

original: nāsmi / etad eva pūrvārdhoktaṃ vastu eva / samādhau dṛśyoparamasvarūpe samādhāne /
analyzed: na asmi etat eva pūrva ardha uktam vastu eva samādhau dṛśya uparama svarūpe samādhāne

original: saṃsṛtismṛteḥ dṛśyasmṛteḥ / akṣayaṃ bījaṃ syāt / saṃsṛtiviṣayasya dṛśyasya saṃsṛtiśabdavācyatvaṃ
analyzed: saṃsṛti smṛteḥ dṛśya smṛteḥ akṣayam bījam syāt saṃsṛti viṣayasya dṛśyasya saṃsṛti śabda vācya tvam

original: lakṣaṇayā jñeyam / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / samādhipariṇatasya dṛśyapramārjanaṃ tadanāsthā ca
analyzed: lakṣaṇayā jñeyam ayam bhāvaḥ samādhi pariṇatasya dṛśya pramārjanam tad anāsthā ca

original: siddhatvena sphurati na vā / na cet tadā sampannam apy etad dvayam asad eva / sphurattāyāḥ
analyzed: siddha tvena sphurati na vā na ced tadā sampannam api etat dvayam asat eva sphurat tāyāḥ

original: eva paramārthataḥ sattāsvarūpatvāt / sphurati cet tadāsthitā eva saṃsṛtismṛtiḥ /
analyzed: eva paramārthataḥ sattā svarūpa tvāt sphurati ced tad āsthitā eva saṃsṛti smṛtiḥ

original: tadbījasya sphuraṇasya sthitatvāt / nanu tvadabhimate dṛśyātyantābhāve 'pi ayaṃ doṣaḥ
analyzed: tad bījasya sphuraṇasya sthita tvāt nanu tvad abhimate dṛśya atyanta abhāve api ayam doṣaḥ

original: prasajati / sphurati cet dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ tat sthitam eva dṛśyaṃ / sphuraṇākhyasya
analyzed: prasajati sphurati ced dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ tat sthitam eva dṛśyam sphuraṇa ākhyasya

original: bījasya sthitatvāt / na cet tad asann eva dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ / iti cen / na / na hi
analyzed: bījasya sthita tvāt na ced tat asan eva dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ iti ced na na hi

original: dṛśyātyantābhāvavādinaḥ sarvoparamasvarūpaḥ samādhiḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvatayā abhipretaḥ
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāva vādinaḥ sarva uparama svarūpaḥ samādhiḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva tayā abhipretaḥ

original: yena proktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ syāt / kiṃ tu dṛśyātyantābhāvaniścayamātram eva tasyopayogi /
analyzed: yena prokta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ syāt kim tu dṛśya atyanta abhāva niścaya mātram eva tasya upayogi

original: na hi rajjusarpanivāraṇārthaṃ mantrapaṭhanaṃ yuktam / api tu nāyaṃ sarpa iti sarpātyantābhāvaniścayamātrasyaiva
analyzed: na hi rajju sarpa nivāraṇa artham mantra paṭhanam yuktam api tu na ayam sarpaḥ iti sarpa atyanta abhāva niścaya mātrasya eva

original: tatropayogaḥ / atyantābhāvaniścayaś ca guruśāstrasaṅgodbhūtenādhiṣṭhānabhūtacinmātravijñānenaiva
analyzed: tatra upayogaḥ atyanta abhāva niścayaḥ ca guru śāstra saṅga udbhūtena adhiṣṭhāna bhūta cit mātra vijñānena eva

original: sidhyati / na pāṣāṇabhāvāpādakaiḥ samādhibhir ity alaṃ prapañcena //MT_3,1.32 //
analyzed: sidhyati na pāṣāṇa bhāva āpādakaiḥ samādhibhiḥ iti alam prapañcena

original: na kevalaṃ jagatsatyatvavācyabhyupagatadṛśyoparamasvarūpasya samādheḥ dṛśyabījadhāratvamātram evāsty / api tu kāryakaraṇe asāmarthyam apy astīty
analyzed: na kevalam jagat satya tva vāci abhyupagata dṛśya uparama svarūpasya samādheḥ dṛśya bīja dhāra tva mātram evā asti api tu kārya karaṇe asāmarthyam api asti iti

original: sati tv asmiñ jagaddṛśye nirvikalpasamādhinā / na cākṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ turyaṃ vāpy upapadyate //MU_3,1.33//
analyzed: sati tu asmin jagat dṛśye nirvikalpa samādhinā na ca akṣaya suṣupta tvam turyam vā api upapadyate

original: tu pakṣāntare / asmin jagaddṛśye jagatsvarūpe dṛśye sati / sati paramārthasati sati /
analyzed: tu pakṣa antare asmin jagat dṛśye jagat svarūpe dṛśye sati sati paramārtha sati sati

original: nirvikalpasamādhinā sarvoparamasvarūpeṇa samādhānena / akṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ turyaṃ vāpi
analyzed: nirvikalpa samādhinā sarva uparama svarūpeṇa samādhānena akṣaya suṣupta tvam turyam vā api

original: nopapadyate na sidhyati / akṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ videhamuktagocarā turyātītāvasthā / turyaṃ
analyzed: na upapadyate na sidhyati akṣaya suṣupta tvam videha mukta gocarā turyātīta avasthā turyam

original: jīvanmuktagocarā turyāvasthā //MT_3,1.33 //
analyzed: jīvanmukta gocarā turya avasthā

original: anupapattim eva sādhayati
analyzed: anupapattim eva sādhayati

original: vyutthāne hi samādhīnāṃ suṣuptānta ivākhilam / jagadduḥkham idam bhāti yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam //MU_3,1.34//
analyzed: vyutthāne hi samādhīnām suṣupta ante iva akhilam jagat duḥkham idam bhāti yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam

original: hi yasmāt kāraṇāt / samādhīnāṃ vyutthāne avaśyabhāvini samādhibhyaḥ vyutthāne / samādheḥ
analyzed: hi yasmāt kāraṇāt samādhīnām vyutthāne avaśya bhāvini samādhibhyaḥ vyutthāne samādheḥ

original: vyutthānāvasthāyām iti yāvat / yathāsthitam pūrvavat sthitam / ata eva akhaṇḍitam
analyzed: vyutthāna avasthāyām iti yāvat yathāsthitam pūrvavat sthitam atas eva akhaṇḍitam

original: kenāpy aṃśena na nyūnam / akhilaṃ samastaṃ / idam jagadduḥkham bhāti sphurati / kasminn
analyzed: kena api aṃśena na nyūnam akhilam samastam idam jagat duḥkham bhāti sphurati kasmin

original: iva / suṣuptānta iva / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / yathā rātrau suṣuptiṃ gatasyāta eva vismṛtasamastajagatprapañcasya
analyzed: iva suṣupta ante iva ayam bhāvaḥ yathā rātrau suṣuptim gatasya atas eva vismṛta samasta jagat prapañcasya

original: tataḥ prabhāte prabuddhasya puruṣasya punaḥ api pūrvavat jagatprapañcaḥ sphurati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte prabuddhasya puruṣasya punar api pūrvavat jagat prapañcaḥ sphurati

original: tathā yena tenopāyena sarvoparamasvarūpasamādhiṃ gatasya puruṣasyāvaśyambhāvini vyutthānasamaye
analyzed: tathā yena tena upāyena sarva uparama sva rūpa samādhim gatasya puruṣasya avaśyambhāvini vyutthāna samaye

original: punar api pūrvavat jagatprapañcaḥ avaśyaṃ sphuraty eva / anyathā asmadabhimatātyantābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: punar api pūrvavat jagat prapañcaḥ avaśyam sphurati eva anyathā asmad abhimata atyanta abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: tathā ca mātulānībhakṣaṇavat kṣaṇamātraṃ jagaduparamasādhakena samādhinā sarvadā
analyzed: tathā ca mātulānī bhakṣaṇa vat kṣaṇa mātram jagat uparama sādhakena samādhinā sarvadā

original: jagadabhāvasvarūpasya turyasya tadatītasya ca siddhir na yukteti //MT_3,1.34 //
analyzed: jagat abhāva svarūpasya turyasya tad atītasya ca siddhiḥ na yuktā iti

original: etenāyātāṃ samādheḥ niṣphalatāṃ kathayati
analyzed: etena āyātām samādheḥ niṣphala tām kathayati

original: prāptaṃ bhavati he rāma tat kiṃ nāma samādhibhiḥ / bhūyo 'narthanipāte 'pi kṣaṇasāmye hi kiṃ sukham //MU_3,1.35//
analyzed: prāptam bhavati he rāma tat kim nāma samādhibhiḥ bhūyas anartha nipāte api kṣaṇa sāmye hi kim sukham

original: kiṃ nāma prāptaṃ bhavati / kiñcid api prāptaṃ na bhavatīty arthaḥ / katham etad ity
analyzed: kim nāma prāptam bhavati kiñcid api prāptam na bhavati iti arthaḥ katham etat iti

original: atrāha bhūya iti / hi yasmāt / bhūyo 'narthapāte / bhūyaḥ anarthanipātaḥ bhedarūpānarthanipātaḥ /
analyzed: atra āha bhūyaḥ iti hi yasmāt bhūyas anartha pāte bhūyas anartha nipātaḥ bheda rūpa anartha nipātaḥ

original: yasmin / tādṛśe kṣaṇasāmye 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sphuraṇaśīlāyāṃ samatāyām api / kiṃ sukhaṃ
analyzed: yasmin tādṛśe kṣaṇa sāmye api kṣaṇam sphuraṇa śīlāyām samatāyām api kim sukham

original: bhavati / yataḥ kṣaṇabhātaṃ sāmyaṃ sukhadaṃ na bhavati / tataḥ tatprāptyāpi kiñcit
analyzed: bhavati yatas kṣaṇa bhātam sāmyam sukha dam na bhavati tatas tad prāptyā api kiñcid

original: prāptaṃ na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / apiśabdaḥ sāmyasya asandigdham sukhāspadatvaṃ dyotayati //MT_3,1.35 //
analyzed: prāptam na bhavati iti bhāvaḥ api śabdaḥ sāmyasya asandigdham sukha āspada tvam dyotayati

original: nanu samādhau satataṃ līnasya vyutthānābhāvena kathaṃ bhūyaḥ jarāduḥkhaprādurbhāvaḥ syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu samādhau satatam līnasya vyutthāna abhāvena katham bhūyas jarā duḥkha prādurbhāvaḥ syāt iti atra āha

original: yadi vāpi samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitiṃ vrajet / tad akṣayasuṣuptābhaṃ tan manye nāmalaṃ padam //MU_3,1.36//
analyzed: yadi vā api samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitim vrajet tat akṣaya suṣupta ābham tat manye na amalam padam

original: puruṣaḥ nirvikalpe samādhāne nirvikalpasamādhau / sthitiṃ satataṃ līnatāṃ / yadi
analyzed: puruṣaḥ nirvikalpe samādhāne nirvikalpa samādhau sthitim satatam līna tām yadi

original: vā vrajet yadi vā gacchet / ahaṃ manye / tat tadāpi / tat nirvikalpasamādhānam /
analyzed: vā vrajet yadi vā gacchet aham manye tat tadā api tat nirvikalpa samādhānam

original: amalaṃ padam jāḍyamalarahitaṃ śuddhacinmātrākhyaṃ mahāsthānaṃ / na bhavati / dṛśyadarśanāsāmarthyarūpasya
analyzed: amalam padam jāḍya mala rahitam śuddha cit mātra ākhyam mahā sthānam na bhavati dṛśya darśana a sāmarthya rūpasya

original: jāḍyākhyasya malasya suptivat sthitatvāt / tat kathambhūtam / akṣayasuṣuptābham turyātītāvasthāvat
analyzed: jāḍya ākhyasya malasya supti vat sthita tvāt tat kathambhūtam akṣaya suṣupta ābham turyātīta avasthāvat

original: bhāsamānaṃ / na tu tatsvarūpam / kālāntare 'vaśyambhāvinaḥ vyutthānasya sthitatvāt /
analyzed: bhāsamānam na tu tad svarūpam kāla antare avaśyambhāvinaḥ vyutthānasya sthita tvāt

original: na ca turyātītāvasthāyāḥ vyutthānaṃ kadāpi sambhavati / cinmātre atyantalayībhāvāt //MT_3,1.36 //
analyzed: na ca turyātīta avasthāyāḥ vyutthānam kadāpi sambhavati cit mātre atyanta layībhāvāt

original: dṛśyasatyatvavādinaḥ nirvikalpasamādhir eva na sambhavati / sthitivrajanasya tu kā kathety abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: dṛśya satya tva vādinaḥ nirvikalpa samādhiḥ eva na sambhavati sthiti vrajanasya tu kā kathā iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: prāpyate sati dṛśye 'smin na ca tan nāma kenacit / yatra tatra kilāyāti cittabhrāntyā jagadbhramaḥ //MU_3,1.37//
analyzed: prāpyate sati dṛśye asmin na ca tat nāma kenacid yatra tatra kila āyāti citta bhrāntyā jagat bhramaḥ

original: nāma niścaye / asmin anubhūyamāne jagati sati / sati paramārthe sati / kenacit kenāpi
analyzed: nāma niścaye asmin anubhūyamāne jagati sati sati paramārthe sati kenacid kena api

original: puruṣeṇa / tat nirvikalpasamādhānaṃ / na prāpyate / yataḥ yatra tatra sthitasyāpi
analyzed: puruṣeṇa tat nirvikalpa samādhānam na prāpyate yatas yatra tatra sthitasya api

original: samādhideśe taditaradeśe vā sthitasya puruṣasya / cittabhrāntyā / citte sthitā bhrāntiḥ
analyzed: samādhi deśe tad itara deśe vā sthitasya puruṣasya citta bhrāntyā citte sthitā bhrāntiḥ

original: jagatsatyatvabhramaḥ cittabhrāntiḥ / tayā jagadbhramaḥ / kila niścaye / āyāti / ayaṃ
analyzed: jagat satya tva bhramaḥ citta bhrāntiḥ tayā jagat bhramaḥ kila niścaye āyāti ayam

original: bhāvaḥ / yathā dṛśyasatyatāyāṃ niścitaḥ puruṣaḥ rātrau supto 'pi dṛśyaṃ paśyaty eva /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ yathā dṛśya satya tāyām niścitaḥ puruṣaḥ rātrau suptaḥ api dṛśyam paśyati eva

original: tathā samādhiṃ gato 'pi paśyed eva samānanyāyatvāt / tathā ca dṛśyasatyatvavādinaḥ
analyzed: tathā samādhim gataḥ api paśyet eva samāna nyāya tvāt tathā ca dṛśya satya tva vādinaḥ

original: nirvikalpasamādhir eva na sambhavati / tatra sthitivrajanasya tu kā katheti //MT_3,1.37 //
analyzed: nirvikalpa samādhiḥ eva na sambhavati tatra sthiti vrajanasya tu kā kathā iti

original: nanu dṛśyasatyatve niścitasyāpi yathā tathā prayuktena dhāraṇopāyena na kiñcid bhānarūpo nirvikalpasamādhiḥ sidhyaty evety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛśya satya tve niścitasya api yathā tathā prayuktena dhāraṇa upāyena na kiñcid bhāna rūpaḥ nirvikalpa samādhiḥ sidhyati eva iti atra āha

original: draṣṭātha yadi pāṣāṇarūpatāṃ bhāvayan balāt / kilāste tat tadante 'pi bhūyo 'syodeti dṛśyatā //MU_3,1.38//
analyzed: draṣṭā atha yadi pāṣāṇa rūpa tām bhāvayan balāt kila āste tat tad ante api bhūyas asya udeti dṛśya tā

original: draṣṭā pramātā / yadi balāt kenāpi haṭhaprayogena / pāṣāṇarūpatāṃ bhāvayan āste tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: draṣṭā pramātā  yadi balāt kena api haṭha prayogena pāṣāṇa rūpa tām bhāvayan āste tiṣṭhati

original: tad api tadāpi / asya svasmin pāṣāṇabhāvaṃ bhāvayataḥ draṣṭuḥ / tadante avaśyabhāvini
analyzed: tat api tadā api asya svasmin pāṣāṇa bhāvam bhāvayataḥ draṣṭuḥ tad ante avaśya bhāvini

original: pāṣāṇabhāvānte / dṛṣyatā paṭādiviṣayaḥ dṛśyabhāvaḥ / udeti sphurati / na hi jīvataḥ
analyzed: pāṣāṇa bhāva ante dṛṣya tā paṭa ādi viṣayaḥ dṛśya bhāvaḥ udeti sphurati na hi jīvataḥ

original: sarvadā pāṣāṇabhāvabhāvanaṃ śakyaṃ / tathā ca dṛśyatve niścitasya sthiraḥ nirvikalpasamādhiḥ
analyzed: sarvadā pāṣāṇa bhāva bhāvanam śakyam tathā ca dṛśya tve niścitasya sthiraḥ nirvikalpa samādhiḥ

original: na sidhyaty eveti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.38 //
analyzed: na sidhyati eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: pāṣāṇarūpatāgamanasyāsambhavaṃ kathayati
analyzed: pāṣāṇa rūpa tā gamanasya asambhavam kathayati

original: na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā nirvikalpasamādhayaḥ / keṣāñcit sthitim āyānti sarvair ity anubhūyate //MU_3,1.39//
analyzed: na ca pāṣāṇa tā tulyāḥ nirvikalpa samādhayaḥ keṣāñcid sthitim āyānti sarvaiḥ iti anubhūyate

original: pāṣāṇatāyāḥ tulyāḥ pāṣāṇatātulyāḥ / vikalparahitā ity arthaḥ / pāṣāṇatābhāvanam eva
analyzed: pāṣāṇa tāyāḥ tulyāḥ pāṣāṇa tā tulyāḥ vikalpa rahitāḥ iti arthaḥ pāṣāṇa tā bhāvanam eva

original: tasya draṣṭuḥ pāṣāṇabhāvaṃ nāśayati / na hi pāṣāṇaḥ svaṃ pāṣāṇatvaṃ bhāvayituṃ śaknotīti
analyzed: tasya draṣṭuḥ pāṣāṇa bhāvam nāśayati na hi pāṣāṇaḥ svam pāṣāṇa tvam bhāvayitum śaknoti iti

original: bhāvaḥ //MT_3,1.39 //
analyzed: bhāvaḥ

original: yathātathāsiddhasyāpi pāṣāṇabhāvasya na paramapadatvaṃ yuktaṃ jaḍatvānapāyād / iti kathayati
analyzed: yathā tathā asiddhasya api pāṣāṇa bhāvasya na parama pada tvam yuktam jaḍa tva anapāyāt iti kathayati

original: na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā rūḍhiṃ yātāḥ samādhayaḥ / bhavanty agryaṃ padaṃ śāntaṃ cidrūpam ajam avyayam //MU_3,1.40//
analyzed: na ca pāṣāṇa tā tulyāḥ rūḍhim yātāḥ samādhayaḥ bhavanti agryam padam śāntam cit rūpam ajam avyayam

original: rūḍhiṃ pariṇāmam / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / dṛśyadarśanāsāmarthyena jaḍatvānapāyāt pāṣāṇabhāvasya
analyzed: rūḍhim pariṇāmam ayam bhāvaḥ dṛśya darśana asāmarthyena jaḍa tva anapāyāt pāṣāṇa bhāvasya

original: cinmātratvam ayuktam / cinmātraṃ hi sarvadā cetyacetanasamartham eva bhavati / svātantryeṇa
analyzed: cit mātra tvam ayuktam cit mātram hi sarvadā cetya cetana samartham eva bhavati svātantryeṇa

original: tu yadi kadācit tac cetanaṃ na karoti tena nāsya jāḍyāpātaḥ / na hi śaktaḥ puruṣaḥ
analyzed: tu yadi kadācid tat cetanam na karoti tena na asya jāḍya āpātaḥ na hi śaktaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: svātantryeṇa kāryam akurvan aśakta iti vaktuṃ yujyate iti //MT_3,1.40 //
analyzed: svātantryeṇa kāryam akurvan aśaktaḥ iti vaktum yujyate iti

original: pūrvoktam upasaṃharati
analyzed: pūrva uktam upasaṃharati

original: tasmād yadīdaṃ sad dṛśyaṃ tan na śāmyet kadācana / śāmyet tapojapadhyānair dṛḍham ity ajñakalpanā //MU_3,1.41//
analyzed: tasmāt yadi idam sat dṛśyam tat na śāmyet kadācana śāmyet tapaḥ japa dhyānaiḥ dṛḍham iti ajña kalpanā

original: tasmāt uktahetoḥ / yadi dṛśyaṃ sat bhavati
analyzed: tasmāt ukta hetoḥ yadi dṛśyam sat bhavati

original: yatvena parabodhatvāyogāt / tad eva nirvāṇamātram eva / cittamātraṃ padmajabhāvena
analyzed: ya tvena para bodha tva ayogāt tat eva nirvāṇa mātram eva cittamātram padmaja bhāvena

original: sthitaṃ śuddhaṃ cittaṃ / āste / tat cittamātram / vasudhāditām paramārthasantaṃ pṛthvyādibhāvaṃ /
analyzed: sthitam śuddham cittam āste tat cittamātram vasudhā ādi tām paramārtha santam pṛthvī ādi bhāvam

original: na yāti / nirvāṇasvarūpaśuddhabodhamayatvāt / ata eva padmajasya ādhibhautikadehābhāva
analyzed: na yāti nirvāṇa sva rūpa śuddha bodha maya tvāt atas eva padmajasya ādhibhautika deha abhāva

original: iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,3.13 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu pratijīvaṃ manobhedasya sthitatvān nānāvidhāni manāṃsi santi / tat kathaṃ padmajarūpāt manasaḥ eva jagadutpattiḥ uktety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu pratijīvam manaḥ bhedasya sthita tvāt nānāvidhāni manāṃsi santi tat katham padmaja rūpāt manasaḥ eva jagat utpattiḥ uktā iti atra āha

original: sarveṣāṃ bhūtamanasāṃ saṃsāravyavahāriṇām / prathamo 'sau praticchandaś cittadehaḥ svatodayaḥ //MU_3,3.14//
analyzed: sarveṣām bhūta manasām saṃsāra vyavahāriṇām prathamaḥ asau praticchandaḥ citta dehaḥ svatā udayaḥ

original: saṃsāre vyavaharantīti tādṛśānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtamanasāṃ madhye / asau padmajaḥ / prathamaḥ
analyzed: saṃsāre vyavaharanti iti tādṛśānām sarveṣām bhūta manasām madhye asau padmajaḥ prathamaḥ

original: praticchandaḥ bhāvimanaḥsṛṣṭikāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ pratibhānam bhavati / cinmātrasyeti
analyzed: bhavati

original: śeṣaḥ / asau kathambhūtaḥ / cittadehaḥ śuddhamanorūpaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / svatodayaḥ /
analyzed: śeṣaḥ asau kathambhūtaḥ citta dehaḥ śuddha manaḥ rūpaḥ punar kathambhūtaḥ svatā udayaḥ

original: svatayā svabhāvena / na tu anyatayā / udayaḥ navīnaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ yasya / saḥ / udayānantaram
analyzed: svatayā svabhāvena na tu anyatayā udayaḥ navīnaḥ prādurbhāvaḥ yasya saḥ udaya anantaram

original: api pūrvabhāvenaiva sthita ity arthaḥ / ata eva asmād evotpattikathanam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,3.14 //
analyzed: api pūrva bhāvena eva sthitaḥ iti arthaḥ atas eva asmāt eva utpatti kathanam iti bhāvaḥ

original: prathamapraticchandatvam asya sādhayati
analyzed: prathama praticchanda tvam asya sādhayati

original: asmāt pūrvāt praticchandād ananyaitatsvarūpiṇī / iyaṃ pravisṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ spandadṛṣṭir ivānilāt //MU_3,3.15//
analyzed: asmāt pūrvāt praticchandāt ananyā etad svarūpiṇī iyam pravisṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ spanda dṛṣṭiḥ iva anilāt

original: asmāt padmajākhyāt / pūrvāt prathamāt / praticchandāt / iyam anubhūyamānā / sṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: asmāt padmajā ākhyāt pūrvāt prathamāt praticchandāt iyam anubhūyamānā sṛṣṭiḥ

original: pravisṛtā prasāraṃ gatā / kathambhūtā / ananyā etasmād avyatiriktā / ata eva etatsvarūpiṇī
analyzed: pravisṛtā prasāram gatā kathambhūtā ananyā etasmāt avyatiriktā atas eva etad svarūpiṇī

original: etanmayī / kā iva / spandadṛṣṭir iva / yathā spandarūpā dṛṣṭiḥ / spanda iti yāvat /
analyzed: etad mayī kā iva spanda dṛṣṭiḥ iva yathā spanda rūpā dṛṣṭiḥ spandaḥ iti yāvat

original: anilāt pravisṛtā bhavati / tathety arthaḥ / ato 'syaiva prathamapraticchandatvaṃ
analyzed: anilāt pravisṛtā bhavati tathā iti arthaḥ atas asya eva prathama praticchanda tvam

original: yuktam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,3.15 //
analyzed: yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: upasaṃhāraṃ karoti
analyzed: upasaṃhāram karoti

original: pratibhānākṛter asmāt pratibhāmātrarūpadhṛt / vibhāty evam ayaṃ sargaḥ satyānubhavavat sthitaḥ //MU_3,3.16//
analyzed: pratibhā nākṛteḥ asmāt pratibhā mātra rūpa dhṛt vibhāti evam ayam sargaḥ satya anubhava vat sthitaḥ

original: evaṃ sati / pratibhānākṛteḥ pratibhānasvarūpāt / asmāt padmajāt / ayaṃ sargaḥ idaṃ
analyzed: evam sati pratibhāna ākṛteḥ pratibhāna svarūpāt asmāt padmajāt ayam sargaḥ idam

original: sṛjikriyāviṣayo dṛśyamaṇḍalaṃ / pratibhāmātrarūpadhṛt eva pratibhānamātrarūpadhārī
analyzed: sṛji kriyā viṣayaḥ dṛśya maṇḍalam pratibhā mātra rūpa dhṛt eva pratibhāna mātra rūpa dhārī

original: eva / na tu sthūlabhūtamayarūpadhārī / vibhāti sphurati / na hi dravaguṇayuktāt jalāt
analyzed: eva na tu sthūla bhūta maya rūpa dhārī vibhāti sphurati na hi drava guṇa yuktāt jalāt

original: dravaguṇarahitaḥ taraṅgaḥ utpadyate / ayaṃ sargaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / sthitaḥ / kathaṃ /
analyzed: drava guṇa rahitaḥ taraṅgaḥ utpadyate ayam sargaḥ kathambhūtaḥ sthitaḥ katham

original: satyānubhavavat satyaḥ anubhavaḥ yasya / saḥ satyānubhavaḥ / sa iva tadvat / paramārthatas
analyzed: satya anubhavavat satyaḥ anubhavaḥ yasya saḥ satya anubhavaḥ saḥ iva tadvat paramārthatas

original: tu svapnavat pratibhānamātram eveti vatigrahaṇam //MT_3,3.16 //
analyzed: tu svapna vat pratibhāna mātram eva iti vati grahaṇam

original: atra dṛṣṭāntadvayaṃ kathayati
analyzed: atra dṛṣṭānta dvayam kathayati

original: dṛṣṭānto 'tra svapnapuraṃ svapnastrīsurataṃ tathā / asad apy arthasampattyā satyānubhavabhāsvaram //MU_3,3.17//
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaḥ atra svapna puram svapna strī suratam tathā asat api artha sampattyā satya anubhava bhāsvaram

original: atrāsmin sthāne / sargasya pratibhānamātrarūpatāyām iti yāvat / svapnapuraṃ svapnadṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: atra asmin sthāne sargasya pratibhāna mātra rūpa tāyām iti yāvat svapna puram svapna dṛṣṭam

original: puraṃ / tathā tadvat / svapnastrīsurataṃ svapnadṛṣṭastrīsurataṃ / dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: puram tathā tadvat svapna strī suratam svapna dṛṣṭa strī suratam dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati

original: kathambhūtam / asad api pratītimātrasāratvenāsatsvarūpam api / arthasampattyā arthakriyāsampādanena /
analyzed: kathambhūtam asat api pratīti mātra sāra tvena asat svarūpam api artha sampattyā arthakriyā sampādanena

original: satyānubhavabhāsvaram satyānubhavayuktavastuvat bhāsanaśīlam //MT_3,3.17 //
analyzed: satya anubhava bhāsvaram satya anubhava yukta vastu vat bhāsana śīlam

original: padmajasya dehābhāve 'pi dehabhānaṃ kathayati
analyzed: padmajasya deha abhāve api deha bhānam kathayati

original: apṛthvyādimayo bhāti vyomākṛtir adehakaḥ / sadeha iva bhūteśaḥ svātmabhūḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ //MU_3,3.18//
analyzed: a pṛthvī ādi mayaḥ bhāti vyoma ākṛtiḥ adehakaḥ sa dehaḥ iva bhūteśaḥ sva ātma bhūḥ puruṣa ākṛtiḥ

original: apṛthvyādimayaḥ pṛthvyādivyatiriktasvarūpaḥ / ata eva vyomākṛtiḥ ākāśākṛtiḥ / ata
analyzed: a pṛthvī ādi mayaḥ pṛthvī ādi vyatirikta svarūpaḥ atas eva vyoma ākṛtiḥ ākāśa ākṛtiḥ

original: eva ca adehaḥ ādhibhautikadeharahitaḥ / svātmabhūḥ padmajaḥ / sadeha iva bhāti sphurati /
analyzed: eva ca adehaḥ ādhibhautika deha rahitaḥ svātmabhūḥ padmajaḥ sa dehaḥ iva bhāti sphurati

original: sadehakāryanānāvidhaprapañcakartṛtvāt / svātmabhūḥ kathambhūtaḥ / bhūteśaḥ sarvabhūtotpādakatvena
analyzed: sa deha kārya nānāvidha prapañca kartṛ tvāt svātmabhūḥ kathambhūtaḥ bhūteśaḥ sarva bhūta utpādaka tvena

original: sarvabhūtasvāmī / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / puruṣākṛtiḥ puruṣavat ākṛtiḥ yasya / saḥ tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhūta svāmī punar kathambhūtaḥ puruṣa ākṛtiḥ puruṣavat ākṛtiḥ yasya saḥ tādṛśaḥ

original: anyathā śāstreṣu caturmukhatvakalpanāṃ na kuryād ity arthaḥ //MT_3,3.18 //
analyzed: anyathā śāstreṣu caturmukha tva kalpanām na kuryāt iti arthaḥ

original: asyodayaśāntī tadabhāvaṃ ca kathayati
analyzed: asya udaya śāntī tad abhāvam ca kathayati

original: sa cit saṅkalparūpatvād udety apy atha śāmyati / svāyattatvāt svabhāvasya nodeti na ca śāmyati //MU_3,3.19//
analyzed: sa cit saṅkalpa rūpa tvāt udeti api atha śāmyati sva āyatta tvāt svabhāvasya nā udeti na ca śāmyati

original: cit paramārthataḥ citsvarūpaḥ / saḥ padmajaḥ / saṅkalparūpatvāt cinmātrāśrayasvaparāmarśasvarūpasaṅkalparūpatvenodeti
prādurbhavati / atha udayānantaram / upaśāmyaty api śāntiṃ vrajati ca / saṅkalpasyodayaśāntiniyatādhāratvāt /
analyzed: prādurbhavati atha udaya anantaram upaśāmyati api śāntim vrajati ca saṅkalpasya udaya śānti niyata ādhāra tvāt

original: tathā saḥ padmajaḥ / svabhāvasya cinmātrākhyasya svarūpasya / svāyattatvāt tad evāham
analyzed: tathā saḥ padmajaḥ svabhāvasya cit mātra ākhyasya svarūpasya sva āyatta tvāt tat eva aham

original: iti parāmarśaviṣayatvāt / na udeti na ca śāmyati / na hi svabhāvāparaparyāyasya sadābhātasya
analyzed: iti parāmarśa viṣaya tvāt na udeti na ca śāmyati na hi svabhāva apara paryāyasya sat ābhātasya

original: cinmātrasyodayaśāntī yukte iti / tatra svātmatve niścitasya tatsvarūpasya ca padmajasyāpi
analyzed: cit mātrasya udaya śāntī yukte iti tatra sva ātma tve niścitasya tad svarūpasya ca padmajasya api

original: te na yukte iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,3.19 //
analyzed: te na yukte iti bhāvaḥ

original: athāsyaiva jagatkāraṇatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: atha asya eva jagat kāraṇa tvam kathayati

original: brahmā saṅkalparahitaḥ pṛthvyādirahitākṛtiḥ / kevalaś cittamātrātmā kāraṇaṃ trijagatsthiteḥ //MU_3,3.20//
analyzed: brahmā saṅkalpa rahitaḥ pṛthvī ādi rahita ākṛtiḥ kevalaḥ cittamātra ātmā kāraṇam tri jagat sthiteḥ

original: saṅkalparahitaḥ ātivāhikadeharahitaḥ / tathā pṛthvyādirahitākṛtiḥ sthūladeharahitaḥ /
analyzed: saṅkalpa rahitaḥ ātivāhika deha rahitaḥ tathā pṛthvī ādi rahita ākṛtiḥ sthūla deha rahitaḥ

original: ata eva kevalaḥ advitīyaḥ / cinmātrarūpa iti yāvat / tathātve 'pi cittamātrātmā śuddhasaṅkalparūpaśuddhacittasvarūpaḥ /
