analyzed: atas eva kevalaḥ advitīyaḥ cit mātra rūpaḥ iti yāvat tathātve api cittamātra ātmā śuddha saṅkalpa rūpa śuddha citta svarūpaḥ

original: brahmā padmajaḥ / trijagatsthiteḥ trijagatsattāyāḥ / kāraṇam bhavati //MT_3,3.20 //
analyzed: brahmā padmajaḥ trijagat sthiteḥ trijagat sattāyāḥ kāraṇam bhavati

original: nanu advitīyāc cinmātrāt kasya preraṇayā śuddhamanorūpaḥ padmajaḥ uttiṣṭhatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu advitīyāt cit mātrāt kasya preraṇayā śuddha manaḥ rūpaḥ padmajaḥ uttiṣṭhati iti atra āha

original: saṅkalpa eṣa kacati yathā nāma svasambhavaḥ / vyomātmaiṣa tathā bhāti bhavatsaṅkalpaśailavat //MU_3,3.21//
analyzed: saṅkalpaḥ eṣa kacati yathā nāma sva sambhavaḥ  vyoma ātmā eṣa tathā bhāti bhavat saṅkalpa śaila vat

original: nāma niścaye / yathā eṣaḥ sarvaiḥ anubhūyamānaḥ saṅkalpaḥ / svasambhavaḥ svotthaḥ /
analyzed: nāma niścaye yathā eṣaḥ sarvaiḥ anubhūyamānaḥ saṅkalpaḥ svasambhavaḥ svotthaḥ

original: na tu parasambhavaḥ / kacati sphurati / tathā eṣaḥ śuddhamanorūpaḥ padmajaḥ svasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: na tu para sambhavaḥ kacati sphurati tathā eṣaḥ śuddha manaḥ rūpaḥ padmajaḥ sva sambhavaḥ

original: bhāti sphurati / kathaṃ / bhavatsaṅkalpaśailavat / saṅkalpe dṛṣṭaḥ śailaḥ saṅkalpaśailaḥ /
analyzed: bhāti sphurati katham bhavat saṅkalpa śaila vat saṅkalpe dṛṣṭaḥ śailaḥ saṅkalpa śailaḥ

original: bhavataḥ saṅkalpaśailaḥ bhavatsaṅkalpaśailaḥ / sa iva bhavatsaṅkalpaśailavat / yathā
analyzed: bhavataḥ saṅkalpa śailaḥ bhavat saṅkalpa śailaḥ saḥ iva bhavat saṅkalpa śaila vat yathā

original: bhavataḥ saṅkalpaśailaḥ svasambhavaḥ bhāti / tathety arthaḥ / saṅkalpasya ca svataḥ
analyzed: bhavataḥ saṅkalpa śailaḥ sva sambhavaḥ bhāti tathā iti arthaḥ saṅkalpasya ca svatas

original: sphuraṇaṃ sarveṣu prasiddham eveti / sa eva sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvābhyāṃ dvir upamānatvenopāttaḥ //MT_3,3.21 //
analyzed: sphuraṇam sarveṣu prasiddham eva iti saḥ eva sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvābhyām dvis upamāna tvena upāttaḥ

original: asya padmajasyādhibhautikadeharāhityaṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ sahetukaṃ kathayati
analyzed: asya padmajasya ādhibhautika deha rāhityam tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ sa hetukam kathayati

original: ātivāhikataikāntavismṛtyā dṛḍharūḍhayā / ādhibhautikatā yena mudhā bhāti piśācavat //MU_3,3.22//
analyzed: ātivāhika tā ekānta vismṛtyā dṛḍha rūḍhayā ādhibhautika tā yena mudhā bhāti piśāca vat

original: idamprathamatodyogasamprabuddhamahāciteḥ /
analyzed: idam prathamatas udyoga samprabuddha mahā citeḥ

original: nodeti śuddhasaṃvittvād ātivāhikavismṛtiḥ //MT_3,3.23//
analyzed: nā udeti śuddha saṃvid tvāt ātivāhika vismṛtiḥ

original: ādhibhautikatā tena nāsyodeti piśācikā / asatyā mṛgatṛṣṇeva mithyā jāḍyabhramapradā //MU_3,3.24//
analyzed: ādhibhautika tā tena na asya udeti piśācikā asatyā mṛgatṛṣṇā iva mithyā jāḍya bhrama pradā

original: yena yataḥ hetoḥ / dṛḍharūḍhayā prauḍhiṃ gatayā / ātivāhikataikāntavismṛtyā / ātivāhikatāyāḥ
analyzed: yena yatas hetoḥ dṛḍha rūḍhayā prauḍhim gatayā ātivāhika tā ekānta vismṛtyā ātivāhika tāyāḥ

original: ātivāhikabhāvasya / sūkṣmatāyā iti yāvat / yā ekāntavismṛtiḥ atyantavismaraṇaṃ /
analyzed: ātivāhika bhāvasya sūkṣma tāyāḥ iti yāvat yā ekānta vismṛtiḥ atyanta vismaraṇam

original: tayā / ādhibhautikatā ādhibhautikabhāvaḥ / sthūlatā iti yāvat / piśācavat mudhā asatyaṃ /
analyzed: tayā ādhibhautika tā ādhibhautika bhāvaḥ sthūla tā iti yāvat piśāca vat mudhā asatyam

original: bhāti sphurati / aśuddhasya manasaḥ iti śeṣaḥ / tena tataḥ kāraṇāt / asya śuddhamanorūpasya
analyzed: bhāti sphurati aśuddhasya manasaḥ iti śeṣaḥ tena tatas kāraṇāt asya śuddha manaḥ rūpasya

original: padmajasya / piśācikā mithyābhūtapiśācarūpā / ādhibhautikatā ādhibhautikabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: padmajasya piśācikā mithyā bhūta piśāca rūpā ādhibhautika tā ādhibhautika bhāvaḥ

original: sthūlabhāva iti yāvat / na bhāti na sphurati / ādhibhautikatā kathambhūtā / jāḍyasya
analyzed: sthūla bhāvaḥ iti yāvat na bhāti na sphurati ādhibhautika tā kathambhūtā jāḍyasya

original: jaḍatāyāḥ / bhramaṃ vaipulyaṃ / prakarṣeṇa dadātīti tādṛśī / ādhibhautikatāsādanena
analyzed: jaḍa tāyāḥ bhramam vaipulyam prakarṣeṇa dadāti iti tādṛśī ādhibhautika tā āsādanena

original: hi manasaḥ jāḍyam adhikībhavati / ādhibhautikatā punaḥ kathambhūtā / asatyā asatyaṃ
analyzed: hi manasaḥ jāḍyam adhikībhavati ādhibhautika tā punar kathambhūtā asatyā asatyam

original: bhātety arthaḥ / kā iva / mṛgatṛṣṇā iva / yathā mṛgatṛṣṇā asatyā bhavati / tathety
analyzed: bhātā iti arthaḥ kā iva mṛgatṛṣṇā iva yathā mṛgatṛṣṇā asatyā bhavati tathā iti

original: arthaḥ / nanu ādhibhautikatā ātivāhikatāvismṛtikāraṇikā bhavatu / kathaṃ sā tena
analyzed: arthaḥ nanu ādhibhautika tā ātivāhika tā vismṛti kāraṇikā bhavatu katham sā tena

original: śuddhamanorūpe padmaje na bhavatīty / atra ślokatrayamadhyagaṃ dvitīyaṃ ślokaṃ samarthakatvena
analyzed: śuddha manaḥ rūpe padmaje na bhavati iti atra śloka traya madhya gam dvitīyam ślokam samarthaka tvena

original: kathayati idam iti / idamprathamatayā tatpūrvaṃ / yaḥ udyogaḥ svaparāmarśaṃ prati
analyzed: kathayati idam iti idam prathama tayā tad pūrvam yaḥ udyogaḥ sva parāmarśam prati

original: ābhimukhyaṃ / tena samprabuddhā svaparāmarśayuktā / yā mahācitiḥ cinmātram / tasya /
analyzed: ābhimukhyam tena samprabuddhā sva parāmarśa yuktā yā mahā citiḥ cit mātram tasya

original: tatsvarūpasyeti yāvat / asya śuddhamanorūpasya padmajasya / śuddhasaṃvittvāt bhedamalārūṣitasaṃvidyuktatvena /
analyzed: tad sva rūpasya iti yāvat asya śuddha manaḥ rūpasya padmajasya śuddha saṃvid tvāt

original: ātivāhikavismṛtiḥ bhāvapradhānanirdeśāśrayaṇena ātivāhikatāvismaraṇam / nodeti na
analyzed: ātivāhika vismṛtiḥ bhāva pradhāna nirdeśa āśrayaṇena ātivāhika tā vismaraṇam na udeti na

original: sphurati / ata evāsyātivāhikatāvismṛtikāraṇikā ādhibhautikatā na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sphurati atas eva asya ātivāhika tā vismṛti kāraṇikā ādhibhautika tā na bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ hi svam eva bhedarūṣitasaṃvidaḥ aśuddhasya manasa eva sthūlapurādibhāvena
analyzed: dṛṣṭam hi svam eva bheda rūṣita saṃvidaḥ aśuddhasya manasaḥ eva sthūla pura ādi bhāvena

original: bhānam iti nātrāyastam //MT_3,3.22-24 //
analyzed: bhānam iti na atra ayastam

original: padmajasya manomātrarūpatvena tatkāryasya jagato 'pi manomātrarūpatvaṃ yogyatayā atidiśati
analyzed: padmajasya manaḥ mātra rūpa tvena tad kāryasya jagataḥ api manaḥ mātra rūpa tvam yogyatayā atidiśati

original: manomātraṃ yadā brahmā na pṛthvyādimayātmakaḥ / manomātram ato viśvaṃ yad yatas tat tad eva hi //MU_3,3.25//
analyzed: manaḥ mātram yadā brahmā na pṛthvī ādi maya ātmakaḥ manaḥ mātram atas viśvam yat yatas tat tat eva hi

original: yadeti yata ity asyārthe / yadā yataḥ / brahmā padmajaḥ / manomātraṃ śuddhamanomātraṃ
analyzed: yadā iti yatas iti asya arthe yadā yatas brahmā padmajaḥ manaḥ mātram śuddha manaḥ mātram

original: bhavati / ataḥ viśvaṃ manomātraṃ bhavati / yataḥ / yat vastu / yataḥ yasmāt vastunaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati atas viśvam manaḥ mātram bhavati yatas yat vastu yatas yasmāt vastunaḥ

original: bhavati / sattākartṛtāṃ bhajati / tat vastu / tad eva bhavati / mṛdaḥ sattākartṛtvaṃ
analyzed: bhavati sattā kartṛtām bhajati tat vastu tat eva bhavati mṛdaḥ sattā kartṛ tvam

original: bhajataḥ ghaṭasya mṛttvadarśanāt / ato jagataḥ manovat anutpattisatattvā evotpattir
analyzed: bhajataḥ ghaṭasya mṛd tva darśanāt atas jagataḥ manaḥ vat anutpatti sa tattvā eva utpattiḥ

original: iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,3.25 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu padmajasya svakāraṇabhūtacinmātravyatiriktasahakārikāraṇābhāvena cinmātrasthūlatāmātrarūpam
analyzed: nanu padmajasya sva kāraṇa bhūta cit mātra vyatirikta sahakāri kāraṇa abhāvena cit mātra sthūla tā mātra rūpam

original: manomātrarūpatvam astu / tajjasya jagataḥ adṛṣṭādisahakārikāraṇasadbhāvāt kathaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ mātra rūpa tvam astu tad jasya jagataḥ adṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri kāraṇa sadbhāvāt katham

original: manomātrarūpatvaṃ yujyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: manaḥ mātra rūpa tvam yujyate iti atra āha

original: ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat / tajjasyāpi na santy eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicit //MU_3,3.26//
analyzed: ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat tad jasya api na santi eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicid

original: ajasya padmajasya / yat yataḥ kāraṇāt / sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi / tu niścaye /
analyzed: ajasya padmajasya yat yatas kāraṇāt sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi tu niścaye

original: tasmāt tataḥ kāraṇāt / tajjasya tasmād utpannasya jagataḥ / kānicit tāni kānicit
analyzed: tasmāt tatas kāraṇāt tad jasya tasmāt utpannasya jagataḥ kānicid tāni kānicid

original: sahakārīṇi / na santy eva / manaḥkāryāṇām adṛṣṭādīnāṃ manaḥ prati sahakāritvāyogāt /
analyzed: sahakārīṇi na santi eva manaḥ kāryāṇām adṛṣṭa ādīnām manaḥ prati sahakāri tva ayogāt

original: na hi yo yasmāt utpadyate sa eva tatsahakārī bhavitum arhati / svotpattisamaye svayam
analyzed: na hi yaḥ yasmāt utpadyate saḥ eva tad sahakārī bhavitum arhati sva utpatti samaye svayam

original: asattvāt / anyān praty eva sahakārikāraṇatvābhyupagame svotpattau sahakārikāraṇāntarāpekṣāyāḥ
analyzed: asattvāt anyān prati eva sahakāri kāraṇa tva abhyupagame sva utpattau sahakāri kāraṇa antara apekṣāyāḥ

original: sthitatvāt / anyathā svasyāpi parān prati sahakārikāraṇatvāyogāt //MT_3,3.26 //
analyzed: sthita tvāt anyathā svasya api parān prati sahakāri kāraṇatva ayogāt

original: nanu tato 'pi kim ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatas api kim iti atra āha

original: kāraṇāt kāryavaicitryaṃ tenātrāsti na kiñcana / yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ kāryaṃ tādṛg iha sthitam //MU_3,3.27//
analyzed: kāraṇāt kārya vaicitryam tena atra asti na kiñcana yādṛśam kāraṇam śuddham kāryam tādṛś iha sthitam

original: tena / yataḥ jagataḥ sahakārikāraṇāni na santi / tasmāt / atra padmajajagadviṣaye /
analyzed: tena yatas jagataḥ sahakāri kāraṇāni na santi tasmāt atra padmaja jagat viṣaye

analyzed: kāraṇāt kārya vaicitryam kārya bhedaḥ kiñcana leśena api nā asti daṇḍa ādi sahakāri kāraṇa sānnidhye

original: eva mṛdo ghaṭākhyakāryavaicitryasya dṛṣṭatvāt / ataḥ iha kāraṇaṃ yādṛśaṃ śuddhaṃ
analyzed: eva mṛdaḥ ghaṭa ākhya kārya vaicitryasya dṛṣṭa tvāt atas iha kāraṇam yādṛśam śuddham

analyzed: bhavati kāryam tādṛś sthitam bhavati bhinna tā āpādakānām sahakāri kāraṇānām abhāvāt

analyzed: bheda āpādaka tvāt

original: nanu cinmātrād utpannasya śuddhamanorūpasya padmajasya cinmātrarūpatvaṃ bhavatu / śuddhamanorūpāt padmajād utpannasya trailokyasya tu kathaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu cit mātrāt utpannasya śuddha manaḥ rūpasya padmajasya cit mātra rūpa tvam bhavatu śuddha manaḥ rūpāt padmajāt utpannasya trailokyasya tu katham

original: tad yuktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: tat yuktam iti atra āha

analyzed: guṇaḥ vistāryate tathā iti arthaḥ manastāyām api paramārthataḥ cit mātra tva anapāyāt

analyzed: sat eva bhavati tathā iti arthaḥ gandharvāḥ hi sva āvāsa artham kalpanayā śūnye nagaram

analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ iti ādi śabdena śuddha buddhi rūpasya viṣṇoḥ śuddha ahaṅkāra rūpasya rudrasya ca grahaṇam prabuddhāḥ atyanta śuddha tvena prakṛṣṭena

analyzed: iti tasya eva viriñca tvam yuktam caturmukha deva viśeṣa kalpanā tu sthūla dṛṣṭīn prati

āhuḥ

original: tadā kadācit na śāmyati / nābhāvo vidyate sata iti nyāyād ity arthaḥ / dṛśye aśāmyati
analyzed: tadā kadācid na śāmyati na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti nyāyāt iti arthaḥ dṛśye aśāmyati

original: sati / boddhari draṣṭari / kevalatvaṃ kevalībhāvaḥ / aboddhṛrūpateti yāvat / na bhavati /
analyzed: sati boddhari draṣṭari kevala tvam kevalībhāvaḥ a boddhṛ rūpa tā iti yāvat na bhavati

original: svavyatiriktasya dṛśyasthabodhyatayā sthitatvāt / mokṣābhāvaprakāram uktvā mokṣaṃ
analyzed: sva vyatiriktasya dṛśya stha bodhya tayā sthita tvāt mokṣa abhāva prakāram uktvā mokṣam

original: kathayati / dṛśya iti / tu pakṣāntare / dṛśye asambhavati sati / uktanyāyena anutpattisatattvotpattiyukte
analyzed: kathayati dṛśye iti tu pakṣa antare dṛśye asambhavati sati ukta nyāyena anutpatti sa tattva utpatti yukte

original: sati / boddhari draṣṭari / boddhṛbhāvaḥ śāmyet śāntiṃ vrajet / na hi dṛśyarahitasya
analyzed: sati boddhari draṣṭari boddhṛ bhāvaḥ śāmyet śāntim vrajet na hi dṛśya rahitasya

original: draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛtvaṃ nāma kiñcid asti / dṛśye kathambhūte 'pi / sthite 'pi / bhāsamānatvāt
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tvam nāma kiñcid asti dṛśye kathambhūte api sthite api bhāsamāna tvāt

original: sthitiṃ bhajaty api / nanu tena boddhṛbhāvaśamanena kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha / hi
analyzed: sthitim bhajati api nanu tena boddhṛ bhāva śamanena kim setsyati iti atra āha hi

original: tad asyeti / hi niścaye / paṇḍitāḥ tat boddhṛbhāvaśamanam / asya boddhuḥ / vimokṣaṃ
analyzed: tat asya iti hi niścaye paṇḍitāḥ tat boddhṛ bhāva śamanam asya boddhuḥ vimokṣam

original: viśiṣṭāṃ muktim / āhuḥ kathayanti / dṛśyānaunmukhyasyaiva mokṣatvād / iti śivam //MT_3,3.40 //
analyzed: viśiṣṭām muktim āhuḥ kathayanti dṛśya an aunmukhyasya eva mokṣa tvāt iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ // 3,3 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ śrīvālmīkiḥ bharadvājaṃ prati kathayati
analyzed: om śrī vālmīkiḥ bharadvājam prati kathayati

original: kathayaty evam uddāmavacanaṃ munināyake / śrotum ekarase jāte jane mauna iva sthite //MU_3,4.1//
analyzed: kathayati evam uddāma vacanam muni nāyake  śrotum ekarase jāte jane maune iva sthite

original: śānteṣu kiṅkiṇījālasvaneṣu spandanaṃ vinā / pañjarāntarahārītaśukeṣv apy astakeliṣu //MU_3,4.2//
analyzed: śānteṣu kiṅkiṇī jāla svaneṣu spandanam vinā pañjara antara hārīta śukeṣu api asta keliṣu

original: suvismṛtavilāsāsu sthitāsu lalanāsv api / citrabhittāv iva nyaste samaste rājasadmani //MU_3,4.3//
analyzed: su vismṛta vilāsāsu sthitāsu lalanāsu api citra bhittau iva nyaste samaste rāja sadmani

original: muhūrtaśeṣam abhavad divasaṃ madhurātapam / vyavahāro ravikaraiḥ saha tānavam āyayau //MU_3,4.4//
analyzed: muhūrta śeṣam abhavat divasam madhura ātapam vyavahāraḥ ravi karaiḥ saha tānavam āyayau

original: munināyake śrīvasiṣṭhe / evam anena prakāreṇa / uddāmavacanam arthagūḍhaṃ vacanaṃ /
analyzed: muni nāyake śrī vasiṣṭhe evam anena prakāreṇa uddāma vacanam artha gūḍham vacanam

original: kathayati sati / ata eva maune iva sthite maunākhyavratayukta iva sthite / jane sabhājane /
analyzed: kathayati sati atas eva maune iva sthite mauna ākhya vrata yukte iva sthite jane sabhājane

original: śrotum ekarase kevalāsvādayukte / jāte sati / tathā spandanaṃ vinā svādhārabhūtastryādikṛtaṃ
analyzed: śrotum ekarase kevala āsvāda yukte jāte sati tathā spandanam vinā sva ādhāra bhūta strī ādi kṛtam

original: spandanaṃ vinā / svādhārabhūtastryādikṛtaspandarāhityenety arthaḥ / kiṅkiṇījālasvaneṣu
analyzed: spandanam vinā sva ādhāra bhūta strī ādi kṛta spanda rāhityena iti arthaḥ kiṅkiṇī jāla svaneṣu

original: satsu / tathā pañjarāntareṣu sthitāḥ ye hārītaśukāḥ / teṣu api astakeliṣu tyaktakrīḍeṣu
analyzed: satsu tathā pañjara antareṣu sthitāḥ ye hārīta śukāḥ teṣu api asta keliṣu tyakta krīḍeṣu

original: satsu / tathā lalanāsu suvismṛtavilāsāsu atyantavismṛtavilāsāsu / sthitāsu satīṣu /
analyzed: satsu tathā lalanāsu su vismṛta vilāsāsu atyanta vismṛta vilāsāsu sthitāsu satīṣu

original: tathā samaste rājasadmani sakale rājagṛhe / citrabhittau nyaste iva citralikhite
analyzed: tathā samaste rāja sadmani sakale rājagṛhe citra bhittau nyaste iva citra likhite

original: iva sati / madhurātapam mandātapam / divasam muhūrtaśeṣam ghaṭikādvayaśeṣam / abhavat /
analyzed: iva sati madhura ātapam manda ātapam divasam muhūrta śeṣam ghaṭikā dvaya śeṣam abhavat

original: tathā vyavahāraḥ lokavyavahāraḥ / ravikaraiḥ saha tānavam āyayau //MT_3,4.1-4 //
analyzed: tathā vyavahāraḥ lokavyavahāraḥ ravikaraiḥ saha tānavam āyayau

original: anyat kiṃ tadābhūd ity apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: anyat kim tadā abhūt iti apekṣāyām āha

original: vavur utphullakamalaprakaronmadamāṃsalāḥ / vāyavo madhuraspandaṃ śravaṇārtham ivāgatāḥ //MU_3,4.5//
analyzed: vavuḥ utphulla kamala prakara unmada māṃsalāḥ vāyavaḥ madhura spandam śravaṇa artham iva āgatāḥ

original: vāyavaḥ madhuraspandam komalaspandam / vavuḥ vānti sma / kathambhūtāḥ / utphullāḥ
analyzed: vāyavaḥ madhura spandam komala spandam vavuḥ vānti sma kathambhūtāḥ utphullāḥ

original: ye kamalaprakarāḥ kamalasamūhāḥ / teṣu unmadāḥ saṅkocakāritvāt udgatarūpāḥ ca te
analyzed: ye kamala prakarāḥ kamala samūhāḥ teṣu unmadāḥ saṅkoca kāri tvāt udgata rūpāḥ ca te

original: māṃsalāś ca / tādṛśāḥ vāyavaḥ / kathambhūtā iva / śravaṇārtham munivākśravaṇārtham /
analyzed: māṃsalāḥ ca tādṛśāḥ vāyavaḥ kathaṃbhūtāḥ iva śravaṇa artham muni vāc śravaṇa artham

original: āgatā iva / yo 'pi śravaṇārtham āgacchati so 'pi madhuraspandam eva vāti //MT_3,4.5 //
analyzed: āgatāḥ iva yaḥ api śravaṇa artham āgacchati saḥ api madhura spandam eva vāti

original: śrutaṃ cintayituṃ bhānur ivāhoracanābhramam / tatyājaikāntam agamac chūnyam astagires taṭam //MU_3,4.6//
analyzed: śrutam cintayitum bhānuḥ iva ahar racanā bhramam tatyāja ekāntam agamat śūnyam asta gireḥ taṭam

original: bhānuḥ sūryaḥ / ahoracanābhramam dinanirmāṇārthaṃ bhramaṇam / tatyāja tyaktavān /
analyzed: bhānuḥ sūryaḥ ahar racanā bhramam dina nirmāṇa artham bhramaṇam tatyāja tyaktavān

original: tathā śūnyaṃ / ata eva ekāntam vijanam / astagireḥ taṭam agamat gatavān / kiṃ kartum
analyzed: tathā śūnyam atas eva ekāntam vijanam astagireḥ taṭam agamat gatavān kim kartum

original: iva / śrutam śravaṇaviṣayīkṛtam munivākkadambakam / cintayitum iva mananaviṣayīkartum
analyzed: iva śrutam śravaṇa viṣayīkṛtam muni vāc kadambakam cintayitum iva manana viṣayīkartum

original: iva / yo 'pi hi śrutaṃ kiñcid upadeśādikaṃ cintayitum icchati so 'pi kriyārūpam bhramam
analyzed: iva yaḥ api hi śrutam kiñcid upadeśa ādikam cintayitum icchati saḥ api kriyā rūpam bhramam

original: tyajati / ekāntaṃ ca gacchati //MT_3,4.6 //
analyzed: tyajati ekāntam ca gacchati

original: uttasthur mihikārambhaśyāmatā vanabhūmiṣu / vijñānaśravaṇād antaḥ śītalāḥ śāntatā iva //MU_3,4.7//
analyzed: uttasthuḥ mihikā ārambha śyāma tāḥ vana bhūmiṣu vijñāna śravaṇāt antar śītalāḥ śānta tāḥ iva

original: vanabhūmiṣu mihikārambhaśyāmatāḥ nīhārārambhaśyāmatāḥ / uttasthuḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
analyzed: vana bhūmiṣu mihikā ārambha śyāmatāḥ nīhāra ārambha śyāmatāḥ uttasthuḥ prādurbhūtāḥ

original: dināvasāne hi mihikāḥ uttiṣṭhanti / mihikārambhaśyāmatāḥ kā iva / śāntatāḥ iva kṣobharāhityānīva /
analyzed: dina avasāne hi mihikāḥ uttiṣṭhanti mihikā ārambha śyāma tāḥ kā iva śānta tāḥ iva kṣobha rāhityāni iva

original: yathā śītalāḥ santāpanāśakatvena śītalasvabhāvāḥ / śāntatāḥ / vijñānaśravaṇāt śrīvasiṣṭhoktavijñānaśravaṇena /
analyzed: yathā śītalāḥ santāpa nāśaka tvena śītala svabhāvāḥ vijñāna śravaṇāt śrī vasiṣṭha ukta vijñāna śravaṇena

original: antaḥ śrotṛjanamanassu / uttasthuḥ / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,4.7 //
analyzed: antar śrotṛ jana manassu uttasthuḥ tathā iti arthaḥ

original: babhūvur alpasañcārā janā daśasu dikṣv api / sāvadhānatayā śrotum iva santyaktaceṣṭitāḥ //MU_3,4.8//

original: chāyā dīrghatvam ājagmur vāsiṣṭhaṃ varṇanakramam / iva śrotum aśeṣāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ dīrghakandharāḥ //MU_3,4.9//
analyzed: chāyāḥ dīrgha tvam ājagmuḥ vāsiṣṭham varṇana kramam iva śrotum aśeṣāṇām vastūnām dīrgha kandharāḥ

analyzed: sāyaṃsamaye hi chāyāḥ dīrghībhavanti yaḥ api kiñcid śrotum icchati saḥ api dīrgha kandharaḥ bhavati iti svabhāva dvaya kathanam

original: pratīhāraḥ puraḥ prahvo bhūtvāha vasudhādhipam / deva snānadvijārcāsu kālo hy atigato
analyzed: pratīhāraḥ puras prahvaḥ bhūtvā āha vasudhādhipam deva snāna dvija arcāsu kālaḥ hi atigataḥ

original: bhṛśam //MU_3,4.10 //prahvo bhūtvā namno bhūtvā / kim āheti karmāpekṣāyām uttarārdham
analyzed: bhṛśam prahvaḥ bhūtvā namnaḥ bhūtvā kim āha iti karma apekṣāyām uttara ardham

original: karmatvena kathayati deveti / hi niścaye //MT_3,4.10 //

original: śrīvasiṣṭhakṛtaṃ vāksaṃharaṇaṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭha kṛtam vāc saṃharaṇam kathayati

original: tato vasiṣṭho bhagavān saṃhṛtya madhurāṃ giram / adya tāvan mahārāja śrutam etāvad astu vaḥ //MU_3,4.11//
analyzed: tatas vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān saṃhṛtya madhurām giram adya tāvat mahā rāja śrutam etāvat astu vaḥ

original: prātar anyad vadiṣyāma ity uktvā maunavān abhūt / ity ākarṇyaivam astūktvā bhūpatir bhūtivṛddhaye //MU_3,4.12//
analyzed: prātar anyat vadiṣyāmaḥ iti uktvā maunavān abhūt iti ākarṇya evam astu uktvā bhūpatiḥ bhūti vṛddhaye

original: puṣpārghyapādyasammānadakṣiṇādānapūjayā / sa devarṣimunīn viprān pūjayām āsa sādaram //MU_3,4.13//
analyzed: puṣpa arghya pādya sammāna dakṣiṇā dāna pūjayā sa deva ṛṣi munīn viprān pūjayām āsa sādaram

analyzed: śrotṝn śravaṇa utsukān jñātvā āha prātar iti ākarṇya eva na tu prativādam kṛtvā saḥ daśarathaḥ

analyzed: atha uttasthau sabhā sarvā sa rāja muni maṇḍalā kuṇḍala ākīrṇa raśmi ogha pariveśa āvṛta ānanā

analyzed: sabhā jana samūhaḥ sabhām viśinaṣṭi kuṇḍala iti kuṇḍalānām ākīrṇaḥ samantāt visārī

original: yaḥ raśmyoghaḥ kiraṇasamūhaḥ / tasya yaḥ pariveśaḥ maṇḍalaṃ / tenāvṛtāni janamukhāni /
analyzed: yaḥ raśmi oghaḥ kiraṇa samūhaḥ tasya yaḥ pariveśaḥ maṇḍalam tena āvṛtāni jana mukhāni

original: sabhāsamukhāni yasyāṃ / sā //MT_3,4.14 //
analyzed: sabhā samukhāni yasyām sā

original: parasparāṃsasaṅghaṭṭaraṇatkeyūrakaṅkaṇā / hārabhārāhatasvarṇapaṭṭābhorastaṭāntarā //MU_3,4.15//
analyzed: paraspara aṃsa saṅghaṭṭa raṇat keyūra kaṅkaṇā hāra bhāra āhata svarṇa paṭṭa ābha uraḥ taṭa antarā

original: parasparaṃ aṃsasaṅghaṭṭāḥ / tena milantaḥ / ata eva raṇantaḥ keyūrāḥ kaṅkaṇāni ca
analyzed: parasparam aṃsa saṅghaṭṭāḥ tena milantaḥ atas eva raṇantaḥ keyūrāḥ kaṅkaṇāni ca

analyzed: yasyām sā hāra bhāraiḥ āhatāni suvarṇa paṭṭa ābhāni uraḥ taṭa antarāṇi uraḥ taṭa madhyāni

original: yasyāṃ / sā //MT_3,4.15 //
analyzed: yasyām sā

original: śekharotsargaviśrāntaprabuddhamadhupavrajaiḥ / saghuṅghumaśirobhāgā patadbhir iva mūrdhajaiḥ //MU_3,4.16//
analyzed: śekhara utsarga viśrānta prabuddha madhupa vrajaiḥ sa ghuṅghuma śiraḥ bhāgā patadbhiḥ iva mūrdhajaiḥ

original: śekhareṣu sabhāsadapuṣpaśekhareṣu / utsargeṇa gandhodgiraṇena / viśrāntāḥ viśrāntiyuktāḥ /
analyzed: śekhareṣu sabhāsada puṣpa śekhareṣu utsargeṇa gandha udgiraṇena viśrāntāḥ viśrānti yuktāḥ

analyzed: tathā prabuddhāḥ gandha ghrāṇane caturāḥ ye madhupāḥ bhramarāḥ teṣām vrajaiḥ samūhaiḥ

original: saghuṅghumaśirobhāgā ghuṅghumaśabdayuktajanaśirodeśayuktā / madhupavrajaiḥ kair iva /
analyzed: sa ghuṅghuma śiraḥ bhāgā ghuṅghuma śabda yukta jana śiraḥ deśa yuktā madhupa vrajaiḥ kaiḥ iva

original: patadbhiḥ patanaśīlaiḥ / mūrdhajaiḥ keśair iva kṛṣṇavarṇatvāt //MT_3,4.16 //
analyzed: patadbhiḥ patana śīlaiḥ mūrdhajaiḥ keśaiḥ iva kṛṣṇa varṇa tvāt

original: kāñcanābharaṇoddyotakanakīkṛtadiṅmukhāḥ / buddhisthamunivāgarthasaṃśāntendriyavṛttayaḥ //MU_3,4.17//
analyzed: kāñcana ābharaṇa uddyota kanakīkṛta diṅmukhāḥ buddhi stha muni vāc artha saṃśānta indriya vṛttayaḥ

original: jagmur nabhaścarā vyoma bhūcarā bhūmimaṇḍalam / cakrur dinasamācāraṃ svaṃ sarve sveṣu sadmasu //MU_3,4.18//
analyzed: jagmuḥ nabhaḥ carāḥ vyoma bhū carāḥ bhūmi maṇḍalam cakruḥ dina samācāram svam sarve sveṣu sadmasu

original: kāñcanābharaṇānāṃ yaḥ uddyotaḥ prakāśaḥ / tena kanakīkṛtāni kanakarūpāṇi kṛtāni /

original: diṅmukhāni yaiḥ / te tādṛśāḥ / tathā buddhisthaḥ buddhau sphuraṇaśīlaḥ / na tu vismāritaḥ /
analyzed: diṅmukhāni yaiḥ te tādṛśāḥ tathā buddhi sthaḥ buddhau sphuraṇa śīlaḥ na tu vismāritaḥ

original: yaḥ munivāgarthaḥ / tena saṃśāntāḥ svaviṣayān prati anaunmukhyaṃ gatāḥ / indriyavṛttayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ muni vāc arthaḥ tena saṃśāntāḥ sva viṣayān prati an aunmukhyam gatāḥ indriya vṛttayaḥ

original: indriyavyāpārāḥ ye / te tādṛśāḥ / nabhaścarāḥ ākāśacāriṇaḥ / vyoma jagmuḥ / bhūcarāḥ
analyzed: indriya vyāpārāḥ ye te tādṛśāḥ nabhaścarāḥ ākāśa cāriṇaḥ vyoma jagmuḥ bhū carāḥ

original: bhūmimaṇḍalam jagmuḥ / tataḥ sarve samastāḥ nabhaścarādayaḥ / sveṣu sadmasu nijeṣu
analyzed: bhūmi maṇḍalam jagmuḥ tatas sarve samastāḥ nabhaścara ādayaḥ sveṣu sadmasu nijeṣu

original: gṛheṣu / svaṃ dinasamācāraṃ cakruḥ //MT_3,4.17-18 //
analyzed: gṛheṣu svam dinasamācāram cakruḥ

original: etasminn antare śyāmā yāminī samadṛśyata / janasaṅghātanirmukte gṛhe bālāṅganā yathā //MU_3,4.19//
analyzed: etasmin antare śyāmā yāminī samadṛśyata jana saṅghāta nirmukte gṛhe bāla aṅganā yathā

analyzed: yatra yasyām avasthāyām saṅkalpanam bhavati he aṅga tatra tasyām avasthāyām

original: tat prasiddhaṃ / manaḥ tathā tena saṅkalpanākhyena rūpeṇa / sthitaṃ bhavati / kecana
analyzed: tat prasiddham manaḥ tathā tena saṅkalpanā ākhyena rūpeṇa sthitam bhavati kecana

original: anirvācye / saṅkalpamanasī / kadācana jātu / bhinne na bhavataḥ / ekasvarūpatvāt //MT_3,4.43 //
analyzed: anirvācye saṅkalpa manasī kadācana jātu bhinne na bhavataḥ eka svarūpa tvāt

original: satyam asty athavāsatyaṃ yad arthapratibhāsanam / tāvanmātraṃ mano viddhi tad brahmaiṣa pitāmahaḥ //MU_3,4.44//
analyzed: satyam asti athavā asatyam yat artha pratibhāsanam tāvat mātram manaḥ viddhi tat brahma eṣa pitāmahaḥ

original: satyam athavā asatyaṃ yat arthapratibhāsanam arthasphuraṇam / asti / tvaṃ / tāvanmātraṃ
analyzed: satyam athavā asatyam yat artha pratibhāsanam artha sphuraṇam asti tvam tāvanmātram

original: tat arthapratibhāsanam / manaḥ cittaṃ / viddhi jānīhi / tat arthapratibhāsanarūpaṃ
analyzed: tat artha pratibhāsanam manaḥ cittam viddhi jānīhi tat artha pratibhāsana rūpam

original: manaḥ / eṣaḥ śāstreṣu kathitaḥ / pitāmahaḥ pitāmahety aparaparyāyaḥ brahmā bhavati /
analyzed: manaḥ eṣaḥ śāstreṣu kathitaḥ pitāmahaḥ pitāmaha iti apara paryāyaḥ brahmā bhavati

original: sarvasṛṣṭikāraṇatvāt / sṛṣṭikāraṇasyaiva śāstreṣv api brahmatvakathanāt //MT_3,4.44 //
analyzed: sarva sṛṣṭi kāraṇa tvāt sṛṣṭi kāraṇasya eva śāstreṣu api brahma tva kathanāt

original: svapnādau sarvair anubhūyamānātivāhikadeharūpatvaṃ manasaḥ kathayati
analyzed: svapna ādau sarvaiḥ anubhūyamāna ātivāhika deha rūpa tvam manasaḥ kathayati

original: ātivāhikadehātmā mana ity abhidhīyate / ādhibhautikabuddhis tu sadā dhīs tu cirasthitiḥ //MU_3,4.45//
analyzed: ātivāhika deha ātmā manaḥ iti abhidhīyate ādhibhautika buddhiḥ tu sadā dhīḥ tu cira sthitiḥ

original: paṇḍitaiḥ ātivāhikasya kṣaṇāntare varṣaprāpyadeśaprāptyā sphuṭam ativahanaśīlasya /
analyzed: paṇḍitaiḥ ātivāhikasya kṣaṇa antare varṣa prāpya deśa prāptyā sphuṭam ativahana śīlasya

original: dehasyārthāt svapnasaṅkalpādau pratibhāsamānasya dehasyātmā svarūpaṃ / mana ity abhidhīyate /
analyzed: dehasya arthāt svapna saṅkalpa ādau pratibhāsamānasya dehasya ātmā svarūpam manaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: na tu tārkikābhimataḥ paramāṇuḥ / na hi tasya proktasvarūpam ativahanaṃ yujyate /
analyzed: na tu tārkika abhimataḥ paramāṇuḥ na hi tasya prokta svarūpam ativahanam yujyate

original: tadārabdhe sthūladehe tadadarśanāt / etatprasaṅgena buddhidārḍhyasyādhibhautikadehatvaṃ
analyzed: tad ārabdhe sthūla dehe tad adarśanāt etad prasaṅgena buddhi dārḍhyasya ādhibhautika deha tvam

original: sādhayati ādhibhautiketi / tu vyatireke / paṇḍitaiḥ ādhibhautikabuddhiḥ ādhibhautikadehākārā
analyzed: sādhayati ādhibhautikā iti tu vyatireke paṇḍitaiḥ ādhibhautika buddhiḥ ādhibhautika deha ākārā

original: buddhiḥ / ādhibhautikadehasvarūpam iti yāvat / cirasthitiḥ dhīḥ iti dārḍhyaṃ gatā
analyzed: buddhiḥ ādhibhautika deha svarūpam iti yāvat cira sthitiḥ dhīḥ iti dārḍhyam gatā

original: ātivāhikadehaviṣayā buddhir iti / sadābhidhīyate / manaḥsvarūpātivāhikadehaviṣayā
analyzed: ātivāhika deha viṣayā buddhiḥ iti sadā abhidhīyate manaḥ svarūpa ātivāhika deha viṣayā

original: buddhir eva hi dārḍhyaṃ gatādhibhautikabhāvena sphurati / na tu māṃsamayaḥ ādhibhautiko
analyzed: buddhiḥ eva hi dārḍhyam gata ādhibhautika bhāvena sphurati na tu māṃsa mayaḥ ādhibhautikaḥ

original: nāma kaścit pṛthag asti yathā tathā sato 'pi tasya buddhiviṣayatvaṃ vinā asatkalpatvāt /
analyzed: nāma kaścid pṛthak asti yathā tathā sataḥ api tasya buddhi viṣaya tvam vinā asat kalpa tvāt

original: buddhiviṣayatve tu buddhirūpatvānapāyāt / viṣayo hi sa evocyate yaḥ viṣayyagrastha
analyzed: buddhi viṣaya tve tu buddhi rūpa tva anapāyāt viṣayaḥ hi saḥ eva ucyate yaḥ

original: iva bhāsate / anyathā pītadravyasyāpi nīlajñānaviṣayatvāpātāt / dvitīyaḥ tuśabdaḥ
analyzed: iva bhāsate anyathā pīta dravyasya api nīla jñāna viṣaya tva āpātāt dvitīyaḥ tuśabdaḥ

original: pādapūraṇārthaḥ //MT_3,4.45 //
dṛśyatvasādhanārthaṃ manasaḥ dṛśyaparyāyatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: dṛśya tva sādhana artham manasaḥ dṛśya paryāya tvam kathayati

original: avidyā saṃsṛtiś cittaṃ mano bandho malaṃ tamaḥ / iti paryāyanāmāni dṛśyasya vidur uttamāḥ //MU_3,4.46//
analyzed: avidyā saṃsṛtiḥ cittam manaḥ bandhaḥ malam tamaḥ iti paryāya nāmāni dṛśyasya viduḥ uttamāḥ

original: ataḥ manaḥ dṛśyam evānyathā dṛśyaparyāyatvam asya na syād iti //MT_3,4.46//
analyzed: atas manaḥ dṛśyam eva anyathā dṛśya paryāya tvam asya na syāt iti

original: nanu padārthagrāhakatayā bhāsamānasya manasaḥ kathaṃ dṛśyaparyāyatvaṃ yuktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu padārtha grāhaka tayā bhāsamānasya manasaḥ katham dṛśya paryāya tvam yuktam iti atra āha

original: na hi dṛśyād ṛte kiñcin manaso rūpam asti hi / dṛśyaṃ cotpannam evaitan neti vakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ //MU_3,4.47//
analyzed: na hi dṛśyāt ṛte kiñcid manasaḥ rūpam asti hi dṛśyam ca utpannam eva etat na iti vakṣyāmi aham punar

original: hi yasmāt kāraṇāt / dṛśyād ṛte kiñcit dṛśyavyatiriktaṃ kiñcit / manasaḥ rūpaṃ / hi
analyzed: hi yasmāt kāraṇāt dṛśyāt ṛte kiñcid dṛśya vyatiriktam kiñcid manasaḥ rūpam hi

original: niścayena / nāsti / ataḥ manasaḥ dṛśyaparyāyatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ / nanu tato 'pi
analyzed: niścayena na asti atas manasaḥ dṛśya paryāya tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ nanu tatas api

original: kim ity / atrāha dṛśyaṃ ceti / etat dṛśyaṃ ca utpannaṃ na bhavati / pūrvam uktatvāt /
analyzed: kim iti atra āha dṛśyam ca iti etat dṛśyam ca utpannam na bhavati pūrvam ukta tvāt

original: ataḥ manaḥ api anutpannam eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / nanu dṛśyānutpannatve mama pūrvaṃ
analyzed: atas manaḥ api anutpannam eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ nanu dṛśya anutpanna tve mama pūrvam

original: niścayo na jāta ity atrāhetīti / aham iti etat dṛśyānutpannatvam / punaḥ vakṣyāmi /
analyzed: niścayaḥ na jātaḥ iti atra āha iti iti  aham iti etat dṛśya anutpanna tvam punar vakṣyāmi

original: durbodhatvād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.47 //
analyzed: durbodha tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛśyānutpannatvam eva kathayati
analyzed: dṛśya anutpanna tvam eva kathayati

original: yathā kamalabīje 'ntaḥ sthitā kamalamañjarī / mahācitparamāṇvantas tathā dṛśyaṃ jagat sthitam //MU_3,4.48//
analyzed: yathā kamala bīje antar sthitā kamalamañjarī mahā cit paramāṇu antar tathā dṛśyam jagat sthitam

original: yathā kamalamañjarī kamalabīje padmākṣe / antaḥ sthitā bhavati / anyathā agre nirgamāsambhavaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: yathā kamalamañjarī kamala bīje padmākṣe antar sthitā bhavati anyathā agre nirgama asambhava prasaṅgāt

original: tathā dṛśyam jagat dṛśikriyāviṣayībhūtaṃ jagat / mahācitparamāṇvantaḥ / mahācit aparicchinnā
analyzed: tathā dṛśyam jagat dṛśi kriyā viṣayībhūtam jagat mahā cit paramāṇu antar mahā cit aparicchinnā

original: cit / sā evātisūkṣmatvāt paramāṇuḥ / tasyāntaḥ madhye / sthitaṃ bhavati / anyathā
analyzed: cit sā eva ati sūkṣma tvāt paramāṇuḥ tasya antar madhye sthitam bhavati anyathā

original: kutaḥ asyāḥ nirgamaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ / ato dṛśyasya mahācitaḥ pṛthaktvābhāvenānutpannatvam
analyzed: kutas asyāḥ nirgamaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ atas dṛśyasya mahā citaḥ pṛthaktva abhāvena anutpanna tvam

original: eveti paramo bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.48 //
analyzed: eva iti paramaḥ bhāvaḥ

original: etad eva punaḥ punaḥ kathayati
analyzed: etat eva punar punar kathayati

original: prakāśasya yathāloko yathā vātasya copanam / yathā dravatvaṃ payaso dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭur īdṛśam //MU_3,4.49//
analyzed: prakāśasya yathā ālokaḥ yathā vātasya copanam yathā drava tvam payasaḥ dṛśya tvam draṣṭuḥ īdṛśam

original: ālokaḥ arthaprākaṭyahetuḥ guṇaviśeṣaḥ / copanaṃ spandaḥ / draṣṭṛvyatiriktadṛśyasya sattā nāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.49//
analyzed: ālokaḥ artha prākaṭya hetuḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ copanam spandaḥ draṣṭṛ vyatirikta dṛśyasya sattā na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: aṅgadatvaṃ yathā hemni mṛganadyāṃ yathā jalam / bhittir yathā svapnapure tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ //MU_3,4.50//
analyzed: aṅgada tvam yathā hemni mṛga nadyām yathā jalam bhittiḥ yathā svapna pure tathā draṣṭari dṛśya dhīḥ

original: spaṣṭam //MT_3,4.50//
analyzed: spaṣṭam

original: anena nyāyena draṣṭuḥ dṛśyamayatvaṃ yat siddhaṃ tad api malatvenonmṛjyatayā pratijānīte
analyzed: anena nyāyena draṣṭuḥ dṛśya maya tvam yat siddham tat api mala tvena unmṛjya tayā pratijānīte

original: evaṃ draṣṭari dṛśyatvam ananyad iva yat sthitam / tad apy unmārjayāmy āśu tvaccittādarśato malam //MU_3,4.51//
analyzed: evam draṣṭari dṛśya tvam ananyat iva yat sthitam tat api unmārjayāmi āśu tvad citta ādarśataḥ malam

original: evaṃ sati / draṣṭari dṛśikriyākartari / ananyat uktanyāyenābhinnaṃ / yat dṛśyatvam
analyzed: evam sati draṣṭari dṛśi kriyā kartari ananyat ukta nyāyena abhinnam yat dṛśya tvam

original: dṛśikriyāviṣayatvaṃ / sthitam iva bhavati / ahaṃ / malam malabhāvena sthitam / tat
analyzed: dṛśi kriyā viṣaya tvam sthitam iva bhavati aham malam mala bhāvena sthitam tat

original: api draṣṭur abhinnaṃ dṛśyatvam api / tvaccittādarśataḥ tvaccittadarpaṇāt / unmārjayāmi /
analyzed: api draṣṭuḥ abhinnam dṛśya tvam api tvad citta ādarśataḥ tvad citta darpaṇāt unmārjayāmi

original: yena sarvathā tvanmanasi dṛśyasparśo na syād / asattvenāpi bhāsamānaṃ dṛśyaṃ leśato
analyzed: yena sarvathā tvad manasi dṛśya sparśaḥ na syāt asattvena api bhāsamānam dṛśyam leśataḥ

original: duḥkhadam eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / nanu draṣṭur abhinnasya dṛśyatvasya kathaṃ malatvaṃ /
analyzed: duḥkha dam eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ nanu draṣṭuḥ abhinnasya dṛśya tvasya katham mala tvam

original: vyatiriktasyaiva malatvād iti cet / satyam / draṣṭā svābhinnatvenāpi niścitaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ
analyzed: vyatiriktasya eva mala tvāt iti ced satyam draṣṭā sva abhinna tvena api niścitam dṛśya tvam

original: svabhinnatvam api āpādayati / svabhinnatvākhyaṃ pratiyoginaṃ vinā svābhinnatvasyāsiddher
analyzed: sva bhinna tvam api āpādayati sva bhinna tva ākhyam pratiyoginam vinā sva abhinna tvasya asiddheḥ

original: iti svabhinnatvāpādakasya dṛśyasya malatvaṃ sphuṭam eveti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ //MT_3,4.51 //
analyzed: iti sva bhinna tva āpādakasya dṛśyasya mala tvam sphuṭam evā iti na kaḥ api virodhaḥ

original: nanu kimarthaṃ draṣṭur ananyatvena sthitasya malarūpasya api dṛśyatvasyonmārjanaṃ karoṣīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kimartham draṣṭuḥ ananya tvena sthitasya mala rūpasya api dṛśya tvasya unmārjanam karoṣi iti atra āha

original: yad draṣṭur asyādraṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyābhāve bhaved balāt / tad viddhi kevalībhāvam ata evāsataḥ sataḥ //MU_3,4.52//
analyzed: yat draṣṭuḥ asya adraṣṭṛ tvam dṛśya abhāve bhavet balāt tat viddhi kevalībhāvam atas eva asataḥ sataḥ

original: asya ātmatvena sthitasya / draṣṭuḥ dṛśikriyākartuḥ / dṛśyābhāve sati / balāt balena /
analyzed: asya ātma tvena sthitasya draṣṭuḥ dṛśi kriyā kartuḥ dṛśya abhāve sati balāt balena

original: svaprayatnaṃ vineti yāvat / yat adraṣṭṛtvaṃ bhavet / na hi dṛśyaṃ vinā draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛtvaṃ
analyzed: sva prayatnam vinā iti yāvat yat adraṣṭṛ tvam bhavet na hi dṛśyam vinā draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tvam

original: nāma kiñcid asti / śaktibhāvena sthitasyāpi tasya svarūpatvānapāyāt / tvam / tat
analyzed: nāma kiñcid asti śakti bhāvena sthitasya api tasya sva rūpa tva anapāyāt tvam tat

original: adraṣṭṛtvaṃ / kevalībhāvam muktiṃ / viddhi jānīhi / draṣṭuḥ dṛśyānaunmukhyamātrasyaiva
muktitvāt / draṣṭuḥ kathambhūtasya / ata evāsataḥ sataḥ / draṣṭṛtvāpekṣayā asataḥ /
analyzed: mukti tvāt draṣṭuḥ kathambhūtasya atas eva asataḥ sataḥ draṣṭṛ tva apekṣayā asataḥ

original: kevalībhāvāpekṣayā sataḥ / na hy asataḥ kevalībhāvaḥ yuktaḥ / tathā cānirvācyasyety
analyzed: kevalībhāva apekṣayā sataḥ na hi asataḥ kevalībhāvaḥ yuktaḥ tathā ca anirvācyasya iti

original: arthaḥ / ataḥ kevalībhāvasiddhaye sarvathā dṛśyonmārjanam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.52 //
analyzed: arthaḥ atas kevalī bhāva siddhaye sarvathā dṛśya unmārjanam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu dṛśyābhāvaprabhāvāt siddhe 'pi adraṣṭṛtve kevalībhāvo na sidhyati / dṛśyaviṣayasya rāgādeḥ suṣuptivat vāsanābhāvena sthitatvād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛśya abhāva prabhāvāt siddhe api adraṣṭṛ tve kevalī bhāvaḥ na sidhyati dṛśya viṣayasya rāga ādeḥ suṣupti vat vāsanā bhāvena sthita tvāt iti atra āha

original: tattām upagate bhāve rāgadveṣādivāsanā / śāmyaty aspandite vāte spandasaṅkṣubdhatā yathā //MU_3,4.53//
analyzed: tad tām upagate bhāve rāga dveṣa ādi vāsanā śāmyati aspandite vāte spanda saṅkṣubdha tā yathā

original: bhāve antare tattve / tattām dṛśyābhāvakṛtāṃ adraṣṭṛtām / upagate sati / rāgadveṣādivāsanā
analyzed: bhāve antare tattve tad tām dṛśya abhāva kṛtām adraṣṭṛ tām upagate sati rāga dveṣa ādi vāsanā

original: pūrvaṃ bhātadṛśyaviṣayarāgadveṣādisaṃskāraḥ / śāmyati śāntiṃ vrajati / āśrayaviṣayayoḥ
analyzed: pūrvam bhāta dṛśya viṣaya rāga dveṣa ādi saṃskāraḥ śāmyati śāntim vrajati āśraya viṣayayoḥ

original: abhāvāt / suṣuptau tu āśrayaviṣayayoḥ vāsanābhāvena sthitatvāt tadanugatayoḥ rāgadveṣādikayor
analyzed: abhāvāt suṣuptau tu āśraya viṣayayoḥ vāsanā bhāvena sthita tvāt tad anugatayoḥ rāga dveṣa ādikayoḥ

original: api vāsanābhāvenāvasthānam asti / na hi suṣuptau draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ samūlaṃ nāśaḥ asti /
analyzed: api vāsanā bhāvena avasthānam asti na hi suṣuptau draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ sa mūlam nāśaḥ asti

original: tataḥ utthitasya punaḥ tadāsthābhāvaprasaṅgāt / na hi samūlaṃ naṣṭe āsthā yuktā /
analyzed: tatas utthitasya punar tad āsthā bhāva prasaṅgāt na hi sa mūlam naṣṭe āsthā yuktā

original: dṛśyābhāve niścitānāṃ tu bhāsamāne 'pi dṛśye kadācid āsthā na vidyate / atra svamana
analyzed: dṛśya abhāve niścitānām tu bhāsamāne api dṛśye kadācid āsthā na vidyate atra

original: eva sākṣikam ity alaṃ prapañcena / rāgadveṣādivāsanā kā yathā / spandasaṅkṣubdhatā
analyzed: eva sākṣikam iti alam prapañcena rāga dveṣa ādi vāsanā kā yathā spanda saṅkṣubdha tā

original: yathā / yathā vāte aspandite sati / vātakṛtā spandasaṅkṣubdhatā spandarūpā saṅkṣubdhatā /
analyzed: yathā yathā vāte aspandite sati vāta kṛtā spanda saṅkṣubdha tā spanda rūpā saṅkṣubdha tā

original: naśyati / tathety arthaḥ / ataḥ dṛśyābhāvakṛtasyādraṣṭṛtvasya kevalībhāvatvaṃ yuktam
analyzed: naśyati tathā iti arthaḥ atas dṛśya abhāva kṛtasya adraṣṭṛ tvasya kevalībhāva tvam yuktam

original: eveti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.53 //
analyzed: eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: etad eva atidurbodhatvāt punaḥ punaḥ kathayati
analyzed: etat eva ati durbodha tvāt punar punar kathayati

original: asambhavati sarvasmin digbhūmyākāśarūpiṇi / prakāśye yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ prakāśasyāmalaṃ bhavet //MU_3,4.54//
analyzed: asambhavati sarvasmin diś bhūmi ākāśa rūpiṇi prakāśye yādṛśam rūpam prakāśasya amalam bhavet

original: trijagat tvam ahaṃ ceti dṛśye 'sattām upāgate / draṣṭuḥ syāt kevalībhāvas tādṛśo vimalātmanaḥ //MU_3,4.55//
analyzed: trijagat tvam aham ca iti dṛśye asat tām upāgate draṣṭuḥ syāt kevalībhāvaḥ tādṛśaḥ vimala ātmanaḥ

original: digbhūmyākāśarūpiṇi digbhūmyākāśasvarūpe / prakāśye prakāśanīye vastujāte / asambhavati
analyzed: diś bhūmi ākāśa rūpiṇi diś bhūmi ākāśa svarūpe prakāśye prakāśanīye vastu jāte asambhavati

original: sati / sambhavakriyākartṛtvam abhajati sati / prakāśasya sūryaprakāśasya / yādṛśam
analyzed: sati sambhava kriyā kartṛ tvam abhajati sati prakāśasya sūrya prakāśasya yādṛśam

original: amalaṃ śuddham / indriyātītam iti yāvat / rūpaṃ bhavet / na hi sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣkrāntaḥ
analyzed: amalam śuddham indriya atītam iti yāvat rūpam bhavet na hi sūrya maṇḍalāt niṣkrāntaḥ

original: bhittau apatitaḥ prakāśaḥ netragamyaḥ bhavati / trijagat tvaṃ ahaṃ ceti dṛśye asattām
analyzed: bhittau apatitaḥ prakāśaḥ netra gamyaḥ bhavati trijagat tvam aham ca iti dṛśye asattām

original: abhāvam / upāgate sati / draṣṭuḥ dṛśyaprakāśakatayā sthitasya draṣṭuḥ / tādṛśaḥ kevalībhāvaḥ
analyzed: abhāvam upāgate sati draṣṭuḥ dṛśya prakāśaka tayā sthitasya draṣṭuḥ tādṛśaḥ kevalībhāvaḥ

original: amalarūpatvaṃ / syāt bhavet / draṣṭuḥ kathambhūtasya / amalātmanaḥ cetyamalarūṣitacinmātrasvarūpasyānyathā
analyzed: amala rūpa tvam syāt bhavet draṣṭuḥ kathambhūtasya amala ātmanaḥ ca iti amala rūṣita cit mātra svarūpasya anyathā

original: kevalībhāvāparaparyāyaḥ nirmalībhāvaḥ ayuktaḥ syāt //MT_3,4.54-55 //
analyzed: kevalībhāva apara paryāyaḥ nirmalībhāvaḥ ayuktaḥ syāt

original: anantākhilaśailādipratibimbe hi yādṛśī / syād darpaṇe darpaṇatā kevalātmasvarūpiṇī //MU_3,4.56//
analyzed: ananta akhila śaila ādi pratibimbe hi yādṛśī syāt darpaṇe darpaṇa tā kevala ātma svarūpiṇī

original: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau praśānte dṛśyasambhrame / syāt tādṛśī kevalatā sthite draṣṭary avīkṣake //MU_3,4.57//
analyzed: aham tvam jagat ityādau praśānte dṛśya sambhrame syāt tādṛśī kevala tā sthite draṣṭari avīkṣake

original: dārṣṭāntikagataṃ praśānte iti padaṃ dṛṣṭānte 'pi yojanīyaṃ / tenāyam arthaḥ / hi
analyzed: dārṣṭāntika gatam praśānte iti padam dṛṣṭānte api yojanīyam tena ayam arthaḥ hi

original: niścaye / anantāḥ ye akhilāḥ śailādayaḥ / tadrūpe pratibimbe praśānte sati / dārṣṭāntikatayā
analyzed: niścaye anantāḥ ye akhilāḥ śaila ādayaḥ tad rūpe pratibimbe praśānte sati dārṣṭāntika tayā

original: gṛhīte darpaṇe pratibimbabhāvam abhajati sati iti yāvat / darpaṇe kevalātmasvarūpiṇī
analyzed: gṛhīte darpaṇe pratibimba bhāvam abhajati sati iti yāvat darpaṇe kevala ātma svarūpiṇī

original: kevaladarpaṇākhyasvarūpamayī / yādṛśī darpaṇatā syāt / ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau dṛśyasambhrame
analyzed: kevala darpaṇa ākhya svarūpa mayī yādṛśī darpaṇa tā syāt aham tvam jagat ityādau dṛśya sambhrame

original: dṛśyākāre sambhrame / dṛśye iti yāvat / praśānte sati / tataḥ avīkṣake dṛśikriyām
analyzed: dṛśya ākāre sambhrame dṛśye iti yāvat praśānte sati tatas avīkṣake dṛśikriyām

original: akurvati / sthite draṣṭari / tādṛśī kevalatā syāt / yathā pratibimbābhāve śuddhaṃ
analyzed: akurvati sthite draṣṭari tādṛśī kevala tā syāt yathā pratibimba abhāve śuddham

original: darpaṇamātram eva tiṣṭhati tathā dṛśyābhāve śuddhaḥ draṣṭā eva tiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.56-57 //
analyzed: darpaṇa mātram eva tiṣṭhati tathā dṛśya abhāve śuddhaḥ draṣṭā eva tiṣṭhati iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛśyābhāvāsambhavaṃ manyamānaḥ śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: dṛśya abhāva asambhavam manyamānaḥ śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: sac cen na śāmyatīdaṃ vā nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ / asattāṃ ca na vidmo 'smin dṛśye doṣapradāyini //MU_3,4.58//
analyzed: sat ced na śāmyati idam vā na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ asat tām ca na vidmaḥ asmin dṛśye doṣa pradāyini

original: vāśabdaḥ yataḥśabdārthe / idaṃ dṛśyaṃ / sat sattābhāk cet / cet yadi bhavati / tadā
analyzed: vā śabdaḥ yatas śabda arthe idam dṛśyam sat sattā bhāj ced ced yadi bhavati tadā

original: na śāmyati / yataḥ sataḥ sattābhajataḥ / abhāvaḥ na vidyate / svarūpahāniprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na śāmyati yatas sataḥ sattā bhajataḥ abhāvaḥ na vidyate svarūpa hāni prasaṅgāt

original: anyathā vahner api dāhakatvahāniḥ syāt / nanu tarhi asad eva bhavatv ity / atrāha
analyzed: anyathā vahneḥ api dāhaka tva hāniḥ syāt nanu tarhi asat eva bhavatu iti atra āha

original: asattāṃ ceti / doṣapradāyini rāgādisvarūpadoṣapradāyini / asataḥ doṣapradāyitvaṃ
analyzed: asattām ca iti doṣa pradāyini rāga ādi svarūpa doṣa pradāyini asataḥ doṣa pradāyi tvam

original: na yuktaṃ vandhyāsutasyāpi tattvāpatter iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.58 //
analyzed: na yuktam vandhyā sutasya api tad tva āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: phalitam āha
analyzed: phalitam āha

original: tasmāt katham iyaṃ śāmyed brahman dṛśyaviṣūcikā / nānodbhavabhramakarī duḥkhasantatidāyinī //MU_3,4.59//
analyzed: tasmāt katham iyam śāmyet brahman dṛśya viṣūcikā nānā udbhava bhrama karī duḥkha santati dāyinī

original: nānodbhavaḥ citrotpattiḥ / yaḥ bhramaḥ mithyājñānam / taṃ karotīti tādṛśī //MT_3,4.59//
analyzed: nānā udbhavaḥ citra utpattiḥ yaḥ bhramaḥ mithyājñānam tam karoti iti tādṛśī

original: unmārjayāmīti pratijñāṃ saphalīkartuṃ śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: unmārjayāmi iti pratijñām saphalīkartum śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: asya dṛśyapiśācasya śāntyai mantram imaṃ śṛṇu / rāmātyantam ayaṃ yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati //MU_3,4.60//
analyzed: asya dṛśya piśācasya śāntyai mantram imam śṛṇu rāma atyantam ayam yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati

original: he rāma / tvam / asya puraḥsphurataḥ / dṛśyapiśācasya śāntyai / imam vakṣyamāṇavākyakadambakasvarūpaṃ /
analyzed: he rāma tvam asya puras sphurataḥ dṛśya piśācasya śāntyai imam vakṣyamāṇa vākya kadambaka svarūpam

original: mantraṃ śṛṇu / yena mantreṇa / ayaṃ dṛśyapiśācaḥ / atyantam mṛtim traikālikam abhāvam /
analyzed: mantram śṛṇu yena mantreṇa ayam dṛśya piśācaḥ atyantam mṛtim traikālikam abhāvam

original: eti gacchati / tataḥ vinaṅkṣyati adarśanaṃ yāti / yuktaṃ ca piśācasya mantreṇa maraṇam
analyzed: eti gacchati tatas vinaṅkṣyati adarśanam yāti yuktam ca piśācasya mantreṇa maraṇam

original: adarśanaṃ ca //MT_3,4.60 //
analyzed: adarśanam ca

original: mantram eva kathayati
analyzed: mantram eva kathayati

original: yad asti tasya nāśo 'sti na kadācana rāghava / yasmāt tan naṣṭam apy antar bījabhūtaṃ bhaved dhṛdi //MU_3,4.61//
analyzed: yat asti tasya nāśaḥ asti na kadācana rāghava yasmāt tat naṣṭam api antar bīja bhūtam bhavet dhṛdi

original: he rāghava / yat vastu / sattāṃ bhajati / tasya nāśaḥ kadācana jātu / na sambhavati /
analyzed: he rāghava yat vastu sattām bhajati tasya nāśaḥ kadācana jātu na sambhavati

original: yasmāt tat vastu / naṣṭam api kenacit parābhimatena samavāyikāraṇanāśādinā naṣṭam
analyzed: yasmāt tat vastu naṣṭam api kenacid para abhimatena samavāyi kāraṇa nāśa ādinā naṣṭam

original: api / hṛdi antaḥ mānasāntaḥ / bījabhūtam / bījabhāvena sthitam vā sattārūpeṇa sthitam
analyzed: api hṛdi antar mānasa antar bīja bhūtam bīja bhāvena sthitam vā sattā rūpeṇa sthitam

original: iti yāvat / bhavati / dṛśyate hi naṣṭam api vastu hṛdi punaḥ punaḥ āvartamānam //MT_3,4.61 //
analyzed: iti yāvat bhavati dṛśyate hi naṣṭam api vastu hṛdi punar punar āvartamānam

original: nanu tataḥ ko doṣaḥ ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atra āha

original: smṛtibījā cidākāśe punar udbhūya dṛśyadhīḥ / lokaśāilāmbarākāraṃ doṣaṃ vitanute 'tanum //MU_3,4.62//
analyzed: smṛti bījā cit ākāśe punar udbhūya dṛśya dhīḥ loka śāila ambara ākāram doṣam vitanute atanum

original: smṛtibījā smṛtikāraṇikā / dṛśyadhīḥ dṛśyākārā dhīḥ / dṛśyam iti yāvat / cidākāśe
analyzed: smṛti bījā smṛti kāraṇikā dṛśya dhīḥ dṛśya ākārā dhīḥ dṛśyam iti yāvat cit ākāśe

original: udbhūya prādurbhūya / atanum mahāntam / lokaśailāmbarākāram doṣam punaḥ vitanute
analyzed: udbhūya prādurbhūya atanum mahāntam loka śaila ambara ākāram doṣam punar vitanute

original: sūkṣmaprapañcabhāvena viśeṣeṇa vistārayati / svapne dṛṣṭatvāt //MT_3,4.62 //
analyzed: sūkṣma prapañca bhāvena viśeṣeṇa vistārayati svapne dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: nanu tato 'pi kim ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatas api kim iti atra āha

original: itthaṃ nirmokṣadoṣaḥ syān na ca tasyāṃśasambhavaḥ / yasmād devarṣimunayo dṛśyante muktibhājanam //MU_3,4.63//
analyzed: ittham nirmokṣa doṣaḥ syāt na ca tasya aṃśa sambhavaḥ yasmāt deva ṛṣi munayaḥ dṛśyante mukti bhājanam

original: itthaṃ sati / nirmokṣadoṣaḥ mokṣābhāvaprasaṅgarūpaḥ doṣaḥ / syāt / sthūlasūkṣmabhāvena
analyzed: ittham sati nirmokṣa doṣaḥ mokṣa abhāva prasaṅga rūpaḥ doṣaḥ syāt sthūla sūkṣma bhāvena

original: dvividhasya dṛśyābhāvasyaiva mokṣatvāt / nanu bhavatu saḥ doṣaḥ / kim asmākaṃ kariṣyatīty /
analyzed: dvividhasya dṛśya abhāvasya eva mokṣa tvāt  nanu bhavatu saḥ doṣaḥ kim asmākam kariṣyati iti

original: atrāha na ceti / tasya nirmokṣadoṣasya / aṃśenāpi sambhavaḥ na ca bhavati / yasmāt
analyzed: atra āha na ca iti tasya nirmokṣa doṣasya aṃśena api sambhavaḥ na ca bhavati yasmāt

original: devarṣimunayaḥ muktibhājanaṃ dṛśyante //MT_3,4.63 //
analyzed: deva ṛṣi munayaḥ mukti bhājanam dṛśyante

original: punar apy etad eva kathayati
analyzed: punar api etat eva kathayati

original: yadi syāj jagadādīdaṃ tat syān mokṣo na kasyacit / bāhyastham astu hṛtsthaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ nāśāya kevalam //MU_3,4.64//
analyzed: yadi syāt jagat ādi idam tat syāt mokṣaḥ na kasyacid bāhya stham astu hṛd stham vā dṛśyam nāśāya kevalam

original: yadi idam jagadādi syāt sattāṃ bhajet / tadā kasyacit kasyāpi pramātuḥ / mokṣaḥ dṛśyān
analyzed: yadi idam jagat ādi syāt sattām bhajet tadā kasyacid kasya api pramātuḥ mokṣaḥ dṛśyān

original: muktiḥ / na syāt / yathā tathā sambhāvite 'pi dṛśyanāśe smṛtiprabhāvāt sūkṣmatayā
analyzed: muktiḥ na syāt yathā tathā sambhāvite api dṛśya nāśe smṛti prabhāvāt sūkṣma tayā

original: punaḥ dṛśyasphuraṇāt / yataḥ dṛśyam bāhyastham sthūlarūpam astu / hṛtstham sūkṣmarūpaṃ
analyzed: punar dṛśya sphuraṇāt yatas dṛśyam bāhya stham sthūla rūpam astu hṛd stham sūkṣma rūpam

original: vā astu / nāśāya bandhākhyanāśotpādārtham bhavati / kṣobhakatvāviśeṣād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: vā astu nāśāya bandha ākhya nāśa utpāda artham bhavati kṣobhaka tva aviśeṣāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: ādiśabdena suṣuptistaimityādeḥ grahaṇam / tasyāpi dṛśyatvād //MT_3,4.64 //
analyzed: ādi śabdena suṣupti staimitya ādeḥ grahaṇam tasya api dṛśya tvāt

original: nanu tarhi kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi kim kāryam iti atra āha

original: tasmād imāṃ pratijñāṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rāmātibhīṣaṇām / yām uttareṇa granthena nūnaṃ tvam avabudhyase //MU_3,4.65//
analyzed: tasmāt imām pratijñām tvam śṛṇu rāma ati bhīṣaṇām yām uttareṇa granthena nūnam tvam avabudhyase

original: atibhīṣaṇatvaṃ ca pratijñāyāḥ asambhavapravṛttatvena jñeyam //MT_3,4.65//
analyzed: ati bhīṣaṇa tvam ca pratijñāyāḥ asambhava pravṛtta tvena jñeyam

original: śrīrāmāvabodhanimittam uttaragrantham eva kathayati
analyzed: śrī rāma avabodha nimittam uttara grantham eva kathayati

original: ayam ākāśabhūtādirūpo 'haṃ ceti lakṣitaḥ / jagacchabdasya rāmārtho nanu nāsty eva kaścana //MU_3,4.66//
analyzed: ayam ākāśa bhūta ādi rūpaḥ aham ca iti lakṣitaḥ jagat śabdasya rāma arthaḥ nanu na asti eva kaścana

original: he rāma / nanu niścaye / ākāśabhūtādirūpaḥ / tathā ahaṃ ceti lakṣitaḥ niścitaḥ /
analyzed: he rāmaiḥ nanu niścaye ākāśa bhūta ādi rūpaḥ tathā aham ca iti lakṣitaḥ niścitaḥ

original: ayam jagacchabdasyārthaḥ abhidheyam / paramārthataḥ nāsty eva sattāṃ na bhajati eva /
analyzed: ayam jagat śabdasya arthaḥ abhidheyam paramārthataḥ na asti eva sattām na bhajati eva

original: na tu sattābhāg bhūtvā naśyati / tathā ca sati na nirmokṣadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ / na hi asataḥ
analyzed: na tu sattā bhāj bhūtvā naśyati tathā ca sati na nirmokṣa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ na hi asataḥ

original: bandhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ / ākāśasya bhūtatve 'pi prādhānyena pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: bandhaka tvam dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ ākāśasya bhūta tve api prādhānyena pṛthak nirdeśaḥ

original: ādiśabdena bhūtakāryāṇāṃ grahaṇam //MT_3,4.66 //
analyzed: ādi śabdena bhūta kāryāṇām grahaṇam

original: nanu puraḥsphurataḥ ahamādikasya jagataḥ kathaṃ sarvathā sattvaṃ yuktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu puras sphurataḥ aham ādikasya jagataḥ katham sarvathā sattvam yuktam iti atra āha

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśyajālaṃ purogatam / evaṃ brahmaiva tat sarvam ajarāmaram avyayam //MU_3,4.67//
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśya jālam purogatam evam brahmā eva tat sarvam ajara amaram avyayam

original: asmābhiḥ yad idaṃ purogataṃ dṛśyajālaṃ nīlasukhādirūpaḥ dṛśyasamūhaḥ / dṛśyate anubhūyate /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ yat idam purogatam dṛśya jālam nīla sukha ādi rūpaḥ dṛśya samūhaḥ dṛśyate anubhūyate

original: tat sarvam ajarāmaram deharahitatvāt tanmātragatajarādirahitam / tathā avyayam nāśarahitam /
analyzed: tat sarvam ajara amaram deha rahita tvāt tanmātra gata jarā ādi rahitam tathā avyayam nāśa rahitam

original: brahmaiva jagattayā bṛṃhitaṃ śuddhacittattvam eva / evam jagadbhāvena bhavati / dṛśyate
analyzed: brahma eva jagat tayā bṛṃhitam śuddha cit tattvam eva evam jagat bhāvena bhavati dṛśyate

original: hi jalasya taraṅgabhāvena bhavanam / tathā ca sati bhāsamānasyāpi jagataḥ asattvaṃ
analyzed: hi jalasya taraṅga bhāvena bhavanam tathā ca sati bhāsamānasya api jagataḥ asattvam

original: yuktam eva / na hi jale bhāsamānasyāpi taraṅgasya sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,4.67 //
analyzed: yuktam eva na hi jale bhāsamānasya api taraṅgasya sattvam dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛśyasya brahmamātratvam eva dṛḍhīkaroti
analyzed: dṛśyasya brahma mātra tvam eva dṛḍhīkaroti

original: pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ prasarati pare śāntaṃ paraṃ sthitam / vyomany evoditaṃ vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati //MU_3,4.68//
analyzed: pūrṇe pūrṇam prasarati pare śāntam param sthitam vyomani eva uditam vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati

original: pūrṇe nirapekṣe / prasarati sañcāraṃ karoti / svarūpasthe pare uttīrṇe / brahmaṇi
analyzed: pūrṇe nirapekṣe prasarati sañcāram karoti sva rūpa sthe pare uttīrṇe brahmaṇi

original: bṛṃhite vastuni / atra saptamyantaiḥ śuddhacittattvasya kathanaṃ / prathamāntaiḥ
analyzed: bṛṃhite vastuni atra saptamī antaiḥ śuddha cit tattvasya kathanam prathama antaiḥ

original: tadrūpasya jagataḥ jñeyam / nanu kathaṃ pūrṇatvādiguṇayukte śuddhacittattve 'vasthānaṃ
analyzed: tad rūpasya jagataḥ jñeyam nanu katham pūrṇa tva ādi guṇa yukte śuddha cit tattve avasthānam

original: yuktam / nyūnasyādhike avasthānadarśanāt / sat-yam / avasthānam atrādheyabhāvena
analyzed: yuktam nyūnasya adhike avasthāna darśanāt satyam avasthānam atra ādheya bhāvena

original: nāsti yenoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ syāt / kiṃ tu tanmātratābhāveneti nātra doṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: na asti yena ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ syāt kim tu tanmātra tā bhāvena iti na atra doṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: ity alaṃ prapañcaiḥ //MT_3,4.68 //
analyzed: iti alam prapañcaiḥ

original: na dṛśyam asti no dṛk ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam / na śūnyaṃ na jaḍaṃ no cic chāntam evedam ātatam //MU_3,4.69//
analyzed: na dṛśyam asti no dṛś ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam na śūnyam na jaḍam na u cit śāntam eva idam ātatam

original: dṛśyam dṛśikriyākarma / nāsti sattāṃ na bhajati / dṛk dṛśikriyā / no asti / draṣṭā
analyzed: dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā karma na asti sattām na bhajati dṛś dṛśi kriyā no asti draṣṭā

analyzed: dṛśi kriyā kartā ca na asti darśanam dṛśi kriyā sādhyam phalam ca na asti sarveṣām

original: eṣāṃ pratītimātrasāratvāt / nanu tarhi etad abhāva evāstī-ty / atrāha na śūnyam iti /
analyzed: eṣām pratīti mātra sāra tvāt nanu tarhi etat abhāvaḥ eva asti iti atra āha na śūnyam iti

original: śūnyam dṛśyādyabhāvaḥ / ca nāsti / na hi sar-vathā asataḥ bhānaṃ yuktaṃ / śaśiśṛṅgāder
analyzed: śūnyam dṛśya ādi abhāvaḥ ca na asti na hi sarvathā asataḥ bhānam yuktam śaśi śṛṅga ādeḥ

original: api bhānāpatteḥ / nanu tarhi jāḍyam eva syāt / jāḍye hi sarveṣām asattā eva bhavatīty /
analyzed: api bhāna āpatteḥ nanu tarhi jāḍyam eva syāt jāḍye hi sarveṣām asattā eva bhavati iti

original: atrāha na jaḍam iti / bhāvapradhānanirdeśaḥ jaḍam jaḍatvam / nāsti / tattve hi dṛśyādibhānam
analyzed: atra āha na jaḍam iti bhāva pradhāna nirdeśaḥ jaḍam jaḍa tvam na asti tattve hi dṛśya ādi bhānam

original: ayuktaṃ syāt / nanu tarhi śiṣṭā cid eva syād ity / atrāha no cid iti / cit cinmātram /
analyzed: ayuktam syāt nanu tarhi śiṣṭā cit eva syāt iti atra āha no cit iti cit cit mātram

original: no asti / cetyāpekṣatvena tasyāḥ sthitatvāt / cetyasya coktanyāyenāsambhavāt / nanu
analyzed: no asti cetya apekṣa tvena tasyāḥ sthita tvāt cetyasya ca ukta nyāyena asambhavāt nanu

original: tarhi kim asti / na hi sarvathā asattā buddhyai ārohatīty / atrāha śāntam iti / ātataṃ
analyzed: tarhi kim asti na hi sarvathā asattā buddhyai ārohati iti atra āha śāntam iti ātatam

original: samantāt sphuratsvarūpam / idam sarvam dṛśyādikam / śāntam / bhavati / cetyakṣobharahitaṃ
analyzed: samantāt sphurat svarūpam idam sarvam dṛśya ādikam śāntam bhavati cetya kṣobha rahitam

original: cinmātraṃ bhavati //MT_3,4.69 //
analyzed: cit mātram bhavati

original: atra niścayam anāpnuvan śrīrāmaḥ muneḥ asambhavārthābhidhāyitvam āsañjayati
analyzed: atra niścayam an āpnuvan śrī rāmaḥ muneḥ asambhava artha abhidhāyi tvam āsañjayati

original: vandhyāputreṇa piṣṭo 'driḥ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ pramāyate / prasārya bhujasaṅghātaṃ śilā nṛtyati tāṇḍavam //MU_3,4.70//
analyzed: vandhyāputreṇa piṣṭaḥ adriḥ śaśa śṛṅgam pramāyate prasārya bhuja saṅghātam śilā nṛtyati tāṇḍavam

original: sravanti sikatās tailaṃ paṭhanty upalaputrikāḥ / garjanti citrajaladā itīvedaṃ vacaḥ prabho //MU_3,4.71//
analyzed: sravanti sikatāḥ tailam paṭhanti upalaputrikāḥ garjanti citra jaladāḥ iti iva idam vacaḥ prabho

original: taveti śeṣaḥ / he prabho / idam tava vacaḥ / iti bhavati / evaṃrūpaṃ bhavati iti /
analyzed: tava iti śeṣaḥ he prabho idam tava vacaḥ iti bhavati evaṃrūpam bhavati iti

original: kim iti / vandhyāputreṇetyādi / janaiḥ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ pramāyate pramātum ārabhyate ity
analyzed: kim iti vandhyā putreṇa ityādi janaiḥ śaśa śṛṅgam pramāyate pramātum ārabhyate iti

original: arthaḥ / pramāyate iti prayogaḥ ārṣaḥ / sarvathā asambaddhārthābhidhāyy eva tava
analyzed: arthaḥ pramāyate iti prayogaḥ ārṣaḥ sarvathā asambaddha artha abhidhāyī eva tava

original: vacanam iti bhāvaḥ / asambhavārthapratipādakatvāropaprakāśitāvinayanirāsanārthaṃ
analyzed: vacanam iti bhāvaḥ asambhava artha pratipādaka tva āropa prakāśi tā vinaya nirāsana artham

original: prabho ity āmantraṇam //MT_3,4.70-71 //
analyzed: prabho iti āmantraṇam

original: jarāmaraṇaduḥkhādiśailākāśamayaṃ jagat / nāstīti kim idaṃ nāma bhavatāpi mamocyate //MU_3,4.72//
analyzed: jarā maraṇa duḥkha ādi śaila ākāśa mayam jagat na asti iti kim idam nāma bhavatā api mama ucyate

analyzed: na hi pratyakṣam anubhūyamānasya jarā ādi rūpasya bhāva jātasya apahnavaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: apiśabdaḥ śrīvasiṣṭhasyāsambhavavāditvāyogyatvasūcanārthaḥ / mamety anena svasya
analyzed: api śabdaḥ śrī vasiṣṭhasya asambhava vādi tva ayogya tva sūcana arthaḥ mama iti anena svasya

original: sacchiṣyatvaṃ dyotayati //MT_3,4.72 //
analyzed: sat śiṣya tvam dyotayati

original: yathety etat satyam evāsti tarhi yuktaṃ kathayety / anenābhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: yathā iti etat satyam eva asti tarhi yuktam kathaya iti anena abhiprāyeṇa āha

analyzed: yathā idam na sthitam viśvam na utpannam na ca vidyate tathā kathaya me brahman yena etat niścitam bhavet

analyzed: etat sthiti ādi abhāvaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: nāsamanvitavāg asmi śṛṇu rāghava kathyate / yathedam asad ābhāti vandhyāputra ivāravī //MU_3,4.74//
analyzed: na a samanvita vāc asmi śṛṇu rāghava kathyate yathā idam asat ābhāti vandhyā putraḥ iva āravī

analyzed: aham vasiṣṭha ākhyaḥ aham asamanvitā asambaddhā vāc yasya saḥ tādṛśaḥ na asmi

analyzed: sphurati mayā tathā kathyate idam kaḥ iva āravī vandhyā putraḥ iva ārava kārī

analyzed: vandhyā putraḥ iva yathā saḥ asat bhāti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: tad eva kathayati

original: idam ādāv anutpannaṃ sargādau tena nāsty alam / idaṃ hi manasā bhāti svapnādau pattanaṃ yathā //MU_3,4.75//
analyzed: idam ādau anutpannam sarga ādau tena nā asti alam idam hi manasā bhāti svapna ādau pattanam yathā

analyzed: an udbhūtam āsīt paramārthataḥ cit mātra bhāvāt acyuteḥ tatas bhinnayā sattayā āśritam

analyzed: tena tatas kāraṇāt idam jagat alam atiśayena na asti sattām na bhajati svapna pattana vat

analyzed: nanu sat sva rūpeṇa manasā bhātasya dṛśyasya sattvam yuktam eva iti atra āha

analyzed: sarga ādau prokta svarūpe sarga ārambhe manaḥ eva anutpannam atas eva asat vapuḥ asat svarūpam bhavati tvam śṛṇu yathā tvayā etat anubhūyate  /

analyzed: aham tathā etat vakṣyāmi

analyzed: manaḥ imam puras bhāsamānam kṣaya ātmakam naśvara svabhāvam dṛśya mayam doṣam dṛśya svarūpam

analyzed: doṣam tanoti vistārayati manaḥ kathambhūtam asat eva sphuraṇa mātra rūpa tvāt

analyzed: vāc jālasya api sattā āpatteḥ manaḥ kaḥ yathā svapnaḥ yathā yathā asat svarūpaḥ svapnaḥ

analyzed: uktam artham sarga anta ślokena saṅgṛhya kathayati

analyzed: upalakṣaṇam ca etat tena yā kācid kriyā iha bhavati sā manaḥ kṛtā eva bhavati iti saṅkṣipta arthaḥ iti śivam

analyzed: evam manaḥ nirṇayam avaśya kartavya tayā śrutvā śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

analyzed: bhagavat muni śārdūla he bhagavat muni śreṣṭha iha bhrame asmin jagat rūpe bhrame

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

analyzed: adarśanam samupāgate sati śāntam eva śanais śanais sarga ādi nāśa sākṣi tā ākhyāt kṣobhāt

analyzed: śānta avaśiṣṭam eva sphuṭam kathayati

original: āste 'nastamito bhāsvān ajo devo nirāmayaḥ / sarvadā sarvakṛt sarvaḥ paramātmā maheśvaraḥ //MU_3,5.4//

original: paramātmā sarveṣāṃ paramārthataḥ ahantāviṣayatayā bhāsamānam kim apy āntaraṃ tattvam /

analyzed: sūrya svarūpaḥ āścaryam ca bhāsvataḥ an astamita tvam ajaḥ janma rahitaḥ prādurbhūtiḥ

analyzed: punar api tam eva viśinaṣṭi

analyzed: yatas vācaḥ nivartante yaḥ muktaiḥ avagamyate yasya ca ātma ādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kalpitāḥ na svabhāva jāḥ

analyzed: iti atra āha yasya ca iti tattva jñaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ kalpitāḥ pravṛtti nimittam an apekṣya eva

analyzed: yam yānti dṛśya vṛndāni payāṃsi iva mahā arṇavam yaḥ ātmānam padārtham ca prakāśayati dīpa vat

analyzed: yaḥ ātmānam cit mātra svarūpam sva ātmānam tathā padārtham jātau ekavacanam

analyzed: ca dīpa vat prakāśayati prakaṭīkaroti

analyzed: ākāśe yaḥ śarīre ca dṛśatsu apsu latāsu ca pāṃsuṣu adriṣu vāteṣu pātāleṣu ca saṃsthitaḥ

original: yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdhaṃ puryaṣṭakam itas tataḥ / yena mūkīkṛtā mūḍhāḥ śilādhyānam ivāsthitāḥ //MU_3,5.12//
analyzed: yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdham puryaṣṭakam itas tatas yena mūkīkṛtāḥ mūḍhāḥ śilādhyānam iva āsthitāḥ

original: yaḥ ātmā / puryaṣṭakam antaḥkaraṇatrayaṃ tanmātrapañcakam itisvarūpaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā puryaṣṭakam antaḥkaraṇa trayam tanmātra pañcakam iti svarūpam puryaṣṭakam

original: arthāc cetanavargam / itaḥ tataḥ plāvayati yatra tatra gamayati / ceṣṭāṃ kārayatīti
analyzed: arthāt cetana vargam itas tatas plāvayati yatra tatra gamayati ceṣṭām kārayati iti

analyzed: yāvat mūḍhāḥ jaḍāḥ yena sāra tayā sthitena ātmanā mūkīkṛtāḥ vimarśa asamarthāḥ
