analyzed: vyoma yena kṛtam śūnyam śailāḥ yena ghanīkṛtāḥ  āpaḥ drutāḥ kṛtāḥ yena dīptaḥ yasya vaśāt raviḥ

original: yena sarvaśaktitvāt nistattvarūpatām āśritena yenātmanā / vyoma vyāpyatayā sthitam
analyzed: yena sarva śakti tvāt nistattva rūpa tām āśritena yena ātmanā vyoma vyāpya tayā sthitam

original: ākāśam / śūnyam nistattvasvarūpaṃ / kṛtam / tathā yena mṛcchilābhāvaṃ śritena yenātmanā /
analyzed: ākāśam śūnyam nistattva svarūpam kṛtam tathā yena mṛd śilā bhāvam śritena yena ātmanā

original: śailāḥ svavyāpyāḥ parvatāḥ / ghanīkṛtāḥ nibiḍāḥ sampāditāḥ / tathā yena dravatvabhāvaṃ
analyzed: śailāḥ sva vyāpyāḥ parvatāḥ ghanīkṛtāḥ nibiḍāḥ sampāditāḥ tathā yena drava tva bhāvam

original: gatena yenātmanā / āpaḥ svavyāpyāni jalāni / drutāḥ dravatvākhyaguṇayuktāḥ / kṛtāḥ /
analyzed: gatena yena ātmanā āpaḥ sva vyāpyāni jalāni drutāḥ drava tva ākhya guṇa yuktāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: tathā raviḥ vyāpyabhāvena sthitaḥ sūryaḥ / yasya vaśāt dīpanaśīlatejobhāvaṃ gatasya
analyzed: tathā raviḥ vyāpya bhāvena sthitaḥ sūryaḥ yasya vaśāt dīpana śīla tejaḥ bhāvam gatasya

original: yasyātmanaḥ vaśena / dīpto bhavati / upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat //MT_3,5.13 //
analyzed: yasya ātmanaḥ vaśena dīptaḥ bhavati upalakṣaṇam ca etat

original: prasaranti yataś citrāḥ saṃsārāsāravṛṣṭayaḥ / akṣayāmṛtasampūrṇād ambhodād iva vṛṣṭayaḥ //MU_3,5.14//
analyzed: prasaranti yatas citrāḥ saṃsāra asāra vṛṣṭayaḥ akṣaya amṛta sampūrṇāt ambhodāt iva vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: akṣayam nāśarahitam / yat amṛtam ānandarasaḥ / tena sampūrṇāt nirbharāt / yataḥ yasmāt
analyzed: akṣayam nāśa rahitam yat amṛtam ānanda rasaḥ tena sampūrṇāt nirbharāt yatas yasmāt

original: ātmanaḥ / saṃsārāsāravṛṣṭayaḥ saṃsārarūpāḥ dhārāsāravṛṣṭayaḥ / prasaranti sañcaraṃ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ saṃsāra asāra vṛṣṭayaḥ saṃsāra rūpāḥ dhārā sāra vṛṣṭayaḥ prasaranti sañcaram

original: yānti / kā iva / vṛṣṭayaḥ iva / yathā akṣayāmṛtasampūrṇāt avināśijalapūrṇāt / ambhodāt
analyzed: yānti kā iva vṛṣṭayaḥ iva yathā akṣaya amṛta sampūrṇāt avināśi jala pūrṇāt ambhodāt

original: meghāt / vṛṣṭayaḥ prasaranti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,5.14 //
analyzed: meghāt vṛṣṭayaḥ prasaranti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: āvirbhāvatirobhāvamayyas tribhuvanormayaḥ / sphuranty avirataṃ yasmin ghṛṇāv iva marīcayaḥ //MU_3,5.15//
analyzed: āvirbhāva tirobhāva mayyaḥ tribhuvana ūrmayaḥ sphuranti aviratam yasmin ghṛṇau iva marīcayaḥ

original: āvirbhāvatirobhāvamayyaḥ āvirbhāvatirobhāvayuktāḥ / tribhuvanormayaḥ / yasmin arthāt
analyzed: āvirbhāva tirobhāva mayyaḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāva yuktāḥ tribhuvana ūrmayaḥ yasmin arthāt

original: samudrarūpe / yasmin aviratam sphuranti / kā iva / marīcayaḥ iva / yathā ghṛṇau sūrye /
analyzed: samudrarūpe yasmin aviratam sphuranti kā iva marīcayaḥ iva yathā ghṛṇau sūrye

original: marīcayaḥ sphuranti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,5.15 //
analyzed: marīcayaḥ sphuranti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: nāśarūpo 'vināśātmā yo 'ntaḥsthaḥ sarvavastuṣu / gupto yo vyatirikto 'pi sarvabhāveṣu saṃsthitaḥ //MU_3,5.16//
analyzed: nāśa rūpaḥ avināśa ātmā yaḥ antaḥsthaḥ sarva vastuṣu guptaḥ yaḥ vyatiriktaḥ api sarva bhāveṣu saṃsthitaḥ

original: avināśātmā yathā tathā sambhāvitasya svanāśasyāpi sākṣitayā sthitatvāt vināśarahitaḥ /
analyzed: avināśa ātmā yathā tathā sambhāvitasya sva nāśasya api sākṣi tayā sthita tvāt vināśa rahitaḥ

original: yaḥ ātmā / nāśarūpaḥ bhavati / nāśabhāvenāpi sthitatvāt / anyathā ātmarahitasya nāśasya
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā nāśa rūpaḥ bhavati nāśa bhāvena api sthita tvāt anyathā ātma rahitasya nāśasya

original: kena rūpeṇa bhānaṃ syāt / tathā vyatiriktaḥ api śuddhacinmātrarūpatvena samastapadārthottīrṇasvarūpaḥ
analyzed: kena rūpeṇa bhānam syāt tathā vyatiriktaḥ api śuddha cit mātra rūpa tvena samasta padārtha uttīrṇa svarūpaḥ

original: api / yaḥ ātmā / sarvabhāveṣu saṃsthitaḥ bhavati / sāratayā sthitatvāt / viruddhaṃ
analyzed: api yaḥ ātmā sarva bhāveṣu saṃsthitaḥ bhavati sāratayā sthitatvāt viruddham

original: ca avināśinaḥ vināśarūpatvam sarvabhāvavyatiriktasya sarvabhāveṣu saṃsthitatvam /
analyzed: ca avināśinaḥ vināśa rūpa tvam sarva bhāva vyatiriktasya sarva bhāveṣu saṃsthita tvam

original: yaḥ ātmā kathambhūtaḥ / sarvavastuṣu antaḥsthaḥ / antaḥ niyāmakatvena sthitaḥ / ata
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā kathambhūtaḥ sarva vastuṣu antaḥsthaḥ antar niyāmaka tvena sthitaḥ

original: eva guptaḥ bahiḥ adṛśyaḥ //MT_3,5.16 //
analyzed: eva guptaḥ bahis adṛśyaḥ

original: prakṛtivratatir vyomni jātā brahmāṇḍasatphalā / cittamūlendriyadalā yena nṛtyati vāyunā //MU_3,5.17//
analyzed: prakṛti vratatiḥ vyomni jātā brahmāṇḍa sat phalā citta mūla indriya dalā yena nṛtyati vāyunā

original: prakṛtiḥ jaganmūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ kim api tattvam / sā eva vratatiḥ latā / yena vāyunā
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ jagat mūla kāraṇa bhūtam kim api tattvam sā eva vratatiḥ latā yena vāyunā

original: yenātmarūpeṇa vātena / nṛtyati kāryabhāvena pariṇāme kartṛtvaṃ bhajati / anyathā
analyzed: yena ātma rūpeṇa vātena nṛtyati kārya bhāvena pariṇāme kartṛ tvam bhajati anyathā

original: kāryavargagatajaḍatvānyathānupapattyā jaḍarūpāyāḥ tasyāḥ kāryabhāvena pariṇāmaṃ prati
analyzed: kārya varga gata jaḍa tva anyathā anupapattyā jaḍa rūpāyāḥ tasyāḥ kārya bhāvena pariṇāmam prati

original: kartṛtvāyogāt / prakṛtivratatiḥ kathambhūtā / vyomni na kiñcidrūpatayā ākāśasvarūpe
analyzed: kartṛ tva ayogāt prakṛti vratatiḥ kathaṃbhūtā vyomni na kiñcid rūpatayā ākāśa svarūpe

original: cinmātre / jātā prādurbhūtā / tathā brahmāṇḍam eva satphalaṃ yasyāḥ / sā / tādṛśī /
analyzed: cit mātre jātā prādurbhūtā tathā brahmāṇḍam eva sat phalam yasyāḥ sā tādṛśī

original: tathā cittam eva mūlaṃ yasyāḥ / sā / tādṛśī / tathā indriyāṇy eva dalāṇi yasyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā cittam eva mūlam yasyāḥ sā tādṛśī tathā indriyāṇi eva dalāṇi yasyāḥ

original: sā / tādṛśī / cittamūlatvena prakṛteḥ pratītimātrasiddhatvamātram uktam iti brahmāṇḍamūlakāraṇabhūtāyāḥ
analyzed: sā tādṛśī citta mūla tvena prakṛteḥ pratīti mātra siddha tva mātram uktam iti brahmāṇḍa mūla kāraṇa bhūtāyāḥ

original: prakṛteḥ kathaṃ tadantargatapuruṣacinmātramūlatvam uktam iti na paryanuyojyam //MT_3,5.17 //
analyzed: prakṛteḥ katham tad antargata puruṣa cit mātra mūla tvam uktam iti na paryanuyojyam

original: yaś cinmaṇiḥ prakacati pratidehasamudgakam / yasminn indau sphuranty etā jagajjālamarīcayaḥ //MU_3,5.18//
analyzed: yaḥ cit maṇiḥ prakacati prati deha samudgakam yasmin indau sphuranti etāḥ jagat jāla marīcayaḥ

original: cinmaṇiḥ cid eva maṇiḥ / prakāśakatvāt ratnam / tatsvarūpaḥ yaḥ ātmā / pratidehasamudgakam
analyzed: eva

original: sarveṣu dehasamudgeṣu / prakacati jīvabhāvena sphura-ti / anyathā dehāntargatānāṃ
analyzed: sarveṣu deha samudgeṣu prakacati jīva bhāvena sphurati anyathā deha antargatānām

original: jīvānāṃ kiṃrūpatvaṃ syāt / yuktaṃ ca samudgake ratnaprakacanam / etāḥ puraḥ dṛśyamānāḥ /
analyzed: jīvānām kiṃrūpa tvam syāt yuktam ca samudgake ratna prakacanam etāḥ puraḥ dṛśyamānāḥ

original: jagajjālamarīcayaḥ / yasmin indau sphuranti / anyathā kimādhāram āsāṃ bhānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: jagat jāla marīcayaḥ yasmin indau sphuranti anyathā kimādhāram āsām bhānam syāt

original: na hi nirādhārasya jagajjālasya sphuraṇaṃ buddhim ārohati / marīcitvaṃ ca jagajjālasya
analyzed: na hi nirādhārasya jagat jālasya sphuraṇam buddhim ārohati marīci tvam ca jagat jālasya

original: citprakāśaviṣayatvena citprakāśatānapāyāj jñeyam / acidrūpo hi cidviṣayatāyogyo na
analyzed: cit prakāśa viṣaya tvena cit prakāśa tā anapāyāt jñeyam acit rūpaḥ hi cit viṣaya tā yogyaḥ na

original: bhavati / viruddhatvena tatsānnidhye tasya sannidhānāsambhavāt //MT_3,5.18 //
analyzed: bhavati viruddha tvena tad sānnidhye tasya sannidhāna asambhavāt

original: praśāntacidghane yasmin sphuranty amṛtavarṣiṇi / dhārājalāni bhūtāni dṛṣṭayas taḍitaḥ sphuṭāḥ //MU_3,5.19//
analyzed: praśānta cit ghane yasmin sphuranti amṛta varṣiṇi dhārā jalāni bhūtāni dṛṣṭayaḥ taḍitaḥ sphuṭāḥ

original: amṛtavarṣiṇi ānandavarṣiṇi / praśāntacidghane yasmin nirapekṣaśuddhacidākhyameghasvarūpe
analyzed: amṛta varṣiṇi ānanda varṣiṇi praśānta cit ghane yasmin nirapekṣa śuddha cit ākhya megha svarūpe

original: yasmin ātmani / bhūtāni samastāḥ padārthāḥ / dhārājalāni / dṛṣṭayaḥ tadviṣayāṇi jñānāni /
analyzed: yasmin ātmani bhūtāni samastāḥ padārthāḥ dhārā jalāni dṛṣṭayaḥ tad viṣayāṇi jñānāni

original: sphuṭāḥ prakaṭāḥ / taḍitaḥ sphuranti / yuktaṃ ca jalavarṣiṇi meghe dhārājalānāṃ taḍitāṃ
analyzed: sphuṭāḥ prakaṭāḥ taḍitaḥ sphuranti yuktam ca jala varṣiṇi meghe dhārā jalānām taḍitām

original: ca sphuraṇam / ānandavarṣitvaṃ cātmanaḥ parapremāspadatvena jñeyam / na hi ānandāvarṣī
analyzed: ca sphuraṇam ānanda varṣi tvam ca ātmanaḥ para prema āspada tvena jñeyam na hi ānanda avarṣī

original: parapremāspado bhavati / ānandavarṣiṇi putrādau eva premāspadatvadarśanāt / ātmanaḥ
parapremāspadatvaṃ ca sarveṣu svasākṣikam eveti nāyastam //MT_3,5.19 //
analyzed: para prema āspada tvam ca sarveṣu sva sākṣikam eva iti na āyastam

original: camatkurvanti vastūni yadālokanayā mithaḥ / asaj jātam asad yena yena sat sattvam āgatam //MU_3,5.20//
analyzed: camatkurvanti vastūni yad ālokanayā mithas asat jātam asat yena yena sat sattvam āgatam

original: vastūni bhoktṛbhogyarūpāṇi bhāvajātāni / mithaḥ anyo'nyasmin / yadālokanayā yaddarśanena /
analyzed: vastūni bhoktṛ bhogya rūpāṇi bhāva jātāni mithas anyaḥ anyasmin yad ālokanayā yad darśanena

original: yaddarśanabhāveneti yāvat / camatkurvanti ānandam anubhavanti / yaddarśanam eva teṣāṃ
analyzed: yad darśana bhāvena iti yāvat camatkurvanti ānandam anubhavanti yat darśanam eva teṣām

original: camatkārakāraṇam astīti yāvat / mithyā iti sāmānyākṣepeṇoktam / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / bhoktāraḥ
analyzed: camatkāra kāraṇam asti iti yāvat mithyā iti sāmānya ākṣepeṇa uktam ayam bhāvaḥ bhoktāraḥ

original: tāvat iṣṭāniṣṭān bhogyān anubhūya bhogyāntaranirapekṣā jāyante / anyathā tatkālaṃ
analyzed: tāvat iṣṭa aniṣṭān bhogyān anubhūya bhogya antara nirapekṣāḥ jāyante anyathā tad kālam

original: viṣayīkṛtasya bhogyasya bhogaḥ samāptiṃ na vrajet / tatkālaṃ bhogyāntaranirapekṣatvaṃ
analyzed: viṣayīkṛtasya bhogyasya bhogaḥ samāptim na vrajet tad kālam bhogya antara nirapekṣa tvam

original: ca tatra teṣāṃ camatkārānubhavanaṃ vinā na sidhyati / ekasmin viṣaye anubhūyamānena
analyzed: ca tatra teṣām camatkāra anubhavanam vinā na sidhyati ekasmin viṣaye anubhūyamānena

original: camatkāreṇaiva hi puruṣaḥ anyeṣu viṣayeṣu nirapekṣo bhavati / sa ca camatkāraḥ vicāryamāṇaḥ
analyzed: camatkāreṇa eva hi puruṣaḥ anyeṣu viṣayeṣu nirapekṣaḥ bhavati sa ca camatkāraḥ vicāryamāṇaḥ

original: nairapekṣyakāraṇatvāt ātmasvarūpa eva bhavati / paramaviśrāntipadasvarūpasya ātmana
analyzed: nairapekṣya kāraṇa tvāt ātma svarūpaḥ eva bhavati parama viśrānti pada svarūpasya ātmana

original: eva nairapekṣyakāraṇatvāt iti yuktam eva bhoktuḥ bhogyeṣu yaddarśanarūpaṃ camatkārakāraṇam
analyzed: eva nairapekṣya kāraṇa tvāt iti yuktam eva bhoktuḥ bhogyeṣu yat darśana rūpam camatkāra kāraṇam

original: iti / anubhavamātragamye 'smin vastuni pratibhāvadbhiḥ svayam api yatanīyam ity alaṃ
analyzed: iti anubhava mātra gamye asmin vastuni pratibhāvadbhiḥ svayam api yatanīyam iti alam

original: prapañcena / tathā yena sākṣitayā sthitena yenātmanā / asat asat jātam / tathā yena
analyzed: prapañcena tathā yena sākṣi tayā sthitena yena ātmanā asat asat jātam tathā yena

original: tādṛśena yenātmanā / sat sattvam āgatam / sākṣiṇaṃ vinā sadasadgatayoḥ sattvāsattvayoḥ
analyzed: tādṛśena yena ātmanā sat sattvam āgatam sākṣiṇam vinā sat asat gatayoḥ sattva asattvayoḥ

original: asaṅkalpatvāt //MT_3,5.20 //
analyzed: a saṅkalpa tvāt

original: calatīdam anicchasya kāyāyo yasya sannidhau / jaḍaṃ paramaratnasya śāntam ātmani tiṣṭhataḥ //MU_3,5.21//
analyzed: calati idam anicchasya kāyāyaḥ yasya sannidhau jaḍam parama ratnasya śāntam ātmani tiṣṭhataḥ

original: anicchasya icchādhāramate rahitatvāt icchārahitasya / ata evātmani śānte / tiṣṭhataś
analyzed: anicchasya icchā dhāra mate rahita tvāt icchā rahitasya atas eva ātmani śānte tiṣṭhataḥ

original: calanecchākhyakṣobharahitaṃ tiṣṭhataḥ / yasya paramaratnasya sannidhau jaḍaṃ grāhyaikarūpatvena
analyzed: calana icchā ākhya kṣobha rahitam tiṣṭhataḥ yasya parama ratnasya sannidhau jaḍam grāhya eka rūpa tvena

original: acetanam / idaṃ kāyāyaḥ śarīrākhyam ayaḥ / calati ceṣṭāṃ karoti / kāyaceṣṭākāraṇatvenābhimatasya
analyzed: acetanam idam kāya ayaḥ śarīra ākhyam ayaḥ calati ceṣṭām karoti kāya ceṣṭā kāraṇa tvena abhimatasya

original: prāṇasyāpi ātmaśaktiyuktatvena paramārthataḥ kāyacalanakāraṇatvāyogāt / bāhyaratnagatajaḍatvarāhityadyotanārthaṃ
analyzed: prāṇasya api ātma śakti yukta tvena paramārthataḥ kāya calana kāraṇa tva ayogāt bāhya ratna gata jaḍa tva rāhitya dyotana artham

original: paramapadopādānam / yuktam ca ayasaḥ ayaskāntākhyaratnasannidhāne calanam //MT_3,5.21 //
niyatir deśakālau ca calanaṃ spandanaṃ kriyāḥ / iti yena gataṃ sattāṃ sarvasattvābhigāminā //MU_3,5.22//
analyzed: niyatiḥ deśa kālau ca calanam spandanam kriyāḥ iti yena gatam sattām sarva sattva abhigāminā

original: niyatiḥ padārtheṣu niyamādāyakaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ / deśaḥ padārthādhārabhūtaḥ vastuviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: niyatiḥ padārtheṣu niyama ādāyakaḥ śakti viśeṣaḥ deśaḥ padārtha ādhāra bhūtaḥ vastu viśeṣaḥ

original: kālaḥ sūryacārādyanumeyaḥ kalanāmātrasvarūpaḥ padārthaparivartikārakaḥ ko 'pi vastuviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ sūrya cāra ādi anumeyaḥ kalanā mātra svarūpaḥ padārtha parivarti kārakaḥ kaḥ api vastu viśeṣaḥ

original: calanam sāmānyacalanam / spandanaṃ kriyāviṣayā ceṣṭā / kriyā pākādirūpaṃ karma /
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat / iti etat / sarvasattvābhigāminā samastasattāviṣayapadārthavyāpakena /
analyzed: upalakṣaṇam ca etat iti etat sarva sattva abhigāminā samasta sattā viṣaya padārtha vyāpakena

original: yenātmanā / sattāṃ gatam / vyāpakenaiva hi vyāpyaṃ sattāṃ labhate //MT_3,5.22 //
analyzed: yena ātmanā sattām gatam vyāpakena eva hi vyāpyam sattām labhate

original: śuddhasaṃvinmayatvād yaḥ khaṃ bhaved vyomavittayā / padārthavittayārthatvam avatiṣṭhaty aniṣṭhitaḥ //MU_3,5.23//
analyzed: śuddha saṃvid maya tvāt yaḥ kham bhavet vyoma vittayā padārtha vittayā artha tvam avatiṣṭhati aniṣṭhitaḥ

original: śuddhasaṃvinmayatvāt / śuddhā kenāpi rūpeṇa niṣṭhāṃ na gatā / yā saṃvit saṃvedanaṃ /
analyzed: śuddha saṃvid maya tvāt śuddhā kena api rūpeṇa niṣṭhām na gatā yā saṃvid saṃvedanam

original: tatsvarūpatvāt / aniṣṭhitaḥ kenāpi rūpeṇa niṣṭhāṃ na gataḥ / yaḥ / vyomavittayā vyomāham
analyzed: tad sva rūpa tvāt aniṣṭhitaḥ kena api rūpeṇa niṣṭhām na gataḥ yaḥ vyoma vittayā vyomā aham

original: iti saṃvidyuktatvena / khaṃ vyoma / bhavati / padārthābhāvarūpaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: iti saṃvid yukta tvena kham vyoma bhavati padārtha abhāva rūpam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: padārthavittayā padārtho 'ham iti saṃvidyuktatvena / arthatvam padārthabhāvam / avatiṣṭhati
analyzed: padārtha vittayā padārthaḥ aham iti saṃvid yukta tvena artha tvam padārtha bhāvam avatiṣṭhati

original: āśrayati / upasargasāmarthyāt tiṣṭhater āśrayaṇam arthaḥ / ghaṭatve niṣṭhitaḥ ghaṭaḥ
analyzed: āśrayati upasarga sāmarthyāt tiṣṭhateḥ āśrayaṇam arthaḥ ghaṭa tve niṣṭhitaḥ ghaṭaḥ

original: paṭatāṃ na yātīti aniṣṭhita ity uktam //MT_3,5.23 //
analyzed: paṭa tām na yāti iti aniṣṭhitaḥ iti uktam

original: sargāntaślokenātmamāhātmyavarṇanaṃ samāpayati
analyzed: sarga anta ślokena ātma māhātmya varṇanam samāpayati

original: kurvann apīva jagatāṃ mahatām ananta- spandaṃ na kiñcana karoti kadācanāpi / svātmany anastamayasaṃvidi nirvikāre tyaktodayasthitimatiḥ sthita  #
analyzed: kurvan api iva jagatām mahatām ananta spandam na kiñcana karoti kadācana api sva ātmani an astamaya saṃvidi nirvikāre tyakta udaya sthiti matiḥ sthita  /

original: eka eva //MU_3,5.24//
analyzed: ekaḥ eva

original: ya iti śeṣaḥ / yaḥ ātmā mahatām jagatām anantaspandam kurvan api iva jagatprādurbhāvānyathānupapattyā
analyzed: yaḥ iti śeṣaḥ yaḥ ātmā mahatām jagatām ananta spandam kurvan api iva jagat prādurbhāva anyathā anupapattyā

original: mahājagadviṣayam anantaṃ spandaṃ kurvann apīva / kadācana kiñcana na karoti atiśuddhena
analyzed: mahā jagat viṣayam anantam spandam kurvan api iva kadācana kiñcana na karoti ati śuddhena

original: kartṛtvābhimānābhāvāt / anyathā ivaśabdaprayogāyogāt / yaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / anastamayasaṃvidi /
analyzed: kartṛ tva abhimāna abhāvāt anyathā iva śabda prayoga ayogāt yaḥ kathambhūtaḥ an astamaya saṃvidi

original: anastamayā yathā tathā kalpitasya svāstamayasyāpi sākṣitvenāvasthānāt paramārthataḥ
analyzed: anastamayāḥ yathā tathā kalpitasya sva astamayasya api sākṣi tvena avasthānāt paramārthataḥ

original: astamayarahitā / yā saṃvit / tatsvarūpe / tathā nirvikāre rāgadveṣādirūpebhyaḥ vikārebhyaḥ
analyzed: astamaya rahitā yā saṃvid tad svarūpe tathā nirvikāre rāga dveṣa ādi rūpebhyaḥ vikārebhyaḥ

original: niṣkrānte / svātmani svasvarūpe / sthitaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / tyaktā udayasthityoḥ
analyzed: niṣkrānte sva ātmani sva svarūpe sthitaḥ punar kathambhūtaḥ tyaktā udaya sthityoḥ

original: jagadviṣayoḥ udayasthityoḥ / matiḥ yena / saḥ / tādṛśaḥ / jagataḥ udaye sthitau arthāt
analyzed: jagat viṣayoḥ udaya sthityoḥ matiḥ yena saḥ tādṛśaḥ jagataḥ udaye sthitau arthāt

original: saṃhāre ca nirapekṣa ity arthaḥ / iti śivam //MT_3,5.24 //
analyzed: saṃhāre ca nirapekṣaḥ iti arthaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ // 3,5 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: oṃ evaṃ paramātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pratipādya śrīrāmaṃ tatprāptiṃ prati tvaramāṇaṃ jñātvā sugamaṃ tatprāptyupāyaṃ kathayati
analyzed: om evam paramātmanaḥ svarūpam māhātmyam ca pratipādya śrī rāmam tad prāptim prati tvaramāṇam jñātvā sugamam tad prāpti upāyam kathayati

original: asya devātidevasya parasya paramātmanaḥ / jñānād eva parā siddhir na tv anuṣṭhānakhedadā //MU_3,6.1//
analyzed: asya devātidevasya parasya paramātmanaḥ jñānāt eva parā siddhiḥ na tu anuṣṭhāna kheda dā

original: asya proktasvarūpasya / devātidevasya niratiśayakrīḍāśīlasya dyotanaśīlasya ca niratiśayaparamātmanaḥ /
analyzed: asya prokta svarūpasya devātidevasya niratiśaya krīḍā śīlasya dyotana śīlasya ca niratiśaya paramātmanaḥ

original: jñānād eva jñānākhyād upāyād eva / siddhiḥ prāptirūpā siddhiḥ / bhavati / asya siddhiḥ
analyzed: jñānāt eva jñāna ākhyāt upāyāt eva siddhiḥ prāpti rūpā siddhiḥ bhavati asya siddhiḥ

original: anuṣṭhānakhedadā / anuṣṭhānena yaḥ khedaḥ / taṃ dadātīti tādṛśī / na bhavati //MT_3,6.1 //
analyzed: anuṣṭhāna kheda dā anuṣṭhānena yaḥ khedaḥ tam dadāti iti tādṛśī na bhavati

original: nanv anuṣṭhānaṃ vinā kathaṃ yuktatā syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu anuṣṭhānam vinā katham yukta tā syāt iti atra āha

original: atra jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ na tv anyad upayujyate / mṛgatṛṣṇājalabhrāntiśāntivedanarūpi tat //MU_3,6.2//
analyzed: atra jñānam anuṣṭhānam na tu anyat upayujyate mṛgatṛṣṇā jala bhrānti śānti vedana rūpi tat

original: atra asyāṃ ātmaprāptirūpāyāṃ siddhau / jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ siddheḥ kāryasādhakaḥ prayatnaḥ /
analyzed: atra asyām ātma prāpti rūpāyām siddhau jñānam anuṣṭhānam siddheḥ kārya sādhakaḥ prayatnaḥ

original: bhavati / anyat jñānākhyānuṣṭhānavyatiriktaṃ kāyavyāpārākhyaṃ / anuṣṭhānaṃ nopayujyate /
analyzed: bhavati anyat jñāna ākhya anuṣṭhāna vyatiriktam kāya vyāpāra ākhyam anuṣṭhānam na upayujyate

original: tat jñānam / mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ yā jalabhrāntiḥ / tasyāḥ śāntiḥ / yena / tat / tādṛśaṃ
analyzed: tat jñānam mṛgatṛṣṇāyām yā jala bhrāntiḥ tasyāḥ śāntiḥ yena tat tādṛśam

original: yat vedanam / tadvat rūpam / asyāstīti tādṛśaṃ bhavati / samyagjñānarūpaṃ bhavatīty
analyzed: yat vedanam tadvat rūpam asya asti iti tādṛśam bhavati samyak jñāna rūpam bhavati iti

original: arthaḥ //MT_3,6.2 //
analyzed: arthaḥ

original: nanv īdṛśo 'sāv ātmā kutra tiṣṭhatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu īdṛśaḥ asau ātmā kutra tiṣṭhati iti atra āha

original: na caiṣa dūre nākāśe nālabhyo viṣamo na ca / svānandabhāsarūpo 'sau svadehād eva labhyate //MU_3,6.3//
analyzed: na ca eṣa dūre na ākāśe na a labhyaḥ viṣamaḥ na ca sva ānanda bhāsa rūpaḥ asau sva dehāt eva labhyate

original: eṣaḥ ātmā / dūre na ca bhavati / svaśarīrāntarvartitvāt / etena dūrasthamahātīrthāśrayatvaśaṅkā
analyzed: eṣaḥ ātmā dūre na ca bhavati sva śarīra antar varti tvāt etena dūra stha mahā tīrtha āśraya tva śaṅkā

original: nivāritā / eṣaḥ ātmā / ākāśe na bhavati / etena uparisthabhuvanāśrayatvaśaṅkā nivāritā /
analyzed: nivāritā eṣaḥ ātmā ākāśe na bhavati etena upari stha bhuvana āśraya tva śaṅkā nivāritā

original: eṣaḥ ātmā / alabhyaḥ labdhum aśakyaḥ / na bhavati / sadā labdhatvāt / anyathā ātmatvāyogyatvāt /
analyzed: eṣaḥ ātmā alabhyaḥ labdhum aśakyaḥ na bhavati sadā labdha tvāt anyathā ātma tva ayogya tvāt

original: etena durlabhatvaśaṅkā nivāritā / eṣaḥ ātmā / viṣamaḥ kaṭhinaḥ / na ca bhavati /
analyzed: etena durlabha tva śaṅkā nivāritā eṣaḥ ātmā viṣamaḥ kaṭhinaḥ na ca bhavati

original: parapremāspadatvāt / na hi kaṭhine premāspadatvaṃ yuktam / paratvaviśeṣitasya tu
analyzed: para prema āspada tvāt na hi kaṭhine prema āspada tvam yuktam para tva viśeṣitasya tu

original: premnaḥ kā kathā / etena aiśvaryaleśamadagrastarājādivat krauryāśaṅkā nivāritā /
analyzed: premnaḥ kā kathā etena aiśvarya leśa mada grasta rāja ādi vat kraurya āśaṅkā nivāritā

original: puruṣeṇa svānandabhāsarūpaḥ bhogādiviṣayanirapekṣasvayambhātānandapratibhāsasvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣeṇa sva ānanda bhāsa rūpaḥ bhoga ādi viṣaya nirapekṣa svayam bhāta ānanda pratibhāsa svarūpaḥ

original: asau ātmā / svadehād eva labhyate / svānandabhāsarūpa ity anena viṣamatvanirāsaḥ /
svadehād ity anena dūrasthatvākāśasthatvayoḥ nirāsaḥ / labhyate ity anena alabhyatvanirāsaḥ //MT_3,6.3 //
analyzed: sva dehāt iti anena dūra stha tva ākāśa stha tvayoḥ nirāsaḥ labhyate iti anena alabhya tva nirāsaḥ

original: nanu tapaḥprabhṛtināpi kecid ātmaprāptiṃ kathayantīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tapaḥ prabhṛtinā api kecid ātma prāptim kathayanti iti atra āha

original: kiñcin nopakaroty atra tapodānavratādikam / svabhāvamātraviśrāntim ṛte nātrāsti sādhanam //MU_3,6.4//
analyzed: kiñcid nā upakaroti atra tapaḥ dāna vrata ādikam svabhāva mātra viśrāntim ṛte na atra asti sādhanam

original: atra asyāṃ ātmaprāptirūpāyāṃ siddhau / tapodānavratādikam kiñcit nopakaroti leśenāpi
analyzed: atra asyām ātma prāpti rūpāyām siddhau tapaḥ dāna vrata ādikam kiñcid na upakaroti leśena api

original: upakāraṃ na karoti / bāhyāṅgatvena ārādupakārakatvāt / tapaḥprabhṛtinā hi sattvaśuddhir
analyzed: upakāram na karoti bāhya aṅga tvena ārāt upakāraka tvāt tapaḥ prabhṛtinā hi sattva śuddhiḥ

original: eva bhavati / nātmaprāptiḥ / atra asyāṃ ātmaprāptau / svabhāvaviśrāntim ṛte svarūpaviśrāntiṃ
analyzed: eva bhavati na ātma prāptiḥ atra asyām ātma prāptau svabhāva viśrāntim ṛte svarūpa viśrāntim

original: vihāya / sādhanaṃ na bhavati //MT_3,6.4 //
analyzed: vihāya sādhanam na bhavati

original: svabhāvaviśrāntau asamarthān prati upāyaṃ kathayati
analyzed: svabhāva viśrāntau asamarthān prati upāyam kathayati

original: śāstrasatsaṅgasadyogiparataivātra kevalam / sādhanaṃ bodhanaṃ mohajālasya yad akṛtrimam //MU_3,6.5//
analyzed: śāstra sat saṅga sat yogi para tā eva atra kevalam sādhanam bodhanam moha jālasya yat akṛtrimam

original: atra asyām ātmaprāptau / śāstraṃ ca adhyātmaśāstraṃ / tac ca satsaṅgasadyoginaḥ ca
analyzed: atra asyām ātma prāptau śāstram ca adhyātma śāstram tat ca sat saṅga sat yoginaḥ ca

original: śāstrasatsaṅgasadyoginaḥ / tatra paratā ekaniṣṭhatvam / eva / na tu tapaḥprabhṛtikam /
sādhanaṃ upāyaḥ / bhavati / sādhanaṃ kiṃ / yat mohajālasya jagati jagattvajñānākhyasya
analyzed: sādhanam upāyaḥ bhavati sādhanam kim yat moha jālasya jagati jagat tva jñāna ākhyasya

original: mithyājñānaprapañcasya / lakṣaṇayā jagati jagattvajñānākhyasya mohajālayuktasya puruṣasyākṛtrimaṃ
analyzed: mithyā jñāna prapañcasya lakṣaṇayā jagati jagat tva jñāna ākhyasya moha jāla yuktasya puruṣasya akṛtrimam

original: sahajaṃ / bodhanaṃ brahmaivedam ity / evaṃbodhakāri bhavati //MT_3,6.5 //
analyzed: sahajam bodhanam brahma eva idam iti evaṃbodha kāri bhavati

original: śāstrādiparatāphalabhūtasyātmaviśrāntim prati sādhanabhūtasya mukhyam upāyatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: śāstra ādi para tā phala bhūtasya ātma viśrāntim prati sādhana bhūtasya mukhyam upāya tvam kathayati

original: ayaṃ sa deva ity eva samparijñānamātrataḥ / jantor na jāyate duḥkhaṃ jīvanmuktatvam eti ca //MU_3,6.6//
analyzed: ayam sa devaḥ iti eva samparijñāna mātrataḥ jantoḥ na jāyate duḥkham jīvanmukta tvam eti ca

original: ayam ahantayā idantayā ca puraḥsphuraṇaśīlaḥ ahaṅkārādikaḥ saṃsāraḥ / saḥ sarveṣāṃ
analyzed: ayam ahantayā idantayā ca puras sphuraṇa śīlaḥ ahaṅkāra ādikaḥ saṃsāraḥ saḥ sarveṣām

original: paramārthataḥ ātmabhāvena sthitatvāt prasiddhaḥ / devaḥ dyotanaśīlaṃ krīḍāśīlaṃ ca
analyzed: paramārthataḥ ātma bhāvena sthita tvāt prasiddhaḥ devaḥ dyotana śīlam krīḍā śīlam ca

original: cittattvaṃ bhavati / ity eva etāvanmātreṇaiva / samparijñānamātrataḥ samyagjñānamātreṇa /
analyzed: cit tattvam bhavati iti eva etāvat mātreṇa eva samparijñāna mātrataḥ samyak jñāna mātreṇa

original: jantoḥ duḥkhaṃ na jāyate / pravāhāgatasya duḥkhasyāpi cinmātratvajñānāt / saḥ jantuḥ
analyzed: jantoḥ duḥkham na jāyate pravāha āgatasya duḥkhasya api cit mātra tva jñānāt saḥ jantuḥ

original: jīvanmuktatvaṃ caiti prāpnoti / śarīrasānnidhye 'pi muktatvāt //MT_3,6.6 //
analyzed: jīvanmukta tvam ca eti prāpnoti śarīra sānnidhye api mukta tvāt

original: sādhanabhāvena prasiddhasya tapaḥprabhṛtikasyāsādhanatvam asahamānaḥ ātmanaḥ sulabhatve nikaṭavartitve ca sandihānaś ca śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: sādhana bhāvena prasiddhasya tapaḥ prabhṛtikasya asādhana tvam asahamānaḥ ātmanaḥ sulabha tve nikaṭa varti tve ca sandihānaḥ ca śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: samparijñātamātreṇa kilānenātmanātmani / punar doṣā na bādhante maraṇādyāḥ kadācana //MU_3,6.7//
analyzed: samparijñāta mātreṇa kila anena ātmanā ātmani punar doṣāḥ na bādhante maraṇa ādyāḥ kadācana

original: ātmani svasmin / samparijñātamātreṇa ahamādijagadadhiṣṭhānatayā samyaṅniścitena /
analyzed: ātmani svasmin samparijñāta mātreṇa aham ādi jagat adhiṣṭhāna tayā samyak niścitena

original: anena ātmanā maraṇādyāḥ doṣāḥ na bādhante / na hi cinmātratāṃ gatasya dehagatāḥ maraṇādyāḥ
analyzed: anena ātmanā maraṇa ādyāḥ doṣāḥ na bādhante na hi cit mātra tām gatasya deha gatāḥ maraṇa ādyāḥ

original: bādhāṃ kartuṃ samarthāḥ bhavanti //MT_3,6.7 //
analyzed: bādhām kartum samarthāḥ bhavanti

original: tarhi jñātajñeyatvena maunam eva kurv ity / atrāha
analyzed: tarhi jñāta jñeya tvena maunam eva kuru iti atra āha

original: devadevo mahān eṣa kuto dūrād avāpyate / tapasā kena tīvreṇa kleśena kiyatātha vā //MU_3,6.8//
analyzed: devadevaḥ mahān eṣa kutas dūrāt avāpyate tapasā kena tīvreṇa kleśena kiyatā atha vā

original: asmābhiḥ eṣaḥ devadevaḥ kutaḥ dūrāt kiyataḥ dūrāt / avāpyate / tathā kena tīvreṇa
analyzed: asmābhiḥ eṣaḥ devadevaḥ kutas dūrāt kiyataḥ dūrāt avāpyate tathā kena tīvreṇa

original: tapasā avāpyata atha vā kiyatā kleśena prāṇarodhanādirūpeṇa kleśena / avāpyate /
analyzed: tapasā avāpyata atha vā kiyatā kleśena prāṇa rodhana ādi rūpeṇa kleśena avāpyate

original: na hi īdṛśasya devadevasya tapaādikaṃ prāṇarodhanādikaṃ ca vinā prāptiḥ yujyate /
analyzed: na hi īdṛśasya devadevasya tapaḥ ādikam prāṇa rodhana ādikam ca vinā prāptiḥ yujyate

original: sarveṣāṃ tatprāptiprasaṅgāt / na hi sarve tatprāptibhājaḥ dṛśyante / na cānavāptasya
analyzed: sarveṣām tad prāpti prasaṅgāt na hi sarve tad prāpti bhājaḥ dṛśyante na ca anavāptasya

original: jñānaviṣayatvaṃ yuktaṃ / prāptasya ghaṭāder eva tadviṣayatādarśanād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,6.8 //
analyzed: jñāna viṣaya tvam yuktam prāptasya ghaṭa ādeḥ eva tad viṣaya tā darśanāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: svapauruṣaprayatnena vivekena vikāsinā / sa devo jñāyate rāma na tapassnānakarmabhiḥ //MU_3,6.9//
analyzed: sva pauruṣa prayatnena vivekena vikāsinā sa devaḥ jñāyate rāma na tapaḥ snāna karmabhiḥ

original: he rāma / svapauruṣaprayatnena nijamānasikapauruṣākhyaprayatnasvarūpeṇa / tathā vikāsinā
analyzed: he rāma sva pauruṣa prayatnena nija mānasika pauruṣa ākhya prayatna svarūpeṇa tathā vikāsinā

original: vikāsayuktena vicāreṇa / ko 'ham idaṃ jagac ca kim ity evaṃrūpeṇa vivekena / puruṣeṇa
analyzed: vikāsa yuktena vicāreṇa kaḥ aham idam jagat ca kim iti evaṃrūpeṇa vivekena puruṣeṇa

original: sa devaḥ jñāyate / tapaḥsnānakarmabhiḥ na jñāyate / cittādiśodhanamātraparatvāt teṣām /
analyzed: sa devaḥ jñāyate tapaḥ snāna karmabhiḥ na jñāyate citta ādi śodhana mātra para tvāt teṣām

original: jñāyate ity anena jñānamātram evātra sādhanīyaṃ / nāvāptiḥ / na hi puraḥsthāyāṃ śuktau
analyzed: jñāyate iti anena jñāna mātram eva atra sādhanīyam na avāptiḥ na hi puraḥsthāyām śuktau

original: rajatabhramayuktasya śuktyavāptiṃ kāṅkṣamāṇasyāpi śuktyavāptiḥ sadhanīyā / śuktir
analyzed: rajata bhrama yuktasya śukti avāptim kāṅkṣamāṇasya api śukti avāptiḥ sadhanīyā śuktiḥ

original: eveyam ity evaṃrūpasya jñānamātrasyaiva sādhanīyatvāt iti dyotitam / kuto dūrād ity
analyzed: eva iyam iti evaṃrūpasya jñāna mātrasya eva sādhanīya tvāt iti dyotitam kutas dūrāt iti

original: asyātyantāsaṅgatattvenottarākathanam //MT_3,6.9 //
analyzed: asya atyanta asaṅga tattvena uttarā kathanam

original: rāgādiyuktasya tapaādeḥ sphuṭam eva asādhanatvam / tadrahitasya tu sādhanatve 'pi rāgādirāhityasyaiva sādhanatvaṃ yuktam ity abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: rāga ādi yuktasya tapaḥ ādeḥ sphuṭam eva asādhana tvam tad rahitasya tu sādhana tve api rāga ādi rāhityasya eva sādhana tvam yuktam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: rāgadveṣatamaḥkrodhamadamātsaryavarjanam / vinā rāma tapodānaṃ kleśa eva na vāstavam //MU_3,6.10//
analyzed: rāga dveṣa tamaḥ krodha mada mātsarya varjanam vinā rāma tapaḥ dānam kleśaḥ eva na vāstavam

original: tapaś ca dānaṃ ca tat tapodānaṃ / vāstavam sahajabhāvakṛtaṃ //MT_3,6.10//
analyzed: tapaḥ ca dānam ca tat tapodānam vāstavam sahaja bhāva kṛtam

original: rāgādyupahate citte vañcayitvā paraṃ dhanam / yad arjyate tato dānād yasyārthas tasya tat phalam //MU_3,6.11//
analyzed: rāga ādi upahate citte vañcayitvā param dhanam yat arjyate tatas dānāt yasya arthaḥ tasya tat phalam

original: tataḥ tasya dhanasya / sārvavibhaktikaḥ tasil //MT_3,6.11//
analyzed: tatas tasya dhanasya sārvavibhaktikaḥ tasil

original: rāgādyupahate citte vratādi kriyate ca yat / sa dambhaḥ procyate tasya phalam asti manāṅ na vā //MU_3,6.12//
analyzed: rāga ādi upahate citte vrata ādi kriyate ca yat sa dambhaḥ procyate tasya phalam asti manāk na vā

original: vāśabdaḥ pakṣāntare //MT_3,6.12//
analyzed: vā śabdaḥ pakṣa antare

original: phalitaṃ kathayati
analyzed: phalitam kathayati

original: tasmāt puruṣayatnena mukhyam auṣadham āharet / sacchāstrasajjanāsaṅgaṃ saṃsṛtivyādhināśane //MU_3,6.13//
analyzed: tasmāt puruṣa yatnena mukhyam auṣadham āharet sat śāstra sat jana asaṅgam saṃsṛti vyādhi nāśane

original: āharet arjayet / kuryād iti yāvat / saṃsṛtivyādhināśane saṃsṛtyākhyavyādhināśanārtham //MT_3,6.13//
analyzed: āharet arjayet kuryāt iti yāvat saṃsṛti vyādhi nāśane saṃsṛti ākhya vyādhi nāśana artham

original: atraikaṃ pauruṣaṃ yatnaṃ varjayitvetarā gatiḥ / sarvaduḥkhakṣayaprāptau na kācid upapadyate //MU_3,6.14//
analyzed: atra ekam pauruṣam yatnam varjayitvā itarā gatiḥ sarva duḥkha kṣaya prāptau na kācid upapadyate

original: atrāsyām ātmaprāptau / pauruṣaṃ yatnam sacchāstravicārādirūpaṃ / gatiḥ upāyaḥ / sarvaduḥkhakṣayaprāptau samastaduḥkhakṣayaprāptirūpāyāṃ //MT_3,6.14//
analyzed: atra asyām ātma prāptau pauruṣam yatnam sat śāstra vicāra ādi rūpam gatiḥ upāyaḥ sarva duḥkha kṣaya prāptau samasta duḥkha kṣaya prāpti rūpāyām

original: nanu tat pauruṣaṃ kīdṛg astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tat pauruṣam kīdṛś asti iti atra āha

original: śṛṇu tat pauruṣaṃ kīdṛg ātmajñānasya labdhaye / yena śāmyanty aśeṣeṇa rāgadveṣaviṣūcikāḥ //MU_3,6.15//
analyzed: śṛṇu tat pauruṣam kīdṛś ātma jñānasya labdhaye yena śāmyanti aśeṣeṇa rāga dveṣa viṣūcikāḥ

original: tvaṃ śṛṇu / kīdṛk kīdṛśaṃ / tat pauruṣaṃ ātmajñānasya labdhaye bhavati / yena pauruṣeṇa /
analyzed: tvam śṛṇu kīdṛś kīdṛśam tat pauruṣam ātma jñānasya labdhaye bhavati yena pauruṣeṇa

original: rāgadveṣaviṣūcikāḥ aśeṣeṇa śāmyanti / anyathā ātmajñānalabdhihetutvaṃ tasya na syād
analyzed: rāga dveṣa viṣūcikāḥ aśeṣeṇa śāmyanti anyathā ātma jñāna labdhi hetu tvam tasya na syāt

original: iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,6.15 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ

original: pratijñātaṃ pauruṣasvarūpakathanam eva karoti
analyzed: pratijñātam pauruṣa svarūpa kathanam eva karoti

original: yathāsambhavayā vṛttyā lokaśāstrāviruddhayā / santoṣasantuṣṭamanā bhogagardhaṃ parityajan //MU_3,6.16//
analyzed: yathāsambhavayā vṛttyā loka śāstra aviruddhayā santoṣa santuṣṭa manāḥ bhoga gardham parityajan

original: yathāsambhavam udyogād anudvignatayā svayā / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparatāṃ prathamaṃ śrayet //MU_3,6.17//
analyzed: yathāsambhavam udyogāt anudvigna tayā svayā sādhu saṅgama sat śāstra para tām prathamam śrayet

original: yathāsambhavayā sambhavānusariṇyā / na tu prayatnasādhitayā / vṛttyā jīvikayā / bhogagardhaṃ bhogalobham //MT_3,6.16-17//
analyzed: yathā sambhavayā sambhava anusariṇyā na tu prayatna sādhitayā vṛttyā jīvikayā bhoga gardham bhoga lobham

original: yathāprāptārthasantuṣṭo yo garhitam upekṣate / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstrarataḥ śīghraṃ sa mucyate //MU_3,6.18//
analyzed: yathā prāpta artha santuṣṭaḥ yaḥ garhitam upekṣate sādhu saṅgama sat śāstra rataḥ śīghram sa mucyate

original: garhitam anyāyāgatam dhanādikam //MT_3,6.18//
analyzed: garhitam anyāya āgatam dhana ādikam

original: nanu kathaṃ saḥ śīghraṃ mucyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham saḥ śīghram mucyate iti atra āha

original: vicāraṇāparijñātasvabhāvasya mahāmateḥ / anukampyā bhavanty ete brahmaviṣṇvindraśaṅkarāḥ //MU_3,6.19//
analyzed: vicāraṇā parijñāta svabhāvasya mahāmateḥ anukampyāḥ bhavanti ete brahma viṣṇu indra śaṅkarāḥ

original: vicāraṇayā sādhusaṅgādiprabhāvasiddhena vicāreṇa / parijñātaḥ dehādivyatiriktatvena
analyzed: vicāraṇayā sādhu saṅga ādi prabhāva siddhena vicāreṇa parijñātaḥ deha ādi vyatirikta tvena

original: niścitaḥ / svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ / yena / saḥ / tādṛśasya mahāmateḥ buddhiyuktasya puruṣasya /
analyzed: niścitaḥ svabhāvaḥ sva rūpam yena saḥ tādṛśasya mahāmateḥ buddhi yuktasya puruṣasya

original: ete brahmaviṣṇvindraśaṅkarāḥ anukampyāḥ / kīdṛśāḥ / eṣāṃ jagajjananādivyāpāraparatārūpā
analyzed: ete brahma viṣṇu indra śaṅkarāḥ anukampyāḥ kīdṛśāḥ eṣām jagat janana ādi vyāpāra para tā rūpā

original: vipad astīty evaṃrūpānukampāviṣayāḥ bhavanti / kim u vaktavyaṃ tasya śīghraṃ mokṣaḥ
analyzed: vipad asti iti evaṃrūpa anukampā viṣayāḥ bhavanti kim u vaktavyam tasya śīghram mokṣaḥ

original: kathaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,6.19 //
analyzed: katham syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu prathamaṃ tāvat tvayā sādhusaṅgatir evopāyatvenoktā / sa sādhur eva kaḥ syād yasya saṅgatiḥ kriyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu prathamam tāvat tvayā sādhu saṅgatiḥ eva upāya tvena uktā sa sādhuḥ eva kaḥ syāt yasya saṅgatiḥ kriyate iti atra āha

original: bhṛśaṃ yaṃ sujanaprāyaṃ lokāḥ sādhuṃ pracakṣate / sa viśiṣṭaḥ sa sādhuḥ syāt taṃ prayatnena saṃśrayet //MU_3,6.20//
analyzed: bhṛśam yam su jana prāyam lokāḥ sādhum pracakṣate sa viśiṣṭaḥ sa sādhuḥ syāt tam prayatnena saṃśrayet

original: sujanaprāyam bāhulyena sujanam / prāyapadenāsādhutve 'pi / prayojanavaśād bāndhavaiḥ
analyzed: su jana prāyam bāhulyena su janam prāya padena asādhu tve api prayojana vaśāt bāndhavaiḥ

original: uktasujanatve puruṣe sādhutve 'pi paranindaikarasikakhalajanaproktāsādhujanatve puruṣe
analyzed: ukta su jana tve puruṣe sādhu tve api para nindā eka rasika khala jana prokta asādhu jana tve puruṣe

original: sādhutvāsādhutvayoḥ nirāsaḥ //MT_3,6.20 //
sādhunirṇayaṃ kṛtvā śāstranirṇayaṃ karoti
analyzed: sādhu nirṇayam kṛtvā śāstra nirṇayam karoti

original: adhyātmavidyā vidyānāṃ pradhānaṃ tatkathāśrayam / śāstraṃ sacchāstram ity āhur mucyate tadvicāravān //MU_3,6.21//
analyzed: adhyātma vidyā vidyānām pradhānam tad kathā āśrayam śāstram sat śāstram iti āhuḥ mucyate tad vicāravān

original: vidyānām samastajñānānāṃ madhye / adhyātmavidyā ātmajñānaṃ / pradhānaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: vidyānām samasta jñānānām madhye adhyātma vidyā ātma jñānam pradhānam bhavati

original: ataḥ paṇḍitāḥ tatkathāśrayam adhyātmavidyākathāvācakam / śāstram sacchāstram ity
analyzed: atas paṇḍitāḥ tad kathā āśrayam adhyātma vidyā kathā vācakam śāstram sat śāstram iti

original: āhuḥ / tadvicāravān proktasacchāstravicārayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ / mucyate saṃsārakṛtāt bandhanāt
analyzed: āhuḥ tad vicāravān prokta sat śāstra vicāra yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ mucyate saṃsāra kṛtāt bandhanāt

original: mukto bhavati / ataḥ adhyātmaśāstram evātropayuktam astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,6.21 //
analyzed: muktaḥ bhavati atas adhyātma śāstram eva atra upayuktam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: sacchāstrādeḥ utpannasya vivekasya mukhyopāyatvaṃ sargāntaślokena sphuṭīkṛtya kathayati
analyzed: sat śāstra ādeḥ utpannasya vivekasya mukhya upāya tvam sarga anta ślokena sphuṭīkṛtya kathayati

original: sacchāstrasatsaṅgamajair vivekais tathā vinaśyanti balān malāni / yathā jalānāṃ katakānuṣaṅgād yathā jaḍānām abhayopayogāt //MU_3,6.22//
analyzed: sat śāstra sat saṅgama jaiḥ vivekaiḥ tathā vinaśyanti balāt malāni yathā jalānām kataka anuṣaṅgāt yathā jaḍānām abhaya upayogāt

original: malāni rāgādirūpāṇi / janapakṣe rajorūpāṇi / katakam jalaśuddhikārī dravyaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: malāni rāga ādi rūpāṇi jana pakṣe rajaḥ rūpāṇi katakam jala śuddhi kārī dravya viśeṣaḥ

original: dvitīyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati / yathā jaḍānām iti / jaḍānāṃ svavivekahīnānām / abhayopayogāt /
analyzed: dvitīyam dṛṣṭāntam kathayati yathā jaḍānām iti jaḍānām sva viveka hīnānām abhaya upayogāt

original: abhayena kenacid dattenābhayena / kṛtaḥ yaḥ upayogaḥ samāśvāsanākhyaḥ upayogaḥ /
analyzed: abhayena kenacid dattena abhayena kṛtaḥ yaḥ upayogaḥ samāśvāsana ākhyaḥ upayogaḥ

original: tasmāt malāni rajjusarpādikṛtabhayarūpāṇi malāni / vinaśyanti / tathety arthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt malāni rajju sarpa ādi kṛta bhaya rūpāṇi malāni vinaśyanti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: vivekināṃ abhayaṃ svavicāreṇa vinaśyantīti jaḍānām ity uktam / iti śivam //MT_3,6.22 //
analyzed: vivekinām abhayam sva vicāreṇa vinaśyanti iti jaḍānām iti uktam iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ // 3,6 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: dūradeśagamanaṃ upāyajālaprayogaṃ ca vinātmāvāptim amanyamānaḥ śrīrāmaḥ punar api pūrvoktam eva praśnaṃ karoti
analyzed: dūra deśa gamanam upāya jāla prayogam ca vinā ātma avāptim a manyamānaḥ śrī rāmaḥ punar api pūrva uktam eva praśnam karoti

original: ya eṣa devaḥ kathito yasmiñ jñāte vimucyate / vada kvāsau sthito devaḥ katham enam ahaṃ labhe //MU_3,7.1//
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa devaḥ kathitaḥ yasmin jñāte vimucyate vada kva asau sthitaḥ devaḥ katham enam aham labhe

original: tvayā yaḥ eṣaḥ devaḥ kathitaḥ / tathā yasmin deve / jñāte sati / puruṣeṇa vimucyate
analyzed: tvayā yaḥ eṣaḥ devaḥ kathitaḥ tathā yasmin deve jñāte sati puruṣeṇa vimucyate

original: muktiḥ prāpyate / tvam vada / asau devaḥ kva sthitaḥ bhavati / aham enam amuṃ devaṃ /
analyzed: muktiḥ prāpyate tvam vada asau devaḥ kva sthitaḥ bhavati aham enam amum devam

original: katham kaiḥ upāyaiḥ / labhe prāpnomi //MT_3,7.1 //
analyzed: katham kaiḥ upāyaiḥ labhe prāpnomi

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: ya eṣa devaḥ kathito naiṣa dūre 'vatiṣṭhate / śarīre saṃsthito nityaṃ cinmātram iti viśrutaḥ //MU_3,7.2//
analyzed: yaḥ eṣa devaḥ kathitaḥ na eṣa dūre avatiṣṭhate śarīre saṃsthitaḥ nityam cit mātram iti viśrutaḥ

original: mayā yaḥ eṣaḥ devaḥ kathitaḥ / eṣaḥ dūre dūradeśe / nāvatiṣṭhate / yataḥ cinmātram
analyzed: mayā yaḥ eṣaḥ devaḥ kathitaḥ eṣaḥ dūre dūra deśe na avatiṣṭhate yatas cit mātram

original: iti viśrutaḥ prasiddhaḥ / eṣaḥ nityaṃ śarīre sthitaḥ bhavati / anyathā pāṣāṇatulyasya
analyzed: iti viśrutaḥ prasiddhaḥ eṣaḥ nityam śarīre sthitaḥ bhavati anyathā pāṣāṇa tulyasya

original: śarīrasyāpi mṛtaśarīravat ceṣṭāśrayatvaṃ na syāt / na ca śarīrasthasya dūrasthatvaṃ
analyzed: śarīrasya api mṛta śarīra vat ceṣṭā āśraya tvam na syāt na ca śarīra sthasya dūra stha tvam

original: vaktuṃ yuktaṃ / svahastayor api dūrasthatvāsaṃyogāt iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,7.2 //
analyzed: vaktum yuktam sva hastayoḥ api dūra stha tva asaṃyogāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tarhi dehaparimāṇaḥ evāsau syāt / tathā ca dehavad anityatvam apy asya syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi deha parimāṇaḥ eva asau syāt tathā ca deha vat anitya tvam api asya syāt iti atra āha

original: eṣa sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ na viśvaṃ tv eṣa sarvagaḥ / vidyate hy eṣa evaiko na tu viśvābhidhāsti dṛk //MU_3,7.3//
analyzed: eṣa sarvam idam viśvam na viśvam tu eṣa sarvagaḥ vidyate hi eṣaḥ eva ekaḥ na tu viśva abhidhā asti dṛś

original: eṣaḥ ātmā / sarvam idam viśvam sarvam idaṃ jagat / bhavati / sarvaṃ sāratvena sthitatvāt /
analyzed: eṣaḥ ātmā sarvam idam viśvam sarvam idam jagat  bhavati sarvam sāra tvena sthita tvāt

original: tu pakṣāntare / sarvagaḥ sa ca sāratvena sarvapadārthagaḥ / eṣaḥ viśvaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: tu pakṣa antare sarva gaḥ sa ca sāra tvena sarva padārtha gaḥ eṣaḥ viśvam na bhavati

original: hi yasmāt / eṣa eka eva vidyate / viśvābhidhā dṛk viśvanāmā dṛṣṭiḥ / viśvam iti yāvat /
analyzed: hi yasmāt eṣaḥ ekaḥ eva vidyate viśva abhidhā   viśva nāmā dṛṣṭiḥ viśvam iti yāvat

original: na asti / bhāsamānasyāpi viśvasya taddṛṣṭyā etadrūpatvānapāyāt / na hi taraṅgākrānte
analyzed: na asti bhāsamānasya api viśvasya tad dṛṣṭyāḥ etad rūpa tva anapāyāt na hi taraṅga ākrānte

original: jale taraṅgābhidhā dṛk bhavati / bhāsamāneṣv api taraṅgeṣu vivekijanadṛṣṭyā jalatvānapāyāt //MT_3,7.3 //
analyzed: jale taraṅga abhidhā   bhavati bhāsamāneṣu api taraṅgeṣu viveki jana dṛṣṭyāḥ jala tva anapāyāt

original: nanu śaśibhṛdādayo 'pi mahādevatāsvarūpāḥ santy / tat katham tvayā vidyate hy eṣa evaika ity uktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu śaśibhṛt ādayaḥ api mahādevatā svarūpāḥ santi tat katham tvayā vidyate hi eṣaḥ eva ekaḥ iti uktam iti atra āha

original: cinmātram eṣa śaśibhṛc cinmātraṃ garuḍadhvajaḥ / cinmātram eva tapanaś cinmātraṃ kamalodbhavaḥ //MU_3,7.4//
analyzed: cit mātram eṣa śaśibhṛt cit mātram garuḍadhvajaḥ cit mātram eva tapanaḥ cit mātram kamalodbhavaḥ

original: eṣaḥ sṛṣṭisaṃhārakatvena prasiddhaḥ / śaśibhṛt śrīmahādevaḥ / cinmātraṃ bhavati /
analyzed: eṣaḥ sṛṣṭi saṃhāraka tvena prasiddhaḥ śaśibhṛt śrī mahādevaḥ cit mātram bhavati

original: nanu katham etad iti cet / satyaṃ / śaśibhṛt sacetano 'sti cetanārahito vā / acetanatve
analyzed: nanu katham etat iti ced satyam śaśibhṛt sa cetanaḥ asti cetanā rahitaḥ vā acetana tve

original: pāṣāṇarūpasya tasya jagadgatasyāvaratulyayogakṣematvam eva / sacetanatve tu sphuṭam
analyzed: pāṣāṇa rūpasya tasya jagadgatasya avara tulya yogakṣema tvam eva sa cetana tve tu sphuṭam

original: cinmātram eva tadbhāvena sphurati / nanu tarhi śaśibhṛtkīṭayoḥ samatvam eva syād
analyzed: cit mātram eva tad bhāvena sphurati nanu tarhi śaśi bhṛt kīṭayoḥ samatvam eva syāt

original: iti cet / kenoktaṃ nāstīti / nanu kāryavilakṣaṇatādarśanād bhedaḥ kalpyate / ayuktam
analyzed: iti ced kena uktam na asti iti nanu kārya vilakṣaṇa tā darśanāt bhedaḥ kalpyate ayuktam

original: eva kalpyate / na hi agnikaṇamahāgnicayayoḥ kāryavailakṣaṇyena bhedaḥ kalpayituṃ
analyzed: eva kalpyate na hi agni kaṇa mahāgni cayayoḥ kārya vailakṣaṇyena bhedaḥ kalpayitum

original: yuktaḥ / nanu agnikaṇamahāgnicayayoḥ kāryavailakṣaṇyaṃ nāsti dāhākhyasyaikasya kāryasya
analyzed: yuktaḥ nanu agni kaṇa mahāgni cayayoḥ kārya vailakṣaṇyam na asti dāha ākhyasya ekasya kāryasya

original: darśanāt iti cet / śaśibhṛtkīṭayor api / kiṃrūpaṃ kāryavailakṣaṇyam asti jñānakriyāyāḥ
analyzed: darśanāt iti ced śaśibhṛt kīṭayoḥ api kiṃrūpam kārya vailakṣaṇyam asti jñāna kriyāyāḥ
