original: jñāyate / lakṣaṇayā prāpyate / tat tadā / duḥkhasantatiḥ saṃsārarūpā duḥkhasantatiḥ /
analyzed: jñāyate lakṣaṇayā prāpyate tat tadā duḥkha santatiḥ saṃsāra rūpā duḥkha santatiḥ

original: kṣayam nāśam / eti gacchati / tadaiva kiñcit prāptaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ / kā iva /
analyzed: kṣayam nāśam eti gacchati tadā eva kiñcid prāptam bhavati iti arthaḥ kā iva

original: viṣūcikā iva / yathā sā viṣāveśaśāntau kṣayam eti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,7.15 //
analyzed: viṣūcikā iva yathā sā viṣa āveśa śāntau kṣayam eti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: śrīrāmaḥ paramātmasvarūpaśravaṇākāṅkṣānirbharatvena kathanāyogyatvāc chrīvasiṣṭhenānādṛtam api ātmasvarūpapraśnaṃ punaḥ karoti
analyzed: śrī rāmaḥ paramātma svarūpa śravaṇa ākāṅkṣā nirbhara tvena kathana ayogya tvāt śrī vasiṣṭhena an ādṛtam api ātma svarūpa praśnam punar karoti

original: rūpaṃ kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ / yasmin dṛṣṭe naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati //MU_3,7.16//
analyzed: rūpam kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ  yasmin dṛṣṭe naraḥ mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati

original: rūpam svarūpam / yathāvat samyak //MT_3,7.16//
analyzed: rūpam svarūpam yathāvat samyak

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ ākāṅkṣānirbharatvena śrīrāmasyādhikāritvaṃ niścityottaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ ākāṅkṣā nirbhara tvena śrī rāmasya adhikāri tvam niścitya uttaram kathayati

original: deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyāḥ saṃvido vapuḥ / nimeṣeṇaiva yan madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.17//
analyzed: deśāt deśa antaram dūram prāptāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ vapuḥ nimeṣeṇa eva yat madhye tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: deśāt ālambanīkṛtāt ekasmāt saṃvedyarūpāt deśāt / dūraṃ atyantavilakṣaṇam / deśāntaram
analyzed: deśāt ālambanīkṛtāt ekasmāt saṃvedya rūpāt deśāt dūram atyanta vilakṣaṇam deśa antaram

original: ālambanaviṣayīkriyamāṇam anyasaṃvedyākhyam deśāntaram / nimeṣeṇaiva ekasmin nimeṣe
analyzed: ālambana viṣayīkriyamāṇam anya saṃvedya ākhyam deśa antaram nimeṣeṇa eva ekasmin nimeṣe

original: eva / na tu madhye mauḍhyam anubhūya / prāptāyāḥ ālambanabhāvena gṛhṇantyāḥ / saṃvidaḥ
analyzed: eva na tu madhye mauḍhyam anubhūya prāptāyāḥ ālambana bhāvena gṛhṇantyāḥ saṃvidaḥ

original: dṛśyagrahaṇonmukhāyāḥ citaḥ / madhye pūrvāparasaṃvedyarāgārūṣitāyāṃ madhyāvasthāyāṃ /
analyzed: dṛśya grahaṇa unmukhāyāḥ citaḥ madhye pūrva apara saṃvedya rāga arūṣitāyām madhya avasthāyām

original: yat vapuḥ bhavati yat anirvācyaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavati / tad eva / na tu tatsadṛśam anyat /
analyzed: yat vapuḥ bhavati yat anirvācyam svarūpam bhavati tat eva na tu tad sadṛśam anyat

original: paramātmanaḥ samastajīvātmasārabhūtasya paramātmatattvasya / rūpaṃ bhavati / sarvamayatve
analyzed: paramātmanaḥ samasta jīvātma sāra bhūtasya paramātma tattvasya rūpam bhavati sarva maya tve

original: 'pi sarvottīrṇatvāt / nanu pūrvasaṃvedyam ālambanīkṛtya tadaivottarasaṃvedyam ālambanīkurvantyāḥ
analyzed: api sarva uttīrṇa tvāt nanu pūrva saṃvedyam ālambanīkṛtya tadā eva uttara saṃvedyam ālambanīkurvantyāḥ

original: saṃvidaḥ kim idaṃ madhyaṃ nāma yatrasthāyāḥ citaḥ paramātmarūpatā uktā / ucyate /
analyzed: saṃvidaḥ kim idam madhyam nāma yatrasthāyāḥ citaḥ paramātma rūpa tā uktā ucyate

original: pūrvasaṃvedyena rañjitāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ svaṃ nirmalaṃ rūpam aprāpyottarasaṃvedyena kariṣyamāṇasya
analyzed: pūrva saṃvedyena rañjitāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ svam nirmalam rūpam a prāpya uttara saṃvedyena kariṣyamāṇasya

original: rāgasyāyuktatvāt nirmalasvarūpatāmayaṃ madhyam avaśyam evāstīti jñātavyam / yathā
analyzed: rāgasya ayukta tvāt nirmala sva rūpa tā mayam madhyam avaśyam eva asti iti jñātavyam yathā

original: nīlīrāgarañjitasya paṭasya pītarāgakaraṇecchayā prakṣālaṇena sphuṭīkṛtaṃ śuddhapaṭatāmayaṃ
analyzed: nīlī rāga rañjitasya paṭasya pīta rāga karaṇa icchayā prakṣālaṇena sphuṭīkṛtam śuddha paṭa tā mayam

original: madhyaṃ bhavati / anyathā kariṣyamāṇasya pītarāgasya karaṇāsambhavāt / nanu pūrvasaṃvedyaviṣayā
analyzed: madhyam bhavati anyathā kariṣyamāṇasya pīta rāgasya karaṇa asambhavāt nanu pūrva saṃvedya viṣayā

original: saṃvit pūrvam eva kṣīṇā / uttarasaṃvedyaviṣayā tu navīnā jātā / tathā ca madhyaṃ
analyzed: saṃvid pūrvam eva kṣīṇā uttara saṃvedya viṣayā tu navīnā jātā tathā ca madhyam

original: nāma śūnyam evāstīti / kiṃ śūnyarūpa evātmāstīti cet / na / uttarasaṃvedyagrahaṇakāle
analyzed: nāma śūnyam eva asti iti kim śūnya rūpaḥ eva ātmā asti iti ced na uttara saṃvedya grahaṇa kāle

original: pūrvasaṃvedyasmṛtyanupapatteḥ / na hi pūrvasaṃvedyagrahaṇakālasthāṃ madhye śuddharūpatayā
analyzed: pūrva saṃvedya smṛti anupapatteḥ na hi pūrva saṃvedya grahaṇa kāla sthām madhye śuddha rūpa tayā

original: sthitāṃ uttarasaṃvedyagrahaṇakāle 'pi sthitām ekāṃ saṃvidam antareṇa pūrvasaṃvedyaviṣayā
analyzed: sthitām uttara saṃvedya grahaṇa kāle api sthitām ekām saṃvidam antareṇa pūrva saṃvedya viṣayā

original: smṛtiḥ upapadyate / etena saṃvedyoparāgarahitaṃ jāḍyārūṣitaṃ saṃvittattvaṃ paramātmatvenoktam /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ upapadyate etena saṃvedya uparāga rahitam saṃvid tattvam parama ātma tvena uktam

original: atra cābhyāsaṃ kurvatām acirād ayatnenaiva paramātmalābho bhaviṣyaty / asyaiva ca
analyzed: atra ca abhyāsam kurvatām acirāt ayatnena eva paramātma lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati asya eva ca

original: madhyadhāmāveśa iti nāmāstīty alaṃ rahasyodghāṭanena / atra ca sadṛśayoḥ saṃvedyayoḥ
analyzed: madhya dhāma āveśaḥ iti nāma asti iti alam rahasya udghāṭanena atra ca sadṛśayoḥ saṃvedyayoḥ

original: madhyam atidurlabham iti dūram ity uktam //MT_3,7.17 //
analyzed: madhyam ati durlabham iti dūram iti uktam

original: atyantābhāva evāsti saṃsārasya jagatsthiteḥ / yasmin bodhamahāmbhodhau tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.18//
analyzed: atyanta abhāvaḥ evā asti saṃsārasya jagat sthiteḥ  yasmin bodha mahā ambhodhau tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: yasmin bodhamahāmbhodhau bodhākhye mahāsamudre / jagatsthiteḥ jagatsattāsvarūpasya /
analyzed: yasmin bodha mahā ambhodhau bodha ākhye mahā samudre jagat sthiteḥ jagat sattā svarūpasya

original: saṃsārasya / atyantābhāva eva budbudavat traikālikaḥ abhāvaḥ eva / asti / tat paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: saṃsārasya atyanta abhāvaḥ eva budbuda vat traikālikaḥ abhāvaḥ eva asti tat paramātmanaḥ

original: rūpaṃ bhavati / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / mumukṣuḥ sacchāstrādibhiḥ prathamaṃ rajjusarpādidṛṣṭāntena
analyzed: rūpam bhavati ayam bhāvaḥ mumukṣuḥ sat śāstra ādibhiḥ prathamam rajju sarpa ādi dṛṣṭāntena

original: tataḥ kanakakaṭakādidṛṣṭāntena dṛśyasya brahmavyatiriktasattābhāvaṃ niścitya śuddhacittattvaikye
analyzed: tatas kanaka kaṭaka ādi dṛṣṭāntena dṛśyasya brahma vyatirikta sattā bhāvam niścitya śuddha cit tattva aikye

original: jātaniścayaḥ yadā abhyāsabalena sarvatra śuddhacittattvamātram evānubhavati suvarṇakāra
analyzed: jāta niścayaḥ yadā abhyāsa balena sarvatra śuddha cit tattva mātram eva anubhavati suvarṇakāra

original: iva kaṭakādiṣu suvarṇatām tadā tasya jñānam yatsvarūpaṃ bhavati tad eva paramātmasvarūpam
analyzed: iva kaṭaka ādiṣu suvarṇa tām tadā tasya jñānam yat sva rūpam bhavati tat eva paramātma svarūpam

original: iti / nanu jagatpratiyogikaḥ atyantābhāvaḥ na sambhavati / pūrvaṃ bhūtatvāt jagataḥ
analyzed: iti nanu jagat pratiyogikaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ na sambhavati pūrvam bhūta tvāt jagataḥ

original: jagadatyantābhāve niścitasyāpi hi pūrvaṃ jagad bhāsamānam āsīd eveti ced / asat etat /
analyzed: jagat atyanta abhāve niścitasya api hi pūrvam jagat bhāsamānam āsīt eva iti ced asat etat

original: paurvakālikaṃ mithyābhānaṃ hi vastunaḥ uttarakāle niścitaṃ traikālikābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ
analyzed: paurvakālikam mithyā bhānam hi vastunaḥ uttara kāle niścitam traikālika abhāva pratiyogi tvam

original: na nihanti / pūrvaṃ rajjau bhāte sarpe 'pi atyantābhāvapratiyogitvaghātitvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: na nihanti pūrvam rajjau bhāte sarpe api atyanta abhāva pratiyogi tva ghāti tva prasaṅgāt

original: pūrvaṃ sarpatvena bhātāyāṃ rajjau tu sarve sarpasya traikālikātyantābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ
analyzed: pūrvam sarpa tvena bhātāyām rajjau tu sarve sarpasya traikālika atyanta abhāva pratiyogi tvam

original: sphuṭam eva paśyantīti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ //MT_3,7.18 //
analyzed: sphuṭam eva paśyanti iti na kaḥ api virodhaḥ

original: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramo yatra sthito 'py astam alaṃ gataḥ / yad anākāśam ākāśas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.19//
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśya kramaḥ yatra sthitaḥ api astam alam gataḥ yat an ākāśam ākāśaḥ tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: sthitaḥ api pratyakṣaṃ bhāsamāno 'pi / draṣṭṛdṛśyakramaḥ ayaṃ draṣṭā idaṃ dṛśyam
analyzed: sthitaḥ api pratyakṣam bhāsamānaḥ api draṣṭṛ dṛśya kramaḥ ayam draṣṭā idam dṛśyam

original: ity evaṃrūpaḥ kramaḥ / yatra yasmin vastuni / alaṃ atiśayena / samyag iti yāvat /
analyzed: iti evaṃrūpaḥ kramaḥ yatra yasmin vastuni alam atiśayena samyak iti yāvat

original: astaṃ layaṃ / gataḥ bhavati / nanu sthitasya draṣṭṛdṛśyakramasya katham anyasmin
analyzed: astam layam gataḥ bhavati nanu sthitasya draṣṭṛ dṛśya kramasya katham anyasmin

original: layasambhavaḥ / tathā cānena dvāreṇa paramātmasvarūpakathanam ayuktam eveti cen /
na / draṣṭṛdṛśyau tāvat kasyacit sākṣiṇaḥ bhātau bhavataḥ na vā / na cet kathaṃ tarhi
analyzed: na draṣṭṛ dṛśyau tāvat kasyacid sākṣiṇaḥ bhātau bhavataḥ na vā na ced katham tarhi

original: tayoḥ draṣṭṛdṛśyatve sidhyataḥ / yathā tathā tatsiddhau api kathaṃ tayoḥ vyavasthā
analyzed: tayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśya tve sidhyataḥ yathā tathā tad siddhau api katham tayoḥ vyavasthā

original: sidhyati / ayaṃ draṣṭaivedaṃ dṛśyam eveti bhātau cet tarhi tasmin layaḥ tayoḥ sukaraḥ
analyzed: sidhyati ayam draṣṭā eva idam dṛśyam eva iti bhātau ced tarhi tasmin layaḥ tayoḥ sukaraḥ

original: eva / na hi svapnasākṣiṇam atikramya svapnabhāte draṣṭṛdṛśye kenāpi svarūpeṇa yukte
analyzed: eva na hi svapna sākṣiṇam atikramya svapna bhāte draṣṭṛ dṛśye kena api sva rūpeṇa yukte

original: sambhavataḥ iti na kaścid virodhaḥ / tathā yat vastu / anākāśam grāhakaikasvabhāvatvena
analyzed: sambhavataḥ iti na kaścid virodhaḥ tathā yat vastu anākāśam grāhaka eka svabhāva tvena

original: grāhyatvābhāvāt grāhyaikasvarūpākāśavyatiriktam api sat / ākāśaḥ bhavati / vyāpakatvasvacchatvādiguṇaiḥ
analyzed: grāhya tva abhāvāt grāhya eka svarūpa ākāśa vyatiriktam api sat ākāśaḥ bhavati vyāpaka tva svaccha tva ādi guṇaiḥ

original: ākāśaśabdavācyo bhavatīty arthaḥ / tat tad eva vastu / na tu tatsadṛśam anyat kiñcit /
analyzed: ākāśa śabda vācyaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ tat tat eva vastu na tu tad sadṛśam anyat kiñcid

original: paramātmanaḥ rūpaṃ bhavati //MT_3,7.19 //
analyzed: paramātmanaḥ rūpam bhavati

original: aśūnyam iva yac chūnyaṃ yasmiñ śūnye jagat sthitam / sargaughe sati yac chūnyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.20//
analyzed: a śūnyam iva yat śūnyam yasmin śūnye jagat sthitam sarga oghe sati yat śūnyam tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: śūnyam bāhyāntaḥkaraṇāgrāhyatvena na kiñcid rūpaṃ / yat vastu / aśūnyam iva kiñcid
analyzed: śūnyam bāhya antaḥkaraṇa agrāhya tvena na kiñcid rūpam yat vastu a śūnyam iva kiñcid

original: iva / bhavati / anyathā jagadrūpabhramādhiṣṭhānatvāsambhavāt / na hi asad vastu kasyacid
analyzed: iva bhavati anyathā jagat rūpa bhrama adhiṣṭhāna tva asambhavāt na hi asat vastu kasyacid

original: adhiṣṭhānībhavitum arhati / vandhyāputrasyāpi maitrabhramādhiṣṭhānatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānībhavitum arhati vandhyā putrasya api maitra bhrama adhiṣṭhāna tva prasaṅgāt

original: tathā śūnye proktanyāyena śūnyasvarūpe / yasmin / jagat sthitaṃ sattābhāk bhavati /
analyzed: tathā śūnye prokta nyāyena śūnya svarūpe yasmin jagat sthitam sattā bhāj bhavati

original: mṛdīva ghaṭādayaḥ / anyathā jagataḥ kiṃrūpatvaṃ syāt iti bhāvaḥ / tathā sargaughe
analyzed: mṛdi iva ghaṭa ādayaḥ anyathā jagataḥ kiṃrūpa tvam syāt iti bhāvaḥ tathā sarga oghe

original: sṛṣṭisamūhe / sati adhiṣṭheyatayā kāryatayā vā sthitiṃ bhajati sati / yat śūnyam
analyzed: sṛṣṭi samūhe sati adhiṣṭheya tayā kārya tayā vā sthitim bhajati sati yat śūnyam

original: svavyatiriktavasturahitam eva / bhavati / na hi rajjau sarpāvasthānena mṛdi vā ghaṭāvasthānena
analyzed: sva vyatirikta vastu rahitam eva bhavati na hi rajjau sarpa avasthānena mṛdi vā ghaṭa avasthānena

original: svavyatiriktavastuyuktatvaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyate / tat paramātmanaḥ rūpaṃ bhavati //MT_3,7.20 //
analyzed: sva vyatirikta vastu yukta tvam kalpayitum śakyate tat paramātmanaḥ rūpam bhavati

original: yan mahācinmayam api bṛhatpāṣāṇavat sthitam / jaḍaṃ tv ajaḍam evāntas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.21//
analyzed: yat mahā cit mayam api bṛhat pāṣāṇa vat sthitam jaḍam tu ajaḍam eva antar tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: yat yat vastu / mahācinmayam api samastajagatsākṣitānyathānupapattyā mahācitprakāśasvarūpam
analyzed: yat yat vastu mahā cit mayam api samasta jagat sākṣi tā anyathā anupapattyā mahā cit prakāśa svarūpam

original: api sat / bṛhatpāṣāṇavat sthitaṃ bhavati / mahājaḍam iva bhavati / atiśāntatvena
analyzed: api sat bṛhat pāṣāṇa vat sthitam bhavati mahā jaḍam iva bhavati ati śānta tvena

original: svaparāmarśe 'pi svātantryeṇa vimukhatvāt / yat kathambhūtaṃ tu / antaḥ pāramārthike
analyzed: sva parāmarśe api svātantryeṇa vimukha tvāt yat kathaṃbhūtam tu antar pāramārthike

original: svarūpe / ajaḍam eva sat / jaḍaṃ tu jaḍam iva ity arthaḥ / idaṃ viśeṣaṇadvayam yathāsaṅkhyātikrameṇa
analyzed: svarūpe ajaḍam eva sat jaḍam tu jaḍam iva iti arthaḥ idam viśeṣaṇa dvayam yathā saṅkhyā atikrameṇa

original: pūrvārdhoktasyārthasya samarthakatvena jñeyam / tat paramātmanaḥ rūpaṃ bhavati //MT_3,7.21 //
analyzed: pūrva ardha uktasya arthasya samarthaka tvena jñeyam tat paramātmanaḥ rūpam bhavati

original: sabāhyābhyantaraṃ sarvaṃ yena samprāpya saṅgamam / svarūpasattām āpnoti tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.22//
analyzed: sa bāhya abhyantaram sarvam yena samprāpya saṅgamam sva rūpa sattām āpnoti tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: sarvaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ bāhyābhyantaratvena vartamānaṃ samastaṃ jagat / yena sākṣitayā
analyzed: sarvam sa bāhya abhyantaram bāhya abhyantara tvena vartamānam samastam jagat yena sākṣi tayā

original: sthitena yena vastunā / saṅgamaṃ sambandhaṃ / prāpya / yadviṣayatvaṃ prāpyeti yāvat /
analyzed: sthitena yena vastunā saṅgamam sambandham prāpya yad viṣaya tvam prāpya iti yāvat

original: svarūpasattām prātisvikasya rūpasya sattām / prāpnoti / sākṣipratītau sphuraṇaṃ vinā
analyzed: sva rūpa sattām prātisvikasya rūpasya sattām prāpnoti sākṣi pratītau sphuraṇam vinā

original: hi sato 'pi nīlasukhādeḥ sattā asatkalpā eva dṛśyate / tat paramātmanaḥ rūpaṃ bhavati //MT_3,7.22 //
analyzed: hi sataḥ api nīla sukha ādeḥ sattā asat kalpā eva dṛśyate tat paramātmanaḥ rūpam bhavati

original: prakāśasya yathāloko yathā śūnyatvam ambare / tathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ yatra tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,7.23//
analyzed: prakāśasya yathā ālokaḥ yathā śūnya tvam ambare tathā idam saṃsthitam yatra tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: prakāśasya tejasaḥ / yathā ālokaḥ padārthaprākaṭyahetuḥ bhāsvaratākhyo guṇaviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: prakāśasya tejasaḥ yathā ālokaḥ padārtha prākaṭya hetuḥ bhāsvara tā ākhyaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ

original: bhavati / yathā vā śūnyatvam śūnyabhāvaḥ / ambare ākāśe / bhavati / tathā tadvat /
analyzed: bhavati yathā vā śūnya tvam śūnya bhāvaḥ ambare ākāśe bhavati tathā tadvat

original: idam jagat / yatra yasmin adṛśye vastuni / sthitaṃ bhavati / tat paramātmanaḥ rūpaṃ
analyzed: idam jagat yatra yasmin adṛśye vastuni sthitam bhavati tat paramātmanaḥ rūpam

original: bhavati / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / yathā bhāsamānaḥ ālokaḥ svapradhānatvena na kathyate / anyathā
analyzed: bhavati ayam bhāvaḥ yathā bhāsamānaḥ ālokaḥ sva pradhāna tvena na kathyate anyathā

original: prakāśaguṇatvakathanānupapatteḥ / prakāśaś ca vicāryamāṇaḥ anirvācyatām evāvagāhate /
analyzed: prakāśa guṇa tva kathana anupapatteḥ prakāśaḥ ca vicāryamāṇaḥ anirvācya tām eva avagāhate

original: tathā bhāsamānam idaṃ jagat api anirvācye kasmin citsārabhūte pradhāne sthitam iti
analyzed: tathā bhāsamānam idam jagat api anirvācye kasmin cit sāra bhūte pradhāne sthitam iti

original: jñeyam / yasmin tu sthitam asti tad eva paramātmā bhavatīti / nanv etaiḥ anumānagamyasya
analyzed: jñeyam yasmin tu sthitam asti tat eva paramātmā bhavati iti nanu etaiḥ anumāna gamyasya

original: kasyāpi vastunaḥ paramātmatvaṃ sādhitam / tathā cāsau paramātmā kalpita iti jñeyam /
analyzed: kasya api vastunaḥ paramātma tvam sādhitam tathā ca asau paramātmā kalpitaḥ iti jñeyam

original: anumānagamyasya kalpitatvāt / nirvikalpapratyakṣamātragamyasya svalakṣaṇasyaiva paramārthasattvād
analyzed: anumāna gamyasya kalpita tvāt nirvikalpa pratyakṣa mātra gamyasya sva lakṣaṇasya eva paramārtha sattvāt

original: iti ced / asad etat / upadeśyasya pratikṣaṇaṃ madhyāvasthāsu ātmatvena pratyakṣaṃ
analyzed: iti ced asat etat upadeśyasya pratikṣaṇam madhya avasthāsu ātma tvena pratyakṣam

original: sphuraṇaśīlam apy ātmatayā ajñātam paramātmasvarūpaṃ / ciravismṛtapuraḥsthitabāndhavavat
analyzed: sphuraṇa śīlam api ātma tayā ajñātam paramātma svarūpam cira vismṛta puras sthita bāndhava vat

original: tavātmā bhavatīti na ko 'py atra pratibhāvataḥ prati anumānasparśaḥ / apratibhāvatāṃ
analyzed: tava ātmā bhavati iti na kaḥ api atra pratibhāvataḥ prati anumāna sparśaḥ a pratibhāva tām

original: tv atrādhikāra eva nāstīty alaṃ paradoṣaguṇavicāraṇena //MT_3,7.23 //
analyzed: tu atra adhikāraḥ eva na asti iti alam para doṣa guṇa vicāraṇena

original: śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: sarvataḥ paramātmaiṣa kathaṃ nāmābhibudhyate / iyato 'sya jagannāmno dṛśyasyāsambhavaḥ kutaḥ //MU_3,7.24//
analyzed: sarvatas paramātmā eṣa katham nāma abhibudhyate iyataḥ asya jagat nāmnaḥ dṛśyasya asambhavaḥ kutas

original: asmābhiḥ / eṣaḥ jagadvyatiriktasvarūpaḥ / paramātmā / sarvataḥ sarvatra / sarvāsv
analyzed: asmābhiḥ eṣaḥ jagat vyatirikta svarūpaḥ paramātmā sarvatas sarvatra sarvāsu

original: avasthāsv iti yāvat / kathaṃ nāma abhibudhyate / yataḥ iyataḥ bāhyāntaravyāpakasya /
analyzed: avasthāsu iti yāvat katham nāma abhibudhyate yatas iyataḥ bāhya antara vyāpakasya

original: asya dṛśyasya asambhavaḥ kutaḥ syāt / jāgrati hi sthūlaṃ jagat sphurati / svapne
analyzed: asya dṛśyasya asambhavaḥ kutas syāt jāgrati hi sthūlam jagat sphurati svapne

original: svapnajagat / suṣuptau jāḍyam / etābhyaḥ vyatiriktā tu avasthā nāstīti / ayaṃ ca
analyzed: svapna jagat suṣuptau jāḍyam etābhyaḥ vyatiriktā tu avasthā na asti iti ayam ca

original: praśnaḥ sarvadā paramātmamayatvāsādanākāṅkṣiṇā śrīrāmeṇa jāgrati pratikṣaṇaṃ sphuramāṇāḥ
analyzed: praśnaḥ sarvadā paramātma maya tva āsādana ākāṅkṣiṇā śrī rāmeṇa jāgrati pratikṣaṇam sphuramāṇāḥ

original: śuddhaparamātmasvarūpamayyaḥ madhyāvasthāḥ anāśritya kṛtaḥ //MT_3,7.24 //
analyzed: śuddha paramātma svarūpa mayyaḥ madhya avasthāḥ an āśritya kṛtaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: bhramasya jāgatasyāsya jātasyākāśavarṇavat / atyantābhāvasambodho yadi rūḍhibalaṃ bhavet //MU_3,7.25//
analyzed: bhramasya jāgatasya asya jātasya ākāśa varṇa vat  atyanta abhāva sambodhaḥ yadi rūḍhi balam bhavet

original: taj jñātaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhaven nānyena karmaṇā / dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu ṛte nānyā śubhā gatiḥ //MU_3,7.26//
analyzed: tat jñātam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam bhavet na anyena karmaṇā dṛśya atyanta abhāvataḥ tu ṛte nā anyā śubhā gatiḥ

original: ākāśavarṇavat jātasya prādurbhūtasya / asya puraḥsphurataḥ / jagata iti yāvat / atyantābhāvasambodhaḥ
analyzed: ākāśa varṇa vat jātasya prādurbhūtasya asya puras sphurataḥ jagataḥ iti yāvat atyanta abhāva sambodhaḥ

original: atyantābhāvajñānam / na tu nāśanākhyaḥ / rūḍhi siddhiyuktaṃ / balaṃ yatra / tat /
analyzed: atyanta abhāva jñānam na tu nāśana ākhyaḥ rūḍhi siddhi yuktam balam yatra tat

original: tādṛśaṃ / bhavet yadi syāt / tat tadā / brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ / rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ /
analyzed: tādṛśam bhavet yadi syāt tat tadā brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ rūpam svarūpam

original: jñātaṃ bhavet / anyena karmaṇā etadvyatiriktena tapaḥprabhṛtinā / na bhavet / yataḥ
analyzed: jñātam bhavet anyena karmaṇā etad vyatiriktena tapaḥ prabhṛtinā na bhavet yatas

original: dṛśyātyantābhāvataḥ ṛte dṛśyātyantābhāvād ṛte / anyā śubhā gatiḥ śubhaḥ upāyaḥ /
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāvataḥ ṛte dṛśya atyanta abhāvāt ṛte anyā śubhā gatiḥ śubhaḥ upāyaḥ

original: na bhavati / dṛśyātyantābhāvaś ca jñānadvāreṇaiva sidhyati / prayatnasādhitasya abhāvasya
analyzed: na bhavati dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ ca jñāna dvāreṇa eva sidhyati prayatna sādhitasya abhāvasya

original: pradhvaṃsābhāvatvād iti śuktau rajatātyantābhāvavat mṛdi ghaṭātyantābhāvavad vātyantābhāvasambodhasyopāyatvakathanam //MT_3,7.25-26 //
analyzed: pradhvaṃsa abhāva tvāt iti śuktau rajata atyanta abhāva vat mṛdi ghaṭa atyanta abhāva vat vā atyanta abhāva sambodhasya upāya tva kathanam

original: nanu samyagjñānadvāreṇa siddhasya dṛśyatvarūpajagadatyantābhāvasyaiva kathaṃ paramātmaprāptau upāyatvam astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu samyak jñāna dvāreṇa siddhasya dṛśya tva rūpa jagat atyanta abhāvasya eva katham paramātma prāptau upāyatvam asti iti atra āha

original: atyantābhāvasampattau dṛśyasyāsya yathāsthiteḥ / śiṣyate paramārtho 'sau budhyate jñāyate tataḥ //MU_3,7.27//
analyzed: atyanta abhāva sampattau dṛśyasya asya yathā sthiteḥ  śiṣyate paramārthaḥ asau budhyate jñāyate tatas

original: yathāsthiteḥ evam eva vartamānasya / na tu prayatnanāśitasya / asya dṛśyasya jagadrūpasya
analyzed: yathā sthiteḥ evam eva vartamānasya na tu prayatna nāśitasya asya dṛśyasya jagat rūpasya

original: dṛśyasya / atyantābhāvasampattau atyantābhāvasya sampattau / śuktau bhātarajatātyantābhāvavat
analyzed: dṛśyasya atyanta abhāva sampattau atyanta abhāvasya sampattau śuktau bhāta rajata atyanta abhāva vat

original: mṛdi bhātaghaṭātyantābhāvavad vā siddhau satyāṃ / asau paramārthaḥ dṛśyādhiṣṭhānabhūtaḥ
analyzed: mṛdi bhāta ghaṭa atyanta abhāva vat vā siddhau satyām asau paramārthaḥ dṛśya adhiṣṭhāna bhūtaḥ

original: dṛśyasārabhūtaḥ vā asau paramātmā / śiṣyate śeṣatvena sthito bhavati / rajatātyantābhāvajñāne
analyzed: dṛśya sāra bhūtaḥ vā asau paramātmā śiṣyate śeṣa tvena sthitaḥ bhavati rajata atyanta abhāva jñāne

original: iva śuktiḥ ghaṭātyantābhāvajñāne iva vā mṛt / tadvyatirekeṇānyasya kasyāpy asattvāt
analyzed: iva śuktiḥ ghaṭa atyanta abhāva jñāne iva vā mṛd tad vyatirekeṇa anyasya kasya api asattvāt

original: tataḥ puruṣeṇāsau budhyate / astīti parokṣapratītyā niścīyate / tataḥ tadanantaram /
analyzed: tatas puruṣeṇa asau budhyate asti iti parokṣa pratītyā niścīyate tatas tad anantaram

original: jñāyate / aham ity aparokṣapratītyā niścīyate //MT_3,7.27 //
analyzed: jñāyate aham iti aparokṣa pratītyā niścīyate

original: nanu jñānopāyikaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvo mā sidhyatu prāṇarodhanādyupāyajālasādhitayā vismṛtyā eva paramātmajñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jñāna upāyikaḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ mā sidhyatu prāṇa rodhana ādi upāya jāla sādhitayā vismṛtyā eva paramātma jñānam bhaviṣyati iti atra āha

original: na cid apratibimbāsti dṛśyābhāvād ṛte kvacit / kva vinā pratibimbena kilādarśo 'vatiṣṭhate //MU_3,7.28//
analyzed: na cit a pratibimbā asti dṛśya abhāvāt ṛte kvacid kva vinā pratibimbena kila ādarśaḥ avatiṣṭhate

original: cit sākṣibhāvena sthitam cittattvam / dṛśyābhāvād ṛte svasākṣibhāvasiddhāt dṛśyābhāvāt
analyzed: cit sākṣi bhāvena sthitam cit tattvam dṛśya abhāvāt ṛte sva sākṣi bhāva siddhāt dṛśya abhāvāt

original: ṛte / apratibimbā dṛśyapratibimbarahitā / dṛśyasākṣitām akurvatīti yāvat / kvacin
analyzed: ṛte apratibimbā dṛśya pratibimba rahitā dṛśya sākṣi tām akurvatī iti yāvat kvacid

original: na bhavati / svabhāvatyāgaprasaṅgāt / atra samarthakaṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati / kva
analyzed: na bhavati svabhāva tyāga prasaṅgāt atra samarthakam dṛṣṭāntam kathayati kva

original: vineti / na hi bimbasattāyāṃ pratibimbarahitaḥ ādarśaḥ dṛśyate iti bhāvaḥ / nanv
analyzed: vinā iti na hi bimba sattāyām pratibimba rahitaḥ ādarśaḥ dṛśyate iti bhāvaḥ nanu

original: anyadeśasthe bimbe sattāṃ bhajaty api ādarśaḥ pratibimbarahitaḥ dṛśyate / tathā bahiḥ
analyzed: anya deśa sthe bimbe sattām bhajati api ādarśaḥ pratibimba rahitaḥ dṛśyate tathā bahis

original: dṛśyasattā bhavatu / prāṇarodhādidvāreṇa bahiḥ aprasarantī cit dṛśyasparśarahitā
analyzed: dṛśya sattā bhavatu prāṇa rodha ādi dvāreṇa bahis a prasarantī cit dṛśya sparśa rahitā

original: bhaviṣyatīti cet / asad etat / atyantābhāvajñānaṃ vinā dṛśyabījasya nāśayitum aśakyatvāt /
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti ced asat etat atyanta abhāva jñānam vinā dṛśya bījasya nāśayitum aśakya tvāt

original: anyathā nidritasyāntaḥ svapnaprapañcabhānaṃ na syāt / nanu tasya prāṇarodhādyupāyarāhityāt
analyzed: anyathā nidritasya antar svapna prapañca bhānam na syāt nanu tasya prāṇa rodha ādi upāya rāhityāt

original: svapnapratibhānam astīti cet / tarhi dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānahīnān kapaṭarahitān prāṇarodhādikāriṇaḥ
analyzed: svapna pratibhānam asti iti ced tarhi dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāna hīnān kapaṭa rahitān prāṇa rodha ādi kāriṇaḥ

original: eva pṛccha / kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ svapnapratibhānam asti na veti / nanu kapaṭarahitāḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānayuktā
analyzed: eva pṛccha kim yuṣmākam svapna pratibhānam asti na vā iti nanu kapaṭa rahitāḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāna yuktā

original: api asmābhiḥ pṛṣṭā eva / tair api svasya svapnapradarśakatvam uktam / ucyatāṃ nāma
analyzed: api asmābhiḥ pṛṣṭāḥ eva taiḥ api svasya svapna pradarśaka tvam uktam ucyatām nāma

original: kā hāniḥ / yathā jāgrati bhāsata eva jagataḥ atyantābhāvajñānaṃ teṣām asti tathā
analyzed: kā hāniḥ yathā jāgrati bhāsate eva jagataḥ atyanta abhāva jñānam teṣām asti tathā

original: svapne 'pi / na hi te bhāsamānam eva dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatayā paśyanti / kiṃ tu brahmatayety
analyzed: svapne api na hi te bhāsamānam eva dṛśyam dṛśya tayā paśyanti kim tu brahma tayā iti

original: alaṃ prapañcena //MT_3,7.28 //
analyzed: alam prapañcena

original: nanu tathāpi dṛśyātyantābhāvena vinaivātmatattvaṃ paśyāma ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api dṛśya atyanta abhāvena vinā eva ātma tattvam paśyāmaḥ iti atra āha

original: jagannāmno 'sya dṛśyasya sattāsambhavanaṃ vinā / budhyate paramaṃ tattvaṃ na kadācana kenacit //MU_3,7.29//
analyzed: jagat nāmnaḥ asya dṛśyasya sattā sambhavanam vinā budhyate paramam tattvam na kadācana kenacid

original: asya puraḥsphurataḥ / jagannāmnaḥ jagad iti nāmadheyayuktasya / dṛśyasya dṛśikriyāviṣayasya
analyzed: asya puras sphurataḥ jagat nāmnaḥ jagat iti nāmadheya yuktasya dṛśyasya dṛśi kriyā viṣayasya

original: bhāvajātasya / sattāsambhavanaṃ vinā atyantābhāvaṃ vinā / kenacit puruṣeṇa / kadācit /
analyzed: bhāva jātasya sattā sambhavanam vinā atyanta abhāvam vinā kenacid puruṣeṇa kadācid

original: paramaṃ tattvam paramātmākhyaṃ tattvam / na budhyate na jñāyate / tasmāt dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ
analyzed: paramam tattvam paramātma ākhyam tattvam na budhyate na jñāyate tasmāt dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ

original: samyagjñānopāyena sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,7.29 //
analyzed: samyak jñāna upāyena sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛśyāsattāyāṃ sandihānaḥ śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: dṛśya asattāyām sandihānaḥ śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: iyato dṛśyajālasya brahmāṇḍasya jagatsthiteḥ / mune katham asattāsti kva meruḥ sarṣapodare //MU_3,7.30//
analyzed: iyataḥ dṛśya jālasya brahmāṇḍasya jagat sthiteḥ mune katham asattā asti kva meruḥ sarṣapa udare

original: vaipulyakathanam / yathā meruḥ sarṣapodare astīti kenacid ukte sati / tasmin asambhavārthapratipādakatvam
analyzed: vaipulya kathanam yathā meruḥ sarṣapa udare asti iti kenacid ukte sati tasmin asambhava artha pratipādaka tvam

original: eva viśrāmyati / tathā jagataḥ sattā nāstīti pratipādake tvayy apīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,7.30 //
analyzed: eva viśrāmyati tathā jagataḥ sattā na asti iti pratipādake tvayi api iti bhāvaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasy akhinnadhīḥ / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparamas tad aham kṣaṇāt //MU_3,7.31//
analyzed: dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasi a khinna dhīḥ sādhu saṅgama sat śāstra paramaḥ tat aham kṣaṇāt

original: pramārjayāmi te dṛśyaṃ bodho mṛgajalaṃ yathā / dṛśyābhāve draṣṭṛtā ca śāmyed bodho 'vaśiṣyate //MU_3,7.32//
analyzed: pramārjayāmi te dṛśyam bodhaḥ mṛga jalam yathā dṛśya abhāve draṣṭṛ tā ca śāmyet bodhaḥ avaśiṣyate

original: he rāma / tvaṃ / cet yadi katicit dināni kiyanti dināni / akhinnadhīḥ anudvignamatiḥ
analyzed: he rāma tvam ced yadi katicid dināni kiyanti dināni akhinna dhīḥ anudvigna matiḥ

original: san / saṃmukhadhīḥ sann iti yāvat / sādhusaṅgamasacchāstraparamaḥ tiṣṭhasi / tat
analyzed: san saṃmukha dhīḥ san iti yāvat sādhu saṅgama sat śāstra paramaḥ tiṣṭhasi tat

original: tadā / ahaṃ kṣaṇāt te tava / tvāṃ pratīti yāvat / dṛśyam dṛśyarūpaṃ jagat / pramārjayāmi
analyzed: tadā aham kṣaṇāt te tava tvām prati iti yāvat dṛśyam dṛśya rūpam jagat pramārjayāmi

original: nāśayāmi / jñānadvāreṇātyantābhāvayuktatvaṃ sampādayāmīti yāvat / kaḥ yathā / bodho
analyzed: nāśayāmi jñāna dvāreṇa atyanta abhāva yuktatvam sampādayāmi iti yāvat kaḥ yathā bodho

original: yathā / yathā bodhaḥ samyagjñānam / mṛgatṛṣṇājalaṃ pramārjayati / tathety arthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā bodhaḥ samyak jñānam mṛgatṛṣṇā jalam pramārjayati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: anena sādhusaṅgādeḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānaṃ prati mukhyam upāyatvam uktam / nanu dṛśyamārjanena
analyzed: anena sādhu saṅga ādeḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñānam prati mukhyam upāya tvam uktam nanu dṛśya mārjanena

original: kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha dṛśyābhāve iti / dṛśyābhāve jñānadvāreṇa dṛśyābhāve siddhe
analyzed: kim setsyati iti atra āha dṛśya abhāve iti dṛśya abhāve jñāna dvāreṇa dṛśya abhāve siddhe

original: sati / draṣṭṛtā ca śāmyet layaṃ vrajet / nanu tarhi abhāva eva śiṣyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: sati draṣṭṛ tā ca śāmyet layam vrajet nanu tarhi abhāvaḥ eva śiṣyate iti atra āha

original: bodha iti / bodhaḥ dṛśyadraṣṭratyantābhāvasākṣibhūtaṃ śuddhacittattvaṃ / śiṣyate
analyzed: bodhaḥ iti bodhaḥ dṛśya draṣṭṛ atyanta abhāva sākṣi bhūtam śuddha cit tattvam śiṣyate

original: avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati / anyathā siddhasyāpi dṛśyātyantābhāvasya asatkalpatvaṃ syāt //MT_3,7.31-32 //
analyzed: avaśiṣṭam bhavati anyathā siddhasya api dṛśya atyanta abhāvasya asat kalpa tvam syāt

original: nanu kathaṃ dṛśyamātrātyantābhāvenaiva draṣṭṛtā śāntiṃ vrajatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham dṛśya mātra atyanta abhāvena eva draṣṭṛ tā śāntim vrajati iti atra āha

original: draṣṭṛtvaṃ sati dṛśye 'smin dṛśyatvaṃ saty avekṣake / ekatvaṃ sati hi dvitve dvitvaṃ caikatvavedane //MU_3,7.33//
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam sati dṛśye asmin dṛśya tvam sati avekṣake eka tvam sati hi dvi tve dvi tvam ca eka tva vedane

original: asmin puraḥsphuraṇaśīle / dṛśye dṛśikriyāviṣaye bhāvajāte / sati sattāṃ bhajati sati /
analyzed: asmin puras sphuraṇa śīle dṛśye dṛśi kriyā viṣaye bhāva jāte sati sattām bhajati sati

original: draṣṭṛtvam paramārthataḥ śuddhacinmātrasvarūpadraṣṭṛviṣayaḥ draṣṭṛbhāvaḥ syāt / viṣayasadbhāvena
dṛśikriyāṃ prati kartṛtvasambhavāt / taṇḍulādiṣu hi satsu tadviṣayāṃ pākakriyāṃ prati
analyzed: dṛśi kriyām prati kartṛ tva sambhavāt taṇḍula ādiṣu hi satsu tad viṣayām pāka kriyām prati

original: kartṛtvaṃ bhajataḥ puruṣasyaiva pācakatvaṃ bhavati / na kevalaṃ dṛśyasattayā draṣṭuḥ
analyzed: kartṛ tvam bhajataḥ puruṣasya eva pācaka tvam bhavati na kevalam dṛśya sattayā draṣṭuḥ

original: eva draṣṭṛtā bhavati / api tu draṣṭṛsattayāpi dṛśyasya dṛśyatvam astīty abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: eva draṣṭṛ tā bhavati api tu draṣṭṛ sattayā api dṛśyasya dṛśya tvam asti iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: dṛśyatvam iti / avekṣake prekṣake / draṣṭarīti yāvat / sati sattām bhajati sati /
analyzed: dṛśya tvam iti avekṣake prekṣake draṣṭari iti yāvat sati sattām bhajati sati

original: dṛśyatvam paramārthataḥ śuddhacinmātrasvarūpadṛśyāśrayaḥ dṛśyabhāvaḥ syāt / na hi
analyzed: dṛśya tvam paramārthataḥ śuddha cit mātra svarūpa dṛśya āśrayaḥ dṛśya bhāvaḥ syāt na hi

original: pācakena pākakriyāviṣayīkṛtaṃ taṇḍulādikam odanāvasthādyaparaparyāyaṃ pācyabhāvam
analyzed: pācakena pāka kriyā viṣayīkṛtam taṇḍula ādikam odana avasthā ādi apara paryāyam pāci abhāvam

original: avalambate / ataḥ anyo'nyāpekṣatvena dṛśyamātrātyantābhāvena draṣṭṛviṣayā draṣṭṛtā
analyzed: avalambate atas anyaḥ anya apekṣa tvena dṛśya mātra atyanta abhāvena draṣṭṛ viṣayā draṣṭṛ tā

original: naśyaty eveti bhāvaḥ / draṣṭṛtvadṛśyatvānyo'nyāśrayakathanaprasaṅgena tayoḥ ekatvadvitvayor
analyzed: naśyati eva iti bhāvaḥ draṣṭṛ tva dṛśya tva anyaḥ anya āśraya kathana prasaṅgena tayoḥ ekatva dvitvayoḥ

original: api anyo'nyāśrayaṃ kathayati ekatvam iti / ekatvam mukhyatayā pūrvaṃ gaṇanārhe draṣṭari
analyzed: api anyaḥ anya āśrayam kathayati ekatvam iti ekatvam mukhya tayā pūrvam gaṇanā arhe draṣṭari

original: gatam ekatvam / dvitve avaratayā paścād gaṇanārhadṛśyagate dvitve / sati sattāṃ bhajati
analyzed: gatam eka tvam dvi tve avara tayā paścāt gaṇanā arha dṛśya gate dvi tve sati sattām bhajati

original: sati / syāt / dvitvābhāve gaṇanasyaiva apravṛtteḥ / gaṇanaṃ hi dvitvādikaṃ vīkṣyaiva
analyzed: sati syāt dvi tva abhāve gaṇanasya eva apravṛtteḥ gaṇanam hi dvi tva ādikam vīkṣya eva

original: vyavasthātuṃ pravartate / dvitvādyabhāve tu kimarthaṃ tasya pravartanaṃ syāt / vyavasthāyāḥ
analyzed: vyavasthātum pravartate dvi tva ādi abhāve tu kimartham tasya pravartanam syāt vyavasthāyāḥ

original: svayaṃ vṛttau ca tatprathamāvayavabhūtasya ekatvasya sphuṭā evāsiddhiḥ / tathā dvitvam
analyzed: svayam vṛttau ca tad prathama avayava bhūtasya eka tvasya sphuṭā evā asiddhiḥ tathā dvi tvam

original: dṛśyagataṃ dvitvam / ekatvavedane ekatvākāre vedane / draṣṭṛgate ekatve iti yāvat /
analyzed: dṛśya gatam dvi tvam ekatva vedane ekatva ākāre vedane draṣṭṛ gate ekatve iti yāvat

original: sati / syāt / ekaṃ vigaṇayyaiva dvitīyo gaṇanaviṣayatāṃ yātīti sphuṭā eva hi ekatvaṃ
analyzed: sati syāt ekam vigaṇayya eva dvitīyaḥ gaṇana viṣaya tām yāti iti sphuṭā eva hi eka tvam

original: vinā dvitvasya anupapattiḥ //MT_3,7.33 //
analyzed: vinā dvi tvasya anupapattiḥ

original: phalitaṃ kathayati
analyzed: phalitam kathayati

original: ekābhāve dvayor eva siddhir bhavati nātra hi / dvitvaikyadraṣṭṛdṛśyatvakṣaye sad avaśiṣyate //MU_3,7.34//
analyzed: eka abhāve dvayoḥ eva siddhiḥ bhavati na atra hi dvi tva aikya draṣṭṛ dṛśya tva kṣaye sat avaśiṣyate

original: hi niścaye / ataḥ atra anayoḥ ekatvadvitvayoḥ madhye / ekābhāve ekasya dvitvasya
analyzed: hi niścaye atas atra anayoḥ ekatva dvitvayoḥ madhye eka abhāve ekasya dvitvasya

original: vā abhāve sati / dvayoḥ eva ubhayoḥ dvitvaikatvayoḥ eva / siddhiḥ na bhavati / nanu
analyzed: vā abhāve sati dvayoḥ eva ubhayoḥ dvitva ekatvayoḥ eva siddhiḥ na bhavati nanu

original: tataḥ kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha dvitvaikyeti / dvitvaikyayoḥ draṣṭṛdṛśyayoś ca kṣayaḥ
analyzed: tatas kim setsyati iti atra āha dvi tva aikya iti dvi tva aikyayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ ca kṣayaḥ

original: dvitvaikyadraṣṭṛdṛśyakṣayaḥ / tasmin sati sat dvitvādisākṣitvena sthitaṃ sadākhyaṃ
analyzed: dvi tva aikya draṣṭṛ dṛśya kṣayaḥ tasmin sati sat dvi tva ādi sākṣi tvena sthitam sat ākhyam

original: vastu / avaśiṣyate avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati //MT_3,7.34 //
analyzed: vastu avaśiṣyate avaśiṣṭam bhavati

original: vyavahitaṃ dṛśyapramārjanapratijñāṃ punar api karoti
analyzed: vyavahitam dṛśya pramārjana pratijñām punar api karoti

original: ahantādi jagad dṛśyaṃ sarvaṃ te mārjayāmy aham / atyantāsattvasaṃvittyā manomakurato malam //MU_3,7.35//
aham / ahantādi ahambhāvapramukham / malaṃ malabhūtaṃ / sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagat / te
analyzed: aham ahantā ādi ahambhāva pramukham malam mala bhūtam sarvam dṛśyam jagat te

original: manomakurataḥ tvanmanodarpaṇāt / atyantāsattvasaṃvittyā atyantābhāvajñānena / dṛśyaviṣayātyantābhāvajñānotpādaneneti
analyzed: manaḥ makurataḥ tvad manaḥ darpaṇāt atyanta asattva saṃvittyā atyanta abhāva jñānena dṛśya viṣaya atyanta abhāva jñāna utpādanena iti

original: yāvat / pramārjayāmi / yuktaṃ ca makurāt malāpamārjanam //MT_3,7.35 //
analyzed: yāvat pramārjayāmi yuktam ca makurāt mala apamārjanam

original: nanv etāvataḥ dṛśyasya pramārjanaṃ kathaṃ kartuṃ śaknoṣīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etāvataḥ dṛśyasya pramārjanam katham kartum śaknoṣi iti atra āha

original: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ / / yat tu nāsti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśas tatpramārjane //MU_3,7.36//
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ   yat tu nā asti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśaḥ tad pramārjane

original: asataḥ sattākartṛtvam abhajataḥ / bhāvaḥ sattā / na vidyate / śaśaśṛṅgasyāpi sattāpatteḥ /
analyzed: asataḥ sattā kartṛ tvam abhajataḥ bhāvaḥ sattā na vidyate śaśa śṛṅgasya api sattā āpatteḥ

original: sataḥ sattākartṛtvaṃ bhajataḥ / abhāvaḥ asattā / na vidyate / svarūpahāniprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: sataḥ sattā kartṛ tvam bhajataḥ abhāvaḥ asattā na vidyate svarūpa hāni prasaṅgāt

original: na ca svarūpahāniḥ yuktā / agner api agnitvahāniprasaṅgāt / yat svarūpeṇa nāsti /
analyzed: na ca sva rūpa hāniḥ yuktā agneḥ api agni tva hāni prasaṅgāt yat sva rūpeṇa na asti

original: tatpramārjane kaḥ kleśaḥ bhavati / na hi śaśiśṛṅgatroṭane kasyāpi yatnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ //MT_3,7.36 //
analyzed: tad pramārjane kaḥ kleśaḥ bhavati na hi śaśi śṛṅga troṭane kasya api yatnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: nanu tathāpi pravartane kim āyātam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api pravartane kim āyātam iti atra āha

original: jagad ādāv anutpannam yac cedaṃ dṛśyate tatam / tat svātmany eva vimale brahma cittvāt svabṛṃhitam //MU_3,7.37//
analyzed: jagat ādau anutpannam yat ca idam dṛśyate tatam tat sva ātmani eva vimale brahma cit tvāt sva bṛṃhitam

original: jagat ādau prathamaṃ eva / anutpannaṃ bhavati / ataḥ jagatpramārjane kleśo nāstīti
analyzed: jagant ādau prathamam eva anutpannam bhavati atas jagat pramārjane kleśaḥ na asti iti

original: bhāvaḥ / nanu yadi jagat prathamam evānutpannaṃ bhavati tarhi kim idaṃ bhāsata ity /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ nanu yadi jagat prathamam eva anutpannam bhavati tarhi kim idam bhāsate iti

original: atrāha yac cedam iti / yac cedam yac caitat / tatam vistāritasvarūpaṃ kiñcit dṛśyate /
analyzed: atra āha yat ca idam iti yat ca idam yat ca etat tatam vistārita svarūpam kiñcid dṛśyate

original: tat brahma eva brahmākhyaṃ vastu eva / vimale svātmani śuddhacinmātrasvarūpāyāṃ svabhittau /
analyzed: tat brahma eva brahma ākhyam vastu eva vimale sva ātmani śuddha cit mātra svarūpāyām sva bhittau

original: cittvāt svabṛṃhitaṃ atiśayena bṛṃhāgataṃ bhavati / anyathā brahmatvāyogāt / bṛṃhāyuktam
analyzed: cit tvāt sva bṛṃhitam atiśayena bṛṃhā gatam bhavati anyathā brahmatva ayogāt bṛṃhā yuktam

original: eva hi brahmocyate / na ca vastuni bṛṃhaṇaṃ nāmānyavastunaḥ utpattiḥ vaktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: eva hi brahma ucyate na ca vastuni bṛṃhaṇam nāma anya vastunaḥ utpattiḥ vaktum śakyate

original: jale 'pi dravatvāt prādurbhūtasya taraṅgatayā bṛṃhaṇasyānyavastūtpattitvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: jale api drava tvāt prādurbhūtasya taraṅgatayā bṛṃhaṇasya anya vastu utpatti tva prasaṅgāt

original: na ca mūrkho 'pi jale taraṅgānām anyatvam aṅgīkaroti / cidrūpasyātmana eva svapnapadārthabhāvena
analyzed: na ca mūrkhaḥ api jale taraṅgānām anya tvam aṅgīkaroti cit rūpasya ātmanaḥ eva svapna padārtha bhāvena

original: bṛṃhaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cittvād ity uktam //MT_3,7.37 //
analyzed: bṛṃhaṇam dṛṣṭam iti cit tvāt iti uktam

original: punaḥ punar etad eva kathayati
analyzed: punar punar etat eva kathayati

original: jagan nāma na cotpannaṃ na cāsti na ca dṛśyate / hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ kim etanmārjane śramaḥ //MU_3,7.38//
analyzed: jagat nāma na ca utpannam na ca asti na ca dṛśyate hemni iva kaṭaka ādi tvam kim etad mārjane śramaḥ

original: nāma niścaye / jagat na cotpannaṃ bhavati / na ca asti / na ca dṛśyate / brahmaṇa
analyzed: nāma niścaye jagat na ca utpannam bhavati na ca asti na ca dṛśyate brahmaṇa

original: evaitadrūpatayā sthitatvāt / jagat kim iva / kaṭakāditvam iva / yathā hemni bhāsamānaṃ
analyzed: eva etad rūpa tayā sthita tvāt jagat kim iva kaṭaka ādi tvam iva yathā hemni bhāsamānam

original: kaṭakāditvaṃ nāsti / hemnaḥ eva tadrūpatayā sthitatvāt / tathā ity arthaḥ / ataḥ
analyzed: kaṭaka ādi tvam na asti hemnaḥ eva tad rūpa tayā sthita tvāt tathā iti arthaḥ atas

original: etatpramārjane śramaḥ kiṃ bhavati / brahmatājñānamātreṇaiva pramārjitatvāt / na hi
analyzed: etad pramārjane śramaḥ kim bhavati brahma tā jñāna mātreṇa eva pramārjita tvāt na hi

original: hemni bhāsamānaṃ kaṭakāditvaṃ aśakyapramārjanaṃ bhavati / hematājñānamātreṇaiva tasya
analyzed: hemni bhāsamānam kaṭaka ādi tvam aśakya pramārjanam bhavati hema tā jñāna mātreṇa eva tasya

original: pramārjitatvāt //MT_3,7.38 //
analyzed: pramārjita tvāt

original: etāvata āśvāsarahitaṃ śiṣyaṃ jñātvā tasya samāśvāsanaṃ karoti
analyzed: etāvataḥ āśvāsa rahitam śiṣyam jñātvā tasya samāśvāsanam karoti

original: tathaitad vistareṇeha vakṣyāmo bahuyuktibhiḥ / abādhitaṃ yathā nūnaṃ svayam evānubhūyate //MU_3,7.39//
analyzed: tathā etat vistareṇa iha vakṣyāmaḥ bahu yuktibhiḥ abādhitam yathā nūnam svayam evā anubhūyate

original: vayam / etat pūrvoktaṃ vastu / vistareṇa bahuyuktibhiḥ tathā ihāsmin śāstre / vakṣyāmaḥ / nūnaṃ niścaye / yathā tvayā etat abādhitaṃ svayam  #
analyzed: vayam etat pūrva uktam vastu vistareṇa bahu yuktibhiḥ tathā iha asmin śāstre vakṣyāmaḥ nūnam niścaye yathā tvayā etat abādhitam svayam

original: evānubhūyate //MT_3,7.39//
analyzed: eva anubhūyate

original: prakṛtam eva kathayati
analyzed: prakṛtam eva kathayati

original: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ yat tasyehāstitā kutaḥ / kuto marau jalasarid dvitīyendau kuto grahaḥ //MU_3,7.40//
analyzed: ādau eva hi na utpannam yat tasya iha astitā kutas kutas marau jala sarit dvitīya indau kutas grahaḥ

original: hi niścaye / yat vastu / ādāv eva utpannaṃ na bhavati / tasyehāstitā sattvam / kutaḥ bhavati / atra dṛṣṭāntadvayam kathayati kuta ityādi //MT_3,7.40//
analyzed: hi niścaye yat vastu ādau eva utpannam na bhavati tasya iha astitā sattvam kutas bhavati atra dṛṣṭānta dvayam kathayati kutas ityādi

original: yathā vandhyāsuto nāsti yathā nāsti marau jalam / yathā nāsti nabhovṛkṣas tathā nāsti jagadbhramaḥ //MU_3,7.41//
analyzed: yathā vandhyā sutaḥ nā asti yathā nā asti marau jalam yathā nā asti nabhaḥ vṛkṣaḥ tathā nā asti jagat bhramaḥ

original: jagadbhramaḥ jagadrūpaḥ bhramaḥ / jagad iti yāvat //MT_3,7.41//
tarhi kim idaṃ bhāsate ity / atrāha
analyzed: tarhi kim idam bhāsate iti atra āha

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate rāma tad brahmaiva nirāmayam / etat purastād vakṣyāmo yuktito na giraiva vaḥ //MU_3,7.42//
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate rāma tat brahma eva nirāmayam etat purastāt vakṣyāmaḥ yuktitaḥ na girā eva vaḥ

original: asmābhiḥ yat idaṃ dṛśyate / tat nirāmayam bhāvābhāvākhyāmayarahitam / brahmaiva bhavati /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ yat idam dṛśyate tat nirāmayam bhāva abhāva ākhya āmaya rahitam brahma eva bhavati

original: vayam / etat purastāt agre / yuktitaḥ yuktibhiḥ / vaḥ yuṣmākam / vakṣyāmaḥ / na girā
analyzed: vayam etat purastāt agre yuktitaḥ yuktibhiḥ vaḥ yuṣmākam vakṣyāmaḥ na girā

original: eva vakṣyāmaḥ / sārvavibhaktikas tasil //MT_3,7.42 //
analyzed: eva vakṣyāmaḥ sārvavibhaktikaḥ tasil

original: sargāntaślokena yuktiyuktavākyopekṣāṃ tyājyatvena kathayati
analyzed: sarga anta ślokena yukti yukta vākya upekṣām tyājya tvena kathayati

original: yan nāma yuktibhir iha pravadanti tajjñās tatrāvahelanam ayuktam udārabuddheḥ / / yo yuktiyuktam avamatya vimūḍhabuddhyā kaṣṭāvaho bhavati  #
analyzed: yat nāma yuktibhiḥ iha pravadanti tad jñāḥ tatra avahelanam ayuktam udāra buddheḥ   yaḥ yukti yuktam avamatya vimūḍha buddhyā kaṣṭa āvahaḥ bhavati  /

original: taṃ vidur ajñam eva //MU_3,7.43//
analyzed: tam viduḥ ajñam eva

original: nāma niścaye / avahelanam upekṣā / kaṣṭāvahaḥ kaṣṭadāyī / asambhavaprayatnair ātmana iti śeṣaḥ / iti śivam //MT_3,7.43//
analyzed: nāma niścaye avahelanam upekṣā kaṣṭa āvahaḥ kaṣṭa dāyī asambhava prayatnaiḥ ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ // 3,7 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati / nyāye 'nubhūta etasmin na jñeyam avaśiṣyate //MU_3,8.1//
analyzed: kayā etat jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati nyāye anubhūte etasmin na jñeyam avaśiṣyate

original: etat dṛśyāsatyatvam / nanu kimartham atra yuktiṃ pṛcchasīty / atrāha nyāyeti / yataḥ
analyzed: etat dṛśya asatya tvam nanu kimartham atra yuktim pṛcchasi iti atra āha nyāya iti yatas

original: etasmin nyāye / nyāyena anubhūte sati / jñeyam nāvaśiṣyate / yuktiśravaṇena sarvasya
analyzed: etasmin nyāye nyāyena anubhūte sati jñeyam na avaśiṣyate yukti śravaṇena sarvasya

original: jñātatvāt //MT_3,8.1 //
analyzed: jñāta tvāt

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ vistarakathanapratijñāṃ sampādayiṣyann uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ vistara kathana pratijñām sampādayiṣyan uttaram kathayati

original: bahukālam iyaṃ rūḍhā mithyājñānaviṣūcikā / jagannāmnī vicārākhyād ṛte mantrān na śāmyati //MU_3,8.2//
analyzed: bahukālam iyam rūḍhā mithyājñāna viṣūcikā jagat nāmnī vicāra ākhyāt ṛte mantrāt na śāmyati

original: ārūḍhā buddhau satyatayā sphuritā / jagataś ca mithyājñānarūpatvaṃ śuktirajatavaj jñeyam / yuktaś ca viṣūcikāyāḥ mantreṇa nāśaḥ //MT_3,8.2//
analyzed: ārūḍhā buddhau satya tayā sphuritā jagataḥ ca mithyā jñāna rūpa tvam śukti rajata vat jñeyam yuktaḥ ca viṣūcikāyāḥ mantreṇa nāśaḥ

original: vakṣyamāṇopadeśaśravaṇaṃ prati śrīrāmaṃ dṛḍhīkaroti
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa upadeśa śravaṇam prati śrī rāmam dṛḍhīkaroti

analyzed: vadāmi ākhyāyikāḥ rāma yāḥ imāḥ bodha siddhaye tāḥ ced śṛṇoṣi tat sādho muktaḥ evā asi

analyzed: buddhimān ākhyāyikāḥ upadeśa kārīṇi ākhyānāni bodha siddhaye dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāna siddhaye

analyzed: muktaḥ dṛśyena a spṛṣṭaḥ

original: aśravaṇe daṇḍaṃ kathayati
analyzed: a śravaṇe daṇḍam kathayati

original: tvaṃ no cet śṛṇoṣi / atha vā udvegaśīlatvāt ardhād utthāya gacchasi / tat tadā / tiryagdharmiṇaḥ paśutulyasya / te / kiñcid api na setsyati
analyzed: tvam no ced śṛṇoṣi atha vā udvega śīla tvāt ardhāt utthāya gacchasi tat tadā tiryagdharmiṇaḥ paśu tulyasya te kiñcid api na setsyati

original: nanu dṛḍhatayā śravaṇenāpi yadi kiñcin na setsyati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha

original: yaḥ puruṣaḥ / yam artham yat vastu / prārthayate prārthanāviṣayaṃ karoti / tathā
analyzed: yaḥ puruṣaḥ yam artham yat vastu prārthayate prārthanā viṣayam karoti tathā

original: na nivartate //MT_3,8.5 //

original: kṣate naṣṭe sati / jīvanmuktapadam jīvanmuktatāṃ / tyaktvā / adehamuktatvaṃ videhamuktabhāvaṃ /
analyzed: kṣate naṣṭe sati jīvanmukta padam jīvanmukta tām tyaktvā adeha mukta tvam videha mukta bhāvam

original: yāti / ka iva kāṃ tyaktvā / pavana iva spandanām / yathā pavanaḥ spandanām ceṣṭākaraṇam /
analyzed: yāti kaḥ iva kām tyaktvā pavanaḥ iva spandanām yathā pavanaḥ spandanām ceṣṭā karaṇam

original: tyajati / tathety arthaḥ / pavanaḥ spandatām iveti vā pāṭhaḥ //MT_3,9.16 //
analyzed: tyajati tathā iti arthaḥ pavanaḥ spandatām iva iti vā pāṭhaḥ

original: jīvanmuktavat tasyāpi lakṣaṇāni leśataḥ kathayati
analyzed: jīvanmukta vat tasya api lakṣaṇāni leśataḥ kathayati

original: videhamukto nodeti nāstam eti na śāmyati / na san nāsan na dūrasthaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca vetarat //MU_3,9.17//
analyzed: videha muktaḥ na udeti na astam eti na śāmyati na sat na asat na dūra stham na ca aham na ca vā itarat

original: videhamuktaḥ anahambhāvena gṛhītasya dehasyāpy abhāvena videhamuktiṃ gataḥ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: videha muktaḥ anahambhāvena gṛhītasya dehasya api abhāvena videha muktim gataḥ puruṣaḥ

original: na udeti sadoditacinmātrabhāvena avasthānāt / tathā astam na eti / yathā tathā kalpitasya
analyzed: na udeti sadā udita cit mātra bhāvena avasthānāt tathā astam na eti yathā tathā kalpitasya

original: tadastasya tataḥ evotthānāt / anyathāsambhavāt / tathā na śāmyati saṃsārabhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tadastasya tatas eva utthānāt anyathā asambhavāt tathā na śāmyati saṃsāra bhāna abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: na sat bhavati / bāhyāntarakaraṇāgocaratvāt / tathā asat na bhavati / etādṛkprapañcabhāvena
analyzed: na sat bhavati bāhya antara karaṇa agocara tvāt tathā asat na bhavati etādṛś prapañca bhāvena

original: bhānābhāvaprasaṅgāt / na hi śaśaśṛṅgaṃ kenāpi rūpeṇa bhātuṃ śaknoti / tathā dūrasthaṃ
analyzed: bhāna abhāva prasaṅgāt na hi śaśa śṛṅgam kena api rūpeṇa bhātum śaknoti tathā dūra stham

original: na bhavati / sarveṣām ahantāsāratvena sthitatvāt / tathā ahaṃ na bhavati / paricchinnaḥ
analyzed: na bhavati sarveṣām ahantā sāra tvena sthita tvāt tathā aham na bhavati paricchinnaḥ

original: pramātā na bhavati / aparimitapramātṛtvena sthitatvāt / tathā itarat parimitaṃ prameyaṃ /
analyzed: pramātā na bhavati aparimita pramātṛ tvena sthita tvāt tathā itarat parimitam prameyam

original: na bhavati / aparimitaprameyabhāvena sthitatvāt //MT_3,9.17 //
analyzed: na bhavati aparimita prameya bhāvena sthita tvāt

original: viśvottīrṇatām uktvā viśvamayatāṃ leśataḥ kathayati
analyzed: viśva uttīrṇa tām uktvā viśva maya tām leśataḥ kathayati

original: sūryo bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam / rudraḥ sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmajaḥ //MU_3,9.18//
analyzed: sūryaḥ bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam  rudraḥ sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmajaḥ

original: asau śuddhacinmātratāṃ yātaḥ videhamuktaḥ sūryo bhūtvā sūryabhāvam āsādya / pratapati
analyzed: asau śuddha cit mātra tām yātaḥ videha muktaḥ sūryaḥ bhūtvā sūrya bhāvam āsādya pratapati

original: tāpakriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajati / tathā viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā jagattrayaṃ pāti rakṣati / evaṃ
analyzed: tāpa kriyā kartṛ tvam bhajati tathā viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā jagattrayam pāti rakṣati evam

original: sarvatra yojyam / eṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ ca bāhyāntaratvena dvaividhyaṃ jñeyam / bāhye hi
analyzed: sarvatra yojyam eṣām sūrya ādīnām ca bāhya antara tvena dvaividhyam jñeyam bāhye hi

original: sūryaḥ yaḥ vyomni dṛśyate / āntaras tu prāṇaḥ / sūryavat śarīrapākakāritvāt / tathā
analyzed: sūryaḥ yaḥ vyomni dṛśyate āntaraḥ tu prāṇaḥ sūrya vat śarīra pāka kāri tvāt tathā

original: viṣṇuḥ buddhiḥ / tadvat saṅkalpasthitikāritvāt / tathā rudraḥ ahaṅkāraḥ / tadvat
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ buddhiḥ tadvat saṅkalpa sthiti kāri tvāt tathā rudraḥ ahaṅkāraḥ tadvat

original: sarvasaṅkalpānāṃ svasmin layīkaraṇāt / tathā padmajaḥ manaḥ / tadvat saṅkalpotpādakatvāt /
analyzed: sarva saṅkalpānām svasmin layīkaraṇāt tathā padmajaḥ manaḥ tadvat saṅkalpa utpādaka tvāt

original: evaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sarvatra yojyam / nanu kathaṃ videhamuktaḥ sūryādicarācarapadārthabhāvam
analyzed: evam yathāsambhavam sarvatra yojyam nanu katham videha muktaḥ sūrya ādi carācara padārtha bhāvam

original: āgatya tadgatāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karotīti cet / satyam / tatra carāḥ tāvat sphuṭam eva
analyzed: āgatya tad gatāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karoti iti ced satyam tatra carāḥ tāvat sphuṭam eva

original: antaryāmiśuddhacittattvādhiṣṭhitāḥ lakṣyante / anyathā maraṇāvasthāṃ gateṣv api teṣu
analyzed: antaryāmi śuddha cit tattva dhiṣṭhitāḥ lakṣyante anyathā maraṇa avasthām gateṣu api teṣu

original: prāgvat kriyādhāratvaprasaṅgāt / nanu tatkriyāyāṃ prāṇa eva prerakaḥ dṛśyate / niṣprāṇānām
analyzed: prāgvat kriyā dhāra tva prasaṅgāt nanu tad kriyāyām prāṇaḥ eva prerakaḥ dṛśyate niṣprāṇānām

original: acaraśarīrāṇāṃ niṣkriyatvadarśanāt / asad etat / na hi prāṇo nāmātra prerakatve samarthaḥ
analyzed: acara śarīrāṇām niṣkriya tva darśanāt asat etat na hi prāṇaḥ nāma atra preraka tve samarthaḥ

original: kaścic cetana iva lakṣyate / kiṃ tv anyasya kasyāpi svatantrasya cetanasya preraṇayā /
analyzed: kaścid cetanaḥ iva lakṣyate kim tu anyasya kasya api svatantrasya cetanasya preraṇayā

original: devadattapreryamāṇakandukavat nirgamapraveśakārīva dṛśyate iti śuddhasya cinmātrasyaiva
analyzed: devadatta preryamāṇa kanduka vat nirgama praveśa kārī iva dṛśyate iti śuddhasya cit mātrasya eva

original: carāntaryāmitvena caragatakriyākartṛtvaṃ jñāyate / acareṣv api dṛśyamāṇā avasthitikriyā
analyzed: cara antaryāmi tvena cara gata kriyā kartṛ tvam jñāyate acareṣu api dṛśyamāṇā avasthiti kriyā

original: kriyātvāt caragatakriyāvat tatkṛtā eva jñeyā / yataḥ yatra sākṣāc cetanatayā bhāsamānānāṃ
analyzed: kriyā tvāt cara gata kriyā vat tad kṛtā eva jñeyā yatas yatra sākṣāt cetana tayā bhāsamānānām

original: carāṇāṃ svakriyāyām asāmarthyam asti tatra sākṣāj jaḍatvena bhāsamānānāṃ acarāṇāṃ
analyzed: carāṇām sva kriyāyām asāmarthyam asti tatra sākṣāt jaḍa tvena bhāsamānānām acarāṇām

original: kā kathā kriyākāritve / tena yathā adhiṣṭhātṛbhūtena devadattena kvacit sthāpitāḥ
analyzed: kā kathā kriyākāri tve tena yathā adhiṣṭhātṛ bhūtena devadattena kvacid sthāpitāḥ

original: stambhādayaḥ tiṣṭhanti tathā svāntargatena kenāpi tattvena sthāpitāḥ acarāḥ tiṣṭhantīti
analyzed: stambha ādayaḥ tiṣṭhanti tathā sva antargatena kena api tattvena sthāpitāḥ acarāḥ tiṣṭhanti iti

original: jñeyam / tatra devadattasya tebhyaḥ bahiḥsthatā pratyakṣam eva dṛśyate iti na tatra
analyzed: jñeyam tatra devadattasya tebhyaḥ bahiḥsthatā pratyakṣam eva dṛśyate iti na tatra

original: tasya tadantargatatvaṃ kalpyate / atra tu bahiḥ sthūlasya kasyāpy adarśanāt tadantargatatvaṃ
analyzed: tasya tad antargata tvam kalpyate atra tu bahis sthūlasya kasya api adarśanāt tad antargata tvam

original: kalpyate / bahirgatatvam api tasya na virudhyate ity āstām etat / evaṃ ca śuddhacinmātre
analyzed: kalpyate bahis gata tvam api tasya na virudhyate iti āstām etat evam ca śuddha cit mātre

original: paryavasitaṃ sarvakriyākartṛtvaṃ tanmayatāgate tasminn api siddham eva / samudre
analyzed: paryavasitam sarva kriyā kartṛ tvam tad maya tā gate tasmin api siddham eva samudre

original: līnasya jalabindoḥ iva samudraguṇaviśiṣṭatvam / avaśiṣṭaṃ mṛtaśarīram api pakṣākṣiptam
analyzed: līnasya jala bindoḥ iva samudra guṇa viśiṣṭa tvam avaśiṣṭam mṛta śarīram api pakṣa ākṣiptam

original: eva jñeyam / nanu tathāpi videhamuktaḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karotīty etāvanmātram eva siddham /
analyzed: eva jñeyam nanu tathā api videha muktaḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karoti iti etāvat mātram eva siddham

original: na tu sarvaṃ bhūtvety etat siddham / tatra kā vārteti cet / satyam / tatreyaṃ vārtā /
analyzed: na tu sarvam bhūtvā iti etat siddham tatra kā vārtā iti ced satyam tatra iyam vārtā

original: carācarāḥ bhāvāḥ kimmayāḥ iti vicāryamāṇe tatsvarūpaṃ hastagrāhābhāvāt anirvācyatāyām
analyzed: cara acarāḥ bhāvāḥ kimmayāḥ iti vicāryamāṇe tad svarūpam hasta grāha abhāvāt anirvācya tāyām

original: eva viśrāmyati / anirvācyatā eva ca śuddhacittattvasya svarūpam iti śuddhacidrūpatāṃ
analyzed: eva viśrāmyati anirvācya tā eva ca śuddha cit tattvasya svarūpam iti śuddha cit rūpa tām

original: gatasya videhamuktasya sarvabhāvo yukta eveti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ / etac ca śuddhacittattvasvarūpam
analyzed: gatasya videha muktasya sarva bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ evā iti na kaḥ api virodhaḥ etat ca śuddha cit tattva svarūpam

original: anubhavatsu pratyakṣasiddham eva / tadavidvadarthe tu ayaṃ prayatnaḥ kṛta ity alaṃ
analyzed: anubhavatsu pratyakṣa siddham eva tad avidvat arthe tu ayam prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ iti alam

original: prapañcena //MT_3,9.18 //
analyzed: prapañcena

original: khaṃ bhūtvā pavanaskandhān dhatte sarkṣasurāsurān / kulācalagaṇo bhūtvā lokapālapurāspadam //MU_3,9.19//
analyzed: kham bhūtvā pavana skandhān dhatte sa ṛkṣa sura asurān kula acala gaṇaḥ bhūtvā lokapāla pura āspadam

original: sarkṣasurāsurān nakṣatradevāsurasahitān / kulācalagaṇaḥ bhūtvā lokapālapurāspadaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ //MT_3,9.19//
analyzed: sa ṛkṣa sura asurān nakṣatra deva asura sahitān kula acala gaṇaḥ bhūtvā lokapāla pura āspadam bhavati iti sambandhaḥ

original: bhūmir bhūtvā bibhartīmāṃ lokasthitim akhaṇḍitām / tṛṇagulmalatā bhūtvā dadāti phalasantatim //MU_3,9.20//
analyzed: bhūmiḥ bhūtvā bibharti imām loka sthitim akhaṇḍitām tṛṇa gulma latā bhūtvā dadāti phala santatim

original: spaṣṭam //MT_3,9.20//
analyzed: spaṣṭam

original: bibhraj jalānalākāraṃ jvalati bhavati drutaḥ / candro 'mṛtaṃ prasravati mṛtiṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣam //MU_3,9.21//
analyzed: bibhrat jala anala ākāram jvalati bhavati drutaḥ candraḥ amṛtam prasravati mṛtim hālāhalam viṣam

original: jalākāraṃ bibhrad drutaḥ dravaguṇayuktaḥ / bhavati / analākāraṃ bibhrat jvalatīty yojyam / candro bhūtvā hālāhalaṃ bhūtveti sambandhanīyam
analyzed: jala ākāram bibhrat drutaḥ drava guṇa yuktaḥ bhavati anala ākāram bibhrat jvalati iti yojyam candraḥ bhūtvā hālāhalam bhūtvā iti sambandhanīyam

original: tejaḥ prakaṭayaty āśās tanoty āndhyaṃ tamo bhavat / śūnyaṃ sad vyomatām eti giriḥ san rodhayaty alam //MU_3,9.22//
analyzed: tejaḥ prakaṭayati āśāḥ tanoti āndhyam tamaḥ bhavat śūnyam sat vyoma tām eti giriḥ san rodhayati alam

original: rodhayati rodhanaṃ karoti //MT_3,9.22//
analyzed: rodhayati rodhanam karoti

original: karoti jaṅgamaṃ cittve sthāvaraṃ sthāvarākṛtiḥ / bhūtvārṇavo valayati bhūstriyaṃ valayo yathā //MU_3,9.23//
analyzed: karoti jaṅgamam cit tve sthāvaram sthāvara ākṛtiḥ bhūtvā arṇavaḥ valayati bhū striyam valayaḥ yathā

original: cittve cidbhāve sthitvā / cidbhāvayukto bhūtveti yāvat / jaṅgamaṃ karoti sthāvarākṛtiḥ
analyzed: cittve cidbhāve sthitvā cidbhāva yuktaḥ bhūtvā iti yāvat jaṅgamam karoti sthāvara ākṛtiḥ

original: san sthāvaraṃ karoti / arṇavaḥ bhūtvā bhūstriyaṃ bhūr eva strī / tām valayati samantāt
analyzed: san sthāvaram karoti arṇavaḥ bhūtvā bhū striyam bhūḥ eva strī tām valayati samantāt

original: paryanteṣu āvṛṇoti / ko yathā / valayo yathā / yathā valayaḥ striyaṃ / arthāt strībhujaṃ /
analyzed: paryanteṣu āvṛṇoti kaḥ yathā valayaḥ yathā yathā valayaḥ striyam arthāt strī bhujam

original: valayati / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,9.23 //
analyzed: valayati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: paramārkavapur bhūtvā prakāśe 'ntar visārayan / trijagattrasareṇvoghaṃ śāntam evāvatiṣṭhati //MU_3,9.24//
analyzed: parama arka vapuḥ bhūtvā prakāśe antar visārayan trijagat trasa reṇu ogham śāntam eva avatiṣṭhati

original: paramārkavapuḥ citsūryavapuḥ / bhūtvā / prakāśe prakāśarūpāyāṃ svabhittau / trijagattrasareṇvoghaṃ
analyzed: parama arka vapuḥ cit sūrya vapuḥ bhūtvā prakāśe prakāśa rūpāyām svabhittau trijagat trasa reṇu ogham

original: trijagadākhyaṃ paramāṇusamūhaṃ / visārayan vistārayan / śāntam eva sākṣibhāvena sthitatvāt
analyzed: trijagat ākhyam paramāṇu samūham visārayan vistārayan śāntam eva sākṣi bhāvena sthita tvāt

original: tatkṛtakṣobharahitam evāvatiṣṭhati / yuktaṃ cārkasya prakāśe trasareṇvoghavisāraṇaṃ
analyzed: tad kṛta kṣobha rahitam eva avatiṣṭhati yuktam ca arkasya prakāśe trasareṇu ogha visāraṇam

original: śāntam avasthānaṃ ca //MT_3,9.24 //
analyzed: śāntam avasthānam ca

original: viśeṣakalanām aśakyāṃ jñātvā sāmānyena kathayati
analyzed: viśeṣa kalanām aśakyām jñātvā sāmānyena kathayati

original: yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātaṃ vā bhām upaiṣyati / kālatrayagataṃ dṛśyaṃ tad asau sarvam eva vā //MU_3,9.25//
analyzed: yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātam vā bhām upaiṣyati kāla traya gatam dṛśyam tat asau sarvam eva vā

original: vā pakṣāntare / yat kiñcit idaṃ jagat / bhātam pūrvaṃ sphuritaṃ / tathā ābhāti adya
analyzed: vā pakṣa antare yat kiñcid idam jagat bhātam pūrvam sphuritam tathā ābhāti adya

original: sphurati / tathā bhām sphuraṇam / upaiṣyati agre āgamiṣyati / tat kālatrayagatam
analyzed: sphurati tathā bhām sphuraṇam upaiṣyati agre āgamiṣyati tat kāla traya gatam

original: sarvaṃ dṛśyam asau uktaḥ videhamuktaḥ / bhavati //MT_3,9.25 //
analyzed: sarvam dṛśyam asau uktaḥ videha muktaḥ bhavati

original: atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: atra śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: katham evaṃ vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me / dṛṣṭir eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyeti niścayaḥ //MU_3,9.26//
analyzed: katham evam vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me dṛṣṭiḥ eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyā iti niścayaḥ

original: he brahman / tvaṃ vada kathaya / puruṣeṇa evam etādṛgguṇayuktena videhamuktena /
analyzed: he brahman tvam vada kathaya puruṣeṇa evam etādṛś guṇa yuktena videha muktena

original: katham bhūyate kathaṃ sampadyate / hi yasmāt kāraṇāt / me niścayaḥ / iti evaṃ / bhavati /
analyzed: katham bhūyate katham sampadyate hi yasmāt kāraṇāt me niścayaḥ iti evam bhavati

original: iti kim / iti viṣamā kaṭhinā / eṣā pūrvoktā / dṛṣṭiḥ videhamuktirūpā dṛṣṭiḥ / duṣprāpā
analyzed: iti kim iti viṣamā kaṭhinā eṣā pūrva uktā dṛṣṭiḥ videha mukti rūpā dṛṣṭiḥ duṣprāpā

original: durākramyā ca bhavati //MT_3,9.26 //
analyzed: durākramyā ca bhavati

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: muktir eṣocyate rāma brahmaitat samudāhṛtam / nirvāṇam etat kathitaṃ śṛṇu samprāpyate katham //MU_3,9.27//
analyzed: muktiḥ eṣā ucyate rāma brahma etat samudāhṛtam  nirvāṇam etat kathitam śṛṇu samprāpyate katham

original: he rāma / paṇḍitaiḥ eṣā etat videhamuktatvaṃ / muktiḥ ucyate / jīvanmuktatvasya sattvarūpacittāśrayatvenāmuktikalpatvāt /
analyzed: he rāma paṇḍitaiḥ eṣā etat videha mukta tvam muktiḥ ucyate jīvanmukta tvasya sattva rūpa citta āśraya tvena amukti kalpa tvāt

original: paṇḍitaiḥ etat brahma samudāhṛtam kathitam / sarvapadārthabhāvena bṛṃhaṇābhāktvāt /
analyzed: paṇḍitaiḥ etat brahma samudāhṛtam kathitam sarva padārtha bhāvena bṛṃhaṇa abhāk tvāt

original: paṇḍitaiḥ etat nirvāṇaṃ kathitam sarvathā parimitāhantāyāḥ layībhāvāt / tvaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: paṇḍitaiḥ etat nirvāṇam kathitam sarvathā parimita ahantāyāḥ layībhāvāt tvam śṛṇu

original: etat puruṣeṇa kathaṃ prāpyate //MT_3,9.27 //
analyzed: etat puruṣeṇa katham prāpyate

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate dṛśyam ahaṃtvattādisaṃyutam / sato 'py asyāpy anutpattyā buddhyā vaitad avāpyate //MU_3,9.28//
