analyzed: eva prathamam kathyate iti atra āha yaḥ kila iti atas mukti kathane pravṛttaiḥ asmābhiḥ

original: utpattiprakaraṇakathanam eva kāryam / anyathā nirādhārāyāḥ mukteḥ kathanam ayuktaṃ
analyzed: utpatti prakaraṇa kathanam eva kāryam anyathā nirādhārāyāḥ mukteḥ kathanam ayuktam

original: syād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,9.45 //
analyzed: syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: vistareṇa kathayiṣyamāṇe 'sminn utpattiprakaraṇe tvaṃ kiṃ kathayasīty / atrāha
analyzed: vistareṇa kathayiṣyamāṇe asmin utpatti prakaraṇe tvam kim kathayasi iti atra āha

original: iyam itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir bhāty ajātaiva khātmikā / ity utpattiprakaraṇe kathyate 'smin mayādhunā //MU_3,9.46//
analyzed: iyam ittham jagat bhrāntiḥ bhāti ajātā eva kha ātmikā iti utpatti prakaraṇe kathyate asmin mayā adhunā

original: iyam puraḥsphuraṇaśīlā / jagadbhrāntiḥ jagadākāraḥ bhramaḥ / itthaṃ anayā yuktyā /
analyzed: iyam puras sphuraṇa śīlā jagat bhrāntiḥ jagat ākāraḥ bhramaḥ ittham anayā yuktyā

original: ajātā eva anutpannā eva / ataḥ khātmikā ākāśasvarūpā satī / bhāti sphurati / iti
analyzed: ajātā eva anutpannā eva atas kha ātmikā ākāśa svarūpā satī bhāti sphurati iti

original: etat / mayā adhunā asmin utpattiprakaraṇe kathyate //MT_3,9.46 //
analyzed: etat mayā adhunā asmin utpatti prakaraṇe kathyate

original: utpattiprakaraṇam eva kathayiṣyan sthūṇānikhanananyāyenotpattimūlakāraṇabhūtaśuddhacinmātraprakaṭanārtham ādau tadāvarakaprapañcalayaṃ tāvat
analyzed: utpatti prakaraṇam eva kathayiṣyan sthūṇā nikhanana nyāyena utpatti mūla kāraṇa bhūta śuddha cit mātra prakaṭana artham ādau tad āvaraka prapañca layam tāvat

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / / sarvaṃ sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ sasurāsurakiṃnaram //MU_3,9.47//
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate kiñcid jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam   sarvam sarva prakāra āḍhyam sa sura asura kiṃnaram

original: tan mahāpralaye prāpte rudrādipariṇāmini / bhavaty asad adṛśyaṃ ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati //MU_3,9.48 //kiñcit
analyzed: tat mahāpralaye prāpte rudra ādi pariṇāmini bhavati asat adṛśyam ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati kiñcid

original: anirvācyasvarūpam / sarvaprakārāḍhyaṃ samastabhāvābhāvādiprakārayuktaṃ / mahāpralaye
analyzed: anirvācya svarūpam sarva prakāra āḍhyam samasta bhāva abhāva ādi prakāra yuktam mahāpralaye

original: turyākhye avasthāviśeṣe mahākalpāntasamaye ca / rudrādipariṇāmini rudrādilayayukte /
analyzed: turya ākhye avasthā viśeṣe mahākalpa anta samaye ca rudra ādi pariṇāmini rudra ādi laya yukte

original: rudro 'tra ahaṅkāraḥ saṃhārādhikārī śrīmahādevo jñeyaḥ / ādiśabdena buddhyādeḥ sṛṣṭisthityadhikāriṇaḥ
analyzed: rudraḥ atra ahaṅkāraḥ saṃhāra adhikārī śrī mahādevaḥ jñeyaḥ ādi śabdena buddhi ādeḥ sṛṣṭi sthiti adhikāriṇaḥ

original: viṣṇvādeś ca grahaṇam / adṛśyam bāhyendriyāgocaram / nanu katham adṛśyaṃ ca bhavatīty /
analyzed: viṣṇu ādeḥ ca grahaṇam adṛśyam bāhya indriya agocaram nanu katham adṛśyam ca bhavati iti

original: atrāha kvāpīti / kvāpi yāti anirvācye kasmin cittattve ekatāṃ yāti / anyatayā sphuratīti
analyzed: atra āha kvāpi iti kvāpi yāti anirvācye kasmin cit tattve ekatām yāti anya tayā sphurati iti

original: yāvat / ata eva vinaśyati adarśanaṃ gacchati / na hi bhāsamānasya sarvathā vināśo
analyzed: yāvat atas eva vinaśyati adarśanam gacchati na hi bhāsamānasya sarvathā

original: yuktaḥ / śuktikārajatasyāpi sarvathā vināśaprasaṅgāt / na hi śuktikārajataṃ sarvathā
analyzed: yuktaḥ śuktikā rajatasya api sarvathā vināśa prasaṅgāt na hi śuktikā rajatam sarvathā

original: vinaśyati / kiṃ tu śuktibhāvena sphurati //MT_3,9.47-48 //
analyzed: vinaśyati kim tu śukti bhāvena sphurati

original: nanu bhāsamānasyaitasya jagataḥ nāśe kiṃ śiṣyate / bhāsamānasya śuktikārajatasya nāśe hi śuktikā śiṣyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu bhāsamānasya etasya jagataḥ nāśe kim śiṣyate bhāsamānasya śuktikā rajatasya nāśe hi śuktikā śiṣyate iti atra āha

original: tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam / anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ sat kiñcid
analyzed: tatas stimita gambhīram na tejaḥ na tamaḥ tatam an ākhyam an abhivyaktam sat kiñcid

original: avaśiṣyate //MU_3,9.49 //tataḥ dṛśyanāśānantaram / kiñcit arthāt dṛśyavināśasākṣisvarūpaṃ
analyzed: avaśiṣyate tatas dṛśya nāśa anantaram kiñcid arthāt dṛśya vināśa sākṣi svarūpam

original: kim api anirvācyaṃ vastu / śiṣyate śiṣṭaṃ bhavati / anyathā bhāsamānasya iyataḥ jagataḥ
analyzed: kim api anirvācyam vastu śiṣyate śiṣṭam bhavati anyathā bhāsamānasya iyataḥ jagataḥ

original: kutrāvasthānaṃ syān / na hi bhāsamānasya vināśo ghaṭasvarūpanāśavat yuktaḥ / śuktikārajatanāśavad
analyzed: kutra avasthānam syāt na hi bhāsamānasya vināśaḥ ghaṭa svarūpa nāśa vat yuktaḥ śuktikā rajata nāśa vat

original: anyarūpatayā sphuraṇamātrarūpatvāt / anyarūpatayā sphuraṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ vinā nopapadyata
analyzed: anya rūpatayā sphuraṇa mātra rūpa tvāt anya rūpatayā sphuraṇam prādhānyam vinā nā upapadyata

original: iti / kiñcit kathambhūtam / stimitagambhīram / stimitam cetyaunmukhyākhyaspandarahitam /
analyzed: iti kiñcid kathaṃbhūtam stimita gambhīram stimitam ca iti aunmukhya ākhya spanda rahitam

original: gambhīram svaviṣayāvagāhitrabhāvenāvagāhanakriyāviṣayatvābhāvena ca avagāhitum aśakyam /
analyzed: gambhīram sva viṣaya avagāhitṛ abhāvena avagāhana kriyā viṣaya tva abhāvena ca avagāhitum aśakyam

original: tādṛśaṃ ca tat tādṛśaṃ ceti / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / na tejaḥ śuddhacinmātrarūpatvena
analyzed: tādṛśam ca tat tādṛśam ca iti punar kathambhūtam na tejaḥ śuddha cit mātra rūpa tvena

original: jīvādisvarūpalaukikacetanavyatiriktam ity arthaḥ / tathā na tamaḥ jaḍapadārthavyatiriktam
analyzed: jīva ādi svarūpa laukika cetanā vyatiriktam iti arthaḥ tathā na tamaḥ jaḍa padārtha vyatiriktam

original: ity arthaḥ / atha vā cinmātrarūpatvena cetyasvarūpabāhyatejastamovyatiriktam iti
analyzed: iti arthaḥ atha vā cit mātra rūpa tvena cetya svarūpa bāhya tejaḥ tamaḥ vyatiriktam iti

original: jñeyam / punaḥ kathambhūtam / sarvatrānusyūtam / punaḥ kathambhūtam / anākhyam ākhyākartṛtvenāvasthānāt
analyzed: jñeyam punar kathambhūtam sarvatra anusyūtam punar kathambhūtam anākhyam ākhyā kartṛ tvena avasthānāt

original: ākhyāviṣayatvābhāvāc cākhyātum aśakyam ity arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / anabhivyaktam
analyzed: ākhyā viṣaya tva abhāvāt ca ākhyātum aśakyam iti arthaḥ punar kathambhūtam anabhivyaktam

original: bāhyāntaḥkaraṇāgocaratvena aprakaṭasvarūpam / kṛtaś ca pūrvam eṣāṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena
analyzed: bāhya antaḥkaraṇa agocara tvena aprakaṭa svarūpam kṛtaḥ ca pūrvam eṣām viśeṣaṇānām hetu hetumat bhāvena

original: śṛṅkhalābandha iti na punar āyastam //MT_3,9.49 //
analyzed: śṛṅkhalā bandhaḥ iti na punar āyastam

original: avaśiṣṭatayā proktaṃ vastu punar api vistareṇa viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: avaśiṣṭa tayā proktam vastu punar api vistareṇa viśinaṣṭi

original: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cākāśaṃ na dṛśyaṃ na ca darśanam / na ca bhūtapadārthaugho yad anantatayā sthitam //MU_3,9.50//
analyzed: na śūnyam na api ca ākāśam na dṛśyam na ca darśanam na ca bhūta padārtha oghaḥ yat ananta tayā sthitam

original: anantatayā anantabhāvena / sthitaṃ yat vastu / śūnyaṃ na bhavati / tattve hi jagadadhiṣṭhānatvam
analyzed: ananta tayā ananta bhāvena sthitam yat vastu śūnyam na bhavati tattve hi jagat adhiṣṭhāna tvam

original: ayuktaṃ syāt / na hi śūnyaṃ kasyāpi adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam / tatra bhāsamānasya picchikādeḥ
analyzed: ayuktam syāt na hi śūnyam kasya api adhiṣṭhānam dṛṣṭam tatra bhāsamānasya picchikā ādeḥ

original: nāyanaraśmyadhiṣṭhānatvāt / tathā yat vastu / ākāśaṃ na bhavati / proktanyāyena śūnyavyatiriktatvāt /
analyzed: na ayana raśmi adhiṣṭhāna tvāt tathā yat vastu ākāśam na bhavati prokta nyāyena śūnya vyatirikta tvāt

original: ākāśasya ca śūnyaikamayatvāt / yat dṛśyaṃ na bhavati / kevaladraṣṭṛsvarūpatvāt /
analyzed: ākāśasya ca śūnya eka maya tvāt yat dṛśyam na bhavati kevala draṣṭṛ sva rūpa tvāt

original: yat vastu / darśanam na bhavati / draṣṭṛdṛśyānapekṣasiddhikatvāt / yat bhūtapadārthaughaḥ
analyzed: yat vastu darśanam na bhavati draṣṭṛ dṛśya anapekṣa siddhika tvāt yat bhūta padārtha oghaḥ

original: na bhavati / tattve hi jaḍaṃ syāt //MT_3,9.50 //
analyzed: na bhavati tattve hi jaḍam syāt

original: kim apy avyapadeśātma pūrṇāt pūrṇatarākṛti / na san nāsan na sadasan nābhāvo bhavanaṃ na ca //MU_3,9.51//
analyzed: kim api a vyapadeśa ātma pūrṇāt pūrṇatara ākṛti na sat na asat na sat asat na abhāvaḥ bhavanam na ca

original: pūrṇāt pūrṇatvenābhimatāt ākāśādeḥ / pūrṇatarākṛti pūrṇatarākāram / yat vastu / kim
analyzed: pūrṇāt pūrṇa tvena abhimatāt ākāśa ādeḥ pūrṇatara ākṛti pūrṇatara ākāram yat vastu kim

original: apy avyapadeśātma kim apy anirvācyasvarūpaṃ bhavati / tathā yat sat na bhavati /
analyzed: api a vyapadeśa ātma kim api anirvācya svarūpam bhavati tathā yat sat na bhavati

original: [...] jagadadhiṣṭhānatvāyogāt / tathā yat sadasat na bhavati / ubhayadoṣaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: jagat adhiṣṭhāna tva ayogāt tathā yat sat asat na bhavati ubhaya doṣa prasaṅgāt

original: tathā yat abhāvaḥ na bhavati / tadviruddhābhāvatayāpy avasthānāt //MT_3,9.51 //
analyzed: tathā yat abhāvaḥ na bhavati tad viruddha abhāvatayā api avasthānāt

original: cinmātraṃ cetyarahitam anantam ajaraṃ śivam / anādimadhyaparyantaṃ yad anādhi nirāmayam //MU_3,9.52//
yat evaṃvidhaṃ bhavati / evaṃvidhaṃ kīdṛg ity apekṣāyām āha cinmātram ityādi / cinmātram
analyzed: yat evaṃvidham bhavati evaṃvidham kīdṛś iti apekṣāyām āha cit mātram ityādi cit mātram

original: kevalaṃ citsvarūpam / ata eva cetyarahitam cetyārūṣitam / anantam svāntasyāpi sākṣitvena
analyzed: kevalam cit svarūpam atas eva cetyarahitam anantam svāntasya api sākṣi tvena

original: sthitatvāt / tatra hi anādimadhyaparyantam ādimadhyaparyantavyavasthākārideśakālabhāsakatvāt
analyzed: sthita tvāt tatra hi anādi madhya paryantam ādi madhya paryanta vyavasthā kāri deśa kāla bhāsaka tvāt

original: ādimadhyaparyantarahitam / anādhi cittābhāvena tadāśritādhirahitam / nirāmayam bhāvābhāvādisvarūparogarahitam //MT_3,9.52 //
analyzed: ādi madhya paryanta rahitam anādhi citta abhāvena tad āśrita ādhi rahitam nirāmayam bhāva abhāva ādi svarūpa roga rahitam

original: yasmiñ jagat prasphurati dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsavat / yaś cedaṃ yaś ca naivedaṃ devaḥ sadasadātmakaḥ //MU_3,9.53//
analyzed: yasmin jagat prasphurati dṛṣṭi mauktika haṃsa vat  yaḥ ca idam yaḥ ca na eva idam devaḥ sat asat ātmakaḥ

original: yasmin vastuni / jagat prasphurati adhiṣṭheyatayā vilasati / kathaṃ / dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsavat /
analyzed: yasmin vastuni jagat prasphurati adhiṣṭheya tayā vilasati katham dṛṣṭi mauktika haṃsa vat

original: dṛṣṭau sphuritau mauktikahaṃsau dṛṣṭimauktikahaṃsau / tāv iva tadvat / rogavaśena
analyzed: dṛṣṭau sphuritau mauktika haṃsau dṛṣṭi mauktika haṃsau tau iva tadvat roga vaśena

original: hi dṛṣṭyavayavabhūtāḥ raśmayaḥ mauktikabhāvena haṃsabhāvena cākāśe sphuranti / sadasadātmakaḥ
analyzed: hi dṛṣṭi avayava bhūtāḥ raśmayaḥ mauktika bhāvena haṃsa bhāvena ca ākāśe sphuranti sat asat ātmakaḥ

original: sadasatsvarūpaḥ / anirvācya iti yāvat / yaḥ devaḥ / yaḥ krīḍāśīlaḥ dyotanaśīlaś ca /
analyzed: sat asat svarūpaḥ anirvācyaḥ iti yāvat yaḥ devaḥ yaḥ krīḍā śīlaḥ dyotana śīlaḥ ca

original: idaṃ idantayā viṣayīkṛtaṃ bhāvajātaṃ bhavati / sārabhāvena sthitatvāt / yaḥ devaḥ
analyzed: idam idantayā viṣayīkṛtam bhāva jātam bhavati sāra bhāvena sthita tvāt yaḥ devaḥ

original: idaṃ na bhavati / ahantāsāratvena sthitatvāt //MT_3,9.53 //
analyzed: idam na bhavati ahantā sāra tvena sthita tvāt

original: akarṇajihvo 'nāsātvaṅnetraḥ sarvatra sarvadā / yaḥ śṛṇoty āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati //MU_3,9.54//
analyzed: a karṇa jihvaḥ an āsā tvac netraḥ sarvatra sarvadā yaḥ śṛṇoti āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati

original: akarṇajihvaḥ śrotrendriyarasanendriyarahitaḥ / tathā anāsātvaṅnetraḥ ghrāṇendriyatvagindriyanetrendriyarahitaḥ /
analyzed: a karṇa jihvaḥ śrotra indriya rasana indriya rahitaḥ tathā an āsā tvac netraḥ ghrāṇa indriya tvac indriya netra indriya rahitaḥ

original: yaḥ sarvatra sarvadeśeṣu / sarvadā sarvakāleṣu / śṛṇoti samastaśabdaśravaṇakriyāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ sarvatra sarva deśeṣu sarvadā sarva kāleṣu śṛṇoti samasta śabda śravaṇa kriyām

original: karoti / āsvādayati samastāsvādāsvādanakriyāṃ karoti / jighran bhavati / samastagandhaśiṅghaṇakriyāṃ
analyzed: karoti āsvādayati samasta āsvāda āsvādana kriyām karoti jighran bhavati samasta gandha śiṅghaṇa kriyām

original: kurvan bhavati / spṛśati samstasparśasparśanakriyāṃ karoti / paśyati samastarūpadarśanakriyāṃ
analyzed: kurvan bhavati spṛśati karoti paśyati samasta rūpa darśana kriyām

original: karoti / samastadeśakālagatasamastaprasādasamastendriyasāratvena sthitatvāt śravaṇādikriyākartṛtvābhimānagrastasamastadeśakālagatasamastapramātṛbhāvena
analyzed: karoti samasta deśa kāla gata samasta prasāda samasta indriya sāra tvena sthita tvāt śravaṇa ādi kriyā kartṛ tva abhimāna grasta samasta deśa kāla gata samasta pramātṛ bhāvena

original: vā sthitatvāt / na cendriyasāratvena sthitasyāsyānyendriyāpekṣā yuktā / indriyāṇām
analyzed: vā sthita tvāt na ca indriya sāra tvena sthitasya asya anya indriya apekṣā yuktā indriyāṇām

original: indriyāntaranairapekṣyeṇa tatsārasyāpi tadvat tadapekṣāyāḥ ayuktavāt / kalpyamānānām
analyzed: indriya antara nairapekṣyeṇa tad sārasya api tadvat tad apekṣāyāḥ ayukta vāt kalpyamānānām

original: api teṣāṃ etatsāratvaṃ vinā nakiñcidrūpatvāpatteḥ / etatsāratve tu etasyaiva tadbhāvenāpi
analyzed: api teṣām etad sāra tvam vinā na kiñcid rūpa tva āpatteḥ etad sāra tve tu etasya eva tad bhāvena api

original: sthitatvāt / sarvapramātṛbhāvena sthitatve api nendriyāntarāpekṣā / tadindriyair
analyzed: sthita tvāt sarva pramātṛ bhāvena sthita tve api na indriya antara apekṣā tad indriyaiḥ

original: evendriyamattvena indriyāntarāṇām anupayogitvāt //MT_3,9.54 //
analyzed: eva indriya mat tvena indriya antarāṇām anupayogi tvāt

original: sa eva sadasadrūpaṃ yenālokena lakṣyate / sargacitram anādyantaṃ kharūpaṃ cāpy arañjanam //MU_3,9.55//
analyzed: saḥ eva sat asat rūpam yena ālokena lakṣyate sarga citram anādi antam kha rūpam ca api arañjanam

original: sa eva cinmātrasvarūpaḥ san draṣṭṛtām āpannaḥ sa eva / na tv anyaḥ kaścit / yenālokena
analyzed: saḥ eva cit mātra svarūpaḥ san draṣṭṛ tām āpannaḥ saḥ eva na tu anyaḥ kaścid yena ālokena

original: yatsvarūpeṇa / sargacitraṃ jagadrūpaṃ citram / citprakāśena lakṣyate dṛśyate / cidālokaṃ
analyzed: yad sva rūpeṇa sarga citram jagat rūpam citram cit prakāśena lakṣyate dṛśyate cit ālokam

original: vinā draṣṭuḥ jagaddarśanāsambhavāt / kathambhūtaṃ sargacitraṃ / sadasadrūpaṃ / phalataḥ
analyzed: vinā draṣṭuḥ jagat darśana asambhavāt kathambhūtam sarga citram sat asat rūpam phalataḥ

original: sadasadbhyām anirvacanīyam / punaḥ kathambhūtam / anādyantam anādyantacinmātrasāratvenādyantarahitam
analyzed: sat asadbhyām anirvacanīyam punar kathambhūtam anādi antam anādi anta cit mātra sāra tvena ādi anta rahitam

original: ity arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ ca / kharūpaṃ ca / ābhāsamātrarūpatvena svapnavat
analyzed: iti arthaḥ punar kathambhūtam ca kha rūpam ca ābhāsa mātra rūpa tvena svapna vat

original: ākāśarūpaṃ cety arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtam / arañjanam bhāsamānābhiḥ bhāvābhāvarañjanābhiḥ
analyzed: ākāśa rūpam ca iti arthaḥ punar kathambhūtam arañjanam bhāsamānābhiḥ bhāva abhāva rañjanābhiḥ

original: śuddhatvena paramārthato muktam ity arthaḥ / apiśabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ //MT_3,9.55 //
analyzed: śuddha tvena paramārthataḥ muktam iti arthaḥ api śabdaḥ pāda pūraṇa arthaḥ

original: ardhonmīlitadṛgbhrūbhūmadhyatārakavaj jagat / vyomātmaiva sadābhāsaṃ svarūpaṃ yo 'bhipaśyati //MU_3,9.56//
analyzed: ardha unmīlita dṛś bhrū bhū madhya tāraka vat jagat vyoma ātmā eva sat ābhāsam svarūpam yaḥ abhipaśyati

original: yaḥ svarūpaṃ cinmātrākhyaṃ svabhāvaṃ / jagat naśvaracetyarūpaṃ / paśyati svagocarīkaroti /
analyzed: yaḥ sva rūpam cit mātra ākhyam svabhāvam jagat naśvara cetya rūpam paśyati sva gocarīkaroti

original: kathambhūtam jagat / vyomātmaiva paramārthato jagadrūpatābhāvāt nakiñcidrūpam eva /
analyzed: kathambhūtam jagat vyoma ātmā eva paramārthataḥ jagat rūpatā bhāvāt nakiñcid rūpam eva

original: punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / sadābhāsaṃ sad ivābhāsata iti sadābhāsam / paramārthato na sad
analyzed: punar kathambhūtam sat ābhāsam sat iva ābhāsate iti sat ābhāsam paramārthataḥ na sat

original: ity arthaḥ / kathaṃ paśyati / ardhonmīlitadṛgbhrūbhūmadhyatārakavat / ardham unmīlitā
analyzed: iti arthaḥ katham paśyati ardha unmīlita dṛś bhrū bhū madhya tāraka vat ardham unmīlitā

original: dṛk yena / saḥ ardhonmīlitadṛk / bhruvau eva bhūḥ sthānaṃ / tasyā madhyaṃ bhrūbhūmadhyaṃ /
analyzed: dṛś yena saḥ ardha unmīlita dṛś bhruvau eva bhūḥ sthānam tasyāḥ madhyam bhrū bhū madhyam

original: ardhonmīlitadṛśaḥ bhrūbhūmadhye bhāsamānā yā tārakā / tadvat / ardhonmīlitanetraḥ
analyzed: ardha unmīlita dṛśaḥ bhrū bhū madhye bhāsamānā yā tārakā tadvat ardha unmīlita netraḥ

original: puruṣaḥ svabhrūmadhye svadṛṣṭiraśmim eva tārakākārāṃ yathā paśyati / tathety arthaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sva bhrū madhye sva dṛṣṭi raśmim eva tārakā ākārām yathā paśyati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: abhinayagamyaś cārthaḥ //MT_3,9.56 //
analyzed: abhinaya gamyaḥ ca arthaḥ

original: yasyānyad asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat / yasyedaṃ ca jagat kāryaṃ taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ //MU_3,9.57//
analyzed: yasya anyat asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇam śaśa śṛṅga vat  yasya idam ca jagat kāryam taraṅga oghaḥ iva ambhasaḥ

original: yasya vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ / nanu kathaṃ nāsya kāraṇam asti / satyam / tatkāraṇaṃ
analyzed: yasya vibhoḥ kāraṇam na asti iti arthaḥ nanu katham na asya kāraṇam asti satyam tad kāraṇam

original: cidrūpam acidrūpaṃ vā / nāntyaḥ cidrūpaṃ prati acidrūpakāraṇatvāyogāt / ādye tu sa
analyzed: cit rūpam acit rūpam vā na antyaḥ cit rūpam prati acit rūpa kāraṇatva ayogāt ādye tu sa

original: eva cidrūpaḥ cidrūpasya svasya kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ syāt / iti sarvasya jagataḥ tatkāryatvaṃ
analyzed: eva cit rūpaḥ cit rūpasya svasya kāraṇam katham syāt iti sarvasya jagataḥ tad kārya tvam

original: kathayati yasyedam iti / jagataḥ cinmātrakāryatvaṃ svapnajagadvaj jñeyam //MT_3,9.57 //
analyzed: kathayati yasya idam iti jagataḥ cit mātra kāryatvam svapna jagat vat jñeyam

original: jvalataḥ sarvato 'jasraṃ cittasthālīṣu tiṣṭhataḥ / yasya cinmātradīpasya bhāsā bhāti jagattrayam //MU_3,9.58//
analyzed: jvalataḥ sarvatas ajasram citta sthālīṣu tiṣṭhataḥ yasya cit mātra dīpasya bhāsā bhāti jagattrayam

original: yasya cinmātradīpasya / dīpatvaṃ cāsya prakāśakatvena jñeyam / bhāsā indriyadvāranirgatayā
analyzed: yasya cit mātra dīpasya dīpa tvam ca asya prakāśaka tvena jñeyam bhāsā indriya dvāra nirgatayā

original: citprabhayā / jagattrayam avasthātraye bhāsamānaṃ prapañcatrayaṃ / bhāti sphurati /
kathambhūtasya / sarvataḥ sarvatra / jvalataḥ sarvaṃ prakaṭayituṃ samarthasyety arthaḥ /
analyzed: kathambhūtasya sarvatas sarvatra jvalataḥ sarvam prakaṭayitum samarthasya iti arthaḥ

original: punaḥ kathambhūtasya / cittasthālīṣu cittarūpeṣu pātreṣu / tiṣṭhataḥ sārabhāvena
analyzed: punar kathambhūtasya citta sthālīṣu citta rūpeṣu pātreṣu tiṣṭhataḥ sāra bhāvena

original: sthitavataḥ / yuktaṃ ca dīpasya pātreṣv avasthānam / yady api suṣuptau cittaṃ līyata
analyzed: sthitavataḥ yuktam ca dīpasya pātreṣu avasthānam yadi api suṣuptau cittam līyata

original: eva tathāpi bījatvenātrāsyāvasthānāt evam uktam / bahir api bhūrbhuvassvarākhyaṃ
analyzed: eva tathā api bīja tvena atra asya avasthānāt evam uktam bahis api bhūrbhuvaḥ svara ākhyam

original: jagattrayaṃ cittenaiva bhāti //MT_3,9.58 //
analyzed: jagattrayam cittena eva bhāti

original: yaṃ vinārkādayo 'py ete prakāśās timiropamāḥ / sati yasmin pravartante trijaganmṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ //MU_3,9.59//
analyzed: yam vinā arka ādayaḥ api ete prakāśāḥ timira upamāḥ sati yasmin pravartante trijagat mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ

original: yaṃ vinā cakṣurindriyasārabhāvena sthitaṃ yaṃ vinā / ete dṛśyamānāḥ / arkādayo 'pi
analyzed: yam vinā cakṣuḥ indriya sāra bhāvena sthitam yam vinā ete dṛśyamānāḥ arka ādayaḥ api

original: timiropamā andhakārasadṛśāḥ / bhavanti / cakṣuṣā aprakāśitāḥ sūryādayo hi sphuṭam
analyzed: timira upamāḥ andhakāra sadṛśāḥ bhavanti cakṣuṣā aprakāśitāḥ sūrya ādayaḥ hi sphuṭam

original: evāndhakārasadṛśā eva / satīti / yathā sūryasannidhāne mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ pravartante /
analyzed: eva andhakāra sadṛśāḥ eva satī iti yathā sūrya sannidhāne mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ pravartante

original: tathā yatsannidhāne trijagad ity arthaḥ //MT_3,9.59 //
analyzed: tathā yad sannidhāne trijagat iti arthaḥ

original: saspande samudetīva niḥspande 'ntargateva ca / iyaṃ yasmiñ jagallakṣmīr alāta iva cakratā //MU_3,9.60//
analyzed: sa spande samudeti iva niḥspande antargatā iva ca iyam yasmin jagat lakṣmīḥ alāte iva cakra tā

original: yasmin saspande dṛśyaunmukhyākhyaspandayukte sati / jagallakṣmīḥ samudetīva / niḥspande
analyzed: yasmin sa spande dṛśya aunmukhya ākhya spanda yukte sati jagat lakṣmīḥ samudeti iva niḥspande

original: sati / antargateva tadantargateva ca bhavati / paramārthato nodeti nāntargacchatīti
analyzed: sati antargatā iva tad antargatā iva ca bhavati paramārthataḥ na udeti na antargacchati iti

original: ivaśabdopādānam / kasminn ivālāta iva / yathālāte saspande bhrāmite sati / cakratā
analyzed: iva śabda upādānam kasmin iva alāte iva yathā alāte sa spande bhrāmite sati cakratā

original: cakrākāratvam / udeti / aspande sati / alātāntargateva bhavati / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,9.60 //
analyzed: cakra ākāra tvam udeti aspande sati alāta antargatā iva bhavati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: jagannirmāṇavilayavilāso vyāpako mahān / spandāspandātmako yasya svabhāvo nirmalo 'kṣayaḥ //MU_3,9.61//
analyzed: jagat nirmāṇa vilaya vilāsaḥ vyāpakaḥ mahān spanda aspanda ātmakaḥ yasya svabhāvaḥ nirmalaḥ akṣayaḥ

original: jagannirmāṇavilayavilāsaḥ jagatsṛṣṭisaṃhāravilāsaḥ / yasyākṣayaḥ nāśarahitaḥ / nirmalaḥ
bhedamālinyādūṣitaḥ / mahān mahattvayukta / ata eva vyāpakaḥ / svabhāvaḥ svarūpam
analyzed: bheda mālinyāḥ dūṣitaḥ mahān mahat tva yukta atas eva vyāpakaḥ svabhāvaḥ svarūpam

original: eva / bhavati / na tv anyat / kathaṃ / sṛṣṭisaṃhāravilāsaḥ cetyamāno 'cetyamāno vā
analyzed: eva bhavati na tu anyat katham sṛṣṭi saṃhāra vilāsaḥ cetyamānaḥ a cetyamānaḥ vā

original: ity etasyāsatkalpatvād alaṃ taccintayādye cidviṣayatayā cidantargatatvāt tadrūpa
analyzed: iti etasya asat kalpa tvāt alam tad cintayā ādye cit viṣaya tayā cit antargata tvāt tad rūpa

original: eveti na virodhaḥ / kathambhūtaḥ / spandāspandātmakaḥ spandāspandasvarūpaḥ / tatra
analyzed: eva iti na virodhaḥ kathambhūtaḥ spanda aspanda ātmakaḥ spanda aspanda svarūpaḥ tatra

original: sṛṣṭivilāsaḥ spandamayaḥ / aspandamayaḥ saṃhāravilāsaḥ //MT_3,9.61 //
spandāspandamayī yasya pavanasyeva sarvagā / sattā nāmnaiva bhinneva vyavahārān na vastutaḥ //MU_3,9.62//
analyzed: spanda aspanda mayī yasya pavanasya iva sarva gā sattā nāmnā eva bhinnā iva vyavahārāt na vastutas

original: yasya spandāspandamayī sattā / cetyaunmukhyayuktā sattā spandamayī / tadrahitāspandamayī /
analyzed: yasya spanda aspanda mayī sattā ca iti aunmukhya yuktā sattā spanda mayī tad rahitā aspanda mayī

original: vyavahārān nāmnaiva vyavahārārthaṃ kṛtena nāmnā eva / bhinnā iva / kathambhūtā /
analyzed: vyavahārāt nāmnā eva vyavahāra artham kṛtena nāmnā eva bhinnā iva kathaṃbhūtā

original: sarvagā viśve taduttīrṇe ca svarūpe gatā / kasyeva / pavanasyeva / pavanasya spandamayī
analyzed: sarva gā viśve tad uttīrṇe ca sva rūpe gatā kasya iva pavanasya iva pavanasya spanda mayī

original: sattā yayā vṛkṣādayaḥ kampante / 'spandamayī ākāśasvarūpā / nanu kathaṃ spandāspandamayyāḥ
analyzed: sattā yayā vṛkṣa ādayaḥ kampante aspanda mayī ākāśa svarūpā nanu katham spanda aspanda mayyāḥ

original: sattāyā ekatvaṃ / satyaṃ / saspandasya niḥspandasya ca jalasyaikatvaṃ yathā nipuṇair
analyzed: sattāyāḥ eka tvam satyam sa spandasya niḥspandasya ca jalasya eka tvam yathā nipuṇaiḥ

original: niścīyate tathātrāpīti na virodhaḥ //MT_3,9.62 //
analyzed: niścīyate tathā atra api iti na virodhaḥ

original: sarvadaiva prabuddho yaḥ supto yaḥ sarvadaiva ca / na prasupto na buddhaś ca yaḥ sarvatraiva sarvadā //MU_3,9.63//
analyzed: sarvadā eva prabuddhaḥ yaḥ suptaḥ yaḥ sarvadā eva ca na prasuptaḥ na buddhaḥ ca yaḥ sarvatra eva sarvadā

original: yaḥ sarvadaiva sarvāsu daśāsv eva / prabuddhaḥ sākṣitayāvasthānāt prakṛṣṭajñānayukta
analyzed: yaḥ sarvadā eva sarvāsu daśāsu eva prabuddhaḥ sākṣi tayā avasthānāt prakṛṣṭa jñāna yukta

original: eva / yaḥ sarvadā eva suptaś ca / tatparāmarśarahitatvāt suptiṃ gataś ca bhavati /
analyzed: eva yaḥ sarvadā eva suptaḥ ca tad parāmarśa rahita tvāt suptim gataḥ ca bhavati

original: yaḥ sarvatraiva sarvadeśeṣu eva / sarvadā sarvāvasthāviśeṣeṣu / prasupto na bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ sarvatra eva sarva deśeṣu eva sarvadā sarva avasthā viśeṣeṣu prasuptaḥ na bhavati

original: nityaṃ bodharūpatvāt / buddhaś ca na bhavati / upekṣayā svaparāmarśe 'pi vimukhatvāt //MT_3,9.63 //
analyzed: nityam bodha rūpa tvāt buddhaḥ ca na bhavati upekṣayā sva parāmarśe api vimukha tvāt

original: yadaspandaḥ śivaṃ śāntaṃ yatspandas trijagatsthitiḥ / spandāspandavilāsātmā ya eko bharitākṛtiḥ //MU_3,9.64//
analyzed: yad aspandaḥ śivam śāntam yad spandaḥ trijagat sthitiḥ spanda aspanda vilāsa ātmā yaḥ ekaḥ bharita ākṛtiḥ

original: iti / yadaspandaḥ yaccetyaunmukhyarāhityam / śāntaṃ kṣobharahitaṃ / śivam ānandaḥ /
analyzed: iti yat aspandaḥ yat ca iti aunmukhya rāhityam śāntam kṣobha rahitam śivam ānandaḥ

original: bhavati / yatspandaḥ yaccetyaunmukhyam / trijagatsthitiḥ trijagatsattā / bhavati /
analyzed: bhavati yad spandaḥ yat ca iti aunmukhyam trijagat sthitiḥ trijagat sattā

original: yaḥ ekaḥ spandāspandavilāsātmā cetyaunmukhyatāyuktatadrahitasvarūpaḥ / bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ spanda aspanda vilāsa ātmā cetya aunmukhya tā yukta tad rahita svarūpaḥ bhavati

original: kathambhūtaḥ / bharitākṛtiḥ / bharitā sarvamayī / ākṛtiḥ svarūpaṃ yasya / tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: kathambhūtaḥ bharita ākṛtiḥ bharitā sarva mayī ākṛtiḥ svarūpam yasya tādṛśaḥ

original: ekasya yugapatspandamayatvaṃ vaicitryāvaham //MT_3,9.64 //
analyzed: ekasya yugapad spanda maya tvam vaicitrya āvaham

original: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu / pratyakṣastho 'py athāgrāhyaḥ śauklyaṃ śuklapaṭeṣv iva //MU_3,9.65//
analyzed: āmodaḥ iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu pratyakṣa sthaḥ api atha agrāhyaḥ śauklyam śukla paṭeṣu iva

original: yaḥ vināśiṣu padārtheṣu / na naśyati tannāśe 'pi tadupādānatayā sūkṣmatvenāvasthānāt /
analyzed: yaḥ vināśiṣu padārtheṣu na naśyati tad nāśe api tad upādānatayā sūkṣma tvena avasthānāt

original: na hi ghaṭe naṣṭe 'pi tadapekṣayā sūkṣmam upādānabhūtaṃ mṛtsvarūpaṃ naśyati / ka
analyzed: na hi ghaṭe naṣṭe api tad apekṣayā sūkṣmam upādāna bhūtam mṛd svarūpam naśyati ka

original: ivāmoda iva / yathā puṣpe naṣṭe 'pi tadāmodaḥ ākāśe bhrāmyan kiñcit kālaṃ na naśyati /
analyzed: iva āmodaḥ iva yathā puṣpe naṣṭe api tad āmodaḥ ākāśe bhrāmyan kiñcid kālam na naśyati

original: tathety arthaḥ / yaḥ agrāhyaḥ kenāpi bāhyenāntareṇa vendriyeṇa grahītuṃ śakyo na
analyzed: tathā iti arthaḥ yaḥ agrāhyaḥ kena api bāhyena antareṇa vā indriyeṇa grahītum śakyaḥ na

original: bhavati / kathambhūto 'pi / pratyakṣastho 'pi pratyakṣe vartamāno 'pi / na hi kasyacit
analyzed: bhavati kathaṃbhūtaḥ api pratyakṣa sthaḥ api pratyakṣe vartamānaḥ api na hi kasyacid

original: svātmāpratyakṣaḥ nāham atrāsmīti / kim iva / śauklyam iva / yathā paṭe vartamānaṃ
analyzed: sva ātmā apratyakṣaḥ na aham atra asmi iti kim iva śauklyam iva yathā paṭe vartamānam

original: śuklatvaṃ pratyakṣam api na hastena grāhyaṃ bhavati / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,9.65 //
analyzed: śukla tvam pratyakṣam api na hastena grāhyam bhavati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: mūkopamo 'pi yo vaktā mantā yo 'py upalopamaḥ / yo bhoktā nityatṛpto 'pi kartā yaś cāpy akiñcana //MU_3,9.66//
analyzed: mūka upamaḥ api yaḥ vaktā mantā yaḥ api upala upamaḥ yaḥ bhoktā nitya tṛptaḥ api kartā yaḥ ca api akiñcana

original: yaḥ vaktā bhavati / sarvavaktṛrūpatayā sthitatvāt / kathambhūto 'pi / mūkopamo 'pi
analyzed: yaḥ vaktā bhavati sarva vaktṛ rūpatayā sthita tvāt kathambhūtaḥ api mūka upamaḥ api

original: mūkopamatvaṃ cāsya nirvikalpatvāt / yaḥ mantāpi jñātā / na hi taṃ vinā ko 'py anyo
analyzed: mūka upama tvam ca asya nirvikalpa tvāt yaḥ mantā api jñātā na hi tam vinā kaḥ api

original: mantā nāma syāt / upalopamaḥ bhavati / cinmātrasvarūpatvena mantṛtvaleparahitatvāt /
analyzed: mantā nāma syāt upala upamaḥ bhavati cit mātra svarūpa tvena mantṛ tva lepa rahita tvāt

original: yaḥ nityatṛpto 'pi parānandarūpatvena sarvadaiva svenaiva tṛpto 'pi / bhoktā bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ nitya tṛptaḥ api parānanda rūpa tvena sarvadā eva svena eva tṛptaḥ api bhoktā bhavati

original: bhoktuḥ tadrūpatānapāyāt / yaḥ kartāpi sarvakartṝṇāṃ sāmarthyāpādakatvena kartṛtvam
analyzed: bhoktuḥ tad rūpa tā anapāyāt yaḥ kartā api sarva kartṝṇām sāmarthya āpādaka tvena kartṛ tvam

original: āpanno 'pi / akiñcana bhavati / kiñcanātra kartā jñeyaḥ / kartāto na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: āpannaḥ api akiñcana bhavati kiñcana atra kartā jñeyaḥ kartā atas na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: akartṛtvaṃ cāsya nakiñcanatvenaiva jñeyam / kartṛtvasya kiñcidrūpatvāt //MT_3,9.66 //
analyzed: akartṛ tvam ca asya nakiñcana tvena eva jñeyam kartṛ tvasya kiñcid rūpa tvāt

original: yo 'naṅgo 'pi samastāṅgaḥ sahasrakaralocanaḥ / na kiñcit saṃsthitenāpi yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat //MU_3,9.67//
analyzed: yaḥ anaṅgaḥ api samasta aṅgaḥ sahasra kara locanaḥ na kiñcid saṃsthitena api yena vyāptam idam jagat

original: yaḥ anaṅgo 'pi śuddhacinmātratvenāṅgarahito 'pi / samastāṅgo bhavati / yaḥ kathambhūtaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ anaṅgaḥ api śuddha cit mātra tvena aṅga rahitaḥ api samasta aṅgaḥ bhavati yaḥ kathambhūtaḥ

original: sahasrakaralocanaḥ / sahasrapadam atrānantatāvācakaṃ / tena anantakaralocana ity
analyzed: sahasra kara locanaḥ sahasra padam atra ananta tā vācakam tena ananta kara locanaḥ iti

original: arthaḥ / anantakaralocanatvaṃ cāsyānantadehe svātmabhūtatayā jñeyam / sahasreti viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa
analyzed: arthaḥ ananta kara locana tvam ca asya ananta dehe svātma bhūta tayā jñeyam sahasra iti viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa

original: hetuḥ / tathā yena sarvam idaṃ vyāptam / anyathā kiṃmayam etat syād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: hetuḥ tathā yena sarvam idam vyāptam anyathā kiṃmayam etat syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: yena kathambhūtenāpi / na saṃsthitenāpi kutrāpi na vartamānenāpi / kathaṃ / kiñcit
analyzed: yena kathambhūtena api na saṃsthitena api kutra api na vartamānena api katham kiñcid

original: leśenāpīty arthaḥ / nasaṃsthitatvaṃ vāsya grahītum aśakyatvāt //MT_3,9.67 //
analyzed: leśena api iti arthaḥ na saṃsthita tvam vā asya grahītum aśakya tvāt

original: nirindriyabalasyāpi yasyāśeṣendriyakriyāḥ / yasya nirmanaso 'py etā manonirmāṇarītayaḥ //MU_3,9.68//
analyzed: nirindriya balasya api yasya aśeṣa indriya kriyāḥ yasya nirmanasaḥ api etāḥ manaḥ nirmāṇa rītayaḥ

original: yasyāśeṣendriyakriyāḥ bhavanti / kathambhūtasyāpi / nirindriyabalasyāpi / aśeṣendriyakriyatvam
analyzed: yasya aśeṣa indriya kriyāḥ bhavanti kathambhūtasya api nirindriya balasya api aśeṣa indriya kriya tvam

original: asyendriyasārarūpatayā / yasya nirmanaso 'pi nirvikalpacinmātratayā manorūpasyāpi /
analyzed: asya indriya sāra rūpa tayā yasya nirmanasaḥ api nirvikalpa cit mātra tayā manaḥ rūpasya api

original: manonirmāṇarītayaḥ bhavanti / anyathā yena tena rūpeṇa bhāsamānānām āsāṃ kuta utthānaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ nirmāṇa rītayaḥ bhavanti anyathā yena tena rūpeṇa bhāsamānānām āsām kutas utthānam
syāt

original: yadanālocanād bhānti saṃsāroragabhītayaḥ / yasmin dṛṣṭe palāyante sarvathā sarvadetayaḥ //MU_3,9.69//
analyzed: yad anālocanāt bhānti saṃsāra uraga bhītayaḥ yasmin dṛṣṭe palāyante sarvathā sarvadā ītayaḥ

original: yadanālocanāt yadviṣayasamyagjñānābhāvāt / saṃsāroragabhītayaḥ saṃsārākhyasarpodbhavāni
analyzed: yad anālocanāt yad viṣaya samyak jñāna abhāvāt saṃsāra uraga bhītayaḥ saṃsāra ākhya sarpa udbhavāni

original: bhayāni / bhānti vilasanti / yathā rajjusamyagjñānābhāvāt uragabhītayaḥ sphurantīty
analyzed: bhayāni bhānti vilasanti yathā rajju samyak jñāna abhāvāt uraga bhītayaḥ sphuranti iti

original: uragapadābhiprāyaḥ / paramātmājñānād eva hi tasmin saṃsāraḥ tadbhītayaś ca bhānti /
analyzed: uraga pada abhiprāyaḥ paramātma ajñānāt eva hi tasmin saṃsāraḥ tad bhītayaḥ ca bhānti

original: yasmin paramātmani / dṛṣṭe svarūpatvenānubhūte sati / sarvathā sarvaprakāreṇa vartamānā /
analyzed: yasmin paramātmani dṛṣṭe svarūpa tvena anubhūte sati sarvathā sarva prakāreṇa vartamānā

original: ītayaḥ bādhāḥ / sarvadā sarvakāleṣu / palāyante dūre gacchanti / ītīnāṃ palāyanam
analyzed: ītayaḥ bādhāḥ sarvadā sarva kāleṣu palāyante dūre gacchanti ītīnām palāyanam

original: ītirūpatāviparyayeṇa paramātmarūpatājñānam eva / tāsām api paramārthataḥ tadrūpatvāt //MT_3,9.69 //
analyzed: īti rūpatā viparyayeṇa paramātma rūpatā jñānam eva tāsām api paramārthataḥ tad rūpa tvāt

original: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ / sati yasmin pravartante citrehāḥ spandapūrvikāḥ //MU_3,9.70//
analyzed: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpe iva kriyāḥ sati yasmin pravartante citrehāḥ spanda pūrvikāḥ

original: sākṣiṇi sarvāsāṃ staimityaspandāvasthānāṃ grāhakatvena sākṣibhūte / sphāre vyāpake /
analyzed: sākṣiṇi sarvāsām staimitya spanda avasthānām grāhaka tvena sākṣi bhūte sphāre vyāpake

original: ābhāse sphurattaikasāre / dhruve udāsīne / yasmin sati sannidhimātraṃ bhajati sati /
analyzed: ābhāse sphurat tā eka sāre dhruve udāsīne yasmin sati sannidhi mātram bhajati sati

original: citrehāḥ nānāvidhāḥ manovyāpārāḥ / kathambhūtāḥ / spandapūrvikāḥ śarīraceṣṭāḥ / pravartante /
analyzed: citrehāḥ nānāvidhāḥ manaḥ vyāpārāḥ kathambhūtāḥ spanda pūrvikāḥ śarīra ceṣṭāḥ pravartante

original: tatsahitā ity arthaḥ / asati āntare kasmin cittattve vikalpānāṃ śarīraceṣṭānāṃ cotthānaṃ
analyzed: tad sahitāḥ iti arthaḥ asati āntare kasmin cit tattve vikalpānām śarīra ceṣṭānām ca utthānam

original: yuktaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ / kā iva / kriyā iva lokakriyā iva / yathā dīpe sannidhimātraṃ
analyzed: yuktam na syāt iti bhāvaḥ kā iva kriyā iva loka kriyā iva yathā dīpe sannidhi mātram

original: bhajati lokakriyā svayam eva pravartante / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,9.70 //
analyzed: bhajati lokakriyā svayam eva pravartante tathā iti arthaḥ

original: yasmād ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ / taraṅgakaṇakallolavīcayo vāridher iva //MU_3,9.71//
analyzed: yasmāt ghaṭa paṭa ākāra padārtha śata paṅktayaḥ taraṅga kaṇa kallola vīcayaḥ vāridheḥ iva

original: yasmād upādānabhūtāt / yataḥ ghaṭapaṭākārapadārthaśatapaṅktayaḥ ghaṭapaṭasvarūpāḥ
analyzed: yasmāt upādāna bhūtāt yatas ghaṭa paṭa ākāra padārtha śata paṅktayaḥ ghaṭa paṭa svarūpāḥ

original: padārthaśatasamūhāḥ / bhavanti / yady api paramāṇvāder evopādānatvam anyair uktaṃ
analyzed: padārtha śata samūhāḥ bhavanti yadi api paramāṇu ādeḥ eva upādāna tvam anyaiḥ uktam

original: tathāpi cetanān prati tasyopādānatvābhāvāt kim api cetanācetanasvarūpam upādānaṃ
analyzed: tathā api cetanān prati tasya upādāna tva abhāvāt kim api cetana acetana svarūpam upādānam

original: kalpyam iti na vivādaḥ / kā iva / taraṅgakaṇakallolavīcaya iva / yathā tāḥ ambudheḥ
analyzed: kalpyam iti na vivādaḥ kā iva taraṅga kaṇa kallola vīcayaḥ iva yathā tāḥ ambudheḥ

original: bhavanti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,9.71 //
analyzed: bhavanti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: sa evānyatayodeti yaḥ padārthaśatabhramaiḥ / kaṭakāṅgadakeyūranūpurair iva kāñcanam //MU_3,9.72//
analyzed: saḥ eva anya tayā udeti yaḥ padārtha śata bhramaiḥ kaṭaka aṅgada keyūra nūpuraiḥ iva kāñcanam

original: sa eva cidākhyo 'pūrvarūpeṇa vartamāna evānyatayānyasvarūpeṇodeti udayaṃ yāty / anyasvarūpatām
analyzed: saḥ eva cit ākhyaḥ apūrva rūpeṇa vartamānaḥ eva anyatayā anya svarūpeṇa udeti udayam yāti anya svarūpa tām

original: iva bhajata ity arthaḥ / kaiḥ kṛtvā / padārthaśatabhramaiḥ padārthaśatarūpāḥ bhramāḥ /
analyzed: iva bhajate iti arthaḥ kaiḥ kṛtvā padārtha śata bhramaiḥ padārtha śata rūpāḥ bhramāḥ

original: taiḥ / padārthaśatair ity arthaḥ / śatapadaṃ cātrānantatāparam / kim iva / kāñcanam
analyzed: taiḥ padārtha śataiḥ iti arthaḥ śata padam ca atra ananta tā param kim iva kāñcanam

original: iva / yathā kāñcanaṃ / tad eva kaṭakāṅgadakeyūranūpurair udeti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,9.72 //
analyzed: iva yathā kāñcanam tat eva kaṭaka aṅgada keyūra nūpuraiḥ udeti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: yas tvam ekāvabhāsātmā yo 'ham ete janāś ca ye / yaś ca na tvam abuddhātman nāhaṃ naite janāś ca yaḥ //MU_3,9.73//
analyzed: yaḥ tvam eka avabhāsa ātmā yaḥ aham ete janāḥ ca ye yaḥ ca na tvam abuddha ātman na aham na ete janāḥ ca yaḥ

original: he abuddhātman adya tāvat ajñātaparamātmatattva / ekāvabhāsātmā kevalajñānasvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: he abuddha ātman adya tāvat ajñāta paramātma tattva eka avabhāsa ātmā kevala jñāna svarūpaḥ

original: yaḥ tvam upadeśyabhūtaḥ asti / tvattayā bhātīty arthaḥ / yaḥ aham upadeśakabhūtaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam upadeśya bhūtaḥ asti tvad tayā bhāti iti arthaḥ yaḥ aham upadeśaka bhūtaḥ

original: asti / mattayā bhātīty arthaḥ / yaś ca ya ete janāḥ asti / tattayā bhātīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: asti mad tayā bhāti iti arthaḥ yaḥ ca ye ete janāḥ asti tat tayā bhāti iti arthaḥ

original: sarvatra sāratayā sthitatvāt / nanu paricchinna eva tarhy asau nety āha yaś ceti /
analyzed: sarvatra sāra tayā sthita tvāt  nanu paricchinnaḥ eva tarhi asau na iti āha yaḥ ca iti

original: tvattādivikalparahitaśuddhacinmātrarūpeṇa paramārthataḥ sthitatvād ity arthaḥ //MT_3,9.73 //
analyzed: tvad tā ādi vikalpa rahita śuddha cit mātra rūpeṇa paramārthataḥ sthita tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: anyevāvyatiriktaiva saivāseva ca bhaṅgurā / payasīva taraṅgālī yasmin sphurati dṛśyabhūḥ //MU_3,9.74//
analyzed: anyā iva a vyatiriktā eva ca bhaṅgurā payasi iva taraṅga ālī yasmin sphurati dṛśya bhūḥ

original: bhaṅgurā naśvarasvabhāvā / dṛśyabhūḥ / dṛśyaṃ dṛśikriyāviṣayo bhāvajātaṃ / tad eva
analyzed: bhaṅgurā naśvara svabhāvā dṛśya bhūḥ dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā viṣayaḥ bhāva jātam tat eva

original: bhūḥ nānāracanādhāratvāt bhūmiḥ / sā yasminn ādhārabhūte / sphurati vilasati / citsvarūpasya
analyzed: bhūḥ nānā racanā ādhāra tvāt bhūmiḥ sā yasmin ādhāra bhūte sphurati vilasati cit svarūpasya

original: dṛśyādhāratvaṃ svapnadṛṣṭāntena jñeyaṃ / kathambhūtaivāvyatiriktaiva tato vyatirekam
analyzed: dṛśya ādhāra tvam svapna dṛṣṭāntena jñeyam kathambhūtā eva avyatiriktā eva tatas vyatirekam

original: anāpannaiva / anyevānyavat / bhāsamānety arthaḥ / avyatiriktasyānyatābhāsanaṃ vaicitryāvahaṃ /
analyzed: an āpannā eva anyā iva anya vat bhāsamānā iti arthaḥ avyatiriktasya anya tā bhāsanam vaicitrya āvaham

original: vyatirekābhāve 'pi jātivyaktyor iva aikyābhāvam āśaṅkya tanmayatāṃ kathayati saiveti /
analyzed: vyatireka abhāve api jāti vyaktyoḥ iva aikya abhāvam āśaṅkya tad maya tām kathayati sā eva iti

original: saiva na tu leśenāpy atadrūpatāmatī / aseva atadvad bhāsamānā / keva / taraṅgālīva /
analyzed: sā eva na tu leśena api a tad rūpa tā matī asā iva a tadvat bhāsamānā kā iva taraṅgālī iva

original: taraṅgālyāḥ ca payasi tadrūpatāyām apy atadrūpatayeva bhāsanaṃ sarvapratītisiddham
analyzed: taraṅgālyāḥ ca payasi tad rūpa tāyām api a tad rūpa tayā iva bhāsanam sarva pratīti siddham
eva

original: yataḥ kālasya kalanā yato dṛśyasya dṛśyatā / mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsāṃ vibhāsanam //MU_3,9.75//
analyzed: yatas kālasya kalanā yatas dṛśyasya dṛśya tā mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsām vibhāsanam

original: kālasya vartamānādyupādhyasahitasya vastunaḥ / yataḥ kalanā kalpanā bhavati / na
analyzed: kālasya vartamāna ādi upādhya sahitasya vastunaḥ yatas kalanā kalpanā bhavati na

original: hy āntaraṃ kalpayitāraṃ vinā kālasya kalpanā yukteti bhāvaḥ / yataḥ dṛśyasya dṛśyatā
analyzed: hi āntaram kalpayitāram vinā kālasya kalpanā yuktā iti bhāvaḥ yatas dṛśyasya dṛśya tā

original: bhavati / na hi draṣṭāraṃ vinā dṛśyasya dṛśyatvam upapadyate / yena mānasī kalanā
analyzed: bhavati na hi draṣṭāram vinā dṛśyasya dṛśya tvam upapadyate yena mānasī kalanā

original: bhavati / na hi sākṣiṇaṃ vinā mano 'pi sidhyati / yena bhāsāṃ ghaṭādijñānānāṃ / vibhāsanaṃ
analyzed: bhavati na hi sākṣiṇam vinā manaḥ api sidhyati yena bhāsām ghaṭa ādi jñānānām vibhāsanam

original: sphuraṇaṃ / bhavati / na hi jñātāraṃ vinā jñānāny utpadyante //MT_3,9.75 //
analyzed: sphuraṇam bhavati na hi jñātāram vinā jñānāni utpadyante

original: kriyāṃ rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ ca cetanam / yad vetsi tad asau devo yena vetsi tad apy asau //MU_3,9.76//
analyzed: kriyām rūpam rasam gandham sparśam śabdam ca cetanam yat vetsi tat asau devaḥ yena vetsi tat api asau

original: kriyām ity anena vetsīty asya sthāne karoṣīty etat sambandhanīyam / tenāyam arthaḥ /
analyzed: kriyām iti anena vetsi iti asya sthāne karoṣi iti etat sambandhanīyam tena ayam arthaḥ

original: tvaṃ / kriyāṃ yat karoṣi / tat karaṇam / api asau pūrvoktaḥ / devaḥ krīḍākārī / bhavati /
analyzed: tvam kriyām yat karoṣi tat karaṇam api asau pūrvoktaḥ devaḥ krīḍā kārī bhavati

original: yena karmendriyeṇa karoṣi / tat karmendriyam / apy asau devaḥ bhavati / tathā rūpaṃ
analyzed: yena karmendriyeṇa karoṣi tat karmendriyam api asau devaḥ bhavati tathā rūpam

original: rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ yad vetsi tad vedanam / asau devaḥ bhavati / yena dhīndriyapañcakena
analyzed: rasam gandham sparśam śabdam yat vetsi tat vedanam asau devaḥ bhavati yena dhīndriya pañcakena

original: vetsi tad apy asau devaḥ bhavati / tathā cetanam saṅkalpādikaṃ / yad vetsi tad asau
analyzed: vetsi tat api asau devaḥ bhavati tathā cetanam saṅkalpa ādikam yat vetsi tat asau

original: devaḥ bhavati / yenāntaḥkaraṇena / vetsi tad apy asau devaḥ bhavati / etena kriyāphalasya
analyzed: devaḥ bhavati yena antaḥkaraṇena vetsi tat api asau devaḥ bhavati etena kriyā phalasya

original: tatkaraṇasya ca tanmayatā kathitā / kartus tu sā nirvivādasiddhaiva //MT_3,9.76 //
analyzed: tad karaṇasya ca tad maya tā kathitā kartuḥ tu sā nirvivāda siddhā eva

original: evaṃ viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa tatsvarūpam uktvā tatpraveśopāyam āha
analyzed: evam viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa tad svarūpam uktvā tad praveśa upāyam āha

original: draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyānāṃ madhye yad darśanaṃ sthitam / sādho tadavadhānena svātmānam avabudhyase //MU_3,9.77//
analyzed: draṣṭṛ darśana dṛśyānām madhye yat darśanam sthitam sādho tad avadhānena sva ātmānam avabudhyase

original: he sādho paramātmabodhārha / tvaṃ tadavadhānena tatrāvadhānadānena / svātmānaṃ svarūpabhūtaṃ
analyzed: he sādho paramātma bodha arha tvam tad avadhānena tatra avadhāna dānena sva ātmānam svarūpa bhūtam

original: paramātmānam / avabudhyase jānāsi / tatra kutra / draṣṭṛdarśanadṛśyānāṃ trayāṇāṃ /
analyzed: paramātmānam avabudhyase jānāsi tatra kutra draṣṭṛ darśana dṛśyānām trayāṇām

original: madhye / yad darśanaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati / ayam atra nirṇayaḥ / sarvo vyavahāraḥ tāvat
analyzed: madhye yat darśanam sthitam bhavati ayam atra nirṇayaḥ sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ tāvat

original: tripuṭyām eva sampadyate / tatra draṣṭā kartā / darśanaṃ kriyā / dṛśyam ālambanabhūtaṃ
analyzed: tripuṭyām eva sampadyate tatra draṣṭā kartā darśanam kriyā dṛśyam ālambana bhūtam

original: karma / yadviṣayā kriyotpadyate / karaṇaṃ tv asādhāraṇakāraṇarūpam etebhyo na vyatiricyate /
analyzed: karma yad viṣayā kriyā utpadyate karaṇam tu asādhāraṇa kāraṇa rūpam etebhyaḥ na vyatiricyate

original: sāmagryā eva karaṇatvāt / tatrāhaṃ draṣṭety abhimānagrastād draṣṭuḥ grāhyaikarūpadṛśyaviṣayaṃ
analyzed: sāmagryāḥ eva karaṇa tvāt tatra aham draṣṭā iti abhimāna grastāt draṣṭuḥ grāhya eka rūpa dṛśya viṣayam

original: darśanam utpadyate / 'nyathā tayoḥ draṣṭṛdṛśyatāyogāt / draṣṭābhimānagrastatvān na
analyzed: darśanam utpadyate anyathā tayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśya tā yogāt draṣṭā abhimāna grasta tvāt na

original: jhagiti śuddhīkartuṃ śakyate / dṛśyaṃ tv atyantajaḍatayā tattulyayogakṣemam evātaḥ
analyzed: śuddhīkartum śakyate   tu

original: tau hitvā darśana evāvadhānaṃ vihitaṃ / nanu darśanam apy āśrayaviṣayadoṣeṇa dūṣitaṃ /
analyzed: tau hitvā darśane eva avadhānam vihitam nanu darśanam api āśraya viṣaya doṣeṇa dūṣitam

original: natarāṃ śuddhīkartuṃ śakyate / satyaṃ / draṣṭari sthitāyā ahantāyāḥ dṛśyasthāyāḥ
analyzed: natarām śuddhīkartum śakyate satyam draṣṭari sthitāyāḥ ahantāyāḥ dṛśya sthāyāḥ

original: jaḍatāyāś ca nivāraṇam aśakyam eva / leśata ubhayasparśadūṣitasya darśanasya tu aṃśabhāvena
analyzed: jaḍa tāyāḥ ca nivāraṇam aśakyam eva leśataḥ ubhaya sparśa dūṣitasya darśanasya tu aṃśa bhāvena

original: sthitadoṣadvayanivāraṇaṃ suśakam eva / tatreyaṃ rītiḥ / darśanaṃ madrūpaṃ nāsti /
analyzed: sthita doṣa dvaya nivāraṇam su śakam eva tatra iyam rītiḥ darśanam mad rūpam na asti

original: sphuṭaṃ madvyatiriktatvāt / madvyatiriktatvaṃ cāsya draṣṭṛtvābhāvāt dṛśyarūpam api
analyzed: sphuṭam mad vyatirikta tvāt mad vyatirikta tvam ca asya draṣṭṛ tva abhāvāt dṛśya rūpam api

original: nāsti / grāhakatvāt / ataḥ tābhyāṃ vyatiriktaṃ kim api grahītum aśakyam avyapadeśyaṃ
analyzed: na asti grāhaka tvāt atas tābhyām vyatiriktam kim api grahītum aśakyam a vyapadeśyam

original: darśanaṃ nāmāstīti siddhā darśanasya paramātmarūpatā / tato draṣṭṛdṛśyayoś ca sā
analyzed: darśanam nāma asti iti siddhā darśanasya paramātma rūpa tā tatas draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ ca sā

original: siddhataraiva / na hi darśanasambandhavilaye draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ sthitiḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: siddhatarā eva na hi darśana sambandha vilaye draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ sthitiḥ sambhavati

original: darśanāśrayatvenaiva draṣṭur draṣṭṛtvāt / tadviṣayatvena ca dṛśyasya dṛśyatvāt /
analyzed: darśana āśraya tvena eva draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tvāt tad viṣaya tvena ca dṛśyasya dṛśya tvāt

original: nakiñcidrūpatvasya / parikalpanā kalpanaṃ / bhavati / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha aśūnyatveti /

original: aśūnyatvāsambhavataḥ uktayuktyā kiñcidrūpatvāsambhavena / śūnyatvāśūnyate nakiñcittvakiñcittve /
analyzed: a śūnyatva asambhavataḥ ukta yuktyā kiñcid rūpa tva asambhavena śūnyatva aśūnyate

original: kutaḥ / na sta ity arthaḥ / sāpekṣayor ekanāśe dvayor api nāśād iti bhāvaḥ / kiñcidrūpatvābhāvaś
analyzed: kutas na staḥ iti arthaḥ sāpekṣayoḥ eka nāśe dvayoḥ api nāśāt iti bhāvaḥ kiñcid rūpa tva abhāvaḥ

original: ca nirālambaśuddhacinmātratayā jñeyaḥ //MT_3,10.14 //
analyzed: ca nirālamba śuddha cit mātra tayā jñeyaḥ

original: śūnyatvaṃ nivārya prakāśarūpatvaṃ nivārayati
analyzed: śūnya tvam nivārya prakāśa rūpa tvam nivārayati

original: brahmaṇy ayaṃ prakāśo hi na sambhavati bhūtajaḥ / sūryānalendutārādi kutas tatra kilāvyaye //MU_3,10.15//
analyzed: brahmaṇi ayam prakāśaḥ hi na sambhavati bhūta jaḥ sūrya anala indu tārā ādi kutas tatra kila avyaye

original: ayaṃ netreṇa dṛśyamāṇaḥ / bhūtajaḥ agnyādibhūtotpannaḥ / prakāśaḥ tejaḥ / hi niścaye /
analyzed: ayam netreṇa dṛśyamāṇaḥ bhūta jaḥ agni ādi bhūta utpannaḥ prakāśaḥ tejaḥ hi niścaye

original: brahmaṇi vyāpake vastuni / na sambhavati / cinmātratayā taduttīrṇatvāt / atra hetutvenottarārdham
analyzed: brahmaṇi vyāpake vastuni na sambhavati cit mātra tayā tad uttīrṇa tvāt atra hetu tvena uttara ardham

original: āha sūryeti / kilaśabdo hetutvadyotanārthaḥ / avyaye nāśarahite / sūryādīnām ākṛtimattvena
analyzed: āha sūrya iti kila śabdaḥ hetutva dyotana arthaḥ avyaye nāśa rahite sūrya ādīnām ākṛtimat tvena

original: nāśasambhavān nātra sthitir yuktā / tadrūpatāyās tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,10.15 //
analyzed: nāśa sambhavāt nā atra sthitiḥ yuktā tad rūpa tāyāḥ tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ

original: tamorūpatvaṃ nivārayati
analyzed: tamaḥ rūpa tvam nivārayati

original: mahābhūtaprakāśānām abhāvas tama ucyate / mahābhūtābhāvajaṃ tu tenātra na tamaḥ kvacit //MU_3,10.16//
analyzed: mahābhūta prakāśānām abhāvaḥ tamaḥ ucyate mahābhūta abhāva jam tu tena atra na tamaḥ kvacid

original: tejo'bhāvasyaiva tamastvaṃ vādibhiḥ pratipāditam iti bhāvaḥ / phalitam āha mahābhūteti /
analyzed: tejaḥ abhāvasya eva tamaḥ tvam vādibhiḥ pratipāditam iti bhāvaḥ phalitam āha mahābhūta iti

original: tu viśeṣe / mahābhūtābhāvajaṃ lakṣaṇayā mahābhūtaprakāśābhāvāt jātaṃ / tadrūpam iti
analyzed: tu viśeṣe mahābhūta abhāva jam lakṣaṇayā mahābhūta prakāśa abhāvāt jātam tat rūpam iti

original: yāvat / tamo / 'tra sadvastuni / tena mahābhūtaprakāśābhāvatvena hetunā / nāsti /
analyzed: yāvat tamaḥ atra sat vastuni tena mahābhūta prakāśa abhāva tvena hetunā na asti

original: kutra / kvacit kasminn apy aṃśe mahābhūtasthityāyatane / mahābhūtapratiyogikābhāvāsambhavena
analyzed: kutra kvacid kasmin api aṃśe mahābhūta sthiti āyatane mahābhūta pratiyogika abhāva asambhavena

original: tamo 'py atra na yuktaṃ / tadrūpasya tu kā katheti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,10.16 //
analyzed: tamaḥ api atra na yuktam tad rūpasya tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tejaso 'bhāve kathaṃ tat prakāśata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tejasaḥ abhāve katham tat prakāśate iti atra āha

original: svānubhūtiprakāśo 'sya kevalaṃ vyomarūpiṇaḥ / yo 'ntar asti sa tenaiva na tv anyenānubhūyate //MU_3,10.17//
analyzed: sva anubhūti prakāśaḥ asya kevalam vyoma rūpiṇaḥ yaḥ antar asti sa tena eva na tu anyena anubhūyate

original: vyomarūpiṇaḥ nakiñcidrūpasyāsya sadvastunaḥ / svānubhūtiḥ svāsvarūpabhūtā cāsāv anubhūtiḥ
analyzed: vyoma rūpiṇaḥ na kiñcid rūpasya asya sat vastunaḥ sva anubhūtiḥ sva asvarūpa bhūtā ca asau anubhūtiḥ

original: anubhavaḥ / svānubhūtiḥ / saiva prakāśaḥ prākaṭyakaraṇabhūtaṃ tejaḥ / svānubhūtyaivāsau
analyzed: anubhavaḥ sva anubhūtiḥ sā eva prakāśaḥ prākaṭya karaṇa bhūtam tejaḥ sva anubhūtyā eva asau

analyzed: bhāti na bāhya tejasā iti arthaḥ iti atra āha yaḥ antar iti yaḥ antar

original: asti / puruṣeṇa sa tenaivākaraṇabhūtena tenaivānubhūyate / svapratītiviṣayatāṃ nīyate /
analyzed: asti puruṣeṇa sa tena eva akaraṇa bhūtena tena eva anubhūyate sva pratīti viṣaya tām nīyate

original: na tv anyena / anyasya tatra praveśāsambhavāt / svayam evāsāv anubhavo 'nubhavitānubhavanam
analyzed: na tu anyena anyasya tatra praveśa asambhavāt svayam eva asau anubhavaḥ anubhavitā anubhavanam

original: anubhūtiviṣayaś ceti / na tatra kasyāpy apekṣeti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,10.17 //
analyzed: anubhūti viṣayaḥ ca iti na tatra kasya api apekṣā iti bhāvaḥ

original: prakṛtam anusandhatte
analyzed: prakṛtam anusandhatte

original: muktaṃ tamaḥprakāśābhyām ity etad ajaraṃ padam / ākāśakośam evainaṃ viddhi kośaṃ jagatsthiteḥ //MU_3,10.18//
analyzed: muktam tamaḥ prakāśābhyām iti etat ajaram padam ākāśa kośam eva enam viddhi kośam jagat sthiteḥ

original: iti anena prakāreṇa / etat avaśeṣatayā kathyamānam / ajaraṃ jarādoṣarahitaṃ / padaṃ
analyzed: iti anena prakāreṇa etat avaśeṣa tayā kathyamānam ajaram jarā doṣa rahitam padam

original: sthānaṃ / tamaḥprakāśābhyāṃ tamasā prakāśena ca / muktaṃ bhavati / khātmakatvam asya
analyzed: sthānam tamaḥ prakāśābhyām tamasā prakāśena ca muktam bhavati kha ātmaka tvam asya

original: nivārayituṃ prastauti / ākāśeti / tvam enaṃ paramātmānam / ākāśakośam eva ākāśamadhyam
analyzed: nivārayitum prastauti  ākāśa iti  tvam enam paramātmānam ākāśa kośam eva ākāśa madhyam

analyzed: eva jagat sthiteḥ kośam bhāṇḍāgāram viddhi jānīhi

original: dṛṣṭāntenaitad eva dṛḍhayati
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntena etat eva dṛḍhayati

original: bilvasya bilvasaṃjñasya yathā bhedo na kaścana / tatheha brahmajagator na manāg api bhinnatā //MU_3,10.19//
analyzed: bilvasya bilva saṃjñasya yathā bhedaḥ na kaścana tathā iha brahma jagatoḥ na manāk api bhinna tā

original: bilvasya bilvaphalasya / bilvasañjñasya bilveti saṃjñāpravṛttinimittasya vastunaḥ /
analyzed: bilvasya bilva phalasya bilva sañjñasya bilva iti saṃjñā pravṛtti nimittasya vastunaḥ

original: yathā yena prakāreṇa / kaścana ko 'pi / bhedaḥ nāsti / tathā tena prakāreṇehāsmiṃl
analyzed: yathā yena prakāreṇa kaścana kaḥ api bhedaḥ na asti tathā tena prakāreṇa iha asmin

original: lokatraye / brahmajagator manāg api bhinnatā na bhavati / yad eva brahma tad eva
analyzed: lokatraye brahma jagatoḥ manāk api bhinna tā na bhavati yat eva brahma tat eva

original: jagat / yad eva jagat tad eva brahmeti bhāvaḥ / bilvasya bilvamadhyasyeti vā pāṭhaḥ //MT_3,10.19 //
analyzed: jagat   yat eva   tat eva   iti

original: nanu tathāpi prakṛte kim āyātam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api prakṛte kim āyātam iti atra āha

original: salile 'ntar yathā vīcir mṛdo 'ntar ghaṭako yathā / tathā yatra jagatsattā tat kathaṃ khātmakaṃ bhavet //MU_3,10.20//
analyzed: salile antar yathā vīciḥ mṛdaḥ antar ghaṭakaḥ yathā tathā yatra jagat sattā tat katham kha ātmakam bhavet

original: salile jale / 'ntaḥ vīciḥ yathā bhavati / tathā tena prakāreṇa / yatra yasminn upādānabhūte /
analyzed: salile jale antar vīciḥ yathā bhavati tathā tena prakāreṇa yatra yasmin upādāna bhūte

original: jagatsattā bhavati / tad vastu / khātmakam ākāśasvarūpaṃ / kathaṃ bhavet //MT_3,10.20 //
analyzed: jagat sattā bhavati tat vastu kha ātmakam ākāśa svarūpam katham bhavet

original: cidrūpatānivāraṇārthaṃ prakriyām ārabhate
mṛjjalādyupamānaśrīḥ sākārātra samā na sā / brahma tv ākāśaviśadaṃ tasyāntaḥsthaṃ tathaiva tat //MU_3,10.21//
analyzed: mṛd jala ādi upamāna śrīḥ sa ākārā atra samā na sā brahma tu ākāśa viśadam tasya antar stham tathā eva tat

original: mṛjjalādyupamānaśrīḥ / atra brahmaviṣaye / samā yogyā / na bhavati / kuta ity apekṣāyām
analyzed: mṛd jala ādi upamāna śrīḥ atra brahma viṣaye samā yogyā na bhavati kutas iti apekṣāyām

original: āha / sākāreti / yataḥ sākārā ākārasahitā bhavati / sākāratvena kathaṃ mṛjjalāder
analyzed: āha sa ākārā iti yatas sa ākārā ākāra sahitā bhavati sa ākāra tvena katham mṛd jala ādeḥ

original: upamānayogyatvam ity / atrāha brahmeti / tuḥ viśeṣe / brahmākāśaviśadaṃ nirākāraṃ /

original: bhavati / sākārasya mṛdādeḥ nirākāraṃ brahma prati upamānatvaṃ na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /

original: phalitam āha / tasyeti / tat tato hetoḥ / tadantaḥsthaṃ tadantare sthitaṃ / jagat

original: punar apy upasaṃhāravyājena jagato nirākāratvaṃ sādhayati

original: tasmād yādṛk cidākāśam ākāśād api nirmalam / tadantaḥsthaṃ tādṛg eva jagacchabdārthabhāg api //MU_3,10.22//
analyzed: tasmāt yādṛś cit ākāśam ākāśāt api nirmalam tad antar stham tādṛś eva jagat śabda artha bhāj api

analyzed: tādṛś eva nirākāram eva bhavati kathambhūtam api jagat śabda artha bhāj api

original: nirdeśaḥ / tena jagadrūpatayā bhāsamānatvena jagacchabdārthatābhāg apīty arthaḥ //MT_3,10.22 //
analyzed: nirdeśaḥ tena jagat rūpa tayā bhāsamāna tvena jagat śabda artha tā bhāj api iti arthaḥ

original: marice 'ntar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktur na lakṣyate / cinmātratvaṃ parākāśe tathā cetyakalāṃ vinā //MU_3,10.23//
analyzed: marice antar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktuḥ na lakṣyate cit mātra tvam para ākāśe tathā cetya kalām vinā

original: yathā kenacit marice 'ntaḥ maricāntare / sthitaṃ taikṣṇyaṃ tiktatā / bhoktuḥ ṛte
analyzed: yathā kenacid marice antar marica antare sthitam taikṣṇyam tikta tā bhoktuḥ ṛte

original: na lakṣyate na dṛśyate / bhoktari tu sati tenaiva lakṣyate ity arthaḥ / tathā parākāśe
analyzed: na lakṣyate na dṛśyate bhoktari tu sati tena eva lakṣyate iti arthaḥ tathā para ākāśe

original: paramātmani / sthitaṃ cinmātratvaṃ / cetyakalāṃ cetyāṃśaṃ vinā / na lakṣyate / cetyacarvaṇād
eva hi cinmātrasya cinmātratā jñāyate //MT_3,10.23 //
analyzed: eva hi cit mātrasya cit mātra tā jñāyate

original: phalitam āha
analyzed: phalitam āha

original: tasmāc cid apy acidrūpā cetyariktatayātmani / jagattā tādṛśy eveyaṃ tādṛṅmātrātmatāvaśā //MU_3,10.24//
analyzed: tasmāt cit api acit rūpā cetya rikta tayā ātmani jagat tā tādṛśī evā iyam tādṛś mātrā ātma tā vaśā

original: tasmāt tato hetoḥ / cetyariktatayā cetyarāhityenātmani cinmātrākhye svasvarūpe /
analyzed: tasmāt tatas hetoḥ cetya rikta tayā cetya rāhityena ātmani cit mātra ākhye sva svarūpe

original: cid api acid eva bhavati / cetyasyaiva pūrvanayena cinmātratādṛḍhīkaraṇasāmarthyāt
analyzed: cit api acit eva bhavati cetyasya eva pūrva nayena cit mātra tā dṛḍhīkaraṇa sāmarthyāt

original: tasya cātrābhāvāt / tasyābhāvaś cātra brahmāntaḥsthatvena brahmatayaiva jñeyaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca atra abhāvāt tasya abhāvaḥ ca atra brahma antar stha tvena brahma tayā eva jñeyaḥ
