analyzed: brahma abhinne jagati api acit tvam atidiśati jagat tā iti iyam jagat tā api tādṛśī

original: eva cidrūpabrahmābhinnatvenācidrūpaiva bhavati / atra hetutayā viśeṣaṇam āha / tādṛṅmātrātmatāvaśeti /
analyzed: eva cit rūpa brahma abhinna tvena acit rūpā eva bhavati atra hetutayā viśeṣaṇam āha tādṛś mātra ātma tā vaśā iti

original: yataḥ tādṛṅmātrātmatāyāḥ acidrūpabrahmamātrasvarūpatāyāḥ / vaśā āyattā / acidbrahmasvarūpiṇīty
analyzed: yatas tādṛś mātra ātmatāyāḥ acit rūpa brahma mātra svarūpa tāyāḥ vaśā āyattā acit brahma svarūpiṇī iti

original: arthaḥ / etena brahmajagatoḥ sarvathābhedo 'pi sādhitaḥ / na brahmaṇo 'cidrūpamātratā /
analyzed: arthaḥ etena brahma jagatoḥ sarvathā abhedaḥ api sādhitaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ acit rūpa mātra tā

original: tasyā agre 'pi sādhyamānatvāt //MT_3,10.24 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ agre api sādhyamāna tvāt

original: nanu jagataḥ sarvathābhinnatve rūpālokamanaskārāḥ kiṃrūpā ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jagataḥ sarvathā abhinna tve rūpa āloka manaskārāḥ kiṃrūpāḥ iti atra āha

original: rūpālokamanaskārās tanmayā eva netarat / yathāsthitam ato viśvaṃ suṣuptaṃ turyam eva vā //MU_3,10.25//
analyzed: rūpa āloka manaskārāḥ tad mayāḥ eva na itarat yathā sthitam atas viśvam suṣuptam turyam eva vā

original: rūpālokamanaskārāḥ / rūpaṃ nīlapītādi / ālokaḥ taddarśanam karaṇabhūtaḥ prakāśo vā /
analyzed: rūpa āloka manaskārāḥ rūpam nīla pīta ādi ālokaḥ tad darśanam karaṇa bhūtaḥ prakāśaḥ vā

original: manaskāraḥ mānasaḥ parāmarśaḥ / tadviṣayāḥ ete tanmayā eva / evaśabdārtham āha netarad
analyzed: manaskāraḥ mānasaḥ parāmarśaḥ tad viṣayāḥ ete tad mayāḥ eva evaśabda artham āha na itarat

original: iti / tanmayatvaṃ caiṣāṃ tadviṣayatvaṃ vināsatkalpatvāt / phalitam āha yatheti /
analyzed: iti tad maya tvam ca eṣām tad viṣaya tvam vinā asat kalpa tvāt phalitam āha yathā iti

original: ato hetoḥ / viśvaṃ jagat / yathāsthitam anena prakāreṇaiva vartamānaṃ / na tu yayā
analyzed: atas hetoḥ viśvam jagat yathā sthitam anena prakāreṇa eva vartamānam na tu yayā

original: kayāpi śaktyāntardhim āpāditaṃ / suṣuptaṃ bhavati / suṣuptau bhedasaṃskāram āśaṅkyāha
analyzed: kayā api śaktyā antardhim āpāditam suṣuptam bhavati suṣuptau bheda saṃskāram āśaṅkya āha

original: turyam iti / turyasvarūpacinmātraikamayam eva vā bhavatīty arthaḥ //MT_3,10.25 //
analyzed: turyam iti turya svarūpa cit mātra eka mayam eva vā bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: jagataḥ turyarūpabrahmatvena yogino vyavahāre 'pi brahmamayatām āha
analyzed: jagataḥ turya rūpa brahma tvena yoginaḥ vyavahāre api brahma maya tām āha

original: tena yogī suṣuptātmā vyavahāry api śāntadhīḥ / āste brahma nirābhāsaṃ sarvabhāsāṃ samudgakam //MU_3,10.26//
analyzed: tena yogī suṣupta ātmā vyavahārī api śānta dhīḥ  / āste brahma nirābhāsam sarva bhāsām samudgakam

original: tena pūrvoktena hetunā / yogī jagadbrahmaikatve samāhitaḥ / brahma brahmasvarūpam /
analyzed: tena pūrva uktena hetunā yogī jagat brahma ekatve samāhitaḥ brahma brahma svarūpam

original: āste / kuta evaṃrūpa āste / yataḥ vyavahāry api vyavahāraṃ kurvāṇo 'pi / śāntadhīḥ
analyzed: āste kutas evaṃrūpaḥ āste yatas vyavahārī api vyavahāram kurvāṇaḥ api śānta dhīḥ

original: kṣobharahitabuddhiḥ / īdṛśo 'pi kutaḥ / yataḥ suṣuptātmā prapañcaṃ prati suptāntaḥkaraṇaḥ /
analyzed: kṣobha rahita buddhiḥ īdṛśaḥ api kutas yatas suṣupta ātmā prapañcam prati supta antaḥkaraṇaḥ

original: prapañcaṃ prati suptamanaso hi śāntadhītvaṃ yuktam eva / kathambhūtaṃ brahma / nirābhāsaṃ
analyzed: prapañcam prati supta manasaḥ hi śānta dhī tvam yuktam eva kathambhūtam brahma nirābhāsam

original: nānābhāsebhyo niṣkrāntaṃ / taduttīrṇam ity arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / sarvabhāsāṃ
analyzed: nānā ābhāsebhyaḥ niṣkrāntam tat uttīrṇam iti arthaḥ punar kathambhūtam sarva bhāsām

original: sarveṣāṃ ghaṭapaṭādijñānānāṃ / samudgakam udbhūtisthānam //MT_3,10.26 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ghaṭa paṭa ādi jñānānām samudgakam udbhūti sthānam

original: punar api prakṛtaṃ brahmajagadabhedam eva kathayati
analyzed: punar api prakṛtam brahma jagat abhedam eva kathayati

original: ākāriṇi yathā saumye sthitas toye dravakramaḥ / anākṛtau tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ pare //MU_3,10.27//
analyzed: ākāriṇi yathā saumye sthitaḥ toye drava kramaḥ anākṛtau tathā viśvam sthitam tad sadṛśam pare

original: ākāriṇi bāhyendriyagrāhyasvarūpayukte / saumye kṣobharahite / toye / dravakramaḥ
analyzed: ākāriṇi bāhya indriya grāhya svarūpa yukte saumye kṣobha rahite toye drava kramaḥ

original: ādyaspandanāsamavāyikāraṇabhūtaguṇaviśeṣaparipāṭī / yathā sthitaḥ bhavati / tathānākṛtau
analyzed: ādya spandana asamavāyi kāraṇa bhūta guṇa viśeṣa paripāṭī yathā sthitaḥ bhavati tathā anākṛtau

original: pare parabrahmaṇi / viśvaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati / kathambhūtaṃ / tatsadṛśam anākṛtīty
analyzed: pare para brahmaṇi viśvam sthitam bhavati kathambhūtam tad sadṛśam anākṛti iti

original: arthaḥ / saumye jale yathā sphuṭībhaviṣyamāṇatvena kiñcittvārho 'pi dravākhyo guṇaḥ
analyzed: arthaḥ saumye jale yathā sphuṭībhaviṣyamāṇa tvena kiñcittva arhaḥ api drava ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ

original: tanmayaḥ / tathā bhāsamānatvena bhinnatvārho 'pi prapañcaḥ brahmamaya iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,10.27 //
analyzed: tad mayaḥ tathā bhāsamāna tvena bhinna tva arhaḥ api prapañcaḥ brahma mayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: abhedam uktvā tattvam eva kathayati
analyzed: abhedam uktvā tattvam eva kathayati

original: pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati nirākārān nirākṛti / brahmaṇo viśvam ābhātaṃ tad viśvārthavivarjitam //MU_3,10.28//
analyzed: pūrṇāt pūrṇam prasarati nirākārāt nirākṛti brahmaṇaḥ viśvam ābhātam tat viśva artha vivarjitam

original: pūrṇād brahmaṇaḥ / pūrṇarūpaṃ jagat / prasarati vilasati / prasaraṇaṃ cātra prapañcākrāntabuddhiṃ
analyzed: pūrṇāt brahmaṇaḥ pūrṇa rūpam jagat prasarati vilasati prasaraṇam ca atra prapañca ākrānta buddhim

original: śiṣyaṃ prayuktam / nirākārāt brahmaṇaḥ / nirākṛti jagat / prasarati / ataḥ brahmaṇaḥ
analyzed: śiṣyam prayuktam nirākārāt brahmaṇaḥ nirākṛti jagat prasarati atas brahmaṇaḥ

original: yad viśvam ābhātaṃ bhānam āgataṃ / tat viśvārthavivarjitam viśvārthaiḥ ghaṭapaṭādibhiḥ
analyzed: yat viśvam ābhātam bhānam āgatam tat viśva artha vivarjitam viśva arthaiḥ ghaṭa paṭa ādibhiḥ

original: vivarjitaṃ bhavati / brahmaikamayaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ //MT_3,10.28 //
analyzed: vivarjitam bhavati brahma eka mayam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati saṃsthitaṃ pūrṇam eva tat / ato viśvam anutpannaṃ yac cotpannaṃ tad eva tat //MU_3,10.29//
analyzed: pūrṇāt pūrṇam prasarati saṃsthitam pūrṇam eva tat  atas viśvam anutpannam yat ca utpannam tat eva tat

original: pūrṇād brahmaṇaḥ / pūrṇarūpaṃ jagat / prasarati vilasati / prasaraṇaṃ saṃsthitaṃ
analyzed: pūrṇāt brahmaṇaḥ pūrṇa rūpam jagat prasarati vilasati prasaraṇam saṃsthitam

original: bhavati / na tu tatprasaraṇena kācit khaṇḍanāsya jāyate ity arthaḥ / phalitam āhāta
analyzed: bhavati na tu tad prasaraṇena kācid khaṇḍanā asya jāyate iti arthaḥ phalitam āha atas

original: iti / ataḥ pūrvoktād dhetoḥ / viśvam anutpannaṃ bhavati / brahmatvena tasya sadā
analyzed: iti atas pūrva uktāt hetoḥ viśvam anutpannam bhavati brahmatvena tasya sadā

original: sthitatvāt / viśvānutpannatvam asahamānaṃ praty āha yac ceti / yat cotpannaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sthita tvāt viśva anutpanna tvam asahamānam prati āha yat ca iti yat ca utpannam bhavati

original: tat tad eva brahmaiva / bhavati / utpannasyāpi brahmatvāviruddhatvād ity arthaḥ //MT_3,10.29 //
analyzed: tat tat eva brahmā eva bhavati utpannasya api brahmatva aviruddha tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: etāvatyā prakriyayā siddham acidrūpatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kathayati
analyzed: etāvatyā prakriyayā siddham acit rūpa tvam brahmaṇaḥ kathayati

original: cetyāsambhavatas tasmin pade keva cidarthatā / āsvādakāsambhavato marice keva tīkṣṇatā //MU_3,10.30//
analyzed: cetya asambhavataḥ tasmin pade kā iva cit artha tā āsvādaka asambhavataḥ marice kā iva tīkṣṇa tā

original: ata ity adhyāhāryam / ato hetoḥ / cetyāsambhavataḥ / cetyasya cidviṣayasya jagato /
analyzed: atas iti adhyāhāryam atas hetoḥ cetya asambhavataḥ cetyasya cit viṣayasya jagataḥ

original: 'sambhavataḥ / tasmin pade brahmasvarūpe pade / keva cidarthatā cicchabdapravṛttinimittatā /
analyzed: asambhavataḥ tasmin pade brahma svarūpe pade kā iva cit artha tā cit śabda pravṛtti nimitta tā

original: bhavati / na kāpīty arthaḥ / cetyaviṣayīkaraṇenaiva hi citaḥ cid iti nāma yuktam /
analyzed: bhavati na kā api iti arthaḥ cetya viṣayīkaraṇena eva hi citaḥ cit iti nāma yuktam

original: cetyābhāve tu tan na yuktam / cetyābhāvaś ca savistaraṃ pūrvaṃ sādhitaḥ / cidarthatāniṣedhaś
analyzed: cetya abhāve tu tat na yuktam cetya abhāvaḥ ca sa vistaram pūrvam sādhitaḥ cit artha tā niṣedhaḥ

original: cātra taduttīrṇatayā jñeyaḥ na jaḍatayeti / atra samarthakaṃ dṛṣṭāntam āha āsvādaketi /
analyzed: ca atra tad uttīrṇa tayā jñeyaḥ na jaḍa tayā iti  atra samarthakam dṛṣṭāntam āha āsvādaka iti

original: keva na kāpīty arthaḥ / āsvādakāsambhavata āsvādakāsambhavena ity arthaḥ //MT_3,10.30 //
analyzed: kā iva na kā api iti arthaḥ āsvādaka asambhavataḥ āsvādaka asambhavena iti arthaḥ

original: punar apy etad eva kathayati
analyzed: punar api etat eva kathayati

original: satyeveyam asatyaiva citeś cittoditā pare / abhāvāt pratibimbasya pratibimbārhatā kutaḥ //MU_3,10.31//
analyzed: satī iva iyam asatyā eva citeḥ citta uditā pare abhāvāt pratibimbasya pratibimba arha tā kutas

original: citeḥ cittā citsambandhī cidbhāvaḥ / pare paramātmani / asatyaiva paramārthato 'satsvarūpaiva
analyzed: citeḥ cittā cit sambandhī cit bhāvaḥ pare paramātmani asatyā eva paramārthataḥ asat svarūpā eva

original: satī / satyeva satyavad / uditātra dṛṣṭāntam āha abhāvād iti / darpaṇasyeti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: satī satyā iva satya vat uditā atra dṛṣṭāntam āha abhāvāt iti darpaṇasya iti śeṣaḥ

original: yathā darpaṇasya pratibimbārhatā pratibimbenaiva jñāyate / tadabhāve tu sā na jñāyate /
analyzed: yathā darpaṇasya pratibimba arha tā pratibimbena eva jñāyate tad abhāve tu sā na jñāyate

original: evaṃ parasya cittā cetyenaiva jñāyate / tadabhāve tu kuto jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,10.31 //
analyzed: evam parasya cittā cetyena eva jñāyate tad abhāve tu kutas jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: jīvādirūpatānirāsārthaṃ paramātmatattvaṃ viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: jīva ādi rūpatā nirāsa artham paramātma tattvam viśinaṣṭi

original: paramāṇor api paraṃ tad aṇīyo 'py aṇīyasaḥ / śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ tad ākāśodarād api //MU_3,10.32//
analyzed: paramāṇoḥ api param tat aṇīyaḥ api aṇīyasaḥ  śuddham sūkṣmam param śāntam tat ākāśa udarāt api

original: tat brahma / paramāṇor api param aṇīyaḥ atisūkṣmaṃ / bhavati / kathambhūtād api /
analyzed: tat brahma paramāṇoḥ api param aṇīyaḥ ati sūkṣmam bhavati kathambhūtāt api

original: aṇīyaso 'pi dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sūkṣmatarād api / sūkṣmataratvaṃ cāsya bāhyendriyāgrāhyatvena
analyzed: aṇīyasaḥ api dvyaṇuka ādi apekṣayā sūkṣmatarāt api sūkṣmatara tvam ca asya bāhya indriya agrāhya tvena

original: jñeyam / tat brahma / kathambhūtaṃ / śuddhaṃ rāgādirajo'dūṣitaṃ / sūkṣmaṃ / param
analyzed: jñeyam tat brahma kathambhūtam śuddham rāga ādi rajaḥ a dūṣitam sūkṣmam param

original: uttīrṇaṃ / śāntaṃ sarvapracāraśūnyaṃ / kasmād api / ākāśodarād api //MT_3,10.32 //
analyzed: uttīrṇam śāntam sarva pracāra śūnyam kasmāt api ākāśa udarāt api

original: dikkālādyanavacchinnarūpatvād ativistṛtam / tad anādyantam ābhāsaṃ bhāsanīyavivarjitam //MU_3,10.33//
analyzed: diś kāla ādi anavacchinna rūpa tvāt ati vistṛtam tat anādi antam ābhāsam bhāsanīya vivarjitam

original: tat brahmātivistṛtam ativistīrṇaṃ bhavati / kutaḥ / dikkālādyanavacchinnarūpatvāt /
analyzed: tat brahma ativistṛtam ati vistīrṇam bhavati kutas diś kāla ādi anavacchinna rūpa tvāt

original: ādiśabdena vastuparigrahaḥ trividhaparicchedaśūnyatvād ity arthaḥ / nanu katham asya
analyzed: ādi śabdena vastu parigrahaḥ trividha pariccheda śūnyatvāt iti arthaḥ nanu katham asya

original: digādiparicchedaśūnyatvaṃ / tathātve 'py ativistṛtatvam iti cet / dik tāvat cetyamānā
analyzed: diś ādi pariccheda śūnyatvam tathātve api ati vistṛta tvam iti ced diś tāvat cetyamānā

original: na vā / na cet tarhi svayam evāsiddhā katham anyaṃ paricchedayet / cetyamānā cet
analyzed: na vā na ced tarhi svayam eva asiddhā katham anyam paricchedayet cetyamānā ced

original: tarhi citaiva sā paricchinnā kathaṃ tāṃ paricchedayet / evaṃ kālāder api jñeyam /
analyzed: tarhi citā eva sā paricchinnā katham tām paricchedayet evam kāla ādeḥ api jñeyam

original: digādibhiḥ paricchinnam eva paricchinnaṃ bhavati / tadabhāve tv ativistṛtam eveti
analyzed: diś ādibhiḥ paricchinnam eva paricchinnam bhavati tad abhāve tu ati vistṛtam eva iti

original: sthitam asyātivistṛtatvam / punaḥ kathambhūtam / anādyantaṃ yathā tathā kalpyamānayor
analyzed: sthitam asya ati vistṛta tvam punar kathambhūtam anādi antam yathā tathā kalpyamānayoḥ

original: apy ādyantayoḥ sākṣitvād ādyantarahitam / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / bhāsanīyavivarjitam
analyzed: api ādi antayoḥ sākṣi tvāt ādi anta rahitam punar kathambhūtam bhāsanīya vivarjitam

original: ābhāsajñeyarahitajñānasvarūpam ity arthaḥ //MT_3,10.33 //
analyzed: ābhāsa jñeya rahita jñāna svarūpam iti arthaḥ

original: proktaviśeṣaṇāvaṣṭambhena jīvādirūpatām asya nivārayati
analyzed: prokta viśeṣaṇa avaṣṭambhena jīva ādi rūpa tām asya nivārayati

original: cidrūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā / kathaṃ syāc cittatākārā vāsanānilarūpiṇī //MU_3,10.34//
analyzed: cit rūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā  katham syāt citta tā ākārā vāsanā anila rūpiṇī

original: yatraivaṃvidhaguṇaviśiṣṭe brahmaṇi / cidrūpam eva bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ cidrūpatvam
analyzed: yatra evaṃvidha guṇa viśiṣṭe brahmaṇi cit rūpam eva bhāva pradhānaḥ nirdeśaḥ cit rūpa tvam

original: eva / no labhyate pūrvanyāyena nānubhūyate / tatra tādṛśe brahmaṇi / jīvatā jīvabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: eva no labhyate pūrva nyāyena na anubhūyate tatra tādṛśe brahmaṇi jīvatā jīva bhāvaḥ

original: kathaṃ syāt / kathambhūtā / cittatākārā cetyaśayanāviṣṭaṃ cittatvaṃ cittaṃ / tadrūpiṇīty
analyzed: katham syāt kathambhūtā citta tā ākārā cetya śayana āviṣṭam citta tvam cittam tad rūpiṇī iti

original: arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtā / vāsanānilarūpiṇī / cetyabhāvanā vāsanā / saiva calattayānilaḥ /
analyzed: arthaḥ punar kathambhūtā vāsanā anila rūpiṇī cetya bhāvanā vāsanā sā eva calat tayā anilaḥ

original: tadrūpiṇī / śuddhā cidrūpatāpi yatra nāsti cetyaśayanāviṣṭāyā jīvatāyāḥ kā tatra
analyzed: tad rūpiṇī śuddhā cit rūpa tā api yatra nā asti cetya śayana āviṣṭāyāḥ jīva tāyāḥ kā tatra

original: vārteti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,10.34 //
analyzed: vārttā iti bhāvaḥ

original: cidrūpatvābhāvenaiva yugapajjīvāditāṃ nirākaroti
analyzed: cit rūpa tva abhāvena eva yugapad jīva ādi tām nirākaroti

original: cidrūpānudayād eva tatra nāsty eva jīvatā / na buddhitā na cittattvaṃ nendriyatvaṃ na vāsanāḥ //MU_3,10.35//
analyzed: cit rūpa anudayāt eva tatra na asti eva jīva tā na buddhi tā na cit tattvam na indriya tvam na vāsanāḥ

original: cidrūpānudayād eva citsvarūpānudbhūter eva / na tv anyena hetunā / tadrūpānudayas
analyzed: cit rūpa anudayāt eva cit svarūpa anudbhūteḥ eva na tu anyena hetunā tad rūpa anudayaḥ

original: tu pūrvaṃ kathitaḥ / sūkṣmarūpeṇa sthitā cetyabhāvanā vāsanā / nanu cidrūpānudayena
analyzed: tu pūrvam kathitaḥ sūkṣma rūpeṇa sthitā cetya bhāvanā vāsanā nanu cit rūpa anudayena

original: katham atra jīvāditā nāsti / satyaṃ / ciducchūnatāyā eva jīvādibhāvena tadrūpatvānudaye
analyzed: katham atra jīva ādi tā na asti satyam cit ucchūna tāyāḥ eva jīva ādi bhāvena tad rūpa tva anudaye

original: yuktam eva jīvatādyabhāvatvam iti na virodhaḥ //MT_3,10.35 //
analyzed: yuktam eva jīva tā ādi abhāva tvam iti na virodhaḥ

original: phalitam āha
analyzed: phalitam āha

original: evaṃ sthitaṃ layārambhapūrṇam apy ajaraṃ padam / asmaddṛṣṭyā sthitaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyam ākāśato 'dhikam //MU_3,10.36//
analyzed: evam sthitam laya ārambha pūrṇam api ajaram padam asmad dṛṣṭyā sthitam śāntam śūnyam ākāśataḥ adhikam

original: layārambhapūrṇaṃ sthitam api ajaraṃ jarākhyaśarīradharmarahitaṃ / padaṃ paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: laya ārambha pūrṇam sthitam api ajaram jarā ākhya śarīra dharma rahitam padam paramātma lakṣaṇam

original: sthānam / asmaddṛṣṭyākāśataḥ ākāśāpekṣayādhikaṃ śāntaṃ / tathā śūnyaṃ nakiñcidrūpaṃ /
analyzed: sthānam asmad dṛṣṭi ākāśataḥ ākāśa apekṣayā adhikam śāntam tathā śūnyam na kiñcid rūpam

original: sthitaṃ bhavati / katham / evaṃ pūrvoktayā yuktyety arthaḥ //MT_3,10.36 //
analyzed: sthitam bhavati katham evam pūrva uktayā yuktyā iti arthaḥ

original: paramātmasvarūpaṃ durbodhaṃ jñātvā punar api śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: paramātma svarūpam durbodham jñātvā punar api śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: paramārthasya kiṃ rūpaṃ tasyānantacidākṛteḥ / punar etat samācakṣva nipuṇaṃ bodhavṛddhaye //MU_3,10.37//
analyzed: paramārthasya kim rūpam tasya ananta cit ākṛteḥ punar etat samācakṣva nipuṇam bodha vṛddhaye

original: tvaṃ punaḥ nipuṇaṃ samyak / bodhavṛddhaye paramātmaviṣayajñānavṛddhaye / etat samācakṣva
analyzed: tvam punar nipuṇam samyak bodha vṛddhaye paramātma viṣaya jñāna vṛddhaye etat samācakṣva

original: kathaya / etat kiṃ / tasya prasiddhasyānantacidākṛteḥ digādyaparicchinnacitsvarūpasya /
analyzed: kathaya etat kim tasya prasiddhasya ananta cit ākṛteḥ diś ādi aparicchinna cit svarūpasya

original: paramārthasya satyasvarūpasya paramātmanaḥ / kiṃ rūpam astīti //MT_3,10.37 //
analyzed: paramārthasya satya svarūpasya paramātmanaḥ kim rūpam asti iti

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram āha

original: mahāpralayasampattau sarvakāraṇakāraṇam / śiṣyate yat paraṃ brahma tad idaṃ varṇyate śṛṇu //MU_3,10.38//
analyzed: mahāpralaya sampattau sarva kāraṇa kāraṇam śiṣyate yat param brahma tat idam varṇyate śṛṇu

original: mahāpralayasampattau turye turyātīte mahākalpāntasamaye vā / kāraṇakāraṇaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ /
analyzed: mahāpralaya sampattau turye turyātīte mahākalpa anta samaye vā kāraṇa kāraṇam mūla kāraṇam

original: yat paraṃ brahma jagadbhāvena bṛṃhāṃ gataṃ paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ vastu / śiṣyate mahāpralayasākṣibhāvena
analyzed: yat param brahma jagat bhāvena bṛṃhām gatam paramātma lakṣaṇam vastu śiṣyate mahāpralaya sākṣi bhāvena

original: śiṣṭaṃ bhavati / mayā tad idaṃ varṇyate / 'taḥ tvaṃ śṛṇu //MT_3,10.38 //
analyzed: śiṣṭam bhavati mayā tat idam varṇyate atas tvam śṛṇu

original: paramātmasvarūpam eva varṇayati
analyzed: paramātma svarūpam eva varṇayati

original: nāśayitvā svam ātmānaṃ manaso vṛttisaṅkṣaye / yad rūpaṃ yad anākhyeyaṃ tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ //MU_3,10.39//
analyzed: nāśayitvā svam ātmānam manasaḥ vṛtti saṅkṣaye yat rūpam yat anākhyeyam tat rūpam tasya vastunaḥ

original: tasya vastunaḥ paraṃ brahmāparaparyāyasya paramātmalakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ / tat rūpaṃ
analyzed: tasya vastunaḥ param brahma apara paryāyasya paramātma lakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ tat rūpam

original: bhavati / tat kiṃ / yat tad rūpaṃ / śiṣyata iti śeṣaḥ / śiṣyate svanāśasākṣibhāvena
analyzed: bhavati tat kim yat tat rūpam śiṣyate iti śeṣaḥ śiṣyate sva nāśa sākṣi bhāvena

original: śiṣṭaṃ bhavati / kasya / manasaḥ / kiṃ kṛtvā / svam ātmānaṃ nāśayitvā śuddhacinmātre
analyzed: śiṣṭam bhavati kasya manasaḥ kim kṛtvā svam ātmānam nāśayitvā śuddha cit mātre

original: layaṃ nītvā / kasmin sati / vṛttisaṅkṣaye vṛttināśe sati ity arthaḥ / tad rūpaṃ kiṃ /
analyzed: layam nītvā kasmin sati vṛtti saṅkṣaye vṛtti nāśe sati iti arthaḥ tat rūpam kim

original: yat anākhyeyaṃ bhavati / atiśuddhatvena ākhyāyogyaṃ na bhavatīty arthaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yat anākhyeyam bhavati ati śuddha tvena ākhyā yogyam na bhavati iti arthaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ

original: manasaiva manaḥ chittveti nyāyena kiñcinmātraṃ samyakjñānena saṃsārakalanābhyo niṣkrāntaṃ
analyzed: manasā eva manaḥ chittvā iti nyāyena kiñcid mātram samyak jñānena saṃsāra kalanābhyaḥ niṣkrāntam

original: śuddhaṃ manaḥ bhāvanābalena śuddhāśuddhavṛttikṣayeṇa hetunā śuddhāśuddhaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: śuddham manaḥ bhāvanā balena śuddha aśuddha vṛtti kṣayeṇa hetunā śuddha aśuddham svam rūpam

original: nāśayati / tataḥ tan manaḥ śuddhatare kutrāpy anākhyeye layībhūtam anākhyeyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: nāśayati tatas tat manaḥ śuddhatare kutra api anākhyeye layībhūtam anākhyeyam bhavati

original: etadrūpatā ca suṣuptau sarvair anubhūyate / kiṃ tu mūḍhatāmiśrā / tac ca mano yadā
analyzed: etad rūpa tā ca suṣuptau sarvaiḥ anubhūyate kim tu mūḍha tā miśrā tat ca manaḥ yadā

original: tādṛk syāt tadāsya paramātmatābhāvaḥ bhavatīti / tatraiva yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam
analyzed: tādṛś syāt tadā asya parama ātma tā bhāvaḥ bhavati iti tatra eva yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam
iti

original: nāsti dṛśyaṃ jagad draṣṭā dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat / bhātīti bhāsanaṃ yat syāt tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ //MU_3,10.40//
analyzed: na asti dṛśyam jagat draṣṭā dṛśya abhāvāt vilīna vat bhāti iti bhāsanam yat syāt tat rūpam tasya vastunaḥ

original: tasya vastunaḥ paramātmalakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ / tad rūpaṃ bhavati / tat kiṃ / yad iti
analyzed: tasya vastunaḥ paramātma lakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ tat rūpam bhavati tat kim yat iti

original: evaṃ / bhāsanaṃ sphuraṇaṃ syāt / iti kim / iti dṛśyaṃ dṛśikriyāviṣayo / jagat nāsti
analyzed: evam bhāsanam sphuraṇam syāt iti kim iti dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā viṣayaḥ jagat na asti

original: pratītimātrasiddhatvāt / draṣṭā dṛśikriyākartā / dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat līna iva /
analyzed: pratīti mātra siddha tvāt draṣṭā dṛśi kriyā kartā dṛśya abhāvāt vilīna vat līnaḥ iva

original: bhātīti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / pūrvaṃ samyagjñānena dṛśyātyantābhāvo yuktyā niśceyaḥ / tataḥ
analyzed: bhāti iti ayam bhāvaḥ pūrvam samyak jñānena dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ yuktyā niśceyaḥ tatas

original: dṛśyātyantābhāvena draṣṭāpi layībhūta iva bhavati / tataś ca draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ ca nāstīti
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāvena draṣṭā api layībhūtaḥ iva bhavati tatas ca draṣṭā dṛśyam ca na asti iti

original: sphurati / tatsphuraṇaṃ ca draṣṭṛdṛśyaleparahitatvena nakiñcidrūpatvād anākhyeyaṃ
analyzed: sphurati tat sphuraṇam ca draṣṭṛ dṛśya lepa rahita tvena na kiñcid rūpa tvāt anākhyeyam

original: bhavati / tad eva ca paramātmasvarūpam iti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //MT_3,10.40 //
analyzed: bhavati tat eva ca paramātma svarūpam iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: citer jīvasvabhāvo yo yadi cetyonmukho vapuḥ / cinmātraṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ tat tat kāraṇakāraṇam //MU_3,10.41//
analyzed: citeḥ jīva svabhāvaḥ yaḥ yadi cetya unmukhaḥ vapuḥ cit mātram vimalam śāntam tat tat kāraṇa kāraṇam

original: tat prasiddhaṃ / tac cinmātraṃ / kāraṇakāraṇaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtaṃ paramātmasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: tat prasiddham tat cit mātram kāraṇa kāraṇam mūlakāraṇa bhūtam paramātma svarūpam

original: bhavati / tat cinmātraṃ kiṃ / citeḥ jīvopādānakāraṇabhūtāyāḥ citeḥ / vapuḥ svarūpaṃ /
analyzed: bhavati tat cit mātram kim citeḥ jīva upādānakāraṇa bhūtāyāḥ citeḥ vapuḥ svarūpam

original: cinmātrasvarūpatvāt citeḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / vimalaṃ cetyamālinyenādūṣitaṃ /
analyzed: cit mātra svarūpa tvāt citeḥ punar kathambhūtam vimalam cetya mālinyena a dūṣitam

original: punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / śāntaṃ cetyakṣatakṣobharahitaṃ / tat cinmātraṃ kiṃ / yaḥ jīvasvabhāvaḥ
analyzed: punar kathambhūtam śāntam ca iti akṣata kṣobha rahitam tat cit mātram kim yaḥ jīva svabhāvaḥ

original: jīvasya rūpo / bhavati / svabhāvaśabdāpekṣayā yacchabdasya puṃliṅgatā / nanu kadāsau
analyzed: jīvasya rūpaḥ bhavati svabhāva śabda apekṣayā yad śabdasya puṃliṅga tā nanu kadā asau

original: jīvasvabhāvo bhavatīty āha yadīti / yadi cetyonmukhaḥ syāt / cetyonmukhāyāḥ citer
analyzed: jīva svabhāvaḥ bhavati iti āha yadi iti yadi cetya unmukhaḥ syāt cetya unmukhāyāḥ citeḥ

original: eva jīvatvāt / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / yac cinmātraṃ cetyonmukhaṃ sat jīvatāṃ yāti tad eva
analyzed: eva jīva tvāt ayam bhāvaḥ yat cit mātram cetya unmukham sat jīva tām yāti tat eva

original: samyagjñānena cetyāsattvaṃ niścitya śuddhīkṛtaṃ sat anākhyeyaṃ bhavati / tad eva
analyzed: samyak jñānena cetya sattvam niścitya śuddhīkṛtam sat anākhyeyam bhavati tat eva

original: ca paramātmarūpam iti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti / citiś ca svaparāmarśakāritayā
analyzed: ca paramātma rūpam iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti citiḥ ca sva parāmarśa kāri tayā

original: parāmarśakartṛtvena parāmarśaviṣayatvena ca dvividhāsti / tatra prathamāyāḥ cinmātram
analyzed: parāmarśa kartṛ tvena parāmarśa viṣaya tvena ca dvividhā asti tatra prathamāyāḥ cit mātram

original: iti nāma dvitīyasyāḥ citir iti //MT_3,10.41 //
analyzed: iti nāma dvitīyasyāḥ citiḥ iti

original: aṅguṣṭhasyātha vāṅgulyā vātādyasparśane sati / jīvataś cetaso rūpaṃ yat tat paramam ātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.42//
analyzed: aṅguṣṭhasya atha vā aṅgulyā vāta ādi asparśane sati jīvataḥ cetasaḥ rūpam yat tat paramam ātmanaḥ

original: rūpam iti śeṣaḥ / tat paramam utkṛṣṭaṃ vastu / paramātmanaḥ rūpaṃ bhavati / tat kiṃ /
analyzed: rūpam iti śeṣaḥ tat paramam utkṛṣṭam vastu paramātmanaḥ rūpam bhavati tat kim

original: cetasaḥ manasaḥ / yad rūpaṃ bhavati / kathambhūtasya cetasaḥ / jīvataḥ svavyāpāraṃ
analyzed: cetasaḥ manasaḥ yat rūpam bhavati kathambhūtasya cetasaḥ jīvataḥ sva vyāpāram

original: prati samarthasya / na tu mūrchādyavasthāvat tatrāśaktasya / tadā hi tasya mūḍhatvam
analyzed: prati samarthasya na tu mūrchā ādi avasthā vat tatra aśaktasya tadā hi tasya mūḍha tvam

original: eva bhavati / na paramātmatvam / kasmin sati / aṅguṣṭhasyātha vāṅgulyā / upalakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: eva bhavati na paramātma tvam kasmin sati aṅguṣṭhasya atha vā aṅgulyā upalakṣaṇam

original: caitat / sarvaśarīrāvayavānāṃ vātādyasparśane sati / ādiśabdena tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ
analyzed: ca etat sarva śarīra avayavānām vāta ādi asparśane sati ādi śabdena tejaḥ prabhṛtīnām

original: grahaṇam / asparśanam asparśaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / puruṣasya yasmin kasmiṃścic charīrāvayave
analyzed: grahaṇam asparśanam asparśaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ puruṣasya yasmin kasmiṃścid śarīra avayave

original: kasyāpi dravyasya sparśe asati tadā nirālambam eva tad avayavavyāpi caitanyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: kasya api dravyasya sparśe asati tadā nirālambam eva tat avayava vyāpi caitanyam bhavet

original: tadā tadavayavamātrānusandhānaparasya tasya bāhyagrahaṇasamartham api manaḥ śuddhanirālambācetyacinmātrarūpaparamātmarūpam
analyzed: tadā tad avayava mātra anusandhāna parasya tasya bāhya grahaṇa samartham api manaḥ śuddha nirālamba acetya cit mātra rūpa paramātma rūpam

original: eva tiṣṭhatīti / tadaiva sarvāḥ manovṛttīḥ vihāya yoginā sāvadhānena parīkṣyam iti //MT_3,10.42 //
analyzed: eva tiṣṭhati iti tadā eva sarvāḥ manaḥ vṛttīḥ vihāya yoginā sāvadhānena parīkṣyam iti

original: asvapnāyā anantāyā ajaḍāyā ghanasthiteḥ / yad rūpaṃ ciracintāyās tat tadānagha śiṣyate //MU_3,10.43//
analyzed: asvapnāyāḥ anantāyāḥ ajaḍāyāḥ ghana sthiteḥ yat rūpam cira cintāyāḥ tat tadā anagha śiṣyate

original: he 'nagha rāgādidoṣarahita / tat vastu / tadā mahātmalayasamaye / śiṣyate / tat kiṃ /
analyzed: he anagha rāga ādi doṣa rahita tat vastu tadā mahātma laya samaye śiṣyate tat kim

original: yat rūpaṃ bhavati / kasyāḥ / ciracintāyāḥ / ciraṃ sarvarātraṃ / kṛtā yā cintā prāpteṣṭaviṣayam
analyzed: yat rūpam bhavati kasyāḥ cira cintāyāḥ ciram sarva rātram kṛtā yā cintā prāpta iṣṭa viṣayam

original: ādhyānam / tasyāḥ cintāviśeṣaṇāny āhāsvapnāyā ityādi / asvapnāyāḥ svapnatvenāpariṇatāyāḥ /
analyzed: ādhyānam tasyāḥ cintā viśeṣaṇāni āha asvapnāyāḥ ityādi asvapnāyāḥ svapna tvena apariṇatāyāḥ

original: jāgrati kriyamāṇā cintā svapnatvena pariṇamate / svapnatayā pariṇatatve tu anāyattatayānyaviṣayiṇy
analyzed: jāgrati kriyamāṇā cintā svapna tvena pariṇamate svapna tayā pariṇata tve tu anāyatta tayā anya viṣayiṇī

original: api syād iti yuktam uktam asvapnāyā iti / anantāyāḥ acchinnasantānatvena pravṛttāyāḥ /
analyzed: api syāt iti yuktam uktam asvapnāyāḥ iti anantāyāḥ acchinna santāna tvena pravṛttāyāḥ

original: anyā kācic cintā tatra madhye nāyātīty arthaḥ / ajaḍāyāḥ kācid dhi cintā nairantaryeṇa
analyzed: anyā kācid cintā tatra madhye na āyāti iti arthaḥ ajaḍāyāḥ kācid hi cintā nairantaryeṇa

original: kriyamāṇā mūrchām āvahati / tannivāraṇārtham ajaḍāyā iti viśeṣaṇam / ghanasthiteḥ /
analyzed: kriyamāṇā mūrchām āvahati tad nivāraṇa artham ajaḍāyāḥ iti viśeṣaṇam ghana sthiteḥ

original: ghanā nibiḍā / cintyamānasyāpi praveśam adadhatī / sthitir avasthānaṃ / yasyāḥ /
analyzed: ghanā nibiḍā cintyamānasya api praveśam adadhatī sthitiḥ avasthānam yasyāḥ

original: sā / tādṛśyāḥ / nirālambāyā ity arthaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / jāgrati kriyamāṇā chinnā jāḍyadoṣarahitā
analyzed: sā tādṛśyāḥ nirālambāyāḥ iti arthaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ jāgrati kriyamāṇā chinnā jāḍya doṣa rahitā

original: cintyamānasparśadūṣitā cintācchinnabodhamayācetyacinmayatām eva yāty / acetyacinmayam
analyzed: cintyamāna sparśa dūṣitā cintā ācchinna bodha mayā a cetya cit maya tām eva yāti a cetya cit mayam

original: eva ca paramātmarūpam iti yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //MT_3,10.43 //
analyzed: eva ca paramātma rūpam iti yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: yad vyomno hṛdayaṃ yad vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca / tasyācetyasya cidvyomnas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ //MU_3,10.44//
analyzed: yat vyomnaḥ hṛdayam yat vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca  tasya acetyasya cit vyomnaḥ tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: tasya prasiddhasya / acetyasya sparśādūṣitasya / cidvyomnaḥ bhānākāśarūpasya / paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya prasiddhasya acetyasya sparśāt dūṣitasya cit vyomnaḥ bhāna ākāśa rūpasya paramātmanaḥ

original: rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ / tat bhavati / tat kiṃ / yat vyomnaḥ hṛdayaṃ śūnyākhyaṃ / bhavati /
analyzed: rūpam svarūpam tat bhavati tat kim yat vyomnaḥ hṛdayam śūnya ākhyam bhavati

original: yad vā / yat hṛdayaṃ / śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca bhavati / tatra śilāyā hṛdayaṃ anyasya
analyzed: yat vā yat hṛdayam śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca bhavati tatra śilāyāḥ hṛdayam anyasya

original: praveśānarhaṃ sūkṣmāvayavanaividdhyarūpaṃ bhavati / pavanasya hṛdayaṃ mṛgyamānaṃ
analyzed: praveśa anarham sūkṣma avayava naividdhya rūpam bhavati pavanasya hṛdayam mṛgyamānam

original: śūnyatāyām eva viśrāmyati / nanv etena jaḍatvam asyāyātam iti cen / na / cidvyomna
analyzed: śūnyatāyām eva viśrāmyati nanu etena jaḍa tvam asya āyātam iti ced na cit vyomnaḥ

original: iti nāmadheyakathanena tannivāraṇāt / vicāre kriyamāṇe vyomādīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ yathāyathaṃ
analyzed: iti nāmadheya kathanena tad nivāraṇāt vicāre kriyamāṇe vyoma ādīnām hṛdayam yathāyatham

original: śūnyarūpam anyapraveśām arhaṃ bhavati / tādṛg eva ca paramātmano rūpam iti yoginā
analyzed: śūnya rūpam anya praveśām arham bhavati tādṛś eva ca paramātmanaḥ rūpam iti yoginā

original: tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam //MT_3,10.44 //
analyzed: tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam

original: acetyasyāmanaskasya jīvato yā kriyāvataḥ / syāt sthitiḥ sā parā śāntā sattā tasyādyavastunaḥ //MU_3,10.45//
analyzed: acetyasya amanaskasya jīvataḥ yā kriyāvataḥ syāt sthitiḥ sā parā śāntā sattā tasya ādya vastunaḥ

original: parā utkṛṣṭā / śāntā kṣobharahitā / sattāvasthitiḥ / tasyādyavastunaḥ paramātmalakṣaṇasya
analyzed: parā utkṛṣṭā śāntā kṣobha rahitā sattā avasthitiḥ tasya ādya vastunaḥ paramātma lakṣaṇasya

original: vastunaḥ / sā syāt / sā kā / yā sthitiḥ sattā syāt / kasya / jīvataḥ jīvayuktasya
analyzed: vastunaḥ sā syāt sā kā yā sthitiḥ sattā syāt kasya jīvataḥ jīva yuktasya

original: puruṣasya / na tu mṛtasya / kathambhūtasyācetyasya / samyagjñānena cetyābhāve niścitatvāt /
analyzed: puruṣasya na tu mṛtasya kathambhūtasya acetyasya samyak jñānena cetya abhāve niścita tvāt

original: cetyarahitasyāta evāmanaskasya manorahitasya / punaḥ kathambhūtasya / kriyāvataḥ
analyzed: cetya rahitasya atas eva amanaskasya manaḥ rahitasya punar kathambhūtasya kriyāvataḥ

original: calanādikriyākāriṇaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / cetyaṃ prati manovyāpāram akurvan ata eva sarvathānusandhānaśūnyaḥ
analyzed: calana ādi kriyā kāriṇaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ cetyam prati manaḥ vyāpāram akurvan atas eva sarvathā anusandhāna śūnyaḥ

original: puruṣaḥ calanādikriyākārī yādṛśo bhavati tādṛg eva sṛṣṭyādivyāpārakāri param ātmatattvaṃ
analyzed: puruṣaḥ calana ādi kriyā kārī yādṛśaḥ bhavati tādṛś eva sṛṣṭi ādi vyāpāra kāri param ātma tattvam

original: bhavatīti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //MT_3,10.45 //
analyzed: bhavati iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: citprakāśasya yan madhyaṃ prakāśasya ghanasya ca / darśanasya ca yan madhyaṃ tad rūpaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ //MU_3,10.46//
analyzed: cit prakāśasya yat madhyam prakāśasya ghanasya ca darśanasya ca yat madhyam tat rūpam brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ

original: paṇḍitāḥ / brahmaṇaḥ nānāpadārthabhāvena bṛṃhitasya paramātmanaḥ / tad rūpaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ brahmaṇaḥ nānā padārtha bhāvena bṛṃhitasya paramātmanaḥ tat rūpam viduḥ

original: jānanti / tat kiṃ / citprakāśasya cita utthitasya cetyaprakāṭyarūpasya prakāśasya /
analyzed: jānanti tat kim cit prakāśasya citaḥ utthitasya cetya prakāṭya rūpasya prakāśasya

original: yat madhyaṃ madhyāvasthā / bhavati / tathā ghanasya nibiḍasya / prakāśasya sūryamaṇḍalāder
analyzed: yat madhyam madhya avasthā bhavati tathā ghanasya nibiḍasya prakāśasya sūrya maṇḍala ādeḥ

original: utthitasya / yan madhyaṃ madhyāvasthā / bhavati / tathā darśanasya draṣṭur utthitāyāḥ
analyzed: utthitasya yat madhyam madhya avasthā bhavati tathā darśanasya draṣṭuḥ utthitāyāḥ

original: dṛśikriyāyāḥ / yan madhyaṃ madhyāvasthā / bhavati / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / citprakāśasya bāhyaprakāśasya
analyzed: dṛśi kriyāyāḥ yat madhyam madhya avasthā bhavati ayam bhāvaḥ cit prakāśasya bāhya prakāśasya

original: darśanasya ca tisro 'vasthā bhavanti / ādyāvasthā madhyāvasthāntyāvasthā / tatra
analyzed: darśanasya ca tisraḥ avasthāḥ bhavanti ādya avasthā madhya avasthā antya avasthā tatra

original: bāhyaprakāśasyādityāder utthānasamaye yādyāvasthā sādityasparśadūṣitā / yā ca padārthaprakāśanasamaye
analyzed: bāhya prakāśasya āditya ādeḥ utthāna samaye yā ādya avasthā sā āditya sparśa dūṣitā yā ca padārtha prakāśana samaye

original: 'ntyāvasthā sā padārthasparśadūṣitā / madhyāvasthā tu śuddhaprakāśasvarūpānākhyā
ca bhavati / tādṛg eva ca paramātmasvarūpam iti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam /
analyzed: ca bhavati tādṛś eva ca paramātma svarūpam iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam

original: citprakāśadarśanayor apy evaṃ yojyam / citprakāśasya darśanasya ca parimitatvāparimitatvamātrakṛto

analyzed: bhedaḥ jñeyaḥ

analyzed: nairantaryeṇa pravartamānā jñāna eka maya tayā devatā eka maya tayā ca pariṇatā satī eka svarūpa paramātma rūpā

analyzed: bāhya tejasaḥ bāhya tamasaḥ ca dhāraṇāyāḥ kaiścid ukta tvāt

original: yato jagad udetīva nityānuditarūpy api / vibhinnavad ivābhinnaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam //MU_3,10.48//

analyzed: iti śeṣaḥ sthitam vartamānam katham vibhinna vat vibhinnam iva paramārthataḥ

analyzed: sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

analyzed: vyavahāra parasya api yat pāṣāṇa vat āsanam avyomnaḥ eva vyoma tvam tat rūpam pāramātmikam

analyzed: tat pāramātmikam paramātma sambandhi rūpam bhavati kim tat yat vyavahāra parasya api

analyzed: paramātma rūpaḥ eva bhavati iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: vedyavedanavettṛtvarūpatrayam idaṃ punaḥ / yatrodety astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam //MU_3,10.50//

analyzed: vedanam vidi kriyā vettā vidi kriyā kartā teṣām bhāvaḥ vedya vedana vettṛ tvam tad ākhyam

original: rūpam iti / yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //MT_3,10.50 //

original: vedyavedanavettṛtvaṃ yatredaṃ pratibimbati / abuddhyādau mahādarśe tad rūpaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam //MU_3,10.51//
analyzed: vedya vedana vettṛ tvam yatra idam pratibimbati a buddhi ādau mahā ādarśe tat rūpam paramam smṛtam

analyzed: kim api mālinyam an ādadhatī pratibimba tayā eva bhāti yatas pratibimbam api kṣaṇa

analyzed: sarga anta ślokena pūrva uktam upasaṃharati

original: brahmārkaśakraharaviṣṇusadāśivādi- śāntau śivaṃ paramam etad ihaikam āste / śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭam avinaṣṭam akaṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ na miśram aṇunāśritam  #

analyzed: sati iti arthaḥ kathambhūtam śiṣṭam pradiṣṭam sarva śānti sākṣitayā śeṣa tvena kathitam

analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe daśamaḥ sargaḥ  /

analyzed: om śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: idaṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagan nāmāsti bhāsuram / mahāpralayasampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati //MU_3,11.1//

analyzed: paramārthataḥ eva asti anyathā bhāsamāna tva ayogāt kathaṃbhūtam idaṃrūpam idam anubhūyamāna bhāva abhāva mayam

original: rūpaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya / tat idaṃrūpam / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha mahāpralayeti / bho
analyzed: rūpam svarūpam yasya tat idaṃrūpam tatas kim iti atra āha mahāpralaya iti bho

original: brahman / idam eva jagat mahāpralayasampattau kva nu gacchati / kaṃ deśaṃ yātīty
analyzed: brahman idam eva jagat mahāpralaya sampattau kva nu gacchati kam deśam yāti iti

original: arthaḥ //MT_3,11.1 //
analyzed: arthaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭho 'py etatsadṛśaṃ kiñcit pṛcchati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ api etad sadṛśam kiñcid pṛcchati

original: kuta āyāti kīdṛg vā vandhyāputraḥ kva gacchati / kva yāti kuta āyāti vada vā vyomakānanam //MU_3,11.2//
analyzed: kutas āyāti kīdṛś vā vandhyā putraḥ kva gacchati kva yāti kutas āyāti vada vā vyoma kānanam

original: kutaḥ āyāti / utpattisamaye ity arthaḥ / kīdṛg vā kiṃsvarūpo vā / yāti / kva gacchati / nāśasamaya ity arthaḥ / etatsadṛśaḥ tava praśna iti  #
analyzed: kutas āyāti utpatti samaye iti arthaḥ kīdṛś vā kiṃsvarūpaḥ vā yāti kva gacchati nāśa samaye iti arthaḥ etad sadṛśaḥ tava praśnaḥ iti  /

original: bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.2//
analyzed: bhāvaḥ

original: śrīrāmo 'trottaraṃ dadhāti
analyzed: śrī rāmaḥ atra uttaram dadhāti

original: vandhyāputro vyomavanaṃ naivāsti na bhaviṣyati / kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā //MU_3,11.3//
analyzed: vandhyāputraḥ vyomavanam na eva asti na bhaviṣyati kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā

original: vartamānabhaviṣyanniṣedhena bhūtaniṣedho 'py ākṣiptaḥ / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha kīdṛśīti / dṛśyatā darśanayogyatā / lakṣaṇayāstiteti yāvat //MT_3,11.3//
analyzed: vartamāna bhaviṣyat niṣedhena bhūta niṣedhaḥ api ākṣiptaḥ tatas kim iti atra āha kīdṛśī iti dṛśyatā darśana yogyatā lakṣaṇayā astitā iti yāvat

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmoktam uttaraṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtyottaram āha
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ śrī rāma uktam uttaram dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya uttaram āha

original: vandhyāputravyomavane yathā na staḥ kadācana / jagadādy akhilaṃ dṛśyaṃ tathā nāsti kadācana //MU_3,11.4//
analyzed: vandhyāputra vyomavane yathā na staḥ kadācana jagat ādi akhilam dṛśyam tathā na asti kadācana

original: jagadādīty ādiśabdena pralayaḥ gṛhyate / kadācana kadāpīty arthaḥ //MT_3,11.4//
analyzed: jagat ādi iti ādi śabdena pralayaḥ gṛhyate kadācana kadāpi iti arthaḥ

original: phalitam āha
analyzed: phalitam āha

original: na cotpannaṃ na ca dhvaṃsi yat kilādau na vidyate / utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśaśabdasya kā kathā //MU_3,11.5//
analyzed: na ca utpannam na ca dhvaṃsi yat kila ādau na vidyate utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśa śabdasya kā kathā

original: kileti niścaye / yat vastu / ādau pūrvaṃ / na cotpannaṃ bhavati / na ca dhvaṃsi bhavati /
analyzed: kila iti niścaye yat vastu ādau pūrvam na ca utpannam bhavati na ca dhvaṃsi bhavati

original: nāśabhāg api na bhavati / tathā na vidyate sthitiviṣayatāṃ ca na yāti / tasya kīdṛśī
analyzed: nāśa bhāj api na bhavati tathā na vidyate sthiti viṣaya tām ca na yāti tasya kīdṛśī

original: kiṃrūpā / utpattir bhavati / utpattyabhāve ca nāśaśabdasya kā kathā / etad vaktum
analyzed: kiṃrūpā utpattiḥ bhavati utpatti abhāve ca nāśa śabdasya kā kathā etat vaktum

original: api na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.5 //
analyzed: api na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: śrīrāmaḥ punaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: śrī rāmaḥ punar pṛcchati

original: vandhyāputranabhovṛkṣakalpanā tāvad asti hi / sā yathā nāśajanmāḍhyā tathaivedaṃ na kiṃ bhavet //MU_3,11.6//
analyzed: vandhyā putra nabhaḥ vṛkṣa kalpanā tāvat asti hi sā yathā nāśa janma āḍhyā tathā evā idam na kim bhavet

original: tāvacchabdo vipratipattyabhāvadyotakaḥ / hi niścaye / vandhyāputrādikalpanābhāve
analyzed: tāvat śabdaḥ vipratipatti abhāva dyotakaḥ hi niścaye vandhyā putra ādi kalpanā abhāve

original: vandhyāputretyādikathaiva na yuktā syād iti bhāvaḥ / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha sā iti /
analyzed: vandhyā putra ityādi kathā eva na yuktā syāt iti bhāvaḥ tatas kim iti atra āha sā iti

original: sā vandhyāputrādikalpanā / asatyatve 'pi nāśajanmāḍhyā nāśajanmayuktā / yathā bhavati /
analyzed: sā vandhyā putra ādi kalpanā asatya tve api nāśa janma āḍhyā nāśa janma yuktā yathā bhavati

original: tathedaṃ dṛśyam / asatyatve 'pi nāśajanmāḍhyaṃ kiṃ na bhavet / bhavatv ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā idam dṛśyam asatya tve api nāśa janma āḍhyam kim na bhavet bhavatu iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca kva nu gacchatīti praśno yukta eveti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.6 //
analyzed: tathā ca kva nu gacchati iti praśnaḥ yuktaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: anyatra striyi dṛṣṭasya putrasyāropeṇa yuktaiva vandhyāputrakalpanātra tu dṛśyasya kva yatrāpi sattaiva nāstīti na tatkalpanā yuktety uttaraṃ  #
analyzed: anyatra striyi dṛṣṭasya putrasya āropeṇa yuktā eva vandhyā putra kalpanā atra tu dṛśyasya kva yatra api sattā eva na asti iti na tad kalpanā yuktā iti uttaram

original: śrīvasiṣṭho bhaṅgyāntareṇāha
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ bhaṅgyā antareṇa āha

original: phullasyātulabhuḥ samyag ālakaiḥ kuru kolanam / niranvayā yathaivoktir jagatsattā tathaiva hi //MU_3,11.7//
analyzed: samyak ālakaiḥ kuru kolanam  niranvayā yathā evā uktiḥ jagat sattā tathā eva hi

original: hi niścaye / jagatsattā tathaiva tena prakāreṇaiva / niranvayā kam apy artham anuddiśya
analyzed: hi niścaye jagat sattā tathā eva tena prakāreṇa eva niranvayā kam api artham an uddiśya

original: pravṛttā / vyartheti yāvat / bhavati / tathā kathaṃ / phullasyetyādi kolanam ityantoktir
analyzed: pravṛttā vyarthā iti yāvat bhavati tathā katham phullasya ityādi iti anta uktiḥ

original: yathā niranvayā bhavati //MT_3,11.7 //
analyzed: yathā niranvayā bhavati

original: niranvayatvam eva dṛṣṭāntāntaraiḥ pratipādayati
analyzed: niranvaya tvam eva dṛṣṭānta antaraiḥ pratipādayati

original: yathā sauvarṇakaṭake dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam / kaṭakatvaṃ tu nāsty eva jagattvaṃ tu tathā pare //MU_3,11.8//
analyzed: yathā sauvarṇa kaṭake dṛśyamānam api sphuṭam kaṭaka tvam tu nā asti eva jagat tvam tu tathā pare

original: yathā sauvarṇakaṭake sphuṭaṃ dṛśyamānam api kaṭakatvaṃ nāsti paramārthataḥ suvarṇaikamayatvāt / pare cinmātre / jagattvaṃ tathaiva nāstīty
analyzed: yathā sauvarṇa kaṭake sphuṭam dṛśyamānam api kaṭaka tvam nā asti paramārthataḥ suvarṇa eka maya tvāt pare cit mātre jagat tvam tathā eva nā asti iti

original: ākāśe ca yathā nāsti śūnyatvaṃ vyatirekavat / jagattvaṃ brahmaṇi tathā nāsty evāpy upalabdhimat //MU_3,11.9//
analyzed: ākāśe ca yathā nā asti śūnya tvam vyatireka vat jagat tvam brahmaṇi tathā nā asti evā api upalabdhimat

original: caśabdaḥ samuccaye / vyatirekavat vyatirekayuktam / ākāśaśūnyatvayoḥ vyatirekānupalabdher
analyzed: caśabdaḥ samuccaye vyatirekavat vyatireka yuktam ākāśa śūnyatvayoḥ vyatireka anupalabdheḥ

original: ity arthaḥ / dārṣṭāntikam āha jagattvam iti / jagattvam jagadrūpatvam / tathā tena
analyzed: iti arthaḥ dārṣṭāntikam āha jagat tvam iti jagat tvam jagat rūpa tvam tathā tena

original: prakāreṇa / brahmaṇi vyāpake citsvarūpe / nāsty eva / vicārāsahatvād ity arthaḥ /
kathambhūtam api / upalabdhimad api bhāsamānatvena upalabdham apīty arthaḥ //MT_3,11.9 //
analyzed: kathambhūtam api upalabdhimat api bhāsamāna tvena upalabdham api iti arthaḥ

original: kajjalān na yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śvaityaṃ ca na yathā himāt / pṛthag evaṃ bhaved buddhaṃ jagan nāsti pare pade //MU_3,11.10//
analyzed: kajjalāt na yathā kārṣṇyam śvaityam ca na yathā himāt  pṛthak evam bhavet buddham jagat na asti pare pade

original: yathā kārṣṇyaṃ kṛṣṇatā / kajjalāt pṛthak na bhavet / tathā śvaityaṃ śvetatā / himād
analyzed: yathā kārṣṇyam kṛṣṇa tā kajjalāt pṛthak na bhavet tathā śvaityam śveta tā himāt

original: yathā pṛthaṅ na bhavet / buddhaṃ paramārthena niścitaṃ / jagat / pare pade paramātmani /
analyzed: yathā pṛthak na bhavet buddham parama arthena niścitam jagat pare pade paramātmani

original: evaṃ tathā / pṛthak nāsti / pare pade iti saptamīdvayaṃ pañcamīsthāne jñeyam //MT_3,11.10 //
analyzed: evam tathā pṛthak na asti pare pade iti saptamī dvayam pañcamī sthāne jñeyam

original: yathā śaityaṃ ca śaśino na himād vyatiricyate / brahmaṇo na tathā sargo vidyate vyatirekavān //MU_3,11.11//
analyzed: yathā śaityam ca śaśinaḥ na himāt vyatiricyate brahmaṇaḥ na tathā sargaḥ vidyate vyatirekavān

original: caśabdaḥ samuccaye / yathā śaityaṃ śītatā / himāt śītalāt / śaśinaḥ / na vyatiricyate nādhikā bhavati / tathā sargaḥ brahmaṇaḥ vyatirekavān  #
analyzed: caśabdaḥ samuccaye yathā śaityam śīta tā himāt śītalāt śaśinaḥ na vyatiricyate na adhikā bhavati tathā sargaḥ brahmaṇaḥ vyatirekavān

original: bhedavān / na bhavati //MT_3,11.11//
analyzed: bhedavān na bhavati

original: guṇiguṇanidarśanenaikyam uktvā jagato bhramasiddhatayā aikyaṃ kathayati
analyzed: guṇi guṇa nidarśanena aikyam uktvā jagataḥ bhrama siddha tayā aikyam kathayati

original: marunadyāṃ yathā toyaṃ dvitīyendau yathendutā / nāsty evaivaṃ jagan nāsti dṛṣṭam apy amalātmani //MU_3,11.12//
analyzed: maru nadyām yathā toyam dvitīya indau yathā indu tā  na asti eva evam jagat na asti dṛṣṭam api amala ātmani

original: dārṣṭāntikaṃ kathayati evam iti / amalātmani śuddhacitsvarūpe paramātmani / evam
analyzed: dārṣṭāntikam kathayati evam iti amala ātmani śuddha cit svarūpe paramātmani evam

original: tathā / dṛṣṭam api bhātam api / jagan nāstīty arthaḥ / nanu pūrvaṃ kaṭakādayaḥ dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttā
analyzed: tathā dṛṣṭam api bhātam api jagant na asti iti arthaḥ nanu pūrvam kaṭaka ādayaḥ dṛṣṭānta tvena upāttā

original: iha tu marujalādīti vaiṣamyam āpatitam iti cen / na / pūrvadṛṣṭāntaiḥ brahmaikarūpatvaṃ
analyzed: iha tu maru jala ādi iti vaiṣamyam āpatitam iti ced na pūrva dṛṣṭāntaiḥ brahma eka rūpa tvam

original: jagata uktam / ihāsatyatvam / phalatas tu sarveṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntānāṃ brahmaikatāyām eva
analyzed: jagataḥ uktam iha asatya tvam phalataḥ tu sarveṣām dṛṣṭāntānām brahma eka tāyām eva

original: tātparyam iti na kiñcid viruddham //MT_3,11.12 //
analyzed: tātparyam iti na kiñcid viruddham

original: punar apy etad eva dṛṣṭāntāntareṇa dṛḍhayati
analyzed: punar api etat eva dṛṣṭānta antareṇa dṛḍhayati

original: saṃvidvilocanāloko bhāty ayaṃ saṃvidambare / jagadākhye 'male vyomni dṛṣṭimuktāvalī yathā //MU_3,11.13//
analyzed: saṃvid vilocana ālokaḥ bhāti ayam saṃvid ambare jagat ākhye amale vyomni dṛṣṭi muktā āvalī yathā

original: ayaṃ ātmatvena pratyakṣe sthitaḥ / saṃvidvilocanālokaḥ / saṃvid eva cid eva / vilocanaṃ
analyzed: ayam ātma tvena pratyakṣe sthitaḥ saṃvid vilocana ālokaḥ saṃvid eva cit eva vilocanam

original: prakāśakatvasāmyena netraṃ / tasyālokaḥ raśmiḥ / bhāti padārthabhāvena sphurati /
analyzed: prakāśaka tva sāmyena netram tasya ālokaḥ raśmiḥ bhāti padārtha bhāvena sphurati

original: kutra / jagadākhye jagannāmni / saṃvidambare cidākāśe / kā yathā / dṛṣṭimuktāvalī
analyzed: kutra jagat ākhye jagat nāmni saṃvid ambare cit ākāśe kā yathā dṛṣṭi muktā āvalī

original: yathā / yathā sā amale vyomni bhūtākāśe / sphurati / tathety arthaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā sā amale vyomni bhūtākāśe sphurati tathā iti arthaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ

original: yathā netrān nirgatāḥ raśmayaḥ ākāśe sphurantaḥ muktāvalīrūpeṇa dṛśyante / tathā
analyzed: yathā netrāt nirgatāḥ raśmayaḥ ākāśe sphurantaḥ muktā āvalī rūpeṇa dṛśyante tathā

original: cita utthitāḥ cidālokākhyāḥ raśmayaḥ jagadākhye cidambare sphurantaḥ nānāpadārtharūpeṇa
analyzed: citaḥ utthitāḥ cit āloka ākhyāḥ raśmayaḥ jagat ākhye cit ambare sphurantaḥ nānā padārtha rūpeṇa

original: dṛśyante iti //MT_3,11.13 //
analyzed: dṛśyante iti

original: cidākāśe cidākāśaś cittvād yaḥ kacati svayam / tad eva tena rūpaṃ svaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate //MU_3,11.14//
analyzed: cit ākāśe cit ākāśaḥ cit tvāt yaḥ kacati svayam tat eva tena rūpam svam jagat iti avabudhyate

original: cidākāśaḥ cidākāśe cidākāśākhyāyāṃ svabhittau / cittvāc cidbhāvena / kacati sphurati /
analyzed: cit ākāśaḥ cit ākāśe cit ākāśa ākhyāyām svabhittau cit tvāt cit bhāvena kacati sphurati

original: aham iti svaparāmarśaviṣayo bhavatīti yāvat / parāmarśābhāve hi tasya cittvam eva
analyzed: aham iti sva parāmarśa viṣayaḥ bhavati iti yāvat parāmarśa abhāve hi tasya cit tvam eva

original: na syāt / tena tena cidākāśena / tat kacanākhyaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ / jagad ity avabudhyate
analyzed: na syāt tena tena cit ākāśena tat kacana ākhyam svam rūpam jagat iti avabudhyate

original: jñāyate / kacanarūpatvād eva jagataḥ //MT_3,11.14 //
analyzed: jñāyate kacana rūpa tvāt eva jagataḥ

original: prakṛtam anusarati
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarati

original: ādāv eva hi yan nāsti kāraṇāsambhavāt svayam / vartamāne 'pi tan nāsti nāśaḥ syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ //MU_3,11.15//
analyzed: ādau eva hi yat na asti kāraṇa asambhavāt svayam vartamāne api tat na asti nāśaḥ syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ

original: hi niścaye / yat yat jagadākhyaṃ vastu / kāraṇāsambhavāt ādau eva svayaṃ nāsti /
analyzed: hi niścaye yat yat jagat ākhyam vastu kāraṇa asambhavāt ādau eva svayam na asti

original: tat vartamāne 'pi nāsti / tatra tasmin vastuni / nāśaḥ vandhyāputradṛṣṭāntena śaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: tat vartamāne api na asti tatra tasmin vastuni nāśaḥ vandhyā putra dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkitaḥ

original: nāśaḥ / kīdṛśaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ / syāt viṣayābhāvenāyogyatvān na syād ity arthaḥ //MT_3,11.15 //
analyzed: nāśaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ syāt viṣaya abhāvena ayogya tvāt na syāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu paramātmalakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya sadbhāvāt kāraṇāsambhavaḥ katham udety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu paramātma lakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya sadbhāvāt kāraṇa asambhavaḥ katham udeti atra āha

original: kvāsambhavadbhūtajāḍyaṃ pṛthvyāder jaḍavastunaḥ / kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ chāyāyā ātapo yathā //MU_3,11.16//
analyzed: kva asambhavat bhūta jāḍyam pṛthvī ādeḥ jaḍa vastunaḥ kāraṇam bhavitum śaktam chāyāyāḥ ātapaḥ yathā

original: bhūteṣu dṛśyamānaṃ jāḍyaṃ bhūtajāḍyam / asambhavat bhūtajāḍyaṃ yasya / tat asambhavadbhūtajāḍyaṃ /
analyzed: bhūteṣu dṛśyamānam jāḍyam bhūtajāḍyam asambhavat bhūtajāḍyam yasya tat asambhavat bhūtajāḍyam

original: arthāt cidākhyaṃ vastu / pṛthvyādeḥ jaḍavastunaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ kva śaktaṃ / na
analyzed: arthāt cit ākhyam vastu pṛthvī ādeḥ jaḍa vastunaḥ kāraṇam bhavitum kva śaktam na

original: śaktam ity arthaḥ / atra dṛṣṭāntam āha chāyāyā iti / ātapasya chāyāyā nāśakatvena
analyzed: śaktam iti arthaḥ atra dṛṣṭāntam āha chāyāyāḥ iti ātapasya chāyāyāḥ nāśaka tvena

original: sphuṭaṃ chāyākāraṇatvāyogād dṛṣṭāntatā //MT_3,11.16 //
analyzed: sphuṭam chāyā kāraṇa tva ayogāt dṛṣṭānta tā

original: nanu kāraṇābhāve 'pi jagad astu ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kāraṇa abhāve api jagat astu iti atra āha

original: kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāryaṃ nedaṃ tat kiñcanoditam / yat tatkāraṇam evāsti tad evettham avasthitam //MU_3,11.17//
analyzed: kāraṇa abhāvataḥ kāryam na idam tat kiñcana uditam yat tad kāraṇam eva asti tat evā ittham avasthitam

original: tat pūrvoktād dhetoḥ / kāraṇābhāvataḥ kāraṇābhāvāt / idam anubhūyamānaṃ / kāryaṃ
analyzed: tat pūrva uktāt hetoḥ kāraṇa abhāvataḥ kāraṇa abhāvāt idam anubhūyamānam kāryam

original: jagadākhyaṃ kāryam / uditam utpannaṃ / nāsti / kathaṃ / kiñcana leśenāpīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: jagat ākhyam kāryam uditam utpannam na asti katham kiñcana leśena api iti arthaḥ

original: punaḥ kim etad dṛśyata ity / atrāha yad iti / tad eva vastu / itthaṃ jagadrūpeṇāvasthitaṃ
analyzed: punar kim etat dṛśyate iti atra āha yat iti tat eva vastu ittham jagat rūpeṇa avasthitam

original: vartamānaṃ bhavati / tad eva kiṃ / yat vastu / tatkāraṇam etasya jagataḥ kāraṇatvena
analyzed: vartamānam bhavati tat eva kim yat vastu tat kāraṇam etasya jagataḥ kāraṇa tvena

original: śaṅkitaṃ vastu / eva bhavati / na tv anyat kiñcid iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.17 //
analyzed: śaṅkitam vastu eva bhavati na tu anyat kiñcid iti bhāvaḥ

original: ajātam eva yad bhāti saṃvido bhānam eva tat / yaj jagad dṛśyate svapne saṃvitkacanam eva tat //MU_3,11.18//
analyzed: ajātam eva yat bhāti saṃvidaḥ bhānam eva tat  yat jagat dṛśyate svapne saṃvid kacanam eva tat

original: yad vastu / ajātam eva bhāti / tat saṃvido jñānasya / bhānam eva tathātvena sphuraṇam
analyzed: yat vastu ajātam eva bhāti tat saṃvidaḥ jñānasya bhānam eva tathātvena sphuraṇam

original: eva / bhavati / atrānurūpaṃ dṛṣṭāntam āha yad iti / tat ity anena jagataḥ parāmarśaḥ /
analyzed: eva bhavati atra anurūpam dṛṣṭāntam āha yat iti tat iti anena jagataḥ parāmarśaḥ

original: svapnasya saṃvitkacanarūpatvaṃ sarvapratītisiddham eveti dṛṣṭāntatvena gṛhītam //MT_3,11.18 //
analyzed: svapnasya saṃvid kacana rūpa tvam sarva pratīti siddham eva iti dṛṣṭānta tvena gṛhītam

original: saṃvitkacanam evāntar yathā svapnajagadbhramaḥ / sargādau brahmaṇi tathā jagatkacanam ātatam //MU_3,11.19//
analyzed: saṃvid kacanam eva antar yathā svapna jagat bhramaḥ sarga ādau brahmaṇi tathā jagat kacanam ātatam

original: antaḥ manasi / svapnajagadbhramaḥ svapnajagadrūpo bhramaḥ / svapnajagad iti yāvat /
analyzed: antar manasi svapna jagat bhramaḥ svapna jagat rūpaḥ bhramaḥ svapna jagat iti yāvat

original: sargādau buddhyāropite sargārambhe / tathāśabdena saṃvitkacanam ākṣipyate / ātatam
analyzed: sarga ādau buddhi āropite sarga ārambhe tathāśabdena saṃvid kacanam ākṣipyate ātatam

original: vistīrṇam //MT_3,11.19 //
analyzed: vistīrṇam

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tat sad evātmani sthitam / nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcit kadācana //MU_3,11.20//
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate kiñcid tat sat eva ātmani sthitam na astam eti na ca udeti jagat kiñcid kadācana

original: yat idam anubhūyamānaṃ / kiñcit vastu / dṛśyate / tat sad eva sad vastv eva / svātmani
analyzed: yat idam anubhūyamānam kiñcid vastu dṛśyate tat sat eva sat vastu eva svātmani

original: cinmaye svasvarūpe / sthitaṃ bhavati / phalitam āha nāstam iti / ata ity adhyāhāryaṃ /
analyzed: cit maye sva svarūpe sthitam bhavati phalitam āha na astam iti atas iti adhyāhāryam

original: cinmātrākhyena rūpeṇa sadaiva sthitatvād iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.20 //
analyzed: cit mātra ākhyena rūpeṇa sadā eva sthita tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā dravatvaṃ salilaṃ spandatvaṃ pavano yathā / yathā prakāśa ābhāso brahmaiva trijagat tathā //MU_3,11.21//
analyzed: yathā drava tvam salilam spanda tvam pavanaḥ yathā yathā prakāśaḥ ābhāsaḥ brahmā eva trijagat tathā

original: na hi kaścit dravatvādi salilādeḥ pṛthakkṛtya darśayituṃ samartha iti bhāvaḥ / prakāśaḥ sūryādiprakāśaḥ / ābhāsaḥ arthaprākaṭyaṃ //MT_3,11.21//
analyzed: na hi kaścid drava tva ādi salila ādeḥ pṛthakkṛtya darśayitum samarthaḥ iti bhāvaḥ prakāśaḥ sūrya ādi prakāśaḥ ābhāsaḥ artha prākaṭyam

original: yathā puram ivāste 'ntar vid eva svapnasaṃvidi / tathā jagad ivābhāti svātmaiva paramātmani //MU_3,11.22//
analyzed: yathā puram iva āste antar vid eva svapna saṃvidi tathā jagat iva ābhāti sva ātmā eva paramātmani

original: yathā svapnasaṃvidi svapnajñāne / svapnāvasthāyām iti yāvat / antaḥ antaḥkaraṇe /
analyzed: yathā svapna saṃvidi svapna jñāne svapna avasthāyām iti yāvat antar antaḥkaraṇe

original: vid eva jñānam eva / puram ivābhāti vilasati / tathā svātmaiva paramātmani / paramātmetyākhyāyāṃ
analyzed: vid eva jñānam eva puram iva ābhāti vilasati tathā svātmā eva paramātmani paramātmā iti ākhyāyām

original: svabhittau / jagad ivābhāti / na tv anyaj jagan nāmāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.22 //
analyzed: svabhittau jagat iva ābhāti na tu anyat jagat nāma asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: atra śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ brahman sughanapratyayaṃ vada / idaṃ dṛśyaviṣaṃ jātam asatsvapnānubhūtivat //MU_3,11.23//
analyzed: evam ced tat katham brahman sughana pratyayam vada idam dṛśya viṣam jātam asat svapna anubhūti vat

original: he brahman / tvaṃ vada / evaṃ cet pūrvoktaḥ prakāro yadi bhavati / tat tarhi / idam
analyzed: he brahman tvam vada evam ced pūrva uktaḥ prakāraḥ yadi bhavati tat tarhi idam

original: anubhūyamānaṃ / dṛśyaviṣaṃ / dṛśyam eva mohādāyakatvena viṣaṃ viṣadravyaṃ / sughanapratyayaṃ /
analyzed: anubhūyamānam dṛśya viṣam dṛśyam eva moha ādāyaka tvena viṣam viṣa dravyam su ghana pratyayam

original: sughanaḥ pratyayaḥ āśvāsaḥ yasmin / tat / tādṛśaṃ / kathaṃ kena hetunā / jātam utpannaṃ /
analyzed: su ghanaḥ pratyayaḥ āśvāsaḥ yasmin tat tādṛśam katham kena hetunā jātam utpannam

original: katham / asatsvapnānubhūtivat / asatī yā svapnānubhūtiḥ svapnākārā anubhūtiḥ / svapnam
analyzed: katham asat svapna anubhūti vat asatī yā svapna anubhūtiḥ svapna ākārā anubhūtiḥ svapnam

original: iti yāvat / tadvat //MT_3,11.23 //
analyzed: iti yāvat tadvat

original: dṛśyātyantāsambhavaṃ vinā muktim amanyamānaḥ tam eva vistareṇa pṛcchati
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta asambhavam vinā muktim a manyamānaḥ tam eva vistareṇa pṛcchati

original: sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśyatā / ekasattve dvayor bandho muktir ekakṣaye dvayoḥ //MU_3,11.24//
analyzed: sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśya tā eka sattve dvayoḥ bandhaḥ muktiḥ eka kṣaye dvayoḥ

original: kileti niścaye / dṛśyasattāyāṃ draṣṭṛsattā bhavati / draṣṭṛsattāyāṃ ca dṛśyasattā
analyzed: kila iti niścaye dṛśya sattāyām draṣṭṛ sattā bhavati draṣṭṛ sattāyām ca dṛśya sattā

original: bhavati / yataḥ tvayaiveti bhāvaḥ / phalitam āha ekasattveti / dvayoḥ madhye ekasattve
analyzed: bhavati yatas tvayā eva iti bhāvaḥ phalitam āha eka sattva iti  dvayoḥ madhye eka sattve

original: bandhaḥ syāt / dvayoḥ madhye ekakṣaye muktiḥ syāt / tasmāt muktyartham ekakṣaya eva
analyzed: bandhaḥ syāt dvayoḥ madhye eka kṣaye muktiḥ syāt tasmāt mukti artham eka kṣayaḥ eva

original: sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.24 //
analyzed: sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tatrāpi kiṃ punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvam eva pṛcchasīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatra api kim punar punar dṛśya atyanta abhāvam eva pṛcchasi iti atra āha

original: atyantāsambhavo yāvad buddho dṛśyasya nākṣayaḥ / tāvad draṣṭur adraṣṭṛtvaṃ na sambhavati mokṣadam //MU_3,11.25//
analyzed: atyanta asambhavaḥ yāvat buddhaḥ dṛśyasya nā akṣayaḥ tāvat draṣṭuḥ adraṣṭṛ tvam na sambhavati mokṣa dam

original: buddhaḥ samyak jñātaḥ / akṣayaḥ avicchinnaḥ / adraṣṭṛtvaṃ adraṣṭṛbhāvaḥ / śuddhacinmātrateti
analyzed: buddhaḥ samyak jñātaḥ akṣayaḥ avicchinnaḥ adraṣṭṛ tvam adraṣṭṛ bhāvaḥ śuddha cit mātra tā iti

original: yāvat / dṛśyātyantābhāvasya sukaratvād draṣṭṛtānirāsasya ca dṛśyātyantābhāvaṃ vinā
analyzed: yāvat dṛśya atyanta abhāvasya sukara tvāt draṣṭṛ tā nirāsasya ca dṛśya atyanta abhāvam vinā

original: duṣkaratvāc ca punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvapraśna iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.25 //
analyzed: duṣkara tvāt ca punar punar dṛśya atyanta abhāva praśnaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu dṛśyātyantābhāve tava kiṃ prayojanaṃ / dṛśyadhvaṃsenāpi kāryasiddher ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛśya atyanta abhāve tava kim prayojanam dṛśya dhvaṃsena api kārya siddheḥ iti atra āha

original: dṛśyaṃ cet sambhavaty ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam / tad dṛśyasmaraṇānartharūpo bandho na naśyati //MU_3,11.26//
analyzed: dṛśyam ced sambhavati ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam tat dṛśya smaraṇa anartha rūpaḥ bandhaḥ na naśyati

original: tat tadā / dṛśyasmaraṇānartharūpaḥ dṛśyasmaraṇam evānarthaḥ / saḥ rūpaṃ yasya / saḥ
analyzed: tat tadā dṛśya smaraṇa anartha rūpaḥ dṛśya smaraṇam eva anarthaḥ saḥ rūpam yasya saḥ

original: tādṛśaḥ bandhaḥ / na naśyati nāśaṃ na yāti / pūrvaṃ satyatayā jñātasya tato naṣṭasyārthasya
analyzed: tādṛśaḥ bandhaḥ na naśyati nāśam na yāti pūrvam satya tayā jñātasya tatas naṣṭasya arthasya

original: smaraṇaṃ hi durnivāram eva / yathā mātrāder iti bhāvaḥ / tat kadā / cet yadi / ādau
analyzed: smaraṇam hi durnivāram eva yathā mātrā ādeḥ iti bhāvaḥ tat kadā ced yadi ādau

original: pūrvaṃ / dṛśyaṃ sambhavati satyatayā upapattimad bhavati / paścāt kṣayaṃ nāśam /
analyzed: pūrvam dṛśyam sambhavati satya tayā upapattimat bhavati paścāt kṣayam nāśam

original: upāgataṃ bhavati / tasmāt traikālika evābhāvo 'trāṅgīkaraṇīya iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,11.26 //
analyzed: upāgatam bhavati tasmāt traikālikaḥ eva abhāvaḥ atra aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu naṣṭasya dṛśyasya kā smṛtir bhavatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu naṣṭasya dṛśyasya kā smṛtiḥ bhavati iti atra āha

original: yatra kvacana saṃsthasya svādarśasyeva cidgateḥ / pratibimbo lagaty eva sargasmṛtimayo hy ayam //MU_3,11.27//
analyzed: yatra kvacana saṃsthasya sva ādarśasya iva cit gateḥ pratibimbaḥ lagati eva sarga smṛti mayaḥ hi ayam

original: hi niścaye / ayaṃ samanantaram uktaḥ / sargasmṛtimayaḥ sargasmaraṇasvarūpaḥ / pratibimbaḥ
analyzed: hi niścaye ayam samanantaram uktaḥ sarga smṛti mayaḥ sarga smaraṇa svarūpaḥ pratibimbaḥ

original: lagaty evāvaśyaṃ lagati / kasyāḥ / cidgateḥ citprakārasya / kasyevādarśasyeva / yathā
analyzed: lagati eva avaśyam lagati kasyāḥ cit gateḥ cit prakārasya kasya iva ādarśasya iva yathā

original: yatra kvacana saṃsthitasyādarśasya padārthasānnidhye pratibimbo lagati tathā yatra
analyzed: yatra kvacana saṃsthitasya ādarśasya padārtha sānnidhye pratibimbaḥ lagati tathā yatra

original: kvacana sthitāyāḥ cidgateḥ sūkṣmatvena sthitadṛśyasānnidhyāt pratibimbo lagatīty
analyzed: kvacana sthitāyāḥ cit gateḥ sūkṣma tvena sthita dṛśya sānnidhyāt pratibimbaḥ lagati iti

original: arthaḥ //MT_3,11.27 //
analyzed: arthaḥ

original: tarhi muktiḥ kadā sambhavatīty / atrāha
analyzed: tarhi muktiḥ kadā sambhavati iti atra āha

original: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva cet svayam / draṣṭṛdṛśyabhramābhāvāt tat sambhavati muktatā //MU_3,11.28//
analyzed: ādau eva hi nā utpannam dṛśyam nā asti eva ced svayam draṣṭṛ dṛśya bhrama abhāvāt tat sambhavati mukta tā

original: dṛśyaṃ dṛśikriyāviṣayo bhāvajātaṃ / ādāv eva prathamam eva / svayaṃ svabhāvenānutpannaṃ
analyzed: dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā viṣayaḥ bhāva jātam ādau eva prathamam eva svayam svabhāvena anutpannam

original: ajātaṃ sat / cet yadi / nāsty eva / tat tadā / muktatā sambhavati upapattiyuktā bhavati /
analyzed: ajātam sat ced yadi na asti eva tat tadā mukta tā sambhavati upapatti yuktā bhavati

original: kutaḥ / draṣṭṛdṛśyabhramābhāvāt / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / dṛśyātyantābhāve sati puruṣasyedaṃ
analyzed: kutas draṣṭṛ dṛśya bhrama abhāvāt ayam bhāvaḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāve sati puruṣasya idam

original: dṛśyam iti bhramaḥ śāmyati / tacchāntau cāhaṃ draṣṭeti bhramo 'pi śāmyaty eva / tataś
analyzed: dṛśyam iti bhramaḥ śāmyati tad śāntau ca aham draṣṭā iti bhramaḥ api śāmyati eva tatas

original: ca śuddhacinmātrasvarūpa evāsau śiṣyate / tad eva ca muktir iti //MT_3,11.28 //
analyzed: ca śuddha cit mātra svarūpaḥ eva asau śiṣyate tat eva ca muktiḥ iti

original: praśnam upasaṃharati
analyzed: praśnam upasaṃharati

original: tasmād asambhavanmukter mama protsāhayuktitaḥ / atyantāsambhavaṃ dṛśye kathayātmavidāṃ vara //MU_3,11.29//
analyzed: tasmāt asambhavat mukteḥ mama protsāha yuktitaḥ atyanta asambhavam dṛśye kathaya ātma vidām vara

original: he ātmavidāṃ vara śreṣṭha / tasmāt tato hetoḥ / asambhavanmukteḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānaṃ
analyzed: he ātma vidām vara śreṣṭha tasmāt tatas hetoḥ asambhavat mukteḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñānam

original: vinānupapadyamānamukteḥ / mama / dṛśye vartamānam atyantāsambhavaṃ / kathaya / kutaḥ /
analyzed: vinā anupapadyamāna mukteḥ mama dṛśye vartamānam atyanta asambhavam kathaya kutas

original: protsāhayuktitaḥ prakṛṣṭam udyogaṃ kṛtvety arthaḥ //MT_3,11.29 //
analyzed: protsāha yuktitaḥ prakṛṣṭam udyogam kṛtvā iti arthaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram āha

original: asad eva yathā bhāti jagat sarvātmakaṃ tathā / śṛṇv ahaṃ kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te //MU_3,11.30//
analyzed: asat eva yathā bhāti jagat sarva ātmakam tathā śṛṇu aham kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te

original: tvaṃ śṛṇu / ahaṃ tathā taṃ prakāraṃ / kathayāmi / kayā / dīrghayā savistarayā / kathayā
analyzed: tvam śṛṇu aham tathā tam prakāram kathayāmi kayā dīrghayā sa vistarayā kathayā

original: vākyaprabandhena / tathā kathaṃ / sarvātmakaṃ samastadṛśyasvarūpaṃ / jagat / yathā
analyzed: vākya prabandhena tathā katham sarva ātmakam samasta dṛśya svarūpam jagat yathā

original: yena prakāreṇa / asad eva bhāti budbudau asatyatayā sphurati //MT_3,11.30 //
analyzed: yena prakāreṇa asat eva bhāti budbudau asatya tayā sphurati

original: nanu kimarthaṃ dīrghayā kathayā kathayasīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kimartham dīrghayā kathayā kathayasi iti atra āha

original: vyavasāyakathāvākyair yāvat tan nānuvarṇitam / na viśrāmyati te tāvad dhṛdi pāṃsur yathā hrade //MU_3,11.31//
analyzed: vyavasāya kathā vākyaiḥ yāvat tat na anuvarṇitam na viśrāmyati te tāvat hṛdi pāṃsuḥ yathā hrade

original: vyavasāyakathāvākyaiḥ / vyavasāyasya viśiṣṭasya niścayasyotpādikā kathā vyavasāyakathā /
analyzed: vyavasāya kathā vākyaiḥ vyavasāyasya viśiṣṭasya niścayasya utpādikā kathā vyavasāya kathā

original: tadabhidhāyakaiḥ vākyaiḥ vyavasāyakathāvākyaiḥ / tat dṛśyāsattvaṃ / yāvat nānuvarṇitaṃ
analyzed: tad abhidhāyakaiḥ vākyaiḥ vyavasāya kathā vākyaiḥ tat dṛśya asattvam yāvat na anuvarṇitam

original: syāt / tāvat te hṛdi na viśrāmyati na sthitiṃ karoti / ko yathā / pāṃsur yathā /
analyzed: syāt tāvat te hṛdi na viśrāmyati na sthitim karoti  kaḥ yathā pāṃsuḥ yathā

original: yathā pāṃsū rajaḥ / hrade na viśrāmyati / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,11.31 //
analyzed: yathā pāṃsuḥ rajaḥ hrade na viśrāmyati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānena kiṃ mama setsyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñānena kim mama setsyati iti atra āha

original: atyantābhāvam asyās tvaṃ jagatsargabhramasthiteḥ / buddhvaikadhyānaniṣṭhātmā vyavahāraṃ kariṣyasi //MU_3,11.32//
analyzed: atyanta abhāvam asyāḥ tvam jagat sarga bhrama sthiteḥ  buddhvā eka dhyāna niṣṭhā ātmā vyavahāram kariṣyasi

original: tvaṃ vyavahāraṃ paramparāyātaṃ rājyarūpaṃ vyavahāraṃ / kariṣyasi kūṭakārṣāpaṇavyavahāravat
analyzed: tvam vyavahāram paramparā yātam rājya rūpam vyavahāram kariṣyasi kūṭa kārṣāpaṇa vyavahāra vat

original: kariṣyasi / na tu vairāgyāvasthāvat tadvimukho bhaviṣyasi / mūḍhatvāvasthāvad vā
analyzed: kariṣyasi na tu vairāgya avasthā vat tad vimukhaḥ bhaviṣyasi mūḍha tva avasthā vat vā

original: tadāsaktaḥ / tvaṃ kathambhūtaḥ / ekadhyānaniṣṭhātmā / ekasya cinmātrākhyasya vastunaḥ /
analyzed: tad āsaktaḥ tvam kathambhūtaḥ eka dhyāna niṣṭhā ātmā ekasya cit mātra ākhyasya vastunaḥ

original: dhyāne cintāyāṃ / niṣṭhā yasya / tādṛśaḥ ātmā sattvarūpaṃ manaḥ yasya / saḥ / tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: dhyāne cintāyām niṣṭhā yasya tādṛśaḥ ātmā sattva rūpam manaḥ yasya saḥ tādṛśaḥ

original: antaḥ cinmātradhyāna ekaniṣṭhaḥ / bahiḥ vyavahārabhāg api bhaviṣyasīty arthaḥ / kiṃ

original: ātivāhikavapuḥ sūkṣmaśarīramayaḥ / bhavati / na tu bhūtarūpaḥ / tu viśeṣe / saḥ sthūlapṛthvyādibhūtarūpī
analyzed: ātivāhika vapuḥ sūkṣmaśarīra mayaḥ bhavati na tu bhūta rūpaḥ tu viśeṣe saḥ sthūla pṛthvī ādi bhūta rūpī

original: na bhavati / tena tadabhūtarūpitākhyena hetunā / pṛthvyādi sat nāsti / nanu prajeśasyāpṛthvyādirūpatayā
analyzed: na bhavati tena tad abhūta rūpitā ākhyena hetunā pṛthvī ādi sat na asti nanu prajā īśasya a pṛthvī ādi rūpa tayā

original: kathaṃ na pṛthvyādi sat astīty / atrāha yadeti / yata ity asyārthe / yataḥ jātam
analyzed: katham na pṛthvī ādi sat asti iti atra āha yadā iti yatas iti asya arthe yatas jātam

original: utpannaṃ / nāsti / śuddhamanorūpasya prajeśasya tadrūpatāgrahaṇena pṛthvyāder jātatvaṃ
analyzed: utpannam na asti śuddha manaḥ rūpasya prajā īśasya tad rūpa tā grahaṇena pṛthvī ādeḥ jāta tvam

original: syān / na tu pūrvanyāyena prajeśasya tadrūpatāgrahaṇaṃ sambhavaty / ataḥ pṛthvyāder
analyzed: syāt na tu pūrva nyāyena prajā īśasya tad rūpa tā grahaṇam sambhavati atas pṛthvī ādeḥ

original: api jātatvaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ / iti śivam //MT_3,13.54 //
analyzed: api jāta tvam na sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ // 3,13 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: oṃ / evaṃ jagato 'tyantābhāvaṃ paramātmaikamayatāṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ uktvā tāvanmātram eva sādhanīyaṃ jñātvā punar api tad eva kathayati
analyzed: om evam jagataḥ atyanta abhāvam paramātma eka maya tām ca punar punar uktvā tāvat mātram eva sādhanīyam jñātvā punar api tat eva kathayati

original: itthaṃ jagad ahantādi dṛśyaṃ jātaṃ na kiñcana / ajātatvāc ca nāsty eva yac cāsti param eva tat //MU_3,14.1//
analyzed: ittham jagat ahantā ādi dṛśyam jātam na kiñcana ajāta tvāt ca na asti eva yat ca asti param eva tat

original: ahantādi ahantāprabhṛti / dṛśyaṃ jagat itthaṃ pūrvaprakāreṇa / kiñcana leśenāpi /
analyzed: ahantā ādi ahantā prabhṛti dṛśyam jagat ittham pūrva prakāreṇa kiñcana leśena api

original: na jātaṃ bhavati / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha ajāteti / jagat ajātatvāt / caśabdaḥ pādapūraṇārthaḥ /
analyzed: na jātam bhavati tatas kim iti atra āha ajāta iti jagat ajāta tvāt caśabdaḥ pāda pūraṇa arthaḥ

original: nāsty eva / nanu katham ajātatvena jagato 'sattvaṃ sādhayasi bhāsamānatvena sattvād
analyzed: na asti eva nanu katham ajāta tvena jagataḥ asattvam sādhayasi bhāsamāna tvena sattvāt

original: ity / atrāha yac ceti / tat param eva uttīrṇaṃ cinmātram eva / bhavati / na tu jagat /
analyzed: iti atra āha yat ca iti tat param eva uttīrṇam cit mātram eva bhavati na tu jagat

original: tat kiṃ / yat asti yat bhāsamānatvena nirākartuṃ na śakyata ity arthaḥ //MT_3,14.1 //
analyzed: tat kim yat asti yat bhāsamāna tvena nirākartum na śakyate iti arthaḥ

original: nanu tarhi pūrvaṃ sādhitā jīvatā katham astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi pūrvam sādhitā jīvatā katham asti iti atra āha

original: paramākāśa evāsau jīvatāṃ cetati svayam / niḥspandāmbhodhijaṭhare salilaṃ spandatām iva //MU_3,14.2//
analyzed: parama ākāśaḥ eva asau jīvatām cetati svayam niḥspanda ambhodhi jaṭhare salilam spandatām iva

original: asau pūrvoktaḥ / paramākāśa eva cinmātrākāśa eva / svayaṃ svena / jīvatāṃ jīvabhāvaṃ /
analyzed: asau pūrva uktaḥ paramākāśaḥ eva cit mātra ākāśaḥ eva svayam svena jīvatām jīva bhāvam

original: cetati anubhavati / kim iva / salilam iva / yathā niḥspandāmbhodhijaṭhare niḥspandasamudramadhye /
analyzed: cetati anubhavati kim iva salilam iva yathā niḥspanda ambhodhi jaṭhare niḥspanda samudra madhye

original: sthitaṃ jalaṃ spandatāṃ / spandaśabdenātra spandayukto lakṣyate / spandayuktatāṃ /
analyzed: sthitam jalam spanda tām spanda śabdena atra spanda yuktaḥ lakṣyate spanda yukta tām

original: cetati / cetanaṃ cātra tadyogyatāmātram eva / na hi tatra salilasya saspandatā kenāpy
analyzed: cetati cetanam ca atra tad yogya tā mātram eva na hi tatra salilasya sa spanda tā kena api

original: aṃśena yuktā / evaṃ brahmaṇy api jīvatāyogyatvamātram eva / na tu tatra jīvatā nāma
analyzed: aṃśena yuktāḥ evam brahmaṇi api jīvatā yogya tva mātram eva na tu tatra jīvatā nāma

original: kācid asti / salile 'gre saspandatāyuktatvāt yogyatājñānaṃ / brahmaṇi jīvarūpatayā
analyzed: kācid asti salile agre sa spanda tā yukta tvāt yogyatā jñānam brahmaṇi jīva rūpa tayā

original: bhāsaneneti viśeṣaḥ //MT_3,14.2 //
analyzed: bhāsanena iti viśeṣaḥ

original: etad eva nānābhaṅgībhiḥ pratipādayati
analyzed: etat eva nānā bhaṅgībhiḥ pratipādayati

original: ākāśarūpam ajahad eva vettīva dṛśyatām / svapnasaṅkalpaśailādāv iva cidvṛttir āntarī //MU_3,14.3//
analyzed: ākāśa rūpam a jahat eva vetti iva dṛśya tām svapna saṅkalpa śaila ādau iva cit vṛttiḥ āntarī

original: asau paramākāśaḥ dṛśyatām dṛśyabhāvaṃ / vetti iva anubhavati iva / kathambhūta eva /
analyzed: asau parama ākāśaḥ dṛśya tām dṛśya bhāvam vetti iva anubhavati iva kathaṃbhūtaḥ eva

original: ākāśarūpaṃ cinmātrākāśākhyaṃ rūpam / ajahad eva / tattyāge tu vedanam asya na syād
analyzed: ākāśa rūpam cit mātra ākāśa ākhyam rūpam ajahat eva tad tyāge tu vedanam asya na syāt

original: iti bhāvaḥ / kevāntarī ahamparāmarśasya sārabhūtāntaḥkaraṇopahitā / cidvṛttir iva
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ kevāntarī ahamparāmarśasya sāra bhūta antaḥkaraṇa upahitā cit vṛttiḥ iva

original: sā yathā / svapnasaṅkalpaśailādau svapne saṅkalpe ca svaviṣayīkṛte svasvarūpaparvatādau
analyzed: sā yathā svapna saṅkalpa śaila ādau svapne saṅkalpe ca sva viṣayīkṛte sva svarūpa parvata ādau

original: sthitāṃ / dṛśyatāṃ vetti / śailo 'yam iti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,14.3 //
analyzed: sthitām dṛśyatām vetti śailaḥ ayam iti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: pṛthvyādirahito deho yo virāḍātmano mahān / ātivāhika evāsau cinmātrācchanabhomayaḥ //MU_3,14.4//
analyzed: pṛthvī ādi rahitaḥ dehaḥ yaḥ virāj ātmanaḥ mahān ātivāhikaḥ eva asau cit mātrāt śana bho mayaḥ

original: pṛthvyādirahitaḥ sthūlapṛthvyādisparśādūṣitaḥ / virāḍātmanaḥ virāṭsvarūpatayā sthitasya
analyzed: pṛthvī ādi rahitaḥ sthūla pṛthvī ādi sparśāt ūṣitaḥ virāj ātmanaḥ virāj svarūpa tayā sthitasya

original: paramātmanaḥ / mahān vyāpakaḥ / yo deho 'sti / saḥ ātivāhika eva sūkṣma eva / bhavati /
analyzed: paramātmanaḥ mahān vyāpakaḥ yaḥ dehaḥ asti saḥ ātivāhikaḥ eva sūkṣmaḥ eva bhavati

original: atra hetutvena viśeṣaṇam āha cinmātreti / yataḥ cinmātrākhyanirmalākāśasvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: atra hetu tvena viśeṣaṇam āha cit mātra iti yatas cit mātra ākhya nirmala ākāśa svarūpaḥ

original: cinmātramayasya śarīrasyātivāhikatvaṃ svapne dṛṣṭam iti nāyastam //MT_3,14.4 //
analyzed: cit mātra mayasya śarīrasya ātivāhika tvam svapne dṛṣṭam iti na āyastam

original: akṣayasvapnaśailābhaḥ sthirasvapnapuropamaḥ / citrakṛtsthitacittasthacitrasainyasamākṛtiḥ //MU_3,14.5//
analyzed: akṣaya svapna śaila ābhaḥ sthira svapna pura upamaḥ citra kṛt sthita citta stha citra sainya sama ākṛtiḥ

original: anikhātamahāstambhaputrikaughasamopamaḥ / brahmākāśe 'nikhātātmā sustambhe sālabhañjakaḥ //MU_3,14.6//
ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ svayambhūr iti viśrutaḥ / prāktanānāṃ svakāryāṇām abhāvād apakāraṇaḥ //MU_3,14.7//
analyzed: ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam svayambhūḥ iti viśrutaḥ prāktanānām sva kāryāṇām abhāvāt apakāraṇaḥ

original: ādyaḥ kāraṇabhūtaḥ / svayambhūr iti viśrutaḥ / svayambhūr iti nāmnā prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: ādyaḥ kāraṇa bhūtaḥ svayambhūḥ iti viśrutaḥ svayambhūḥ iti nāmnā prasiddhaḥ

original: prajāpatiḥ / pūrvaṃ sargārambhe / apakāraṇaḥ kāraṇarahitaḥ / bhavati / kutaḥ / prāktanānāṃ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ pūrvam sarga ārambhe apakāraṇaḥ kāraṇa rahitaḥ bhavati kutas prāktanānām

original: svakāryāṇāṃ pūrvakalpakṛtakarmaṇām / abhāvāt / karmaṇāṃ ca janmahetutvaṃ sarvaśāstreṣu
analyzed: sva kāryāṇām pūrva kalpa kṛta karmaṇām abhāvāt karmaṇām ca janma hetu tvam sarva śāstreṣu

original: prasiddham eva / kāryāṇām abhāvaś cāsya cinmātrataḥ sadya utthitatvena jñeyaḥ / kiṃrūpo
analyzed: prasiddham eva kāryāṇām abhāvaḥ ca asya cit mātrataḥ sadyas utthita tvena jñeyaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ

original: 'sau / akṣaya ityādi / akṣayaḥ itarasvapnaśailavat kṣaṇikatvadoṣarahitaḥ yaḥ svapnaśailaḥ /
analyzed: asau akṣayaḥ ityādi akṣayaḥ itara svapna śaila vat kṣaṇika tva doṣa rahitaḥ yaḥ svapna śailaḥ

original: tadvad ābhā yasya / sa akṣayasvapnaśailābhaḥ / sthirasvapnapuropamaḥ / itarasvapnapuravailakṣyeṇa
analyzed: tadvat ābhā yasya sa akṣaya svapna śaila ābhaḥ sthira svapna pura upamaḥ itara svapna pura vailakṣyeṇa

original: sthiraṃ sthirākāraṃ / yat svapnapuraṃ / tasyopamā yasya / saḥ / etena viśeṣaṇadvayenātivāhikatāyām
analyzed: sthiram sthira ākāram yat svapna puram tasya upamā yasya saḥ etena viśeṣaṇa dvayena ātivāhika tāyām

original: apy asya sthiratoktā / citrakṛti sthitaṃ cittaṃ citrakṛtsthitacittaṃ / tatrasthaṃ
analyzed: api asya sthira tā uktā citrakṛti sthitam cittam citrakṛt sthita cittam tatrastham

original: yat citrasainyam agre prakaṭībhavad ālekhyasainyaṃ / tena samākṛtiḥ svarūpaṃ yasya /
analyzed: yat citra sainyam agre prakaṭībhavat ālekhya sainyam tena sama ākṛtiḥ sva rūpam yasya

original: saḥ citrakṛtsthitacittasthacitrasainyasamākṛtiḥ / anikhāto 'nutkīrṇaḥ / yaḥ mahāstambhaputrikaughaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ citra kṛt sthita citta stha citra sainya sama ākṛtiḥ a nikhātaḥ an utkīrṇaḥ yaḥ mahā stambhaputrikā oghaḥ

original: tena samā upamā yasya / saḥ anikhātamahāstambhaputrikaughasamopamaḥ / brahmākāśe
analyzed: tena samā upamā yasya saḥ a nikhāta mahā stambha putrikā ogha sama upamaḥ brahma ākāśe

original: sustambhe anikhātātmā anutkīrṇasvarūpaḥ / sālabhañjakaḥ mahatī putrikā / anikhāteti
analyzed: su stambhe a nikhāta ātmā an utkīrṇa svarūpaḥ sālabhañjakaḥ mahatī putrikā a nikhātā iti

original: viśeṣaṇasyaiveyaṃ vyākhyā / etena viśeṣaṇadvayena brahmaikamayatāsyoktā //MT_3,14.5-7 //
analyzed: viśeṣaṇasya eva iyam vyākhyā etena viśeṣaṇa dvayena brahma eka maya tā asya uktā

original: mahāpralayaparyanteṣv ādyāḥ kila pitāmahāḥ / mucyante sarva evātaḥ prāktanaṃ karma teṣu kim //MU_3,14.8//
analyzed: mahāpralaya paryanteṣu ādyāḥ kila pitāmahāḥ mucyante sarve eva atas prāktanam karma teṣu kim

original: sarve eva ādyāḥ pitāmahāḥ mahāpralayaparyanteṣu / paryantaśabdenātra udrekatā vivakṣitā /
analyzed: sarve eva ādyāḥ pitāmahāḥ mahāpralaya paryanteṣu paryanta śabdena atra udreka tā vivakṣitā

original: mucyante cinmātrākhye svarūpe layībhavanti / phalitam āhātaḥ iti / ato hetoḥ / teṣu
analyzed: mucyante cit mātra ākhye svarūpe layībhavanti phalitam āha atas iti atas hetoḥ teṣu

original: sarveṣu ādyeṣu pitāmaheṣu / prāktanaṃ karma kiṃ bhavati / na kiñcid apīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣu ādyeṣu pitāmaheṣu prāktanam karma kim bhavati na kiñcid api iti arthaḥ

original: tathā ca / sarve 'pi te 'pakāraṇā eveti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.8 //
analyzed: tathā ca sarve api te apakāraṇāḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: moktavya eva kuḍyātmā dṛśyo 'dṛśyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ / na ca dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā sarvam eva ca //MU_3,14.9//
analyzed: moktavyaḥ eva kuḍya ātmā dṛśyaḥ a dṛśyaḥ ca saṃsthitaḥ na ca dṛśyam na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā sarvam eva ca

original: praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ sarveṣām eṣa eva saḥ / asmād udeti jīvālī dīpālī dīpakād iva //MU_3,14.10//
analyzed: praticchandaḥ padārthānām sarveṣām eṣaḥ eva saḥ asmāt udeti jīvālī dīpālī dīpakāt iva

original: eṣa sa eva pūrvoktaḥ prajāpatir eva / sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ praticchandaḥ samaṣṭirūpaḥ
analyzed: eṣa saḥ eva pūrva uktaḥ prajāpatiḥ eva sarveṣām padārthānām praticchandaḥ samaṣṭi rūpaḥ

original: ābhāsaḥ / bhavati / sarveṣām ābhāsānām etatsvarūpatvāt / kathambhūto 'sau / moktavya
analyzed: ābhāsaḥ bhavati sarveṣām ābhāsānām etad sva rūpa tvāt kathambhūtaḥ asau moktavya

original: eva moktuṃ madhye gantuṃ śakya eva / kuḍyātmā / kuḍyaṃ hi rodhakatvena madhye gantuṃ
analyzed: eva moktum madhye gantum śakyaḥ eva kuḍya ātmā kuḍyam hi rodhaka tvena madhye gantum

original: na śakyate / 'yaṃ tu apūrvam eva kuḍyaḥ / moktavyatvam asya sarveṣāṃ dṛśyasañcārāṇāṃ
analyzed: na śakyate  ayam tu apūrvam eva kuḍyaḥ moktavya tvam asya sarveṣām dṛśya sañcārāṇām

original: praveśanirgamamahattvāt / kuḍyatvaṃ tu sarvādhāratvena / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / dṛśyaḥ
analyzed: praveśa nirgama mahat tvāt kuḍya tvam tu sarva ādhāra tvena punar kathambhūtaḥ dṛśyaḥ

original: saṃsthitaḥ dṛśyarūpeṇāsthitaḥ / adṛśyaś ca sthitaḥ draṣṭṛrūpeṇa ca sthitaḥ / cinmātrābhāsaśuddhamanorūpaprajāpatirūpatvād
analyzed: saṃsthitaḥ dṛśya rūpeṇa asthitaḥ adṛśyaḥ ca sthitaḥ draṣṭṛ rūpeṇa ca sthitaḥ cit mātra ābhāsa śuddha manaḥ rūpa prajāpati rūpa tvāt

original: draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ / punaḥ kiṃ / na dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā na sṛjikriyākartā sarvottīrṇarūpatvāt /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ punar kim na dṛśyam na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā na sṛji kriyā kartā sarva uttīrṇa rūpa tvāt

original: punaḥ kiṃ / sarvam eva ca / nanu katham ayaṃ praticchandaḥ astīty / atrāha asmād
analyzed: punar kim sarvam eva ca nanu katham ayam praticchandaḥ asti iti atra āha asmāt

original: iti / yataḥ asmāt prajāpateḥ / jīvālī udeti prādurbhavati / nanu mṛdo ghaṭālī rajjusamūhāt
analyzed: iti yatas asmāt prajāpateḥ jīvālī udeti prādurbhavati nanu mṛdaḥ ghaṭa āliḥ rajju samūhāt

original: vā sarpālīnyaṃ tathā udeti / na tayoḥ tatpraticchandatvaṃ dṛśyate ity / atrāha dīpālīti /
analyzed: vā tathā udeti na tayoḥ tad praticchanda tvam dṛśyate iti atra āha dīpa āli iti

original: vivartapariṇāmābhyām anya eva praticchandyapraticchandakarūpaḥ prakāraḥ atrāstīti
analyzed: vivarta pariṇāmābhyām anyaḥ eva praticchandya praticchandaka rūpaḥ prakāraḥ atra asti iti
bhāvaḥ

original: saṅkalpa eva saṅkalpāt kilaiti kṣmādivarjitaḥ / kṣmādimān iva niṣkuḍyaḥ svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā //MU_3,14.11//
analyzed: saṅkalpaḥ eva saṅkalpāt kila eti kṣmā ādi varjitaḥ kṣmādimān iva niṣkuḍyaḥ svapnāt svapna antaram yathā

original: kileti niścaye / kṣmādivarjitaḥ ābhāsarūpatvena sthūlapṛthvyādirahitaḥ / kṣmādimān
analyzed: kila iti niścaye kṣmā ādi varjitaḥ ābhāsa rūpatvena sthūla pṛthvī ādi rahitaḥ kṣmādimān

original: iva bhāsamānatvena tatsahita iva bhāsamānaḥ / niṣkuḍyaḥ bhāsamānaiḥ kuḍyarūpaiḥ parvatādibhiḥ
