analyzed: iva bhāsamāna tvena tad sahitaḥ iva bhāsamānaḥ niṣkuḍyaḥ bhāsamānaiḥ kuḍya rūpaiḥ parvata ādibhiḥ

original: hīnaḥ / saṅkalpaḥ jagadākhyaḥ saṅkalpaḥ / saṅkalpāt śuddhamanorūpād brahmaṇaḥ / eti
analyzed: hīnaḥ saṅkalpaḥ jagat ākhyaḥ saṅkalpaḥ saṅkalpāt śuddha manaḥ rūpāt brahmaṇaḥ eti

original: prādurbhavati / atra dṛṣṭāntam āha svapnād iti / svapnāt saṅkalparūpāt / svapnāntaraṃ
analyzed: prādurbhavati atra dṛṣṭāntam āha svapnāt iti svapnāt saṅkalpa rūpāt svapna antaram

original: saṅkalparūpam anyasvapnam / yathaiti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,14.11 //
analyzed: saṅkalpa rūpam anya svapnam yathā eti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: asmād eva praticchandāj jīvāḥ samprasaranty amī / sahakārikāraṇānām abhāvāc ca sa eva te //MU_3,14.12//
analyzed: asmāt eva praticchandāt jīvāḥ samprasaranti amī sahakāri kāraṇānām abhāvāt ca saḥ eva te

original: asmāt prajāpatināmnaḥ / praticchandāt ābhāsāt / amī pratyaksaṃ sphuramāṇāḥ / jīvāḥ /
analyzed: asmāt prajāpati nāmnaḥ praticchandāt ābhāsāt amī pratyaksam sphuramāṇāḥ jīvāḥ

original: samprasaranti sañcāraṃ yānti / tarhi tata utpannatvena tato bhinnā eva syur ity /
analyzed: samprasaranti sañcāram yānti tarhi tatas utpanna tvena tatas bhinnāḥ eva syuḥ iti

original: atrāha sahakārīti / te jīvāḥ / sa eva bhavanti / na tu tato bhinnāḥ / kutaḥ / sahakārikāraṇānām
analyzed: atra āha sahakāri iti te jīvāḥ saḥ eva bhavanti na tu tatas bhinnāḥ kutas sahakāri kāraṇānām

original: prāktanakarmarūpāṇāṃ sahakārikāraṇānām / abhāvāt / sahakārikāraṇābhāve kāryaṃ kāraṇarūpam
analyzed: prāktana karma rūpāṇām sahakāri kāraṇānām abhāvāt sahakāri kāraṇa abhāve kāryam kāraṇa rūpam

original: eveti hi prasiddhiḥ //MT_3,14.12 //
analyzed: eva iti hi prasiddhiḥ

original: sahakārikāraṇānām abhāve kāryakāraṇam / ekam etad ato nānyaḥ parasmāt sargavibhramaḥ //MU_3,14.13//
analyzed: sahakāri kāraṇānām abhāve kārya kāraṇam ekam etat atas na anyaḥ parasmāt sarga vibhramaḥ

original: kāryaṃ ca tat kāraṇaṃ ca kāryakāraṇaṃ / parasmāt dṛśyāpekṣayā utkṛṣṭāt prajāpateḥ / sargavibhramaḥ sargavilāsaḥ //MT_3,14.13//
analyzed: kāryam ca tat kāraṇam ca kārya kāraṇam parasmāt dṛśya apekṣayā utkṛṣṭāt prajāpateḥ sarga vibhramaḥ sarga vilāsaḥ

original: brahmaivādyo virāḍātmā virāḍātmaiva sargatā / jīvākāśaḥ sa evetthaṃ sthitaḥ pṛthvyādy asad yataḥ //MU_3,14.14//
analyzed: brahmā eva ādyaḥ virāj ātmā virāj ātmā eva sarga tā jīva ākāśaḥ saḥ eva ittham sthitaḥ pṛthvī ādi asat yatas

original: brahma eva brahmatattvam evādyaḥ virāḍātmā virāṭsvarūpo paramātmā / bhavati / virāḍātmā
analyzed: brahma eva brahma tattvam eva ādyaḥ virāj ātmā paramātmā bhavati virāj ātmā

original: eva sargatā sargaḥ / bhavati / pādapūraṇārtho bhāvapratyayaḥ / upasaṃhāraṃ karoti
analyzed: eva sarga tā sargaḥ bhavati pāda pūraṇa arthaḥ bhāva pratyayaḥ upasaṃhāram karoti

original: jīveti / sa pūrvoktaḥ / jīvākāśa eva cetyatvāditanmātrāntavalitacinmātrākhyaḥ jīvākāśa
analyzed: jīva iti sa pūrva uktaḥ jīvākāśaḥ eva cetya tva ādi tanmātra anta valita cit mātra ākhyaḥ jīvākāśa

original: eva / itthaṃ prajāpatyādisargarūpeṇa / sthito bhavati / atra hetum āha pṛthvyādīti /
analyzed: eva ittham prajāpati ādi sarga rūpeṇa sthitaḥ bhavati atra hetum āha pṛthvī ādi iti

original: yataḥ yasmāt kāraṇāt / pṛthvyādi asat bhavati //MT_3,14.14 //
analyzed: yatas yasmāt kāraṇāt pṛthvī ādi asat bhavati

original: jīvākāśa iti śrutvā kiñcit saṃśayam āpannaḥ śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: jīva ākāśaḥ iti śrutvā kiñcid saṃśayam āpannaḥ śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: kiṃ syāt parimito jīvarāśir āho anantakaḥ / āhosvid asty anantātmā jīvapiṇḍo 'calopamaḥ //MU_3,14.15//
analyzed: kim syāt parimitaḥ jīva rāśiḥ āho anantakaḥ āhosvit asti ananta ātmā jīva piṇḍaḥ acala upamaḥ

original: jīvarāśiḥ jīvākāśatvenoktaḥ jīvapuñjaḥ / parimitaḥ kiṃ syāt āho anantakaḥ aparimitaḥ
analyzed: jīvarāśiḥ jīva ākāśa tvena uktaḥ jīva puñjaḥ parimitaḥ kim syāt āho anantakaḥ aparimitaḥ

original: syāt / āhosvit anantātmā jīvapiṇḍaḥ acalopamaḥ parvataprakhyaḥ / asti / rāśiḥ bhinnatvena
analyzed: syāt āhosvit ananta ātmā jīva piṇḍaḥ acala upamaḥ parvata prakhyaḥ asti rāśiḥ bhinna tvena

original: vartamānānāṃ samūhaḥ / piṇḍaḥ mṛtpiṇḍavat eka eva kaścij jīvamayaḥ piṇḍa iti bhedaḥ //MT_3,14.15 //
analyzed: vartamānānām samūhaḥ piṇḍaḥ mṛd piṇḍa vat ekaḥ eva kaścid jīva mayaḥ piṇḍaḥ iti bhedaḥ

original: nanu kiṃ tava rāśipiṇḍatvayoḥ praśnenety āśaṅkyāha
analyzed: nanu kim tava rāśi piṇḍa tvayoḥ praśnena iti āśaṅkya āha

original: dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva vāridheḥ / kaṇās taptāyasa iva kasmān niryānti jīvakāḥ //MU_3,14.16//
analyzed: dhārāḥ payaḥ mucaḥ iva śīkarāḥ iva vāridheḥ kaṇāḥ tapta ayasaḥ iva kasmāt niryānti jīvakāḥ

original: dhārā jaladhārāḥ / śīkarāḥ jalakaṇāḥ / taptāyasaḥ vahnyabhijvalitāt ayasaḥ / kaṇāḥ
analyzed: dhārāḥ jala dhārāḥ śīkarāḥ jala kaṇāḥ tapta ayasaḥ vahni abhijvalitāt ayasaḥ kaṇāḥ

original: vahnimayāḥ leśāḥ / kasmād iti / jīvarāśeḥ jīvapiṇḍasya vānaṅgīkāre eteṣāṃ niryāṇaṃ
analyzed: vahni mayāḥ leśāḥ kasmāt iti jīvarāśeḥ jīva piṇḍasya vā anaṅgīkāre eteṣām niryāṇam

original: na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.16 //
analyzed: na sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: praśnam upasaṃharati
analyzed: praśnam upasaṃharati

original: iti me bhagavan brūhi jīvajālavinirṇayam / jñātam etan mayā prāyas tad eva prakaṭīkuru //MU_3,14.17//
analyzed: iti me bhagavan brūhi jīva jāla vinirṇayam jñātam etat mayā prāyas tat eva prakaṭīkuru

original: he bhagavan tvaṃ / iti pṛṣṭaṃ / jīvajālavinirṇayaṃ me brūhi / etāvad uktvā tvayā
analyzed: he bhagavan tvam iti pṛṣṭam jīva jāla vinirṇayam me brūhi etāvat uktvā tvayā

original: kiṃ na śrutam ity / atrāha jñātam iti / mayā etat prāyaḥ bāhulyena / jñātam / na
analyzed: kim na śrutam iti atra āha jñātam iti mayā etat prāyas bāhulyena jñātam na

original: tv aśeṣeṇātaḥ tad eva prakaṭīkuru yenāśeṣeṇa jānāmīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.17 //
analyzed: tu aśeṣeṇa atas tat eva prakaṭīkuru yena aśeṣeṇa jānāmi iti bhāvaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram āha

original: eka eva na jīvo 'sti rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ / śaśaśṛṅgaṃ samuḍḍīya prayātītīva te vacaḥ //MU_3,14.18//
analyzed: ekaḥ eva na jīvaḥ asti rāśīnām sambhavaḥ kutas śaśa śṛṅgam samuḍḍīya prayāti iti iva te vacaḥ

original: paramārthataḥ eka eva jīvo nāsti / tvatpṛṣṭānāṃ rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ syāt / etatpraśnasyāsambaddhārthatvaṃ
analyzed: paramārthataḥ ekaḥ eva jīvaḥ na asti tvad pṛṣṭānām rāśīnām sambhavaḥ kutas syāt etat praśnasya asambaddha artha tvam

original: kathayati śaśeti / śaśaśṛṅgaṃ samuḍḍīya prayāti iti etadvacanasadṛśaṃ / te vacaḥ
analyzed: kathayati śaśa iti śaśa śṛṅgam samuḍḍīya prayāti iti etad vacana sadṛśam te vacaḥ

original: asti / ādau śaśaśṛṅgam eva nāsti / kā kathā taduḍḍayanasya / tathā jīva eva nāsti /
analyzed: asti ādau śaśa śṛṅgam eva na asti kā kathā tad uḍḍayanasya tathā jīvaḥ eva na asti

original: kā kathā tadrāśyāder iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.18 //
analyzed: kā kathā tad rāśi ādeḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: sarvam etat pṛṣṭaṃ nirākaroti
analyzed: sarvam etat pṛṣṭam nirākaroti

original: na jīvo 'sti na jīvānāṃ rāśayaḥ santi rāghava / na caikaḥ parvataprakhyo jīvapiṇḍo 'sti kaścana //MU_3,14.19//
analyzed: na jīvaḥ asti na jīvānām rāśayaḥ santi rāghava na ca ekaḥ parvata prakhyaḥ jīva piṇḍaḥ asti kaścana

original: paramārthataḥ sarvasya śuddhacinmātraikamayatvāt jīvo nāsti / he rāghava / jīvānāṃ
analyzed: paramārthataḥ sarvasya śuddha cit mātra eka maya tvāt jīvaḥ na asti he rāghava jīvānām

original: rāśayo na santi / na ca ekaḥ kaścana parvataprakhyaḥ jīvapiṇḍo 'sti / ataś ca tvatpraśno
analyzed: rāśayaḥ na santi na ca ekaḥ kaścana parvata prakhyaḥ jīva piṇḍaḥ asti atas ca tvad praśnaḥ

original: 'yaṃ na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.19 //
analyzed: ayam na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: āśīḥprakāreṇa niścayam asya kartavyatvena kathayati
analyzed: āśīḥ prakāreṇa niścayam asya kartavya tvena kathayati

original: jīvaśabdārthakalanāḥ samastakalanānvitāḥ / na ca kāścana santīti niścayo 'stu tavācalaḥ //MU_3,14.20//
analyzed: jīva śabda artha kalanāḥ samasta kalanā anvitāḥ na ca kāścana santi iti niścayaḥ astu tava acalaḥ

original: taveti niścayaḥ ayaṃ niścayaḥ / acalaḥ sthiro / 'stu / iti kiṃ / iti jīvaśabdārthakalanāḥ /
analyzed: tava iti niścayaḥ ayam niścayaḥ acalaḥ sthiraḥ astu iti kim iti jīva śabda artha kalanāḥ

original: tāḥ samastakalanānvitāḥ samastābhiḥ ahambhāvādikalanābhiḥ anvitāḥ / na santi //MT_3,14.20 //
analyzed: tāḥ samasta kalanā anvitāḥ samastābhiḥ ahambhāva ādi kalanābhiḥ anvitāḥ na santi

original: nanu jīvādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇa sphuraṇāt katham ayaṃ niścayaḥ yuktaḥ syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jīva ādīnām pratyakṣeṇa sphuraṇāt katham ayam niścayaḥ yuktaḥ syāt iti atra āha

original: śuddhaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ brahmāstīha hi sarvagam / tad yathā sarvaśaktitvād vindate yāṃ svayaṃ kalām //MU_3,14.21//
analyzed: śuddham cit mātram amalam brahma asti iha hi sarvagam tat yathā sarva śakti tvāt vindate yām svayam kalām

original: cinmātrānukrameṇaiva sampraphullāṃ latām iva /
analyzed: cit mātra anukrameṇa eva sampraphullām latām iva

original: nanu mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā tām evāśu prapaśyati //MT_3,14.22//
analyzed: nanu mūrtām amūrtām vā tām eva āśu prapaśyati

original: hi niścaye / śuddhaṃ cinmātraṃ śuddhacinmātrasvarūpam / ata evāmalaṃ brahmāsti /
analyzed: hi niścaye śuddham cit mātram śuddha cit mātra svarūpam atas eva amalam brahma asti

original: kathambhūtaṃ / sarvagam samastadeśakālavyāpakam / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha tad iti /
analyzed: kathambhūtam sarvagam samasta deśa kāla vyāpakam tatas kim iti atra āha tat iti

original: tat brahma / sarvaśaktitvāt yataḥ sarvaśaktir asti / tataḥ yāṃ jīvādimayīṃ / kalāṃ
analyzed: tat brahma sarva śakti tvāt yatas sarva śaktiḥ asti tatas yām jīva ādi mayīm kalām

original: kalanāṃ / yathā yena prakāreṇa / svayaṃ svena / na tu pāratantryeṇa / vindate svopalabdhiviṣayaṃ
analyzed: kalanām yathā yena prakāreṇa svayam svena na tu pāratantryeṇa vindate sva upalabdhi viṣayam

original: karoti / kathambhūtāṃ kalāṃ / cinmātrānukrameṇa cinmātraparipāṭyā / latām iva latāvat /
analyzed: karoti kathambhūtām kalām cit mātra anukrameṇa cit mātra paripāṭyā latām iva latā vat

original: sampraphullāṃ vikasitāṃ / cinmātrasyaiva hīyaṃ paripāṭī yat kalanāḥ vikāsayati /
analyzed: sampraphullām vikasitām cit mātrasya eva hi iyam paripāṭī yat kalanāḥ vikāsayati

original: nanu niścaye / tāṃ kalanāṃ / mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā sthūlāṃ sūkṣmāṃ vāśu tasminn eva kṣaṇe /
analyzed: nanu niścaye tām kalanām mūrtām amūrtām vā sthūlām sūkṣmām vā āśu tasmin eva kṣaṇe

original: prapaśyati sampannām eva paśyati / tathā ca / jīvaḥ paramārthataḥ svayaṃ siddho nāsti /
analyzed: prapaśyati sampannām eva paśyati tathā ca jīvaḥ paramārthataḥ svayam siddhaḥ na asti

original: kasya rāśitā piṇḍatā vā bhaved iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.21-22 //
analyzed: kasya rāśi tā piṇḍa tā vā bhavet iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadi brahma jīvādi paśyati tadā tadbhinnam evaitat syāt / svabhinnasyaiva dṛṣṭigocaratvād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi brahma jīva ādi paśyati tadā tad bhinnam eva etat syāt sva bhinnasya eva dṛṣṭi gocara tvāt iti atra āha

original: jīvo buddhiḥ kriyāspando mano dvitvaikyam ity api / svasattāṃ prakacantīṃ tāṃ niyojayati vedane //MU_3,14.23//
analyzed: jīvaḥ buddhiḥ kriyā spandaḥ manaḥ dvi tva aikyam iti api sva sattām prakacantīm tām niyojayati vedane

original: tat brahma / tāṃ prasiddhāṃ / svasattāṃ svasphurattāṃ / vedane niyojayati vedanaviṣayāṃ
analyzed: tat brahma tām prasiddhām sva sattām sva sphurat tām vedane niyojayati vedana viṣayām

original: karoti / paśyatīti yāvat / svasattāṃ kathambhūtāṃ / jīvaḥ buddhiḥ kriyāspandaḥ hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthāś
analyzed: karoti paśyati iti yāvat sva sattām kathaṃbhūtām jīvaḥ buddhiḥ kriyā spandaḥ hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthāḥ

original: ceṣṭāḥ / manaḥ / dvitvaṃ ca tat aikyaṃ ca dvitvaikyam / ity api etadrūpeṇa / kacantīṃ
analyzed: ceṣṭāḥ manaḥ dvi tvam ca tat aikyam ca dvi tva aikyam iti api etad rūpeṇa kacantīm

original: sphurantīṃ / tathā ca / dṛṣṭigocaratve 'pi na jīvāder bhinnatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.23 //
analyzed: sphurantīm tathā ca dṛṣṭi gocara tve api na jīva ādeḥ bhinna tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu brahmasattā kathaṃ jīvādibhāvena sphuratīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu brahma sattā katham jīva ādi bhāvena sphurati iti atra āha

original: sābuddhaivaṃ bhavaty eva bhaved brahmaiva bodhataḥ / abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśaṃ na tu sa budhyate //MU_3,14.24//
analyzed: sā abuddhā evam bhavati eva bhavet brahmā eva bodhataḥ  abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśam na tu sa budhyate

original: sā brahmasattābuddhā brahmasattābhāvenājñātā satī / evaṃ bhavati eva jīvādirūpatayā
analyzed: sā brahma sattā buddhā brahma sattā bhāvena ajñātā satī evam bhavati eva jīva ādi rūpatayā

original: bhāsata eva / bodhataḥ brahmasattābhāvena jñānāt / brahmaiva bhavet / sattātadvatoḥ
analyzed: bhāsate eva bodhataḥ brahma sattā bhāvena jñānāt brahmā eva bhavet sattā tadvatoḥ

original: bhedābhāvāt / nanu jīvādeḥ brahmasattābhāvena brahmamayatve 'pi brahmasattāviṣayas
analyzed: bheda abhāvāt nanu jīva ādeḥ brahma sattā bhāvena brahma maya tve api brahma sattā viṣayaḥ

original: tu yaḥ abodha āsīt saḥ abodhatvena jñātaḥ san ghaṭādivat tathaiva tiṣṭhati / tathā
analyzed: tu yaḥ abodhaḥ āsīt saḥ abodha tvena jñātaḥ san ghaṭa ādi vat tathā eva tiṣṭhati tathā

original: ca na brahmaikamayatā sidhyati ity / atrāha abodha iti / abodhaḥ prekṣayā bodhena /
analyzed: ca na brahma eka maya tā sidhyati iti atra āha abodhaḥ iti abodhaḥ prekṣayā bodhena

original: nāśaṃ yāti / tu pakṣāntare / saḥ abodhaḥ / na budhyate bodhaviṣayo na sampadyate
analyzed: nāśam yāti tu pakṣa antare saḥ abodhaḥ na budhyate bodha viṣayaḥ na sampadyate

original: viruddhatvāt tadudbodhakāle eva naṣṭatvāt / na hi tamaḥ tejoviṣayo bhavatīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.24 //
analyzed: viruddha tvāt tad udbodha kāle eva naṣṭa tvāt na hi tamaḥ tejaḥ viṣayaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: etad eva dṛṣṭāntena dṛḍhīkaroti
analyzed: etat eva dṛṣṭāntena dṛḍhīkaroti

original: yathāndhakāro dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ praṇaśyati / na cāsya jñāyate tattvam abodhasyaivam eva hi //MU_3,14.25//
analyzed: yathā andhakāraḥ dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ praṇaśyati na ca asya jñāyate tattvam abodhasya evam eva hi

original: yathāndhakāraḥ dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ draṣṭum ārabdhaḥ / praṇaśyati / asyāndhakārasya /
analyzed: yathā andhakāraḥ dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ draṣṭum ārabdhaḥ praṇaśyati asya andhakārasya

original: tattvaṃ svarūpaṃ / na ca jñāyate / puruṣeṇeti śeṣaḥ / dārṣṭāntike yojayati abodhasyeti /
analyzed: tattvam svarūpam na ca jñāyate puruṣeṇa iti śeṣaḥ dārṣṭāntike yojayati abodhasya iti

original: hi niścaye / 'bodhasyājñānasyaivam eva tattvaṃ na jñāyate ity arthaḥ //MT_3,14.25 //
analyzed: hi niścaye  abodhasya ajñānasya evam eva tattvam na jñāyate iti arthaḥ

original: jīvasya brahmatvam upasaṃharati
analyzed: jīvasya brahmatvam upasaṃharati

original: evaṃ brahmaiva jīvātmā nirvibhāgo nirantaraḥ / sarvaśaktir anādyanto mahācitsārarūpadhṛt //MU_3,14.26//
analyzed: evam brahmā eva jīvātmā nirvibhāgaḥ nirantaraḥ sarva śaktiḥ anādi antaḥ mahā cit sāra rūpa dhṛt

original: evaṃ pūrvoktaprakāreṇa / jīvātmā brahmaiva bhavati / brahmatvāpādakāny asya viśeṣaṇāny
analyzed: evam pūrva ukta prakāreṇa jīvātmā brahma eva bhavati brahma tva āpādakāni asya viśeṣaṇāni

original: āha nirvibhāga iti / nirvibhāgaḥ vibhāgarahitaḥ / na hi jīvasvarūpe kaścid vibhāgo
analyzed: āha nirvibhāgaḥ iti nirvibhāgaḥ vibhāga rahitaḥ na hi jīva svarūpe kaścid

original: 'sti niravayavatvāt / nirantaraḥ prakāśanirbharitatvena madhye 'vakāśahīnaḥ / sarvaśaktiḥ
analyzed: asti niravayava tvāt nirantaraḥ prakāśa nirbharita tvena madhye avakāśa hīnaḥ sarva śaktiḥ

original: sarvaśaktitvaṃ cāsya svapnādau pratyakṣadṛṣṭam eva / anādyantaḥ ādyantarahitatvaṃ
analyzed: sarva śakti tvam ca asya svapna ādau pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam eva anādi antaḥ ādi anta rahita tvam

original: cāsyādyantaparicchedakatvenaiva siddham / na hi paricchedyaḥ paricchedakasya paricchedaṃ
analyzed: ca asya ādi anta paricchedaka tvena eva siddham na hi paricchedyaḥ paricchedakasya paricchedam

original: kartuṃ śaknoti / mahācitsārarūpadhṛt / mahācit vimarśaśaktiḥ / tasyāḥ sāraḥ prakāśaḥ /
analyzed: kartum śaknoti mahā cit sāra rūpa dhṛt mahā cit vimarśa śaktiḥ tasyāḥ sāraḥ prakāśaḥ

original: tasya rūpaṃ dhārayati mahācitsārarūpadhṛt / prakāśasvarūpa ity arthaḥ //MT_3,14.26 //
analyzed: tasya rūpam dhārayati mahā cit sāra rūpa dhṛt prakāśa svarūpaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sarvathaiva bhedakalanāṃ nirākaroti
analyzed: sarvathā eva bheda kalanām nirākaroti

original: sarvānantatayā tv asya na kācid bhedakalpanā / vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tad evānubhūtitaḥ //MU_3,14.27//
analyzed: sarva ananta tayā tu asya na kācid bheda kalpanā vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tat eva anubhūtitaḥ

original: tu viśeṣe / 'sya brahmaṇaḥ / sarvānantatayā sarvaś cāsāv anantaś ca sarvānantaḥ /
analyzed: tu viśeṣe asya brahmaṇaḥ sarva ananta tayā sarvaḥ ca asau anantaḥ ca sarva anantaḥ

original: tasya bhāvaḥ sarvānantatā / tayā / kācid bhedakalanā bhedākārā kalanā / bheda iti
analyzed: tasya bhāvaḥ sarva ananta tā tayā kācid bheda kalanā bheda ākārā kalanā bhedaḥ iti

original: yāvat / nāsti / sarvarūpasyānantasya ca bhedāyogāt / na hi ghaṭādyapekṣayānantasya
analyzed: yāvat na asti sarva rūpasya anantasya ca bheda ayogāt na hi ghaṭa ādi apekṣayā anantasya

original: ghaṭaśarāvādisarvarūpasya mṛdādeḥ ghaṭabhedo yuktaḥ / nanu sarvatvam anantatvaṃ ca
analyzed: ghaṭa śarāva ādi sarva rūpasya mṛd ādeḥ ghaṭa bhedaḥ yuktaḥ nanu sarva tvam ananta tvam ca

original: asarvāt sāntāc ca bhedakam eva / tathā ca tābhyām eva tasya bhedaḥ sampadyata ity /
analyzed: asarvāt sa antāt ca bhedakam eva tathā ca tābhyām eva tasya bhedaḥ sampadyate iti

original: atrāha vidyata iti / hi yasmādarthe / yā kalanā bhedakalanā / vidyate / sā tad eva
analyzed: atra āha vidyate iti hi yasmāt arthe yā kalanā bheda kalanā vidyate sā tat eva

original: brahmaiva / bhavati / kuto / 'nubhūtitaḥ anubhūtisvarūpataḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / yā kācit
analyzed: brahmā eva bhavati kutas anubhūtitaḥ anubhūti svarūpataḥ ayam bhāvaḥ yā kācid

original: kalanāsti sānubhūtā na vā / na cet sā svayam asiddhā brahmaṇi bhedaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: kalanā asti sā anubhūtā na vā na ced sā svayam asiddhā brahmaṇi bhedam katham kuryāt

original: anubhūtā cet tarhi anubhavarūpaivānubhavasya ca cidrūpatvena brahmatvaṃ siddham eveti /
analyzed: anubhūtā ced tarhi anubhava rūpā evā anubhavasya ca cit rūpa tvena brahma tvam siddham evā iti

original: brahmaiva sā bhaved iti //MT_3,14.27 //
analyzed: brahmā eva sā bhavet iti

original: atra śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: atra śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: evam etat kathaṃ brahmann ekajīvecchayākhilāḥ / jagajjīvā na yujyante mahājīvaikatāvaśāt //MU_3,14.28//
analyzed: evam etat katham brahman eka jīva icchayā akhilāḥ jagat jīvāḥ na yujyante mahā jīva eka tā vaśāt

original: he brahman / etat tvayoktam / evaṃ bhavati / satyam eva bhavatīty arthaḥ / sarveṣāṃ
analyzed: he brahman etat tvayā uktam evam bhavati satyam eva bhavati iti arthaḥ sarveṣām

original: jīvānāṃ tatraikajīvecchānuvartitvam āśaṅkate / katham iti / akhilāḥ jagajjīvāḥ /
analyzed: jīvānām tatra eka jīva icchā anuvarti tvam āśaṅkate katham iti akhilāḥ jagat jīvāḥ

original: jagati sthitā jīvāḥ jagajjīvāḥ / mahājīvaikatāvaśāt / mahājīvena cetyatvāditanmātrāntaprapañcavalitacinmātrākhyamahājīvena /
analyzed: jagati sthitāḥ jīvāḥ jagajjīvāḥ mahājīva eka tā vaśāt mahājīvena cetya tva ādi tanmātra anta prapañca valita cit mātra ākhya mahājīvena

original: yā ekatā aikyaṃ / tasyāḥ vaśāt vaśena / ekajīvecchayā ekasya kasyāpi sāmānyajīvasyecchayā /
analyzed: yā ekatā aikyam tasyāḥ vaśāt vaśena eka jīva icchayā ekasya kasya api sāmānya jīvasya icchayā

original: kathaṃ na yujyante / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ proktasvarūpamahājīvaikamayatve
analyzed: katham na yujyante ayam bhāvaḥ sarveṣām jīvānām prokta svarūpa mahājīva eka maya tve

original: ekasmin jīve uditayecchayā sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ yogo yuktaḥ //MT_3,14.28 //
analyzed: ekasmin jīve uditayā icchayā sarveṣām jīvānām yogaḥ yuktaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭha uttaram āha
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram āha

original: mahājīvātma tad brahma sarvaśaktimayātmakam / sthitaṃ yatheccham eveha nirvibhāgaṃ nirantaram //MU_3,14.29//
analyzed: mahā jīva ātma tat brahma sarva śakti maya ātmakam sthitam yatheccham eva iha nirvibhāgam nirantaram

original: mahājīvātma mahājīvaḥ / tat brahma iha yathecchaṃ svecchāsadṛśaṃ / sthitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: bhavati

original: tat brahma kathambhūtaṃ / sarvaśaktimayātmakam / sarvaśaktimayaḥ sarvaśaktinirbharaḥ /
analyzed: tat brahma kathambhūtam sarva śakti maya ātmakam sarva śakti mayaḥ sarva śakti nirbharaḥ

original: ātmā yasya / tat / tādṛśam / sarvaśaktimayātmakatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktīnāṃ tata
analyzed: ātmā yasya tat tādṛśam sarva śakti maya ātmaka tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ sarva śaktīnām tata

original: evotthānāt / punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / nirvibhāgaṃ akhaṇḍasvarūpatvena vibhāgān niṣkrāntam /
analyzed: eva utthānāt punar kathambhūtam nirvibhāgam akhaṇḍa svarūpa tvena vibhāgāt niṣkrāntam

original: punaḥ kathambhūtaṃ / nirantaram prakāśākhyasārabharitam //MT_3,14.29 //
analyzed: punar kathambhūtam nirantaram prakāśa ākhya sāra bharitam

original: nanu brahma yathecchaṃ sthitaṃ bhavatu / tataḥ kim ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu brahma yatheccham sthitam bhavatu tatas kim iti atra āha

original: yad evecchati tat tasya bhavaty āśu mahātmanaḥ / pūrvaṃ tu naśyatīcchā cid ato dvitvam udeti tat //MU_3,14.30//
analyzed: yat evā icchati tat tasya bhavati āśu mahātmanaḥ pūrvam tu naśyati icchā cit atas dvi tvam udeti tat

original: tat brahma / yad evecchati icchāviṣayaṃ karoti / tad eva / na tv anyat / tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat brahma yat eva icchati icchā viṣayam karoti tat eva na tu anyat tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: vyāpakasvarūpasya brahmaṇaḥ / āśu icchākṣaṇe eva / bhavati sampadyate / ekatecchānāśena
analyzed: vyāpaka svarūpasya brahmaṇaḥ āśu icchā kṣaṇe eva bhavati sampadyate ekatā icchā nāśena

original: dvitvotpattim asmāt kathayati pūrvam iti / cit icchā / nīlam utpalam itivat cidviśeṣitecchā
analyzed: dvi tva utpattim asmāt kathayati pūrvam iti cit icchā nīlam utpalam iti vat cit viśeṣita icchā

original: jñeyā / cidviśeṣitatvaṃ cātra cidviṣayatvaṃ jñeyam / yata ity adhyāhāryam / tenāyam
analyzed: jñeyā cit viśeṣita tvam ca atra cit viṣaya tvam jñeyam yatas iti adhyāhāryam tena ayam

original: arthaḥ / yataḥ cit icchā / cidrūpa eva bhavāmīty evaṃrūpā ekatecchā / pūrvaṃ prathamasargārambhe /
analyzed: arthaḥ yatas cit icchā cit rūpaḥ eva bhavāmi iti evaṃrūpā ekatā icchā pūrvam prathama sarga ārambhe

original: 'taḥ saptamyarthe tasil asmin brahmaṇi / tuśabdaḥ ivārthe / naśyati tu susphūrtyaviṣayatārūpaṃ
analyzed: atas saptamī arthe tasil asmin brahmaṇi tuśabdaḥ iva arthe naśyati tu susphūrti aviṣaya tā rūpam

original: nāśaṃ yātīva / paramārthataḥ tu na naśyati tasyāḥ sarvatrānugamāt / iti tuśabdopādānam /
analyzed: nāśam yāti iva paramārthataḥ tu na naśyati tasyāḥ sarvatra anugamāt iti tuśabda upādānam

original: cidviṣayecchānāśaś ca cetyaviṣayecchodbhūter eva jñeyaḥ / tat tasmāt kāraṇāt / dvitvaṃ
analyzed: cit viṣaya icchā nāśaḥ ca cetya viṣaya icchā udbhūteḥ eva jñeyaḥ tat tasmāt kāraṇāt dvi tvam

original: cetyasvarūpajīvādirūpeṇa sthito dvidhābhāvaḥ / udeti prādurbhavati / ekatecchānāśahetubhūtatayā
analyzed: cetya svarūpa jīva ādi rūpeṇa sthitaḥ dvidhā bhāvaḥ udeti prādurbhavati ekatā icchā nāśa hetu bhūta tayā

original: dvitvecchayā eva dvitvam udetīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.30 //
analyzed: dvi tva icchayā eva dvi tvam udeti iti bhāvaḥ

original: dvitvodayānantaraṃ śaktikriyākramakaraṇaṃ kathayati
analyzed: dvitva udaya anantaram śakti kriyā krama karaṇam kathayati

original: paścād dvitvavibhaktānāṃ svaśaktīnāṃ prakalpitaḥ / anenetthaṃ hi bhavatīty evaṃ tena kriyākramaḥ //MU_3,14.31//
analyzed: paścāt dvi tva vibhaktānām sva śaktīnām prakalpitaḥ anena ittham hi bhavati iti evam tena kriyā kramaḥ

original: paścāt / tena brahmaṇā / dvitvavibhaktānāṃ / dvitvena dvidhābhāvena / vibhaktānāṃ
analyzed: paścāt tena brahmaṇā dvi tva vibhaktānām dvi tvena dvidhā bhāvena vibhaktānām

original: vibhāgena sthāpitānāṃ / svaśaktīnāṃ / ity evaṃ iti prakāreṇa / kriyākramaḥ kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: vibhāgena sthāpitānām sva śaktīnām iti evam iti prakāreṇa kriyā kramaḥ kalpitaḥ

original: hi niścaye / ity evaṃ kathaṃ / anena sampadyate //MT_3,14.31 //
analyzed: hi niścaye iti evam katham anena sampadyate

original: sampannaṃ sveṣṭaṃ kathayati
analyzed: sampannam sva iṣṭam kathayati

original: śaktyādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamo yaḥ prakalpitaḥ / taṃ vinā nodayo 'nyāsāṃ pradhānecchaiva rohati //MU_3,14.32//
analyzed: śaktyā ādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamaḥ yaḥ prakalpitaḥ tam vinā nā udayaḥ anyāsām pradhāna icchā eva rohati

original: tayā prasiddhayādyayā mūlakāraṇabhūtayā / brāhmyā brahmasambandhinyā / śaktyā / yaḥ
analyzed: tayā prasiddhayā ādyayā mūla kāraṇa bhūtayā brāhmyā brahma sambandhinyā śaktyā yaḥ

original: niyamaḥ svecchāsadṛśī niyatiḥ / prakalpitaḥ / taṃ niyamaṃ / vinā ṛte / 'nyāsāṃ jīvasthānānām /
analyzed: niyamaḥ sva icchā sadṛśī niyatiḥ prakalpitaḥ tam niyamam vinā ṛte anyāsām jīvasthānānām

original: udayo na syāt / ata ity adhyāhāryam / ataḥ pradhānecchaiva rohati / pradhānasya mahājīvātmabhūtasya
analyzed: udayaḥ na syāt atas iti adhyāhāryam atas pradhāna icchā eva rohati pradhānasya mahājīva ātma bhūtasya

original: brahmaṇaḥ / icchaiva rohati jīvecchārūpeṇa pariṇamate / tathā ca pradhānecchānuvartitvam
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ icchā eva rohati jīva icchā rūpeṇa pariṇamate tathā ca pradhāna icchā anuvarti tvam

original: eva / na sā niyamakāritvam uktam / iha tu tacchakter iti cen / na / śaktitadvator
analyzed: eva na sā niyama kāri tvam uktam iha tu tad śakteḥ iti ced na śakti tadvatoḥ

original: abhedāt //MT_3,14.32 //
analyzed: abhedāt

original: etad eva nānāracanābhiḥ kathayati
analyzed: etat eva nānā racanābhiḥ kathayati

original: yasyā jīvābhidhānāyāḥ śaktyā yecchā phalaty asau / pradhānaśaktiniyamānuṣṭhānena vinā na tu //MU_3,14.33//
analyzed: yasyāḥ jīva abhidhānāyāḥ śaktyāḥ yā icchā phalati asau pradhāna śakti niyama anuṣṭhānena vinā na tu

original: yasyāḥ jīvābhidhānāyāḥ śaktyāḥ śaktirūpasya yasya jīvasya / yā icchā phalati phalayuktā
analyzed: yasyāḥ jīva abhidhānāyāḥ śaktyāḥ śakti rūpasya yasya jīvasya yā icchā phalati phala yuktā

original: bhavati / tasyā ity adhyāhāryam / tasyāḥ śakteḥ asau icchā / pradhānaśaktiniyamānuṣṭhānena
analyzed: bhavati tasyāḥ iti adhyāhāryam tasyāḥ śakteḥ asau icchā pradhāna śakti niyama anuṣṭhānena

original: vinā / pradhānaśakteḥ brahmaśakteḥ / yat niyamānuṣṭhānaṃ niyamakaraṇaṃ / tad vinā
analyzed: vinā pradhāna śakteḥ brahma śakteḥ yat niyama anuṣṭhānam niyama karaṇam tat vinā

original: na bhavati / svarūpam eva na labhate / kā kathā tatphalasyeti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.33 //
analyzed: na bhavati sva rūpam eva na labhate kā kathā tad phalasya iti bhāvaḥ

original: pradhānaśaktiniyamaḥ supratiṣṭho bhaven na cet / tat phalaṃ śaktyaśaktatvān nehitānāṃ kvacid bhavet //MU_3,14.34//
analyzed: pradhāna śakti niyamaḥ su pratiṣṭhaḥ bhavet na ced tat phalam śakti aśakta tvāt na īhitānām kvacid bhavet

original: pradhānaśakteḥ brahmaśakteḥ / niyamaḥ pradhānaśaktiniyamaḥ / supratiṣṭhaḥ susthiraḥ /
na ced bhavet yadi na syāt / tat tadā / rohitānāṃ kvacit kutrāpi deśe kāle vā / phalaṃ
analyzed: na ced bhavet yadi na syāt tat tadā rohitānām kvacid kutra api deśe kāle vā phalam

original: na syāt / kutaḥ / śaktyaśaktatvāt / śaktyā brahmaśaktyā / lakṣaṇayā tanniyamena /
analyzed: na syāt kutas śakti aśakta tvāt śaktyā brahma śaktyā lakṣaṇayā tad niyamena

original: yat śaktatvaṃ phalaṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ / tadabhāvaḥ aśaktatvaṃ / tasmāt śaktyaśaktatvāt /
analyzed: yat śakta tvam phalam prati sāmarthyam tad abhāvaḥ aśakta tvam tasmāt śakti aśakta tvāt

original: yataḥ rohitānāṃ nānāvidhānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ phalaṃ vidyate 'taḥ anumīyate ko 'pi niyamo
analyzed: yatas rohitānām nānāvidhānām kriyāṇām phalam vidyate atas anumīyate kaḥ api

original: 'sti yena kriyāṇāṃ phalotpādanaṃ prati sāmarthyam astīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.34 //
analyzed: asti yena kriyāṇām phala utpādanam prati sāmarthyam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: prakṛtam anusarati
analyzed: prakṛtam anusarati

original: evaṃ brahma mahājīvo vidyate 'ntādivarjitaḥ / jīvatkoṭimahākoṭī bhavaty atha na kiñcana //MU_3,14.35//
analyzed: evam brahma mahājīvaḥ vidyate anta ādi varjitaḥ jīvat koṭi mahā koṭī bhavati atha na kiñcana

original: evaṃ pūrvoktaprakāreṇa / brahmāntādivarjitaḥ antamadhyādirahitaḥ / mahājīvaḥ vidyate /
analyzed: evam pūrva ukta prakāreṇa brahma anta ādi varjitaḥ anta madhya ādi rahitaḥ mahājīvaḥ vidyate

original: kuto niryānti jīvakā iti pūrvataroktasya praśnasyottaram āha jīvatkoṭīti / tat brahma /
analyzed: kutas niryānti jīvakāḥ iti pūrvatara uktasya praśnasya uttaram āha jīvat koṭi iti  tat brahma

original: jīvatkoṭimahākoṭī / jīvatāṃ jīvanakriyākartṛkāṇāṃ / koṭimahākoṭī koṭimahākoṭisaṅkhye /
analyzed: jīvat koṭi mahā koṭī jīvatām jīvana kriyā kartṛkāṇām koṭi mahā koṭī koṭi mahā koṭi saṅkhye

original: bhavati svayam eva tadrūpo bhavati / na tu tato jīvāḥ niryāntīti bhāvaḥ / atha tathāpi /
analyzed: bhavati svayam eva tad rūpaḥ bhavati na tu tatas jīvāḥ niryānti iti bhāvaḥ atha tathā api

original: na kiñcana bhavati / cinmaye svarūpe tathaiva sthitatvāt //MT_3,14.35 //
analyzed: na kiñcana bhavati cit maye svarūpe tathā eva sthita tvāt

original: nanu brahma kena jīvatāṃ yātīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu brahma kena jīvatām yāti iti atra āha

original: cetyasaṃvedanāj jīvo bhavaty āyāti saṃsṛtim / tadasaṃvedanād rūpaṃ śamam āyāti saṃsṛteḥ //MU_3,14.36//
analyzed: cetya saṃvedanāt jīvaḥ bhavati āyāti saṃsṛtim tad asaṃvedanāt rūpam śamam āyāti saṃsṛteḥ

original: cetyasaṃvedanāt cidviṣayabhūtabhāvajātaparāmarśāt / brahma jīvo bhavati / tataḥ saṃsṛtiṃ
analyzed: cetya saṃvedanāt cit viṣaya bhūta bhāva jāta parāmarśāt brahma jīvaḥ bhavati tatas saṃsṛtim

original: yāti sukhaduḥkhalepasvarūpasaṃsārabhāk bhavati / nanu kadācit saṃsṛtir asya nivartate
analyzed: yāti sukha duḥkha lepa sva rūpa saṃsāra bhāj bhavati nanu kadācid saṃsṛtiḥ asya nivartate

original: na vety / atrāha tad iti / tadasaṃvedanāt cetyāparāmarśāt / asyety adhyāhāryam /
analyzed: na vā iti atra āha tat iti tad asaṃvedanāt cetya aparāmarśāt asya iti adhyāhāryam

original: asya jīvasya / saṃsṛteḥ saṃsārasya / rūpaṃ śamaṃ śāntiṃ / yāti //MT_3,14.36 //
analyzed: asya jīvasya saṃsṛteḥ saṃsārasya rūpam śamam śāntim yāti

original: nanu saṃsṛtyupaśamena jīvasya kiṃ sampadyata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu saṃsṛti upaśamena jīvasya kim sampadyate iti atra āha

original: evaṃ kaniṣṭhajīvānāṃ jyeṣṭhajīvakriyākramaiḥ / samudety ādyajīvatvaṃ tāmrāṇām iva hematā //MU_3,14.37//
analyzed: evam kaniṣṭha jīvānām jyeṣṭha jīva kriyā kramaiḥ samudeti ādya jīva tvam tāmrāṇām iva hema tā

original: evaṃ sati saṃsṛtyupaśame sati / jyeṣṭhajīvasya brahmaṇaḥ / kriyākramaiḥ jyeṣṭhajīvakriyākramaiḥ /
analyzed: evam sati saṃsṛti upaśame sati jyeṣṭhajīvasya brahmaṇaḥ kriyā kramaiḥ jyeṣṭhajīva kriyā kramaiḥ

original: kaniṣṭhajīvānām ādyajīvatvaṃ brahmatvaṃ / samudeti prādurbhavati / jyeṣṭhajīvakriyākramā
analyzed: kaniṣṭha jīvānām ādya jīva tvam brahmatvam samudeti prādurbhavati jyeṣṭha jīva kriyā kramā

original: atra brahmakṛtāḥ kriyākramā jñātavyāḥ / brahmakṛtakriyākramasyaiva jīvānāṃ brahmatvāpādane
analyzed: atra brahma kṛtāḥ kriyā kramāḥ jñātavyāḥ brahma kṛta kriyā kramasya eva jīvānām brahma tva āpādane

original: samarthatvāt / atra dṛṣṭāntam āha tāmrāṇām iti / svarṇakārakriyākramaiḥ tāmrāṇāṃ
analyzed: samartha tvāt atra dṛṣṭāntam āha tāmrāṇām iti svarṇakāra kriyā kramaiḥ tāmrāṇām

original: yathā hematvaṃ samudeti / tathety arthaḥ //MT_3,14.37 //
analyzed: yathā hema tvam samudeti tathā iti arthaḥ

original: pūrvataroktaṃ smarati
analyzed: pūrvatara uktam smarati

original: atrānante parākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇo 'py asan / khātmaiva sann ivodeti ciccamatkaraṇātmakaḥ //MU_3,14.38//
analyzed: atra anante para ākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇaḥ api asan kha ātmā eva san iva udeti cit camatkaraṇa ātmakaḥ

original: itthaṃ pūrvoktakrameṇātrānante parākāśe prasiddhe 'parimeye cidākāśe / eṣaḥ pūrvoktaḥ /
analyzed: ittham pūrva ukta krameṇa atra anante para ākāśe prasiddhe aparimeye cit ākāśe eṣaḥ pūrva uktaḥ

original: gaṇaḥ cetyatvādirūpaḥ prapañcaḥ / asann api sann ivodeti / kathambhūtaḥ / khātmaiva
analyzed: gaṇaḥ cetya tva ādi rūpaḥ prapañcaḥ asan api san iva udeti kathambhūtaḥ kha ātmā eva

original: nakiñcidrūpa eva / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / ciccamatkaraṇātmakaḥ / citaḥ yat camatkaraṇaṃ
analyzed: na kiñcid rūpaḥ eva punar kathambhūtaḥ cit camatkaraṇa ātmakaḥ citaḥ yat camatkaraṇam

original: svaśaktyāsvādakaraṇaṃ / tat ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya / saḥ ciccamatkaraṇātmakaḥ / camatkaraṇaṃ
analyzed: sva śakti āsvāda karaṇam tat ātmā sva rūpam yasya saḥ cit camatkaraṇa ātmakaḥ camatkaraṇam

original: vinā svatantrāyāḥ citeḥ cetyonmukhatāyogāt //MT_3,14.38 //
analyzed: vinā svatantrāyāḥ citeḥ cetya unmukha tā yogāt

original: nanu camatkaraṇārtham anyāpekṣāyā avaśyambhāvāt kuto 'syāḥ svatantrādīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu camatkaraṇa artham anya apekṣāyāḥ avaśyambhāvāt kutas asyāḥ svatantra ādi iti atra āha

original: svayam eva camatkāro yaḥ samāgamyate citā / bhaviṣyannāmadehādi tad ahambhāvanaṃ viduḥ //MU_3,14.39//
analyzed: svayam eva camatkāraḥ yaḥ samāgamyate citā bhaviṣyat nāma deha ādi tat ahambhāvanam viduḥ

original: yaḥ camatkāraḥ citā saha svayaṃ cidāśrayeṇa svaviṣayena ca yatnena vinā / samāgamyate
analyzed: yaḥ camatkāraḥ citā saha svayam cit āśrayeṇa sva viṣayena ca yatnena vinā samāgamyate

original: svayaṃ samāgamaviṣayatāṃ bhajati / paṇḍitāḥ tad ahambhāvanam ahaṅkāraṃ / viduḥ /
analyzed: svayam samāgama viṣaya tām bhajati paṇḍitāḥ tat ahambhāvanam ahaṅkāram viduḥ

original: ahaṅkāro 'pi ciccamatkāra eva / kā kathā jīvasyeti ahambhāvagrahaṇābhiprāyaḥ / kathambhūtaṃ /
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ api cit camatkāraḥ eva kā kathā jīvasya iti ahambhāva grahaṇa abhiprāyaḥ kathambhūtam

original: bhaviṣyannāmadehādi / bhaviṣyat nāma ca dehādi ca yasya / tat / nāmāhaṅkārety abhidhā /
analyzed: bhaviṣyat nāma deha ādi bhaviṣyat nāma ca deha ādi ca yasya tat nāma ahaṅkāra iti abhidhā

original: dehaḥ sthūlasūkṣmarūpaḥ / cinnairapekṣyadyotanāya samāgamyata iti karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ //MT_3,14.39 //
analyzed: dehaḥ sthūla sūkṣma rūpaḥ cit nairapekṣya dyotanāya samāgamyate iti karma kartṛ vyapadeśaḥ

original: prakṛtaṃ cidaikyaṃ bahuvistareṇa kathayati
analyzed: prakṛtam cit aikyam bahu vistareṇa kathayati

original: cito yaḥ syāc cidālokas tanmayatvād anantakaḥ / sa eṣa bhuvanābhoga iti tasyāḥ prabimbati //MU_3,14.40//
analyzed: citaḥ yaḥ syāt cit ālokaḥ tad maya tvāt anantakaḥ saḥ eṣa bhuvana ābhogaḥ iti tasyāḥ prabimbati

original: citaḥ anantasvabhāvasya citprakāśasya / yaḥ ālokaḥ bhāvaprakaṭanahetuḥ svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: citaḥ ananta svabhāvasya cit prakāśasya yaḥ ālokaḥ bhāva prakaṭana hetuḥ svabhāva viśeṣaḥ

original: syād asti / kathambhūtaḥ / tanmayatvāt cinmayatvād / anantakaḥ cidvad aparimeyaḥ /
analyzed: syāt asti kathambhūtaḥ tad maya tvāt cit maya tvāt anantakaḥ cit vat aparimeyaḥ

original: aparimeyatvaṃ ca citaḥ parimātur abhāvena svayaṃ svasmin parimātṛtāsambhavāc ca jñeyam /
analyzed: aparimeya tvam ca citaḥ parimātuḥ abhāvena svayam svasmin parimātṛ tā asambhavāt ca jñeyam

original: sa eṣaḥ pūrvoktaḥ viṣayasya svavyatiriktasya cidālokaḥ / tasyāḥ citaḥ / bhuvanābhoga
analyzed: saḥ eṣaḥ pūrvoktaḥ viṣayasya sva vyatiriktasya cit ālokaḥ tasyāḥ citaḥ bhuvana ābhoga

original: iti bhuvanavistāro 'yam iti / pratibimbati mālinyānādāyakatvena pratibimbabhāvena
analyzed: iti bhuvana vistāraḥ ayam iti pratibimbati mālinyāḥ anādāyaka tvena pratibimba bhāvena

original: sphurati //MT_3,14.40 //
analyzed: sphurati

original: pariṇāmavikārādiśabdaiḥ saiva cid avyayā / tādṛgrūpyād abhedyāpi svaśaktyaiva vibudhyate //MU_3,14.41//
analyzed: pariṇāma vikāra ādi śabdaiḥ sā eva cit avyayā tādṛś rūpyāt abhedyā api sva śaktyā eva vibudhyate

original: svaśaktyā eva pramātṛbhāvena sphurantyā nijaśaktyā eva kartryāvyayā nāśarahitā /
analyzed: sva śaktyā eva pramātṛ bhāvena sphurantyā nija śaktyā eva kartryā avyayā nāśa rahitā

original: saiva cit pariṇāmavikārādiśabdaiḥ vibudhyate vijñāyate / śabdasyārthabodhaṃ prati
analyzed: sā eva cit pariṇāma vikāra ādi śabdaiḥ vibudhyate vijñāyate śabdasya artha bodham prati

original: kāraṇatvaṃ suprasiddham eveti nāyastam / kathambhūtāpi / tādṛgrūpyāt cidrūpatāyāḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa tvam su prasiddham evā iti na āyastam kathambhūtā api tādṛgrūpyāt cit rūpa tāyāḥ

original: abhedyāpi bhinnīkartum ayogyāpi / nanu svarūpād abhinnatve kathaṃ pariṇāmādiśabdavācyatvaṃ
analyzed: abhedyā api bhinnīkartum ayogyā api nanu svarūpāt abhinna tve katham pariṇāma ādi śabda vācyatvam

original: asyā iti cet / satyam / yathā toyaṃ svarūpād abhinnam api taraṅgatām āsādya toyapariṇāmaśabdena
analyzed: asyāḥ iti ced satyam yathā toyam svarūpāt abhinnam api taraṅga tām āsādya toya pariṇāma śabdena

original: tadvikāraśabdena ca kathyate tatheyam apīti na virodhaḥ //MT_3,14.41 //
analyzed: tad vikāra śabdena ca kathyate tathā iyam api iti na virodhaḥ

original: avicchinnavilāsātma svato yat svadanaṃ citaḥ / acetyasya prakāśasya jagad ity eva tat sthitam //MU_3,14.42//
analyzed: avicchinna vilāsa ātma svatas yat svadanam citaḥ acetyasya prakāśasya jagat iti eva tat sthitam

original: acetyasya prakāśasya cetyaleparahitaprakāśarūpāyāḥ citaḥ / svayam ayatnena / yat
analyzed: acetyasya prakāśasya cetya lepa rahita prakāśa rūpāyāḥ citaḥ svayam ayatnena yat

original: svadanaṃ svaśaktyāsvādaḥ bhavati / kathambhūtam / avicchinnavilāsātma / avicchinavilāsaḥ
analyzed: svadanam sva śakti āsvādaḥ bhavati kathambhūtam avicchinna vilāsa ātma

original: chedarahitasphuraṇayuktaḥ / ātmā yasya / tat avicchinnavilāsātma / tat svadanaṃ jagad
analyzed: cheda rahita sphuraṇa yuktaḥ ātmā yasya tat avicchinna vilāsa ātma tat svadanam jagat

original: ity eva jagatsvarūpeṇa / sthitaṃ bhavati //MT_3,14.42 //
analyzed: iti eva jagat svarūpeṇa sthitam bhavati

original: ākāśād api sūkṣmaiṣā yā śaktir vitatā citaḥ / sā svabhāvata evainām ahantāṃ paripaśyati //MU_3,14.43//
analyzed: ākāśāt api sūkṣmā eṣā yā śaktiḥ vitatā citaḥ sā svabhāvataḥ eva enām ahantām paripaśyati

original: yā eṣā ākāśād api sūkṣmāparicchedyā / vitatā sarvatra vyāptā / citaḥ śaktiḥ sāmarthyaṃ
analyzed: yā eṣā ākāśāt api sūkṣmā a paricchedyā vitatā sarvatra vyāptā citaḥ śaktiḥ sāmarthyam

original: asti / sā cit / svabhāvata eva svasattayaiva / na tu yatnādinā / enāṃ proktaviśeṣaṇāṃ /
analyzed: asti sā cit svabhāvataḥ eva sva sattayā eva na tu yatna ādinā enām prokta viśeṣaṇām

original: ahantāṃ paripaśyati ahaṅkārabhāvena cetati //MT_3,14.43 //
analyzed: ahantām paripaśyati ahaṅkāra bhāvena cetati

original: ātmany ātmātmanaivāsyā yat prasphurati vārivat / jagadantam ahantāṇuṃ tad evāsau prapaśyati //MU_3,14.44//
analyzed: ātmani ātma ātmanā eva asyāḥ yat prasphurati vārivat jagat antam ahanta aṇum tat eva asau prapaśyati

original: asyāḥ citaḥ / ātmā sphurattākhyaṃ svarūpam / ātmani sphurattākhye svarūpe svasvarūpe /
analyzed: asyāḥ citaḥ ātmā sphurat tā ākhyam svarūpam ātmani sphurat tā ākhye svarūpe sva svarūpe

original: ātmanā svabhāvena / na tu yatnena / yat sphurati vilasati / kathaṃ / vārivat jalavat /
analyzed: ātmanā svabhāvena na tu yatnena yat sphurati vilasati katham vārivat jalavat

original: tad eva sphuraṇam evāsau cid / ahantāṇuṃ prapaśyati parimitāhantārūpatayā parāmṛśati /
analyzed: tat eva sphuraṇam eva asau cit ahantā aṇum prapaśyati parimita ahantā rūpa tayā parāmṛśati

original: kīdṛśam ahantāṇuṃ / jagadantam jagatparyantam //MT_3,14.44 //
analyzed: kīdṛśam ahantā aṇum jagat antam jagat paryantam

original: camatkārakarī cāru yac camatkurute citiḥ / iyaṃ svātmani tasyaiva jagannāma kṛtaṃ tatam //MU_3,14.45//
analyzed: camatkāra karī cāru yat camatkurute citiḥ iyam sva ātmani tasya eva jagat nāma kṛtam tatam

original: camatkārakarī camatkārakaraṇa[ ? ]syaiva / tataṃ vistīrṇaṃ / jagannāma jagad iti nāma / kṛtaṃ / tayaiveti śeṣaḥ //MT_3,14.45//
analyzed: camatkāra karī tayā eva tatam vistīrṇam jagat nāma jagat iti nāma kṛtam tayā eva iti śeṣaḥ

original: citaś cittvam ahaṅkāraḥ saiva rāghava kalpanā / tanmātrādi cid evāto dvitvaikatve kva saṃsthite //MU_3,14.46//
analyzed: citaḥ cit tvam ahaṅkāraḥ sā eva rāghava kalpanā tanmātra ādi cit eva atas dvitva ekatve kva saṃsthite

original: citaḥ cittvam ahaṅkāraḥ bhavati / ahaṅkāratayā cittvasyaiva pariṇāmād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: citaḥ cit tvam ahaṅkāraḥ bhavati ahaṅkāra tayā cit tvasya eva pariṇāmāt iti arthaḥ

original: he rāghava / saivāhaṅkāra eva / kalpanā bhavati / kalpanāpadāpekṣaṃ strītvaṃ / ataḥ
analyzed: he rāghava sā eva ahaṅkāraḥ eva kalpanā bhavati kalpanā pada apekṣam strī tvam atas

original: tanmātrādi ahaṅkārotpannaṃ tanmātrādikam / cid eva bhavati / tanmātrakāraṇasyāhaṅkārasya
analyzed: tanmātra ādi ahaṅkāra utpannam tanmātra ādikam cit eva bhavati tanmātra kāraṇasya ahaṅkārasya

original: cittvāt / dvitvaikatve kva saṃsthite bhavataḥ / na sta iti bhāvaḥ / nanu dvitvaṃ
analyzed: cit tvāt dvitva ekatve kva saṃsthite bhavataḥ na staḥ iti bhāvaḥ nanu dvitvam

original: mā bhavatu / ekatvaṃ kathaṃ nāstīti cen / maivaṃ / svapratipakṣaṃ dvitvaṃ vinaikatvasyāpy
analyzed: mā bhavatu ekatvam katham na asti iti ced mā evam sva pratipakṣam dvitvam vinā ekatvasya api

original: asiddheḥ / na hi chāyāṃ vinā prakāśaḥ prakāśo bhavati anirvācyatvāt //MT_3,14.46 //
analyzed: asiddheḥ na hi chāyām vinā prakāśaḥ prakāśaḥ bhavati anirvācya tvāt

original: evaṃ cidekamayatvaṃ sarvasya prasādhya bhedatyāgaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati anuṣṭheyatvena vidadhāti
analyzed: evam cit eka maya tvam sarvasya prasādhya bheda tyāgam śiṣyam prati anuṣṭheya tvena vidadhāti

original: jīvahetāv asantyāge tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti santyaja / śeṣaṃ sadasator madhye bhavetyarthātmako bhavet //MU_3,14.47//
analyzed: jīva hetau asat tyāge tvam ca aham ca iti santyaja śeṣam sat asatoḥ madhye bhava iti artha ātmakaḥ bhavet

original: puruṣaḥ / ityarthātmakaḥ / itiśabdākṣiptagurūpadeśavākyārthātmakaḥ / tatpara iti
yāvat / bhavet / itiśabdākṣiptaṃ gurūpadeśam āha tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti tyaja / yena jīvatā
analyzed: yāvat bhavet iti śabda ākṣiptam guru upadeśam āha tvam ca aham ca iti tyaja yena jīvatā

original: dūre gacchatīti bhāvaḥ / punaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ tiṣṭhāmīty / atrāha śeṣam iti / sadasatoḥ
analyzed: dūre gacchati iti bhāvaḥ punar kiṃrūpaḥ tiṣṭhāmi iti atra āha śeṣam iti sat asatoḥ

original: madhye sthitaṃ sattvāsattvābhyām anirvacanārhaṃ / śeṣaṃ sarvaprapañcabādhe 'pi sākṣitayā
analyzed: madhye sthitam sattva asattvābhyām anirvacana arham śeṣam sarva prapañca bādhe api sākṣi tayā

original: śuddhaṃ cinmātraṃ / bhava //MT_3,14.47 //
analyzed: śuddham cit mātram bhava

original: evaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati abhedaṃ vidheyatvenoktvā tatkṛpayā punar apy abhedam eva kathayati
analyzed: evam śiṣyam prati abhedam vidheya tvena uktvā tad kṛpayā punar api abhedam eva kathayati

original: citā yathādau kalitā svasattā sā tathoditā / abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnaḥ sattāsatte 'tha vedmy aham //MU_3,14.48//
analyzed: citā yathā ādau kalitā sva sattā sā tathā uditā abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnaḥ sattā asatte atha vedmi aham

original: citādau sargārambhe / svasattā sphurāmītirūpā nijā sattā / yathā yena jīvādirūpeṇa /
analyzed: citā ādau sarga ārambhe sva sattā sphurāmi iti rūpā nijā sattā yathā yena jīva ādi rūpeṇa

original: kalitā / asyā ity adhyāhāryam / asyāḥ citaḥ sā sattā / tathā tena rūpeṇoditā prādurbhūtā
analyzed: kalitā asyāḥ iti adhyāhāryam asyāḥ citaḥ sā sattā tathā tena rūpeṇa uditā prādurbhūtā

original: satī / cidākāśāt abhinnā dṛśyate / jñānibhir iti śeṣaḥ / aham ity anena sattāsāmānyapramātā
analyzed: satī cit ākāśāt abhinnā dṛśyate jñānibhiḥ iti śeṣaḥ aham iti anena sattā sāmānya pramātā

original: kathitaḥ / athāhaṃ sattāsatte vedmi jānāmi / na tu tathāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.48 //
analyzed: kathitaḥ atha aham sattā asatte vedmi jānāmi na tu tathā asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: citkhaṃ khaṃ jagadīhāḥ khaṃ kham abdhivibudhācalāḥ / khākāraciccamatkārarūpatvān nānyad asti hi //MU_3,14.49//
analyzed: cit kham kham jagat īhāḥ kham kham abdhi vibudha acalāḥ kha ākāra cit camatkāra rūpa tvāt na anyat asti hi

original: citkhaṃ kham ākāśaṃ bhavati / jagadīhāḥ / jagatāṃ hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthāḥ ceṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: cit kham kham ākāśam bhavati jagat īhāḥ jagatām hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthāḥ ceṣṭāḥ

original: khaṃ bhavanti / abdhiś ca vibudhāś cācalāś ca / te api kham eva bhavanti / atra hetutvenottarārdham
analyzed: kham bhavanti abdhiḥ ca vibudhāḥ ca acalāḥ ca te api kham eva bhavanti atra hetu tvena uttara ardham

original: āha khākāreti / hi yasmādarthe / khākāraḥ yaḥ ciccamatkāraḥ / sa eva rūpaṃ yasya /
analyzed: āha kha ākāra iti hi yasmāt arthe kha ākāraḥ yaḥ cit camatkāraḥ saḥ eva rūpam yasya

original: saḥ / tasya bhāvaḥ tattvaṃ / tasmāt khākāraciccamatkārarūpatvāt / anyat nāsti / yataḥ
analyzed: saḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt kha ākāra cit camatkāra rūpa tvāt anyat na asti yatas

original: sarvaṃ kharūpaṃ ciccamatkāramātrarūpaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ //MT_3,14.49 //
analyzed: sarvam kha rūpam cit camatkāra mātra rūpam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yo yadvilāsas tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate / api sāvayavāt tattvāt kaivānavayave kathā //MU_3,14.50//
analyzed: yaḥ yad vilāsaḥ tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate api sa avayavāt tattvāt kā eva anavayave kathā

original: yaḥ yadvilāsaḥ yasya sphuraṇaṃ bhavati / saḥ sāvayavāt tattvād api tasmāt kadā na
analyzed: yaḥ yad vilāsaḥ yasya sphuraṇam bhavati saḥ sa avayavāt tattvāt api tasmāt kadā na

original: jātu na / bhidyate / na hi kaścit taraṅgaṃ toyāt bhinnaṃ vadatīti bhāvaḥ / anavayave
analyzed: jātu na bhidyate na hi kaścid taraṅgam toyāt bhinnam vadati iti bhāvaḥ an avayave

original: avayavarahite / svapne 'pi tad vācyam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.50 //
analyzed: avayava rahite svapne api tat vācyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu citaḥ jagadrūpatve 'pi tadgrāhiṇyā anyasyāś citaḥ sadbhāvāt nābhedamayatety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu citaḥ jagat rūpa tve api tad grāhiṇyāḥ anyasyāḥ citaḥ sadbhāvāt na abheda maya tā iti atra āha

original: citer nityam acetyāyāś cin nāsty avitatākṛteḥ / yad rūpaṃ jagato rūpaṃ tattatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ //MU_3,14.51//
analyzed: citeḥ nityam acetyāyāḥ cit na asti avitata ākṛteḥ yat rūpam jagataḥ rūpam tad tad sphuraṇa rūpiṇaḥ

original: nityam acetyāyāḥ cetitum ayogyāyāḥ / citeḥ cit svagrāhiṇī cit / nāsti cidrūpatvahāner
analyzed: nityam acetyāyāḥ cetitum ayogyāyāḥ citeḥ cit sva grāhiṇī cit na asti cit rūpa tva hāneḥ

original: iti bhāvaḥ / citeḥ kathambhūtāyāḥ / avitatākṛteḥ / sūkṣmatayāvitatā kutrāpi na sthitākṛtiḥ
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ citeḥ kathambhūtāyāḥ avitata ākṛteḥ sūkṣma tayā avitatā kutra api na sthitā ākṛtiḥ

original: rūpaṃ yasyāḥ / sā / tasyāḥ / nanu etad asiddhaṃ / sphurāmītirūpeṇa yuktatvād ity /
analyzed: rūpam yasyāḥ sā tasyāḥ nanu etat asiddham sphurāmi iti rūpeṇa yukta tvāt iti

original: atrāha yad rūpam iti / yad rūpaṃ / yat sphurāmītyādikaṃ / rūpaṃ bhavati / tad ity
analyzed: atra āha yat rūpam iti yat rūpam yat sphurāmi ityādikam rūpam bhavati tat iti

original: adhyāhāryam / tat jagata eva rūpam / na tu citeḥ / mukhyataḥ cititvaṃ hi sphurāmīty
analyzed: adhyāhāryam tat jagataḥ eva rūpam na tu citeḥ mukhyatas citi tvam hi sphurāmi iti

original: asya grāhikāyāḥ citer eva / sphurāmīti grāhyarūpāyās tu gauṇaṃ cititvaṃ bhavad api
analyzed: asya grāhikāyāḥ citeḥ eva sphurāmi iti grāhya rūpāyāḥ tu gauṇam citi tvam bhavat api

original: na jagattvaṃ vyabhicarati / kathambhūtasya jagataḥ / tattatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ / tattatsphuraṇāni
analyzed: na jagat tvam vyabhicarati kathambhūtasya jagataḥ tad tad sphuraṇa rūpiṇaḥ tad tad sphuraṇāni

original: sphurāmītyādīni / rūpaṃ yasya / tat / tasya tattatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ / yat kiñcic cetyatām
analyzed: sphurāmi ityādīni rūpam yasya tat tasya tad tad sphuraṇa rūpiṇaḥ yat kiñcid cetyatām

original: āyāti tat sarvaṃ jagad evety arthaḥ //MT_3,14.51 //
analyzed: āyāti tat sarvam jagat eva iti arthaḥ

original: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro bhūtāni girayo diśaḥ / iti paryāyaracanā citas tattvāj jagatsthiteḥ //MU_3,14.52//
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ bhūtāni girayaḥ diśaḥ iti paryāya racanā citaḥ tattvāt jagat sthiteḥ

original: mano buddhir ityādirūpeṇoktā śabdasantatiḥ / citaḥ paryāyaracanā bhavati / kutaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ityādi rūpeṇa uktā śabda santatiḥ citaḥ paryāya racanā bhavati kutas

original: jagatsthiteḥ manobuddhyādirūpāyāḥ jagatsthiteḥ / tattvāt cidrūpatvāt / sarve śabdāḥ
analyzed: jagat sthiteḥ manaḥ buddhi ādi rūpāyāḥ jagat sthiteḥ tattvāt cit rūpa tvāt sarve śabdāḥ

original: cidvācakā eveti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.52 //
analyzed: cit vācakāḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: citaś cittvaṃ jagad viddhi nājagac cittvam asti hi / ajagattvād acic cit syād bhāvābhedāj jagat kutaḥ //MU_3,14.53//
analyzed: citaḥ cit tvam jagat viddhi na a jagat cit tvam asti hi a jagat tvāt acit cit syāt bhāva abhedāt jagat kutas

original: citaḥ sambandhi cittvaṃ cidbhāvaṃ / yena sā cid iti nāmayogyā bhavati sa ko 'pi dharmaḥ /
analyzed: citaḥ sambandhi cit tvam cit bhāvam yena sā cit iti nāma yogyā bhavati sa kaḥ api dharmaḥ

original: tam iti yāvat / jagat viddhi jānīhi / atra hetum āha neti / hi yasmāt kāraṇāt / cittvam
analyzed: tam iti yāvat jagant viddhi jānīhi atra hetum āha na iti hi yasmāt kāraṇāt cit tvam

original: ajagat jagato vyatiriktaṃ / nāsti / cetyarūpajagadabhāve 'nirvācyāyāḥ citaḥ sphuṭaṃ
analyzed: ajagat jagataḥ vyatiriktam na asti cetya rūpa jagat abhāve anirvācyāyāḥ citaḥ sphuṭam

original: cittvāyogyatvāt / avāntaraṃ phalitam āha ajagad iti / ata ity adhyāhāryam / ato hetoḥ /
analyzed: cit tva ayogya tvāt avāntaram phalitam āha ajagat iti  atas iti adhyāhāryam atas hetoḥ

original: cit ajagattvād dhetor / acit syāt cinnāmayogyā na syāt / yadi jagan na syād anirvācyāyāḥ
analyzed: cit a jagat tvāt hetoḥ acit syāt cit nāma yogyā na syāt yadi jagat na syāt anirvācyāyāḥ

original: citer api cittvaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ / paramaṃ phalitam āha bhāvābhedād iti / bhāvābhedāt
analyzed: citeḥ api cit tvam na syāt iti bhāvaḥ paramam phalitam āha bhāva abhedāt iti bhāva abhedāt

original: pūrvanyāyasiddhena cijjagator abhedena siddhāt padārthābhedāt / jagat kutaḥ kathaṃ /
analyzed: pūrva nyāya siddhena cit jagatoḥ abhedena siddhāt padārtha abhedāt jagat kutas katham

original: syāt / cittvajagator abhede sati cittvasya cidekamayatayā cita eva sarvathā sthitatvāt
analyzed: syāt cit tva jagatoḥ abhede sati cit tvasya cit eka maya tayā citaḥ eva sarvathā sthita tvāt

original: jagan nāstīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.53 //
analyzed: jagant na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: citer maricabījasya nijā yāntaś camatkṛtiḥ / saivaiṣā jīvatanmātramātraṃ jagad iti sthitā //MU_3,14.54//
analyzed: citeḥ marica bījasya nijāḥ yāntaḥ camatkṛtiḥ sā eva eṣā jīva tanmātra mātram jagat iti sthitā

original: citeḥ cinnāmnaḥ / maricabījasyāntaḥ madhye / yā camatkṛtiḥ arthāt tīkṣṇatāsthānīyaḥ
analyzed: citeḥ cit nāmnaḥ marica bījasya antar madhye yā camatkṛtiḥ arthāt tīkṣṇa tā sthānīyaḥ

original: svaśaktyāsvādākhyaḥ camatkāraḥ / bhavati / saivaiṣā jagad iti jagadrūpeṇa / sthitā
bhavati / kathambhūtaṃ jagat / jīvatanmātramātraṃ kevalaṃ jīvapañcatanmātrasvarūpaṃ /
analyzed: bhavati kathaṃbhūtam jagat jīva tanmātra mātram kevalam jīva pañca tanmātra svarūpam

original: na tu sthūlabhūtamayaṃ / svapnanyāyena sthūlatāyā asatyatvāt //MT_3,14.54 //
analyzed: na tu sthūla bhūta mayam svapna nyāyena sthūla tāyāḥ asatya tvāt

original: cittvāt svaśaktikacanaṃ yad ahambhāvanaṃ citeḥ / jīvaḥ spandātmakarmātmā bhaviṣyadabhidho hy asau //MU_3,14.55//
analyzed: cit tvāt sva śakti kacanam yat ahambhāvanam citeḥ  jīvaḥ spanda ātma karma ātmā bhaviṣyat abhidhaḥ hi asau

original: citeḥ svaśaktikacanaṃ svaśaktisphuraṇarūpaṃ / ahambhāvanaṃ yad asti / kutaḥ / cittvāt
analyzed: citeḥ sva śakti kacanam sva śakti sphuraṇa rūpam ahambhāvanam yat asti kutas cit tvāt

original: cidbhāvākhyāt hetoḥ / hi niścaye / asau svaśaktisphuraṇaṃ / jīvaḥ bhavati / jīvāpekṣayā
analyzed: cit bhāva ākhyāt hetoḥ hi niścaye asau sva śakti sphuraṇam jīvaḥ bhavati jīva apekṣayā

original: puṃliṅgatā / kathambhūto jīvaḥ / spandātma kiñcitsphuraṇarūpaṃ / yat karma / tat
analyzed: puṃliṅgatā kathambhūtaḥ jīvaḥ spanda ātma kiñcid sphuraṇa rūpam yat karma tat

original: ātmā svarūpaṃ / yasya / spandātmakarmātmā citspandarūpa evety arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā svarūpam yasya spanda ātma karma ātmā cit spanda rūpaḥ eva iti arthaḥ punar kathambhūtaḥ

original: bhaviṣyadabhidhaḥ vaikharīprādurbhāva ity arthaḥ //MT_3,14.55 //
yac cic cittvena kalanaṃ susampādyābhidhārthadik / vyavacchedavikārais tad bhidyate 'to na vidyate //MU_3,14.56//
analyzed: yat cit cittvena kalanam su sampādya abhidhā artha diś vyavaccheda vikāraiḥ tat bhidyate atas na vidyate

original: cit ārṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhīlopaḥ citaḥ / yat cittvena cidbhāvena / kalanaṃ paricchedaḥ / bhavati /
analyzed: cit ārṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhī lopaḥ citaḥ yat cit tvena cit bhāvena kalanam paricchedaḥ bhavati

original: kathambhūtaṃ / susampādyā sukhena sampādayituṃ śakyābhidhārthadik nāmārthaleśaḥ yena /
analyzed: kathambhūtam su sampādyā sukhena sampādayitum śakyā abhidhā artha diś nāma artha leśaḥ yena

original: tat susampādyābhidhārthadik / paricchinnasyaiva hi vastunaḥ nāma tadvācyatvaṃ ca
kartuṃ śakyaṃ / tat bhidyate citaḥ bhinnatvena sthīyate / kaiḥ / vyavacchedavikāraiḥ /
analyzed: kartum śakyam tat bhidyate citaḥ bhinna tvena sthīyate kaiḥ vyavaccheda vikāraiḥ

original: cittaṃ na spṛśatīti yāvat / bhavantu jaḍebhyaḥ bhinnatāpādanāni / ta eva vikārāḥ /
analyzed: cittam na spṛśati iti yāvat bhavantu jaḍebhyaḥ bhinna tā āpādanāni te eva vikārāḥ

original: taiḥ / tadyuktatvād iti yāvat / cito bhinnaṃ / kā hānir ity / atrāhāta iti / ataḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tad yukta tvāt iti yāvat citaḥ bhinnam kā hāniḥ iti atra āha atas iti atas

original: cito bhinnatvāt / na vidyate / cidbhinnasya cetyamānatāyogāt / tadayoge ca sato 'pi /
analyzed: citaḥ bhinna tvāt na vidyate cit bhinnasya cetyamāna tā yogāt tad ayoge ca sataḥ api

original: tasyāsaṅkalpatvāt / cidrūpatvena kalanābhāvena vyarthasya cittvasyāpy abhāvaḥ / cittvābhāve
analyzed: tasya asaṅkalpa tvāt cit rūpa tvena kalanā abhāvena vyarthasya cit tvasya api abhāvaḥ cit tva abhāve

original: ca jagato 'bhāvaḥ / tadabhāve ca śuddhasya cinmātrasyaiva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.56 //
analyzed: ca jagataḥ abhāvaḥ tad abhāve ca śuddhasya cit mātrasya eva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu bhavatu cidekamayatvaṃ sarvasya / tadaṃśabhūtayoḥ kartṛkarmaṇos tu parasparaṃ bhedo durnivāra ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu bhavatu cit eka maya tvam sarvasya tad aṃśa bhūtayoḥ kartṛ karmaṇoḥ tu parasparam bhedaḥ durnivāraḥ iti atra āha

original: citspandarūpiṇor asti na bhedaḥ kartṛkarmaṇoḥ / spandamātraṃ bhavet karma sa eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ //MU_3,14.57//
analyzed: cit spanda rūpiṇoḥ asti na bhedaḥ kartṛ karmaṇoḥ spanda mātram bhavet karma saḥ eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: citspandarūpiṇoḥ citsphūrtyākhyarūpayuktayoḥ / kartṛkarmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ nāsti / katham
analyzed: cit spanda rūpiṇoḥ cit sphūrti ākhya rūpa yuktayoḥ kartṛ karmaṇoḥ bhedaḥ na asti katham

original: etad ity / atrāha spandeti / spandamātraṃ karma bhavet / bahiḥspandasyaiva karmatvadarśanāt /
analyzed: etat iti atra āha spanda iti spanda mātram karma bhavet bahis spandasya eva karma tva darśanāt

original: sa eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ / paṇḍitair iti śeṣaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / antaḥ vicāryamāṇaṃ jñānaṃ
analyzed: saḥ eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ paṇḍitaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ ayam bhāvaḥ antar vicāryamāṇam jñānam

original: vinā na kiñcil labhyate / ghaṭapaṭādiś ca bahirbhūtaḥ / ataḥ jñānasya taiḥ saha ko
analyzed: vinā na kiñcid labhyate ghaṭa paṭa ādiḥ ca bahis bhūtaḥ atas jñānasya taiḥ saha kaḥ

original: 'pi sambandho nāstīti śuddhaṃ jñānaṃ śiṣṭaṃ / sa eva ca citaḥ sphuraṇākhyaḥ spandaḥ /
analyzed: api sambandhaḥ na asti iti śuddham jñānam śiṣṭam saḥ eva ca citaḥ sphuraṇa ākhyaḥ spandaḥ

original: tad eva karma / bahiḥsthitasya śarīracalanādirūpasya karmaṇo 'pi tatpūrvakatvāt /
analyzed: tat eva karma bahis sthitasya śarīra calana ādi rūpasya karmaṇaḥ api tad pūrvaka tvāt

original: tat tattvam eva / sa eva ca puruṣaḥ / antar anyasyānupalambhāt bahiḥśarīrasya mṛtpiṇḍarūpasya
analyzed: tat tattvam eva saḥ eva ca puruṣaḥ antar anyasya anupalambhāt bahis śarīrasya mṛd piṇḍa rūpasya

original: puruṣatvāyogāt iti siddhaṃ karmaṇaḥ puruṣatvam //MT_3,14.57 //
analyzed: puruṣa tva ayogāt iti siddham karmaṇaḥ puruṣa tvam

original: sarvasya jīvāder vargasyaikatvaṃ sādhayati
analyzed: sarvasya jīva ādeḥ vargasya eka tvam sādhayati

original: jīvaś cittve parispandaḥ puṃsāṃ cittaṃ sa eva ca / manas tv indriyarūpaṃ san nānānānaiva gacchati //MU_3,14.58//
analyzed: jīvaḥ cit tve parispandaḥ puṃsām cittam saḥ eva ca manaḥ tu indriya rūpam sat nānā nānā eva gacchati

original: jīvaḥ cittve cidbhāve / citsvarūpa iti yāvat / parispandaḥ bhavati / puṃsāṃ sa eva
analyzed: jīvaḥ cit tve cit bhāve cit svarūpaḥ iti yāvat parispandaḥ bhavati puṃsām saḥ eva

original: karmāparaparyāyaṃ cittaṃ bhavati / parispanda eva ca / citspandatvavyatiriktasya
analyzed: karma apara paryāyam cittam bhavati parispandaḥ eva ca cit spanda tva vyatiriktasya

original: jīvasya cittasya vābhāvāt / tu viśeṣe / mana eva citspandarūpaṃ cittam / indriyarūpaṃ
analyzed: jīvasya cittasya vā abhāvāt tu viśeṣe manaḥ eva cit spanda rūpam cittam indriya rūpam

original: sat / nānānānātvaṃ gacchati / cittaṃ kathambhūtam eva / anānaiva / paramārthataḥ
analyzed: sat nānā nānātvam gacchati cittam kathambhūtam eva anānā eva paramārthataḥ

original: ekatvāt nānātvarahitaṃ / idam atra tātparyam / jīvas tāvat citspanda eva / taccittam
analyzed: ekatvāt nānātva rahitam idam atra tātparyam jīvaḥ tāvat cit spandaḥ eva tat cittam

original: api vikalpātmakaṃ tathaiva / tad eva ca cittam indriyarūpeṇa pariṇamate / tataś ca
analyzed: api vikalpa ātmakam tathā eva tat eva ca cittam indriya rūpeṇa pariṇamate tatas ca

original: svapariṇāmabhūtendriyadvāreṇa bahir nirgatya rūpādipañcakasvarūpaviṣayarūpatām āpadyate /
analyzed: sva pariṇāma bhūta indriya dvāreṇa bahis nirgatya rūpa ādi pañcaka svarūpa viṣaya rūpa tām āpadyate

original: tataś ca tadādhārabhūtapañcakatām āsādyate / tataś ca tatkāryabhāvena pariṇamate
analyzed: tatas ca tad ādhāra bhūta pañcaka tām āsādyate tatas ca tad kārya bhāvena pariṇamate

original: iti citspanda eva sthūlasūkṣmabhāvarūpeṇa sthitaḥ / sa ca cidavyatirikta iti sarvaṃ
analyzed: iti cit spandaḥ eva sthūla sūkṣma bhāva rūpeṇa sthitaḥ sa ca cit avyatiriktaḥ iti sarvam

original: cidrūpam eva sthitam iti //MT_3,14.58 //
analyzed: cit rūpam eva sthitam iti

original: śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṃ hi citprakāśacchaṭā jagat / kāryakāraṇakāditvaṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate //MU_3,14.59//
analyzed: śānta aśeṣa viśeṣam hi cit prakāśa chaṭā jagat kārya kāraṇaka ādi tvam tasmāt anyat na vidyate

original: hi yasmāt arthe / 'śeṣaṃ samastaṃ jagat citprakāśacchaṭā citprakāśe siddhapadārthapaṅktimayatvāt
analyzed: hi yasmāt arthe aśeṣam samastam jagat cit prakāśa chaṭā cit prakāśe siddha padārtha paṅkti maya tvāt

original: citprakāśapaṅktiḥ / bhavati / kathambhūtaṃ / śāntāśeṣaviśeṣaṃ / śāntāḥ cinmātre pralīnāḥ /
analyzed: cit prakāśa paṅktiḥ bhavati kathambhūtam śānta aśeṣa viśeṣam śāntāḥ cit mātre pralīnāḥ

original: aśeṣāḥ samastāḥ / viśeṣāḥ bhāvāḥ yasya / tat / tasmāt tato hetoḥ / kāryakāraṇakāditvam
analyzed: aśeṣāḥ samastāḥ viśeṣāḥ bhāvāḥ yasya tat tasmāt tatas hetoḥ kārya kāraṇaka ādi tvam

original: anyat cinmātrāt pṛthak / na vidyate / kāryakāraṇatvāder api jagattvena citprakāśacchaṭātvānapāyāt //MT_3,14.59 //
analyzed: anyat cit mātrāt pṛthak na vidyate kārya kāraṇa tva ādeḥ api jagat tvena cit prakāśa chaṭā tva anapāyāt

original: acchedyo 'ham adāhyo 'yam akledyo 'śoṣya eva ca / nityaḥ satatagaḥ sthāṇur acalo
analyzed: acchedyaḥ aham a dāhyaḥ ayam a kledyaḥ a śoṣyaḥ eva ca nityaḥ satata gaḥ sthāṇuḥ

original: 'ham iti sthitam //MU_3,14.60 //sarvasya jīvāder jagataḥ citprakāśamayatve sati iti
analyzed: aham iti sthitam sarvasya jīva ādeḥ jagataḥ cit prakāśa maya tve sati iti

original: sthitam bhavati / ayaṃ niścaya eva pratiṣṭhito bhavati iti / kim iti / ahaṃ citprakāśarūpaḥ
analyzed: sthitam bhavati ayam niścayaḥ eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ bhavati iti  kim iti aham cit prakāśa rūpaḥ

original: aham / acchedyaḥ aśarīravat chedayogyo nāsmi / evam adāhyo 'yam ity ādāv api sambandhanīyam /
analyzed: aham acchedyaḥ aśarīra vat cheda yogyaḥ na asmi evam adāhyaḥ ayam iti ādau api sambandhanīyam

original: ahaṃ nityo 'smi / nityatve viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āha satataga iti / sarvakālaga ity
analyzed: aham nityaḥ asmi nitya tve viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha satata gaḥ iti sarva kāla gaḥ iti

original: arthaḥ / punaḥ kathambhūtaḥ / sthāṇuḥ svasvarūpe dṛḍhaṃ sthitaḥ / atrāpi hetum viśeṣaṇatvenāhācala
analyzed: arthaḥ punar kathambhūtaḥ sthāṇuḥ sva svarūpe dṛḍham sthitaḥ atra api hetum viśeṣaṇa tvena āha acala

original: iti / yataḥ niṣkampa ity arthaḥ //MT_3,14.60 //
analyzed: iti yatas niṣkampaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu cidekamayatve sati vādinaḥ kimarthaṃ vivadanti ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu cit eka maya tve sati vādinaḥ kimartham vivadanti iti atra āha

original: vivadante yathā hy atra vivadante tathā bhramaiḥ / bhramanto na vayaṃ tv ete jātā vigatavibhramāḥ //MU_3,14.61//
analyzed: vivadante yathā hi atra vivadante tathā bhramaiḥ bhramantaḥ na vayam tu ete jātāḥ vigata vibhramāḥ

original: vādina iti śeṣaḥ / vādinaḥ tārkikādayaḥ / atra citprakāśe / yathā yena prakāreṇa /
analyzed: vādinaḥ iti śeṣaḥ vādinaḥ tārkika ādayaḥ atra cit prakāśe yathā yena prakāreṇa

original: vivadante vivādaṃ kurvanti / tathā bhramaiḥ mithyājñānaiḥ / vivadante / jñātatattvānāṃ
analyzed: vivadante vivādam kurvanti tathā bhramaiḥ mithyā jñānaiḥ vivadante jñāta tattvānām

original: vivādābhāvāt / tathā hi / tārkikāḥ ātmānaṃ jñānaguṇaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ ca kathayanti /
analyzed: vivāda abhāvāt tathā hi tārkikāḥ ātmānam jñāna guṇam saṃsāriṇam ca kathayanti

original: sāṅkhyāḥ udāsīnaṃ jñānarūpam api paramāṇurūpam / cārvākā bhūtarūpaṃ / bauddhāḥ śūnyarūpaṃ /
analyzed: sāṅkhyāḥ udāsīnam jñāna rūpam api paramāṇu rūpam cārvākāḥ bhūta rūpam bauddhāḥ śūnya rūpam

original: vedāntinaḥ śāntasvarūpaṃ / evam anye 'py anyat kiñcit / yady api ete 'dhikārikṛpayaiva
analyzed: vedāntinaḥ śānta svarūpam evam anye api anyat kiñcid yadi api ete adhikāri kṛpayā eva

original: vivadante tathāpi adhikāriṇāṃ tattatpadaniṣṭhānām adhaḥsthaṃ padaṃ parityajyordhvapadagamanārthaṃ
analyzed: vivadante tathā api adhikāriṇām tad tad pada niṣṭhānām adhas stham padam parityajya ūrdhva pada gamana artham

original: vādināṃ bhramaḥ uktaḥ / yadi vādinaḥ bhrameṇa vivadante tarhi yūyaṃ kathaṃ sthitāḥ
analyzed: vādinām bhramaḥ uktaḥ yadi vādinaḥ bhrameṇa vivadante tarhi yūyam katham sthitāḥ

original: ity / atrāha bhramanta iti / tu vyatireke / ete vayaṃ vigatabhramāḥ vādyuktanānāguṇottīrṇaśuddhacinmātrāṅgīkārāt
analyzed: iti atra āha bhramantaḥ iti tu vyatireke ete vayam vigata bhramāḥ vādi ukta nānā guṇa uttīrṇa śuddha cit mātra aṅgīkārāt

original: dūrībhūtamithyājñānāḥ / jātāḥ / kathambhūtāḥ / na bhramanta ity arthaḥ / nanu śrīvasiṣṭhena
analyzed: dūrībhūta mithyājñānāḥ jātāḥ kathambhūtāḥ na bhramantaḥ iti arthaḥ nanu śrī vasiṣṭhena

original: tanmatanirāsapareṇa vivāda eva kṛtaḥ / maivam / bodhanārthatanmatanirāse 'pi cinmātrāṅgīkāreṇaiva
analyzed: tad mata nirāsa pareṇa vivādaḥ eva kṛtaḥ mā evam bodhana artha tad mata nirāse api cit mātra aṅgīkāreṇa eva

original: sarvamatāṅgīkārāt / cinmātraṃ hi sarve 'ṅgīkurvanty eva / kiṃ tu tadviśeṣeṣu vivadante //MT_3,14.61 //
analyzed: sarva mata aṅgīkārāt cit mātram hi sarve aṅgīkurvanti eva kim tu tad viśeṣeṣu vivadante

original: punar api cidekamayatvam eva kathayati
analyzed: punar api cit eka maya tvam eva kathayati

original: dṛśye mūrte 'jñasaṃrūḍhe vikārādi pṛthag bhavet / nāmūrte tajjñakacite citkhe sadasadātmani //MU_3,14.62//
analyzed: dṛśye mūrte ajña saṃrūḍhe vikāra ādi pṛthak bhavet na amūrte tad jñaka cite cit khe sat asat ātmani

original: mūrte sthūle / dṛśye dṛśikriyāviṣaye bhāvajāte / kathambhūte / 'jñasaṃrūḍhe / ajñeṣu
analyzed: mūrte sthūle dṛśye dṛśi kriyā viṣaye bhāva jāte kathambhūte ajña saṃrūḍhe ajñeṣu

original: mūrkheṣu / saṃrūḍhe dṛḍhībhūte / mūrkhajñāte iti yāvat / vikārādi / ādiśabdāt pariṇāmāder
analyzed: mūrkheṣu saṃrūḍhe dṛḍhībhūte mūrkha jñāte iti yāvat vikāra ādi ādi śabdāt pariṇāma ādeḥ

original: grahaṇam / pṛthak bhavet / sthūlasya dṛśyasya vikārādidharmādhikaraṇatve yogyatāstīti
analyzed: grahaṇam pṛthak bhavet sthūlasya dṛśyasya vikāra ādi dharma adhikaraṇa tve yogyatā asti iti

original: bhāvaḥ / amūrte sūkṣme / tajjñakacite tattvajñeṣu sphurite / citkhe cidākāśe / vikārādi
analyzed: bhāvaḥ amūrte sūkṣme tad jñaka cite tattva jñeṣu sphurite cit khe cit ākāśe vikāra ādi

original: pṛthak na bhavet / kathambhūte citkhe / sadasadātmani sadasatsvarūpe / vikārādi yadi
analyzed: pṛthak na bhavet kathaṃbhūte cit khe sat asat ātmani sat asat svarūpe vikāra ādi yadi

original: sat tadāpi tanmayam eva / yady asat tadāpi tathaiveti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.62 //
analyzed: sat tadā api tad mayam eva yadi asat tadā api tathā eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: cittattvaṃ cetyarasataḥ śaktīḥ kālādināmikāḥ / tanoty ākāśaviśadāś cinmadhuśrīḥ svamañjarīḥ //MU_3,14.63//
cinmadhuśrīḥ cidākhyāvasantalakṣmīḥ / kālādināmikāḥ kāladeśādināmayuktāḥ / śaktīḥ
svamañjarīḥ tanoti vistārayati / kutaḥ / cetyarasataḥ cetyāsvādena yuktam / yuktaṃ
analyzed: sva mañjarīḥ tanoti vistārayati kutas cetya rasataḥ cetya āsvādena yuktam yuktam

original: ca vasantalakṣmyāḥ rasena mañjarītananam / śaktīḥ kiṃ / cittattvam cinmātrarūpiṇya
analyzed: ca vasanta lakṣmyāḥ rasena mañjarī tananam śaktīḥ kim cit tattvam cit mātra rūpiṇyaḥ

original: eva / śaktitadvator abhedāt / punaḥ kathambhūtāḥ / ākāśaviśadāḥ / na tu bhāsamānasthūlarūpayuktāḥ //MT_3,14.63 //
analyzed: eva śakti tadvatoḥ abhedāt punar kathaṃbhūtāḥ ākāśa viśadāḥ na tu bhāsamāna sthūla rūpa yuktāḥ

original: svabhāvena cinmātrasya cetyarūpatayā sphuraṇaṃ kathayati
analyzed: svabhāvena cit mātrasya cetya rūpa tayā sphuraṇam kathayati

original: svayaṃ vicitraṃ sphurati citkañcukam anāhatam / svayaṃ vicitraṃ kacati cidratnam apakāraṇam //MU_3,14.64//
analyzed: svayam vicitram sphurati cit kañcukam anāhatam svayam vicitram kacati cit ratnam apakāraṇam

original: citkañcukam / kañcukaṃ lakṣaṇayā paṭaḥ / cidākhyaḥ paṭaḥ / svayaṃ svabhāvena / vicitraṃ
analyzed: cit kañcukam kañcukam lakṣaṇayā paṭaḥ cit ākhyaḥ paṭaḥ svayam svabhāvena vicitram

original: sphurati citrapaṭavat vicitratāyuktaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ / vicitratā cārthacetyakṛtā
analyzed: sphurati citra paṭa vat vicitra tā yuktam bhavati iti arthaḥ vicitra tā ca artha cetya kṛtā

original: jñeyā / tathā cidratnaṃ svayaṃ vicitraṃ kacati / ratnasya ca kacanaṃ yuktam eva /
analyzed: jñeyā tathā cit ratnam svayam vicitram kacati ratnasya ca kacanam yuktam eva

original: svayam ity asyārthaṃ svayam evāhāpakāraṇaṃ iti //MT_3,14.64 //
analyzed: svayam iti asya artham svayam eva āha apakāraṇam iti

original: svayaṃ vilakṣaṇaspandaś cidvāyur ajaḍātmakaḥ / svayaṃ vicitravalanaṃ cidvāri na nikhātagam //MU_3,14.65//
analyzed: svayam vilakṣaṇa spandaḥ cit vāyuḥ ajaḍa ātmakaḥ svayam vicitra valanam cit vāri na nikhāta gam

original: vilakṣaṇaspandaḥ bāhyavāyoḥ vyatiriktaspandayuktaḥ / atra hetutvena viśeṣaṇam āha
analyzed: vilakṣaṇa spandaḥ bāhya vāyoḥ vyatirikta spanda yuktaḥ atra hetu tvena viśeṣaṇam āha

original: ajaḍātmaka iti / jaḍājaḍayoḥ spando 'vaśyaṃ vilakṣaṇa eva syād iti bhāvaḥ / vāri
analyzed: ajaḍa ātmakaḥ iti jaḍa ajaḍayoḥ spandaḥ avaśyam vilakṣaṇaḥ eva syāt iti bhāvaḥ vāri

original: nikhātagaṃ sat / vicitravalanaṃ vicitrasphuraṇaṃ bhavati / cidvāri tu nikhātagaṃ
analyzed: nikhāta gam sat vicitra valanam vicitra sphuraṇam bhavati cit vāri tu nikhāta gam

original: sat / vicitravalanaṃ na bhavati //MT_3,14.65 //
analyzed: sat vicitra valanam na bhavati

original: svayaṃ vicitradhātūccaiś cicchṛṅgam apanirmitam / svayaṃ citrarasollāsā cijjyotsnā satatoditā //MU_3,14.66//
analyzed: svayam vicitra dhātu uccais cit śṛṅgam apanirmitam svayam citra rasa ullāsā cit jyotsnā satata uditā

original: uccaiḥ cicchṛṅgam apanirmitam nirmāṇarahitam / vicitradhātu / vicitrā nānāvidhāḥ /
analyzed: uccais cit śṛṅgam apanirmitam nirmāṇa rahitam vicitra dhātu vicitrāḥ nānāvidhāḥ

original: dhātavaḥ bhūtākhyāni kāraṇadravyāṇi / yasmin / tat / bhavati / śṛṅgam api vicitradhātu
analyzed: dhātavaḥ bhūta ākhyāni kāraṇa dravyāṇi yasmin tat bhavati śṛṅgam api vicitra dhātu

original: vicitragairikādidhātuyuktaṃ bhavati / kiṃ tu nirmitam / svayaṃ cijjyotsnā citrarasollāsā
analyzed: vicitra gairika ādi dhātu yuktam bhavati kim tu nirmitam svayam cit jyotsnā citra rasa ullāsā

original: nānāvidhacetyarasollāsayuktā / tayā satatoditā bhavati / bāhyajyotsnāpi vicitrāmṛtarasollāsayuktā
analyzed: nānāvidha cetya rasa ullāsa yuktā tayā satata uditā bhavati bāhya jyotsnā api vicitra amṛta rasa ullāsa yuktā

original: bhavati / kiṃ tu śuklapakṣa evoditā bhavati //MT_3,14.66 //
analyzed: bhavati kim tu śuklapakṣe eva uditā bhavati

original: svayaṃ sadaiva prakaṭaś cidāloko 'malātmakaḥ / svayam astaṅgatevājñe jñe jñānād uditā citiḥ //MU_3,14.67//
analyzed: svayam sadā eva prakaṭaḥ cit ālokaḥ amala ātmakaḥ svayam a staṅga tā iva ajñe jñe jñānāt uditā citiḥ

original: ālokasya prakaṭatāguṇayuktatvāt iti bhāvaḥ / svayam iti / citiḥ svayaṃ ajñe mūrkhe /
analyzed: ālokasya prakaṭa tā guṇa yukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ svayam iti citiḥ svayam ajñe mūrkhe

original: 'staṅgateva bhavati / astaṅgatatvaṃ ca asyāḥ sthitāyāḥ api jñānāviṣayībhāva evāta
analyzed: a staṅga tā iva bhavati a staṅga ta tvam ca asyāḥ sthitāyāḥ api

original: ivaśabdopādānam / citiḥ svayaṃ jñe jñānayukte / jñānād uditā bhavati / yathākāśe
analyzed: iva śabda upādānam citiḥ svayam jñe jñāna yukte jñānāt uditā bhavati yathā ākāśe

original: jvalann api sūryo 'ndhaṃ praty anuditaḥ / netrasahitaṃ prati tūditaḥ / evam iyam
analyzed: jvalan api sūryaḥ andham prati anuditaḥ netra sahitam prati tu uditaḥ evam iyam

original: apīti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,14.67 //
analyzed: api iti bhāvaḥ

original: svayaṃ jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padaṃ sauṣuptam āgatā / svayaṃ spandi tathāspandi cittvāc citimahānabhaḥ //MU_3,14.68//
analyzed: svayam jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padam sauṣuptam āgatā svayam spandi tathā aspandi cit tvāt citi mahā nabhaḥ

original: citiḥ jaḍeṣu sthāvarādiṣu / jāḍyena jaḍabhāvena / svayaṃ sauṣuptapadaṃ suṣuptisthānam /
analyzed: citiḥ jaḍeṣu sthāvara ādiṣu jāḍyena jaḍa bhāvena svayam sauṣupta padam suṣupti sthānam

original: āgatā bhavati / citimahānabhaḥ cidākhyo mahākāśaḥ / svayam spandi sphurattāyuktaṃ
analyzed: āgatā bhavati citi mahā nabhaḥ cit ākhyaḥ mahā ākāśaḥ svayam spandi sphurat tā yuktam

original: bhavati / tathā tena prakāreṇāspandi śāntatāyukto bhavati / bāhyākāśasya tu vātarūpeṇa
analyzed: bhavati tathā tena prakāreṇa aspandi śānta tā yuktaḥ bhavati bāhya ākāśasya tu vāta rūpeṇa

original: saspandatvaṃ svarūpeṇāspandatvam //MT_3,14.68 //
analyzed: sa spanda tvam svarūpeṇa aspanda tvam

original: guṇini guṇavat citi jagataḥ sadasattvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: guṇini guṇavat citi jagataḥ sat asat tvam kathayati

original: citprakāśaprakāśo hi jagad asti ca nāsti ca / cidākāśaikaśūnyatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca //MU_3,14.69//
analyzed: cit prakāśa prakāśaḥ hi jagat asti ca na asti ca cit ākāśa eka śūnyatvam jagat asti ca na asti ca

original: hi niścaye / citprakāśaprakāśaḥ / citprakāśasya cidākhyasya tejasaḥ / prakāśaḥ ālokākhyaguṇabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: hi niścaye cit prakāśa prakāśaḥ cit prakāśasya cit ākhyasya tejasaḥ prakāśaḥ āloka ākhya guṇa bhūtaḥ

original: jagat asti ca nāsti ca / cakāraḥ svayaṃ astitvanāstitvayoḥ samapradhānatvaṃ dyotayati /
analyzed: jagat asti ca na asti ca cakāraḥ svayam astitva nāstitvayoḥ samapradhāna tvam dyotayati

original: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / yathā tejorūpe guṇini ālokākhyo guṇaḥ bhedena bhāsamānatvāt asti /
analyzed: ayam bhāvaḥ yathā tejaḥ rūpe guṇini āloka ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ bhedena bhāsamāna tvāt asti

original: tato vyatirekeṇa labdhum aśakyatvān nāsti / tathā jagad api cidākhye ādhārabhūte
analyzed: tatas vyatirekeṇa labdhum aśakya tvāt na asti tathā jagat api cit ākhye ādhāra bhūte

original: guṇini bhāsamānatvād asti / tadvyatirekeṇa labdhum aśakyatvān nāstīti / evam agre
analyzed: guṇini bhāsamāna tvāt asti tad vyatirekeṇa labdhum aśakya tvāt na asti iti evam agre

original: 'pi yojyam / cidākāśeti / cidākāśasyaikaṃ śūnyatvaṃ śūnyatvākhyo guṇaḥ / cidākāśaikaśūnyatvam //MT_3,14.69 //
analyzed: api yojyam cit ākāśa iti cit ākāśasya ekam śūnyatvam śūnyatva ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ cit ākāśa eka śūnyatvam

original: cidālokamahārūpaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca / cinmārutaghanaspando jagad asti ca nāsti ca //MU_3,14.70//
analyzed: cit āloka mahā rūpam jagat asti ca na asti ca cit māruta ghana spandaḥ jagat asti ca na asti ca

original: mahārūpaṃ bhāsuraḥ śuklākhyaguṇaḥ / cinmāruteti / spandasya ca vāyuguṇatvaṃ prasiddham eva //MT_3,14.70//
analyzed: mahārūpam bhāsuraḥ śukla ākhya guṇaḥ cit māruta iti spandasya ca vāyu guṇa tvam prasiddham eva

original: cidghanadhvāntakṛṣṇatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca / cidarkālokadivaso jagad asti ca nāsti ca //MU_3,14.71//
analyzed: cit ghana dhvānta kṛṣṇa tvam jagat asti ca na asti ca cit arka āloka divasaḥ jagat asti ca na asti ca

original: dhvāntasya ca kṛṣṇatvaṃ guṇaḥ / cidarketi / divasasyārkālokānuvidhāyitvāt tadguṇatvam //MT_3,14.71//
analyzed: dhvāntasya ca kṛṣṇa tvam guṇaḥ cit arka iti divasasya arka āloka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad guṇa tvam

original: pūrvoktaṃ dṛḍhayituṃ sarvathā cidguṇatvam eva jagataḥ kathayati
analyzed: pūrva uktam dṛḍhayitum sarvathā cit guṇa tvam eva jagataḥ kathayati

original: citkajjalarajaḥśailaparamāṇur jagadbhramaḥ / cidagnyauṣṇyaṃ jagallekhā jagac cicchaṅkhaśuklatā //MU_3,14.72//
cit eva kajjalarajaḥśailaḥ añjanādriḥ / tasya paramāṇuḥ / paramāṇoḥ parvataguṇatvaṃ
analyzed: cit eva kajjala rajaḥ śailaḥ añjana adriḥ tasya paramāṇuḥ paramāṇoḥ parvata guṇa tvam

original: tadāśritatvenopacārāj jñeyam / jagadākāraḥ jagadbhramaḥ / jagad iti yāvat / jagallekhā
analyzed: tad āśrita tvena upacārāt jñeyam jagat ākāraḥ jagat bhramaḥ jagat iti yāvat jagat lekhā

original: jagatpaṅktiḥ //MT_3,14.72 //
analyzed: jagat paṅktiḥ

original: jagac cicchailajaṭharaṃ cijjaladravatā jagat / jagac cidikṣumādhuryaṃ citkṣīrasnigdhatā jagat //MU_3,14.73//
analyzed: jagat cit śaila jaṭharam cit jala drava tā jagat  jagat cit ikṣu mādhuryam cit kṣīra snigdha tā jagat

original: jagat cicchailasya jaṭharam antaḥsthaḥ sārarūpaḥ bhāgaḥ / bhavati / dravatā dravatvaṃ / snigdhatā snehākhyo guṇaḥ //MT_3,14.73//
analyzed: jagat cit śailasya jaṭharam antaḥsthaḥ sāra rūpaḥ bhāgaḥ bhavati drava tā drava tvam snigdha tā sneha ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ

original: jagac ciddhimaśītatvaṃ cijjvālājvalanaṃ jagat / jagac citsarpiṣi sneho vīciś citsarito jagat //MU_3,14.74//
analyzed: jagat cit hima śīta tvam cit jvālā jvalanam jagat  jagat cit sarpiṣi snehaḥ vīciḥ cit saritaḥ jagat

original: cijjvālā cidākhyāgniśikhā / tasyā jvalanaṃ jvalanakriyā / vīceḥ racanārūpatvāt jalaguṇatvam //MT_3,14.74//
jagac citkṣaudramādhuryaṃ jagac citkanakāṅgadam / jagac citpuṣpasaugandhyaṃ cillatāgraphalaṃ jagat //MU_3,14.75//
analyzed: jagat cit kṣaudra mādhuryam jagat cit kanaka aṅgadam  jagat cit puṣpa saugandhyam cit latā agra phalam jagat

original: rūpatvena guṇatvam / phalasya latāguṇatvaṃ tadāśritatvenopacārāt //MT_3,14.75//
analyzed: rūpa tvena guṇa tvam phalasya latā guṇa tvam tad āśrita tvena upacārāt

original: phalitam āha
analyzed: phalitam āha

original: citsattaiva jagatsattā jagatsattaiva cidvapuḥ / atra bhedavikārādi na khe malam iva sthitam //MU_3,14.76//
analyzed: cit sattā eva jagat sattā jagat sattā eva cit vapuḥ atra bheda vikāra ādi na khe malam iva sthitam

original: ataḥ citsattaiva jagatsattā bhavati / jagatsattaiva cidvapur bhavati / na hi guṇasattā
analyzed: atas cit sattā eva jagat sattā bhavati jagat sattā eva cit vapuḥ bhavati na hi guṇa sattā

original: ādiśabdena pariṇāmāder grahaṇam / sthitaṃ na bhava-ti / kim iva / khe ākāśe / malam

iva

'vikalpyaṃ citsvarūpam eva kathayataḥ / tadabhinnasya tribhuvanasyāpi sattāsattātvam
analyzed: avikalpyam cit svarūpam eva kathayataḥ tad abhinnasya tribhuvanasya api sattā sattā tvam

analyzed: śilā hṛdaya pīnā api su ākāśa viśadā eva cit dhatte antar akhilam śāntam sat niveṣam yathā śilā
