original: piṇḍavat yaḥ grahaḥ / tena varjitam / yuktaṃ cākāśasya piṇḍagraharahitatvaṃ / vyomni
analyzed: piṇḍa vat yaḥ grahaḥ tena varjitam yuktam ca ākāśasya piṇḍa graha rahita tvam vyomni

original: cidākāśe / vyomamayaṃ cidākāśamayaṃ / citram ālekhyaṃ / saṅkalpapuravat saṅkalpollikhitapuravat /
analyzed: cit ākāśe vyoma mayam cit ākāśa mayam citram ālekhyam saṅkalpa pura vat saṅkalpa ullikhita pura vat

original: sthitam vyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ / saṅkalpapurasya cākāśamayatvaṃ tulādeśāpūrakatvaṃ ca yuktam
analyzed: sthitam vyavatiṣṭhamānam saṅkalpa purasya ca ākāśa maya tvam tulā deśāpūraka tvam ca yuktam

original: eveti siddhaḥ sarvasya jagataḥ vivakṣitaḥ atyantābhāvaḥ / yac cotpattiḥ pūrvam uktā
analyzed: eva iti siddhaḥ sarvasya jagataḥ vivakṣitaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ yat ca utpattiḥ pūrvam uktā

original: sāpy anutpattikalpatvenātyantābhāvasyaiva sādhanīti na pūrvāparavirodhaḥ //MT_3,15.16 //
analyzed: sā api anutpatti kalpa tvena atyanta abhāvasya eva sādhanī iti na pūrva apara virodhaḥ

original: atha jagataḥ tulādeśādyapūrakatvasādhakaṃ mahāvṛttāntaṃ vṛttāntakāmān prati kṛpayā kathayati
analyzed: atha jagataḥ tulā deśa ādya pūraka tva sādhakam mahā vṛttāntam vṛttānta kāmān prati kṛpayā kathayati

original: atredaṃ maṇḍapākhyānaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam / niḥsandeho yathaiṣo 'rthaś citte viśrāntim eṣyati //MU_3,15.17//
analyzed: atrā idam maṇḍapa ākhyānam śṛṇu śravaṇa bhūṣaṇam niḥsandehaḥ yathā eṣaḥ arthaḥ citte viśrāntim eṣyati

original: tvam / atra jagato deśādyapūrakatve / maṇḍapākhyānaṃ / maṇḍapeti nāmnā prasiddham
analyzed: tvam atra jagataḥ deśa ādya pūraka tve maṇḍapa ākhyānam maṇḍapa iti nāmnā prasiddham

original: ākhyānaṃ maṇḍapākhyānaṃ / śṛṇu / kathambhūtaṃ / śravaṇabhūṣaṇaṃ śravaṇārham ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: ākhyānam maṇḍapa ākhyānam śṛṇu kathambhūtam śravaṇa bhūṣaṇam śravaṇa arham iti arthaḥ

original: tataḥ kim ity / atrāha niḥsandeha iti / yathā yena / niḥsandehaḥ sandehān niṣkrāntaḥ /
analyzed: tatas kim iti atra āha niḥsandehaḥ iti yathā yena niḥsandehaḥ sandehāt niṣkrāntaḥ

original: eṣaḥ pūrvoktaḥ / arthaḥ / citte tvaccitte / viśrāntim eṣyati //MT_3,15.17 //
analyzed: eṣaḥ pūrva uktaḥ arthaḥ citte tvad citte viśrāntim eṣyati

original: tvarayāviṣṭaḥ śrīrāmaḥ maṇḍapākhyānaṃ prati śrīvasiṣṭhaṃ prārthayati
analyzed: tvarayā āviṣṭaḥ śrī rāmaḥ maṇḍapa ākhyānam prati śrī vasiṣṭham prārthayati

original: sadbodhavṛddhaye brahman samāsena vadāśu me / maṇḍapākhyānam akhilaṃ yena bodho vivardhate //MU_3,15.18//
analyzed: sat bodha vṛddhaye brahman samāsena vada āśu me maṇḍapa ākhyānam akhilam yena bodhaḥ vivardhate

original: jagataḥ tulādeśāpūrakatvajñānaṃ sadbodhaḥ / tasya vṛddhaye / phalitam āha yeneti / yena uditenety arthaḥ //MT_3,15.18//
analyzed: jagataḥ tulā deśa āpūraka tva jñānam sat bodhaḥ tasya vṛddhaye phalitam āha yena iti  yena uditena iti arthaḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ maṇḍapākhyānam eva kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ maṇḍapa ākhyānam eva kathayati

original: abhūd asmin mahīpīṭhe kulapadmo vikāsavān / padmo nāma nṛpaḥ śrīmān bahuputro 'tikośavān //MU_3,15.19//
analyzed: abhūt asmin mahī pīṭhe kula padmaḥ vikāsavān padmaḥ nāma nṛpaḥ śrīmān bahu putraḥ ati kośavān

original: asmin mahīpīṭhe padmo nāma nṛpaḥ abhūt / tasyaiva nānāvidhāni viśeṣaṇāny āha kuleti /
analyzed: asmin mahī pīṭhe padmaḥ nāma nṛpaḥ abhūt tasya eva nānāvidhāni viśeṣaṇāni āha kula iti

original: vikāsavān kulapadmaḥ / padmasya ca vikāso yuktaḥ / padmaśabdo 'tra lakṣaṇayā śreṣṭhavācakaḥ /
analyzed: vikāsavān kula padmaḥ padmasya ca vikāsaḥ yuktaḥ padma śabdaḥ atra lakṣaṇayā śreṣṭha vācakaḥ

original: atikośavān bahubhāṇḍāgārayuktaḥ //MT_3,15.19 //
analyzed: ati kośavān bahu bhāṇḍāgāra yuktaḥ

original: maryādāpālane 'mbhodhir dviṣattimirabhāskaraḥ / kāntākumudinīcandro doṣatṛṣṇāhutāśanaḥ //MU_3,15.20//
ambhodheḥ maryādapālanaṃ prasiddham eva / kāntākumudinīcandraḥ / candratvam asya tadvikāsakāritvena / doṣatṛṣṇāhutāśanatvaṃ doṣatṛṣṇādāhakatvena
analyzed: ambhodheḥ maryāda pālanam prasiddham eva kāntā kumudinī candraḥ candra tvam asya tad vikāsa kāri tvena doṣa tṛṣṇā hutāśana tvam doṣa tṛṣṇā dāhaka tvena

original: merur vibudhavṛndānāṃ yaśaścandrodbhavārṇavaḥ / saraḥ sadguṇahaṃsānāṃ kalākamalabhāskaraḥ //MU_3,15.21//
analyzed: meruḥ vibudha vṛndānām yaśaḥ candra udbhava arṇavaḥ saraḥ sat guṇa haṃsānām kalā kamala bhāskaraḥ

original: vibudhāḥ paṇḍitāḥ / ta eva vibudhā devāḥ / teṣāṃ / meruḥ bahukāñcanapradatvenāśrayatvena
analyzed: vibudhāḥ paṇḍitāḥ te eva vibudhāḥ devāḥ teṣām meruḥ bahu kāñcana prada tvena āśraya tvena

original: ca meruparvatasadṛśaḥ / yaśa iti / yaśaḥcandrodbhave 'rṇavaḥ samudraḥ / sadguṇarūpāṇāṃ
analyzed: ca meru parvata sadṛśaḥ yaśaḥ iti arṇavaḥ samudraḥ sat guṇa rūpāṇām

original: haṃsānāṃ saraḥ / kalā eva kamalāni / teṣāṃ vikāsapradatvena bhāskaraḥ //MT_3,15.21 //
analyzed: haṃsānām saraḥ kalāḥ eva kamalāni teṣām vikāsa prada tvena bhāskaraḥ

original: śātravāmbhodapavano mattamātaṅgakesarī / samastavidyādayitaḥ sarvāścaryaguṇākaraḥ //MU_3,15.22//
śātravaṃ śatrusamūhaḥ / sa evāmbhodaḥ meghaḥ / tasya pavanaḥ nāśakāritvāt / mātaṅgā
analyzed: śātravam śatru samūhaḥ saḥ eva ambhodaḥ meghaḥ tasya pavanaḥ nāśa kāri tvāt mātaṅgā

original: atra śatrusenā yā vivakṣitāḥ / samastā yā vidyārūpāḥ nāyikāḥ / tāsāṃ dayitaḥ patiḥ /
analyzed: atra śatru senāḥ yāḥ vivakṣitāḥ samastāḥ yāḥ vidyā rūpāḥ nāyikāḥ tāsām dayitaḥ patiḥ

original: sarve ca te āścaryabhūtāḥ guṇāḥ / teṣām ākaraḥ utpattisthānam //MT_3,15.22 //
analyzed: sarve ca te āścarya bhūtāḥ guṇāḥ teṣām ākaraḥ utpatti sthānam

original: śūrārisāgarakṣobhavilasanmandarācalaḥ / vilāsapuṣpaughamadhuḥ saubhāgyakusumāyudhaḥ //MU_3,15.23//
śūrāś ca te 'rayaḥ / tadrūpaḥ yaḥ sāgaraḥ / tasya kṣobhe vilasan mandarācalaḥ / vilāsā
analyzed: śūrāḥ ca te arayaḥ tad rūpaḥ yaḥ sāgaraḥ tasya kṣobhe vilasan mandara acalaḥ vilāsā

original: vibhramā eva / puṣpāṇi / teṣāṃ yaḥ oghaḥ / tasya madhuḥ vasantaḥ / vikāsakāritvāt /
analyzed: vibhramāḥ eva puṣpāṇi teṣām yaḥ oghaḥ tasya madhuḥ vasantaḥ vikāsa kāri tvāt

original: saubhāgyena subhagabhāvena / kusumāyudhaḥ kāmaḥ //MT_3,15.23 //
analyzed: saubhāgyena subhaga bhāvena kusumāyudhaḥ kāmaḥ

original: līlālatālāsyamarut sāhasotsavakeśavaḥ / saujanyakairavaśaśī durlīlālatikānalaḥ //MU_3,15.24//
līlā iva latā / tasyā lāsye nartane / marut / līlāyukta ity arthaḥ / sāhasam eva
analyzed: līlā iva latā tasyāḥ lāsye nartane marut līlā yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ sāhasam eva

original: hitāhitānapekṣaṃ karma eva / utsavaḥ mahaḥ / tasya keśavaḥ viṣṇuḥ / tasya hiraṇyākhyādivadhasāhasakāritvād
analyzed: hita ahita anapekṣam karma eva utsavaḥ mahaḥ tasya keśavaḥ viṣṇuḥ tasya hiraṇya ākhyā ādi vadha sāhasa kāri tvāt

original: upamānatvaṃ / saujanyam eva kairavaṃ / tasya vikāsakāritvāt śaśī candraḥ / durlīlālatikānāṃ
analyzed: upamāna tvam saujanyam eva kairavam tasya vikāsa kāri tvāt śaśī candraḥ durlīlā latikānām

original: dāhakatvād analaḥ agniḥ //MT_3,15.24 //
analyzed: dāhaka tvāt analaḥ agniḥ

original: tasyāsīt subhagā bhāryā līlā nāma vilāsinī / sarvasaubhāgyavalitā kamalevoditāvanau //MU_3,15.25//
analyzed: tasya āsīt subhagā bhāryā līlā nāma vilāsinī sarva saubhāgya valitā kamalā iva uditā avanau

original: tasya padmākhyasya rājñaḥ / līlā nāma bhāryā līlākhyā bhāryāsīt / asyā viśeṣaṇāny
analyzed: tasya padma ākhyasya rājñaḥ līlā nāma bhāryā līlā ākhyā bhāryā āsīt asyāḥ viśeṣaṇāni

original: āha subhageti / subhagā praśastarūpayuktā / vilāsinī vilāsayuktā / sarvasaubhāgyaiḥ
analyzed: āha subhagā iti subhagā praśasta rūpa yuktā vilāsinī vilāsa yuktā sarva saubhāgyaiḥ

original: valitā bharitāvanau bhūmau / kamalevoditā utpannā //MT_3,15.25 //
analyzed: valitā bharita avanau bhūmau kamalā iva uditā utpannā

original: sarvasampattivalitā līlāmadhurabhāṣiṇī / sānandamandacalitā dvitīyendūdayasmitā //MU_3,15.26//
analyzed: sarva sampatti valitā līlā madhura bhāṣiṇī sa ānanda manda calitā dvitīya indu udaya smitā

original: līleti / līlayā madhuraṃ bhāṣiṇī / sānandeti / sānandaṃ mandaṃ calitaṃ yasyāḥ / sā / dvitīyeti / dvitīyendūdayabhūtaṃ smitaṃ yasyāḥ / sā //MT_3,15.26//
analyzed: līlā iti līlayā madhuram bhāṣiṇī sa ānanda iti sa ānandam mandam calitam yasyāḥ sā dvitīyā iti dvitīya indu udaya bhūtam smitam yasyāḥ sā

original: alakālimanohārivadanāmbhojaśālinī / śītāṅgī karṇikāgaurī jaṅgameva sarojinī //MU_3,15.27//
alakālyā manohāri yat vadanāmbhojaṃ / tena śālinī / śītāṅgī śiśirāṅgī / karṇiketi /
analyzed: alakālyāḥ manohāri yat vadana ambhojam tena śālinī śītāṅgī śiśirāṅgī karṇikā iti

original: karṇikāvad gaurī / keva / jaṅgamā sañcāriṇī / sarojinīva / sarojiny api alimanohāri
analyzed: karṇikā vat gaurī kā iva jaṅgamā sañcāriṇī sarojinī iva sarojinī api ali manohāri

original: ambhojaśālinī śītāṅgī karṇikayā gaurī bhavati //MT_3,15.27 //
analyzed: ambhoja śālinī śīta aṅgī karṇikayā gaurī bhavati

original: latāvilāsakundaughahāsinī rasaśālinī / prabālahastā puṣpāḍhyā madhuśrīr iva dehinī //MU_3,15.28//
analyzed: latā vilāsa kunda ogha hāsinī rasa śālinī prabāla hastā puṣpa āḍhyā madhu śrīḥ iva dehinī

original: śālinī śṛṅgārasuśālinī / prabāleti / prabālavat hastau yasyāḥ / sā / puṣpeti / puṣpair
analyzed: śālinī śṛṅgārasuśālinī prabāla iti prabāla vat hastau yasyāḥ sā puṣpa iti puṣpaiḥ

original: ābharaṇabhūtaiḥ puṣpair / āḍhyā / keva / dehinī mūrtimatī / madhuśrīr iva / sāpi
analyzed: ābharaṇa bhūtaiḥ puṣpaiḥ āḍhyā kā iva dehinī mūrtimatī madhu śrīḥ iva sā api

original: kundaughaiḥ hāsinī / rasena vasantarasena / śālinī ca bhavati / śeṣaṃ samānam //MT_3,15.28 //
analyzed: kunda oghaiḥ hāsinī rasena vasanta rasena śālinī ca bhavati śeṣam samānam

original: avadātā tanuḥ puṇyā janatāhlādadāyinī / gaṅgeva gāṃ gatā devanadī haṃsavilāsinī //MU_3,15.29//
analyzed: avadātā tanuḥ puṇyā janatā āhlāda dāyinī gaṅgā iva gām gatā deva nadī haṃsa vilāsinī

original: avadātā tanuḥ sitāṅgī / puṇyā bhāgyavatī / janateti / janatāyāḥ āhlādadāyinī / haṃseti /
analyzed: avadātā tanuḥ sita aṅgī puṇyā bhāgyavatī janatā iti janatāyāḥ āhlāda dāyinī haṃsa iti

original: haṃsavat vilāsayuktā / keva / gāṃ bhūmiṃ / gatā / devanadī gaṅgeva / sāpi tādṛśy
analyzed: haṃsa vat vilāsa yuktā kā iva gām bhūmim gatā deva nadī gaṅgā iva sā api tādṛśī

original: eva bhavati //MT_3,15.29 //
analyzed: eva bhavati

original: tasya bhūtalapuṣpeṣoḥ sakalāhlādadāyinaḥ / paricaryāṃ ciraṃ kartum anyā ratir ivoditā //MU_3,15.30//
analyzed: tasya bhū tala puṣpa iṣoḥ sakala āhlāda dāyinaḥ paricaryām ciram kartum anyā ratiḥ iva uditā

original: puṣpeṣoḥ rateḥ paricaryāṃ kartuṃ yuktatvāt etad uktam //MT_3,15.30//
analyzed: puṣpeṣoḥ rateḥ paricaryām kartum yukta tvāt etat uktam

original: sargāntaślokena tasyāḥ satīguṇān āha
analyzed: sarga anta ślokena tasyāḥ satī guṇān āha

original: udvigne prodvignā muditā mudite samākulākulite / pratibimbasamā kāntā saṅkruddhe kevalaṃ bhītā //MU_3,15.31//
analyzed: udvigne prodvignā muditā mudite samākula ākulite pratibimba samā kāntā saṅkruddhe kevalam bhītā

original: sā kāntā / tasyeti śeṣaḥ / tasya rājñaḥ / pratibimbasamāsīt / kathambhūtā / tasmin
analyzed: sā kāntā tasya iti śeṣaḥ tasya rājñaḥ kathambhūtā tasmin

original: prodvigne sati / prodvignā / tasmin mudite sati / muditā / tasmin samākule sati /
analyzed: prodvigne sati prodvignā tasmin mudite sati muditā tasmin samākule sati

original: samākulā / tasmin saṅkruddhe sati / kevalaṃ bhītā / etāvanmātreṇaiva kevalaṃ sā viruddhāsīd
analyzed: samākulā tasmin saṅkruddhe sati kevalam bhītā etāvat mātreṇa eva kevalam sā viruddhā āsīt

original: iti bhāvaḥ / iti śivam //MT_3,15.31 //
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ // 3,15 //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ  /

original: oṃ tasya rājñaḥ tayā rājñyā saha krīḍām āha
analyzed: om tasya rājñaḥ tayā rājñyā saha krīḍām āha

original: bhūtalāpsarasā sārdham ananyavanitāpatiḥ / akṛtrimapremarasaṃ sa reme kāntayā tayā //MU_3,16.1//
analyzed: bhū tala apsarasā sārdham ananya vanitā patiḥ akṛtrima prema rasam sa reme kāntayā tayā

original: sa rājā / tayā līlākhyayā / kāntayā sahākṛtrimaḥ premarasaḥ yatra tat akṛtrimapremarasaṃ /
analyzed: sa rājā tayā līlā ākhyayā kāntayā saha akṛtrimaḥ prema rasaḥ yatra tat akṛtrima prema rasam

original: vakṣyamāṇeṣu sthāneṣu vakṣyamāṇaiḥ krīḍāviśeṣaiḥ / reme / tayā kiṃrūpayā / bhūtalāpsarasā /
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇeṣu sthāneṣu vakṣyamāṇaiḥ krīḍā viśeṣaiḥ reme tayā kiṃrūpayā bhū tala apsarasā

original: sa kathambhūtaḥ / ananyavanitāpatiḥ nānyavanitāyāḥ patiḥ / tasyām eva rata ity arthaḥ //MT_3,16.1 //
analyzed: sa kathambhūtaḥ ananya vanitā patiḥ na anya vanitāyāḥ patiḥ tasyām eva rataḥ iti arthaḥ

original: krīḍāsthānāny āha
analyzed: krīḍā sthānāni āha

original: udyānavanagulmeṣu tamālagahaneṣu ca / puṣpamaṇḍapatalpeṣu latāvalayasadmasu //MU_3,16.2//
analyzed: udyāna vana gulmeṣu tamāla gahaneṣu ca puṣpa maṇḍapa talpeṣu latā valaya sadmasu

original: udyānavaneṣu vihitāni yāni gulmāni veśmāni / teṣu / puṣpeti / puṣpaiḥ kṛtāni yāni maṇḍapatalpāni / teṣu / maṇḍapaḥ janāśrayaḥ / latāvalayasadmasu  #
analyzed: udyāna vaneṣu vihitāni yāni gulmāni veśmāni teṣu puṣpa iti puṣpaiḥ kṛtāni yāni maṇḍapa talpāni teṣu maṇḍapaḥ janāśrayaḥ latā valaya sadmasu

original: latāmaṇḍalagṛheṣu //MT_3,16.2//
analyzed: latā maṇḍala gṛheṣu

original: puṣpāntaḥpuraśayyāsu puṣpasambhāravīthiṣu / vasantodyānadolāsu krīḍāpuṣkariṇīṣu ca //MU_3,16.3//
analyzed: puṣpa antaḥpura śayyāsu puṣpa sambhāra vīthiṣu vasanta udyāna dolāsu krīḍā puṣkariṇīṣu ca

original: puṣpaiḥ racitā yāḥ antaḥpuraśayyāḥ / tāsu / puṣpeti / puṣpasambhāreṇa puṣpasamūhena yuktāḥ vīthyaḥ mārgāḥ / tāsu / vasanteti / vasante racitāḥ  #
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ racitāḥ yāḥ antaḥpuraśayyāḥ tāsu puṣpa iti puṣpa sambhāreṇa puṣpa samūhena yuktāḥ vīthyaḥ mārgāḥ tāsu vasanta iti vasante racitāḥ

original: udyānadolāḥ / tāsu //MT_3,16.3//
analyzed: udyāna dolāḥ tāsu

original: candanadrumaṣaṇḍeṣu santānakataleṣu ca / kadambanimbageheṣu pāribhadrodareṣu ca //MU_3,16.4//

analyzed: sthite sati bhartrā avalokitā vīkṣitā

original: adyaivārabhyaitadarthaṃ devīṃ jñaptiṃ sarasvatīm / japopavāsaniyamair ā toṣaṃ pūjayāmy aham //MU_3,16.30//
analyzed: adyā evā ārabhya etad artham devīm jñaptim sarasvatīm japa upavāsa niyamaiḥ ā toṣam pūjayāmi aham

original: adyaiva / na tu śvaḥ / etadarthaṃ bhartṛjīvasya svagehān nirgamābhāvārtham / jñaptiṃ
analyzed: adya eva na tu śvas etad artham bhartṛ jīvasya sva gehāt nirgama abhāva artham jñaptim

original: devīṃ svapratibhāṃ devīṃ / ā toṣaṃ prasādaparyantam / nanu jñaptyārādhanatayā kutaḥ
analyzed: devīm sva pratibhām devīm

original: śrutam / jñaptiprasādād eveti brūmaḥ / sarvatra jñaptiprasādasyaiva kāraṇatvāt /
analyzed: śrutam jñapti prasādāt eva iti brūmaḥ sarvatra jñapti prasādasya eva kāraṇa tvāt

original: agre vakṣyamāṇaḥ jñaptyupadeśaś ca svapratibhākṛtaḥ jñeyaḥ / yataḥ yat yat līlayā
analyzed: agre vakṣyamāṇaḥ jñapti upadeśaḥ ca sva pratibhā kṛtaḥ jñeyaḥ yatas yat yat līlayā

original: kṛtaṃ śrutaṃ vā tat svapratibhayaiva / yad api gurvādimukhena śrūyate tad api svapratibhayaiva /
analyzed: kṛtam śrutam vā tat sva pratibhayā eva yat api guru ādi mukhena śrūyate tat api sva pratibhayā eva

original: sarvatra svapratibhāyāḥ sthitatvāt //MT_3,16.30 //
analyzed: sarvatra sva pratibhāyāḥ sthita tvāt

original: cintānantaraṃ tatprayatnaṃ kathayati
analyzed: cintā anantaram tad prayatnam kathayati

original: iti niścitya sā nātham anuktvaiva varāṅganā / yathāśāstraṃ cacārograṃ tapo niyamam āsthitā //MU_3,16.31//
analyzed: iti niścitya sā nātham an uktvā eva vara aṅganā yathāśāstram cacāra ugram tapaḥ niyamam āsthitā

original: niyamam āsthitāśritā / taṃ vinā tapaso vyarthatvāt //MT_3,16.31//
analyzed: niyamam āsthitā āśritā tam vinā tapasaḥ vyartha tvāt

original: tat tapaḥ viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa kathayati
analyzed: tat tapaḥ viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa kathayati

original: trirātrasya trirātrasya paryante kṛtapāraṇā / devadvijaguruprājñavidvatpūjāparāyaṇā //MU_3,16.32//
analyzed: tri rātrasya tri rātrasya paryante kṛta pāraṇā deva dvija guru prājña vidvas pūjā parāyaṇā

original: trirātrasya trirātrasyeti vīpsāyāṃ dvitvam //MT_3,16.32//
analyzed: tri rātrasya tri rātrasya iti vīpsāyām dvi tvam

original: snānadānatapodhyānanityodyuktaśarīrikā / sarvāstikyasadācārakāriṇī kleśakāriṇī //MU_3,16.33//
analyzed: snāna dāna tapaḥ dhyāna nitya udyukta śarīrikā sarva āstikya sat ācāra kāriṇī kleśa kāriṇī

original: snānādiṣu nityam udyuktaṃ ceṣṭāyuktaṃ / śarīraṃ yasyāḥ / sā / sarveti / āstikyaḥ āstikayogyaḥ / kleśaḥ taporūpaḥ //MT_3,16.33//
analyzed: snāna ādiṣu nityam udyuktam ceṣṭā yuktam śarīram yasyāḥ sā sarvā iti āstikyaḥ āstika yogyaḥ kleśaḥ tapaḥ rūpaḥ

original: yathākālaṃ yathodyogaṃ yathāśāstraṃ yathākramam / toṣayām āsa bhartāram aparijñātatatsthitim //MU_3,16.34//
analyzed: yathākālam yathā udyogam yathāśāstram yathākramam toṣayām āsa bhartāram a parijñāta tad sthitim

original: aparijñātā / tasyā līlāyāḥ / trayam etat tapaḥ karotīty evaṃrūpā sthitir / yena / saḥ //MT_3,16.34//
analyzed: a parijñātā tasyāḥ līlāyāḥ trayam etat tapaḥ karoti iti evaṃrūpā sthitiḥ yena saḥ

original: trirātraśatam evaṃ sā bālā niyamaśālinī / anāratataponiṣṭham atiṣṭhat kaṣṭaceṣṭayā //MU_3,16.35//
analyzed: tri rātra śatam evam sā bālā niyama śālinī anārata tapaḥ niṣṭham atiṣṭhat kaṣṭa ceṣṭayā

original: anārateti / anārataṃ tapasi niṣṭhā yatra / tat / kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat / kaṣṭaceṣṭayā rātritrayānantaraṃ pāraṇādirūpayā duḥkhadayā ceṣṭayā //MT_3,16.35//
analyzed: anārata iti anāratam tapasi niṣṭhā yatra tat kriyā viśeṣaṇam etat kaṣṭa ceṣṭayā rātri traya anantaram pāraṇa ādi rūpayā duḥkha dayā ceṣṭayā

original: atha jñaptiprasādam āha
analyzed: atha jñapti prasādam āha

original: trirātrāṇāṃ śatenātha pūjitā pratimām itā / tuṣṭā bhagavatī gaurī vāgīśīdam uvāca tām //MU_3,16.36//
analyzed: tri rātrāṇām śatena atha pūjitā pratimām itā tuṣṭā bhagavatī gaurī vāgīśā idam uvāca tām

original: atha niyamānantaram / vāgīśī jñaptiḥ / gaurī śuddhasvarūpā / vāgīśītvam asyāḥ vācāṃ
analyzed: atha niyama anantaram vāgīśī jñaptiḥ gaurī śuddha svarūpā vāgīśī tvam asyāḥ vācām

original: mūlakāraṇatvena jñeyaṃ / pratimām itā śilādipratimām āśritā / svayā pratibhayā pratimāyām
analyzed: mūla kāraṇa tvena jñeyam pratimām itā śilā ādi pratimām āśritā svayā pratibhayā pratimāyām

original: ābhāsena tasyāḥ darśanaṃ dattavān iti bhāvaḥ //MT_3,16.36 //
analyzed: ābhāsena tasyāḥ darśanam dattavān iti bhāvaḥ

original: jñaptyā kathyamānaṃ vākyam āha
analyzed: jñaptyā kathyamānam vākyam āha

original: nirantareṇa tapasā bhartṛbhaktyatiśāyinā / parituṣṭāsmi te vatse gṛhāṇa varam īpsitam //MU_3,16.37//
analyzed: nirantareṇa tapasā bhartṛ bhakti atiśāyinā parituṣṭā asmi te vatse gṛhāṇa varam īpsitam

original: nirantareṇācchinnena //MT_3,16.37//
analyzed: nirantareṇa ācchinnena

original: jñaptivākyaṃ śrutvā rājñī tāṃ stauti
analyzed: jñapti vākyam śrutvā rājñī tām stauti

original: jaya janmajarājvālādāhadoṣaśaśiprabhe / jaya hārdāndhakāraughanivāraṇaraviprabhe //MU_3,16.38//
analyzed: jaya janma jarā jvālā dāha doṣa śaśi prabhe jaya hārda andhakāra ogha nivāraṇa ravi prabhe

original: śaśiprabhāyāḥ dāhadoṣanivārakatvaṃ raviprabhāyāḥ cāndhakāranivartakatvaṃ prasiddham eva //MT_3,16.38//
analyzed: śaśi prabhāyāḥ dāha doṣa nivāraka tvam ravi prabhāyāḥ ca andhakāra nivartaka tvam prasiddham eva

original: amba māṃ trijaganmātas trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām / idaṃ varadvayaṃ dehi yad iha prārthaye śubham //MU_3,16.39//
analyzed: amba mām trijagat mātar trāyasva kṛpaṇām imām idam vara dvayam dehi yat iha prārthaye śubham

original: kṛpaṇāṃ dīnāṃ / śubham iti varadvayaviśeṣaṇam //MT_3,16.39//
analyzed: kṛpaṇām dīnām śubham iti vara dvaya viśeṣaṇam

original: varadvayamadhye ekaṃ kathayati
analyzed: vara dvaya madhye ekam kathayati

original: ekaṃ tāvad videhasya bhartur jīvo mamāmbike / asmād eva hi mā yāsīn nijāntaḥpuramaṇḍapāt //MU_3,16.40//
analyzed: ekam tāvat videhasya bhartuḥ jīvaḥ mama ambike asmāt eva hi mā yāsīt nija antaḥpura maṇḍapāt

original: varadvayamadhye ekam idaṃ varaṃ dehi / kim ity apekṣāyām āha videheti / videhasya mṛtasya / mā yāsīt mā gacchatu //MT_3,16.40//
analyzed: vara dvaya madhye ekam idam varam dehi kim iti apekṣāyām āha videha iti videhasya mṛtasya mā yāsīt mā gacchatu

original: dvitīyaṃ kathayati
analyzed: dvitīyam kathayati

original: dvitīyaṃ tvāṃ mahādevi prārthaye 'haṃ yadā yadā / darśanāya varārthena tadā me dehi darśanam //MU_3,16.41//
analyzed: dvitīyam tvām mahādevi prārthaye aham yadā yadā darśanāya vara arthena tadā me dehi darśanam

original: dvitīyam idaṃ dehi / kim ity apekṣāyām āha tvām iti / he devi / ahaṃ tvāṃ yadā darśanāya prārthaye tadā tvaṃ varārthena varānurodhena / darśanaṃ  #
analyzed: dvitīyam idam dehi kim iti apekṣāyām āha tvām iti he devi aham tvām yadā darśanāya prārthaye tadā tvam vara arthena vara anurodhena darśanam
dehi

original: varadvayam aṅgīkṛtya jñaptya
analyzed: vara dvayam aṅgīkṛtya jñaptya
